address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
Nathaniel and Anthi were super friendly and considerate.
First, I received timely response upon my booking request. Then a detailed guidance was send to me before my check-in. During my stay, Anthi checked upon me to see if everything went well or if I needed any help. The check out process was also very easy and efficient.
The apartment is in awesome location close to the quite and hipster side of central, the room deco is stylish and simple, necessities were of high quality and aesthetics. Loved it.
So thrilled that Nathaniel is also a big fan of Monocle. I brought my own monocle travel guide with me yet to find Nathaniel has already prepared the Hong Kong edition along with other magazine subscriptions (;
Strongly recommend Nathaniel and Anthi’s place and big thumb’s up for their hospitality.

I really liked staying here.  It is a great location, easy to get to Central  (right near the escalator),  there is a supermarket on the next block, and it's easy to get cabs when needed.  The apartment is small (which is not unusual in Hong Kong!) , but super quiet, very clean, uncluttered, and had everything I needed for my three day stay.  The building is secure and has an elevator. Great place for a solo traveler.   Anthi, Nathaniel's sister, left some basics for me, and there was also a pod coffee machine, which I very much appreciated.  Also, the communication was superb.  I would definitely stay here again.

The apartment is super nice and clean with cozy decoration. Though the size is compact but everything you needed is there. (Not to mention most apartment in HK is compact anyway) Location is perfect for people who enjoy the nightlife of Soho and LKF. Since the apartment is located on the hill, the options getting there is quite limited. You can get there by taking the escalator but I highly recommend taking the taxi downhill as it only costs you about HK$30-40  then you have plenty options of transportations that you can take to places. 

Nate and Anthi are amazing. They have been super helpful and accommodating throughout our entire stay at the apartment. 

Thank you so much again. We highly recommend you to rent from them and we would love to stay here again in the future when I come back to visit.

This home is very central to everything at the HK island side. It is a decent size apartment and Anthi/Nath has been very prompt and hospitable since day one. Small thoughts like snacks, fruits, drinks upon arrival. Very clean and nicely decorated (a plus for people who like aseop shower items and those who need caffaine in the morning). Highly recommended.
gr8 location/gr8 apt/fantastastic host

I spent 1 month at Nathaniel's place and couldn't have felt more at home. The apartment is super nice, very bright and spacious with lots of stylish touches. Location is fantastic, right in the heart of Soho. Thank you, would definitely love to stay here again!

name: Sweet little space fully Equipped in Villeray
summary: Apartment very cutie and cozy. Access by car is easy due to the many parking spots in the streets. It is also easy to reach the subway Jarry and Fabre. Grocery stores, parks and restaurants are nearby. The apartment has a washer, dryer, bedrooms and fully equipped kitchen. It is perfect for couples and travelers alike.
space: Pretty 3 1/2 fully furnished 1 closed bedroom 1 semi-enclosed bedroom 1 sofa bed. Living room with television. Washer and dryer. Close to bus stops and subway Jarry and Fabre. Close to grocery stores. 20 minutes from the airport.
description: Apartment very cutie and cozy. Access by car is easy due to the many parking spots in the streets. It is also easy to reach the subway Jarry and Fabre. Grocery stores, parks and restaurants are nearby. The apartment has a washer, dryer, bedrooms and fully equipped kitchen. It is perfect for couples and travelers alike. Pretty 3 1/2 fully furnished 1 closed bedroom 1 semi-enclosed bedroom 1 sofa bed. Living room with television. Washer and dryer. Close to bus stops and subway Jarry and Fabre. Close to grocery stores. 20 minutes from the airport.
neighborhood_overview: L’arrondissement de Villeray–Saint-Michel–Parc-Extension est un véritable joyau de verdure. Ses rues bordées de grands arbres et ses espaces verts entretiennent une vie de quartier unique. Ses rues commerciales sont au cœur de véritables villages urbains. Ceux-ci sont animés par des gens de toutes origines qui prennent grand plaisir à se côtoyer. Territoire privilégié pour les plex, l’arrondissement offre des secteurs de maisons unifamiliales fort agréables. Les nouveaux condos ajoutent des options nouvelles aux ménages en quête d’un milieu de vie sympathique. Trois bibliothèques publiques, une Maison de la culture, de multiples installations sportives et de loisirs et quoi encore ? En fait, un espace urbain rêvé pour élever les familles. Les Activités dans le quartier: Parc Jarry La Tohu École nationale du cirque Stade Uniprix Le Taz Casa d’Italia La Maison des Grands-Parents de Villeray Complexe environnemental Saint-Michel
transit: Près des arrêts d'autobus et des métros Jarry et Fabre Station de Bixi à proximité  Stationnement gratuit dans la rue  Possibilité d’avoir une place de stationnement privé à l’arrière gratuite
interaction: Je suis disponible, en tout temps, à répondre aux questions des voyageurs par SMS, par e-mail et par téléphone.

host.host_about: Je suis une jeune étudiante passionnée de sports de planches, amoureuse de la nature et des voyages. Je désire faire profiter mon appartement aux autres voyageurs lors de mes absences.

reviews.comments: Très gentille filles ,  bel appartement ,  près de tout  j'ai vraiment aimé , merci
good

Adelyna is a wonderful host, she answered all our questions and she has a lovely home. She was able to give us directions to some great places. If your going to stay in Montreal this is a great place to stay.

Notre semaine chez Adelyna a été remarquable. L'appartement est propre, meublé avec beaucoup de goût et est très chaleureux : 2 canapés en cuir, une grande télé avec connexion internet et serveur Netflix, machine à laver et sèche linge, etc... tout y est ! Nous recommandons sincèrement cette location. Si vous voulez visiter Montréal il n'y a pas à hésiter car l'appartement est proche de toutes commodités et notamment de la station de métro Fabre. Je soulignerai une fois de plus la sympathie d'Adelyna et de sa famille que nous avons eu l'occasion de rencontrer. Merci.
L'appartement est bien situé, il est correct propre et bien équipé pour pouvoir séjourné

Nous avons séjourné une nuit chez Adelyna.  L'appartement est joli et plutôt chaleureux.  C'était propre et il nous a semblé qu'il y avait toutes les commodités nécessaires.  Nous avions réservé à moins de 24h d'avance mais tout était bien en ordre dans l'appart.  Nous n'avons pas rencontré Adelyna en personne mais elle nous avait laissé la clé à l'entrée avec un système doté d'un mot de passe qui fonctionnait tout à fait bien.  Point négatif à noter par contre, le bloc appartement comme tel est sale et délabré.  Il y avait entre autres des mégots de cigarettes par terre dans la cage d'escalier et on n'était pas rassurés à l'arrivée.  Mais une fois dans l'appartement c'était ok.  Merci Adelyna pour ton hospitalité!
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Adelyna was a fantastic host. She was quick to respond and made checking in and out very convenient. The apartment was accommodating, clean, and very spacious. Having access to Apple TV was a great finishing touch to staying in Adelyna's place. Exceeded expectations for the value. 

The apartment is located very close to the highway with ample street parking. It will be very convenient for guests who drive! Keep in mind to respect some of the parking restrictions though. We didn't think much of it and paid the consequences. Overall our trip was great, we will definitely stay at Adelyna's again!

logement situé à proximité de tous transports en commun (bus, métro), au calme et près des commerces (resto traditionnel et rapide).
et à côté de l'appart, le meilleur resto de poutine de la ville (primé au festival de la poutine à Montréal) !!!
Adelyna est très sympa, hyper disponible et pas avare de renseignements sur la ville.
le seul bémol, c'est les odeurs du PFK qui se situe juste à côté.
le logement était propre et soigné ... nous le recommandons pour un séjour familial de 4 personnes maxi et il répond à tous les besoins familiaux nécessaires

Nous avons séjourné chez Adelyna pendant presqu'un mois. La description et les photos sont conformes au logement, avec la gentillesse d'Adelyna en plus :-)
De notre arrivée jusqu'à notre départ, Adelyna a été un super hôte: disponible, réactive, toujours à l'aide et avec de bons conseils. Logement proche transports publics, supermarchés... Je recommande vivement chez Adelyna !

Adelyna was very easy and quick to communicate with.  The neighborhood and location were as described. Very quiet and seemed safe.   The apartment was cozy and as described as well. Bedrooms, bathroom and   Did not spend a lot of time at the apartment but it was a good stay overall.

Notre sejour chez Adelyna fut exceptionnel nous avons adoré les 4 mois passés dans ce logement. Appartement tout equipé, facilité d'accès aux transports ! 

Adelyna est une hôte exceptionnelle, disponible en tout temps et toujours aussi serviable ! 

Je vous recommande vivement cet appartement !
Hôte sympathique et attentionnée, bel appartement!
Everything was very good to stay in

Adelyna est une hote très réactive qui répond à nos besoins. Nous avons rencontré un problème d’adaptateurs, en moins de deux jours Adelyna avait arrangé le problème. L’appartement est très bien situé et très propre, on s’y sent très bien. Je recommande entièrement cet appartement ! Merci encore Adelyna

Adelyna's place was such a lovely home to stay in for a first-time trip to Montreal! It was located on a Main Street about 30-45 minutes outside of the main downtown/city area. Easy access to bus routes! The apartment was prepared with all the necessities (and more!) for bathroom and kitchen supplies, and the living room and bedrooms were stylish and homey. Adelyna was attentive and quick-to-respond to our needs and questions. Overall a great stay!

neighborhood_overview: Well in the Flamengo beach block, in the park area, in front of Açucar Hill, you can easily walk and do jogging and sport, picnic . The area is familiar and vibrating, with nice buildings of the old portuguese king era. Music, cinemas, pubs and amusements around. Famous Lapa nights very near. Between 2 to 5 underground  stops   to Botafogo, Copacabana, Ipanema beaches. Bem no bloco de praia do Flamengo, na área do parque, na frente do Pao de Açucar, você pode facilmente caminhar e fazer jogos e esporte, piquenique . A área é familiar e vibrante, com edifícios agradáveis da era do rei português. Música, cinemas, pubs e divertimentos ao redor. Famosas noites da Lapa muito (Website hidden by Airbnb) apenas   2 a  5 paradas de Metro para as  praias de  Botafogo, Copacabana, Ipanema.
notes: There is a washing machine in the terrace, a frigobar into the main bedroom. Towels, sheets, pillows, pressure cooker., pots, plates and cutlery for 6 people, coffee machine Italian  ( moca ) . Wifi, 1 tv no cable, dvd. Tem maquina de lavar particular. No apartamento estão disponíveis toalhas, roupa de cama, Travesseiros, Panela de pressão,panelas, pratos e talheres pra 6 pessoas. cafeteira italiana moka. Wifi, 1 tv com todos os canais abertos locais. aparelho de Dvd.
transit: The apartment is 10 minutes by car to the airport Santos Dumont, 40 to Galeao. Until 10:30pm you can take the airport bus 2018 in the street in front. O apartamento esta a 10 minutos de carro do aeroporto Santos Dumont, 40 do Galeao. Voce pode utilizar tambem a linha 2018 do onibus para aeroporto, que passa na rua da frente até as 22:30.
access: The apartment is located on the 3rd floor, no elevator, so it is not recommended for the elderly or people with walking difficulties. O apartamento está localizado no 3º andar, sem elevador, por isso não é recomendado para idosos ou pessoas com dificuldades de locomoção.
house_rules: - Smoking allowed on the terrace. - Permetido fumar no terraço.

host.host_about:
Sou cabelereiro e gosto de viver na minha cidade maravilhosa, amo viajar, ler, escutar musica, assistir um bom filme. Sou muito social e companheiro, tenho muito respeito da vida e do todos os seres umanos. No apartamento tenho um quarto vazio muito acochegante, moderno e espacioso que posso alugar.

I'm a brasilian haircut stylist, living in the beautiful city of Rio de Janeiro. I like traveling and making new friends. I am sociable and responsible and I love the respect for all human beings, am fond of movies, reading and photography, but I also appreciate musical evenings. 
I can share my renovated apt, I have a large spare double room.

Just 5 min walk from Circular Quay and Rocks, Oper House.  It’s opposite side of Wynyard station so you catch a train to travel or simply take a ferry to explore beautiful Sydney.

interaction: Reach out whenever you need! :-)
house_rules: - strictly no smoking  - no parties  - check in after 2pm - check out 11am - please wear provided slipper inside  - fee applies to late checkout and early check in - each guest must have their photo ID's upon check in or your stay may be refused.

host.host_about: Love travelling, food , meeting new people :)

reviews.comments: The host was very friendly and the location was prime
Great location and great host
Very convenient to city south, the rocks, Wynyard and circular quay. 2 supermarkets within 2 minutes walk. Plenty of food options.

Apartment in fantastic location, only 7 mins walk to opera house. Chloe was a wonderful host; very accommodating. We greatly appreciated the help she gave us to & from the station. A very thoughtful host.
Very good location, and Chloe was very flexible and responsive!

Chloe is such a wonderful and accommodating host. Her place was clean and as described, the location was super convenient to everywhere! She was also super helpful with recommending activities and things to do around Sydney. Her apartment was within short walking distance of all major tourist attractions. Highly recommended host, we will stay here again.
Central location, lots of great restaurants nearby and so easy to get around
The place was as expected, would gladly stay here again. Location is perfect, of note it is in a very expensive part of the city, but its Sydney so that is to be expected. Roof top pool is awesome.
My second, great experience with airbnb - thank you Chloe for being such a great host and for the fabulously located apartment.

Chloe was a great host and the location is fabulous. We loved our weekend in the city - close to public transport and easy walking distance to circular quay. We were 3 adults and it was just enough room for us.

The location of this apartment is prime! Easy walking distance to all the inner city attractions and as this apartment shares the building with a hotel, you feel safe coming and going as you please. 

There are currently major roadworks going on on George street (the street the apartment overlooks) which is really loud at night time as they work throughout the night. If you're sensitive to sound while sleeping, ask the host if they're still working or bring a good set of ear plugs ;)

Great location. There was a strong smell of damp throughout the apartment though and the bathroom was quite compact. Overall quite basic accommodation and we felt it was overpriced despite the good location
Fantastic host, great communication and very attentive. Perfect central location! Clean and practical apartment.
Just spent the weekend , Chloe very helpful , enjoyed our stay, close to everything , my family had a great time
Great location! Easy access to Opera House etc etc.

Right in the heart of Sydney CBD - great location.
Great communication with Chloe, she made the whole process very easy.
The apartment also has a portacot - which would be useful if travelling with the little ones.
Overall a very good stay.

Chloe was a great host, answered all of my questions promptly and very generously allowed us an early check-in and late check-out (mainly for bag storage).  The apartment was very quiet, rarely heard any traffic or other people.  As per pics it was nicely decorated.  There is a small but nice rooftop pool which got a little busy with children (ours included) in the afternoon.  There was also a rooftop BBQ together with stunning views would be a nice way to spend the evening if desired. It was extremely convenient to all modes of transport and many Sydney sights. All in all, I would highly recommend this apartment and Chloe as a host and we look forward to returning to Chloe's apartment next year.

Pros: 
Chloe was very responsive and accommodating to early and late check-in requirements.
Great lively location close to every thing - no need to rent a car. Walking distance to everything.

Cons: 
Check for construction schedules. The property was inaccessible for us when we arrived as the streets were closed for construction and our cab driver dropped us off several yards from the property with many pieces of our luggage. 
The Dryer was broken and we decided not to use the terrace pool as we did not have a dryer to dry clothes.
Got only ONE access card to the room and we were two families and had to depend on one another to enter the room.
Great - I would go back
Great central  location for a Sydney holiday.
Thank you for Chloe letting us living your so nice beautiful house!非常感谢房东,非常好的地段距离火车站仅2分钟步行,距离超市也很近
Perfect location!  Spotlessly clean apartment.  Would definitely recommend!
Great place with a great location, close to Sydney Harbour, would definitely stay again. The hosts were really nice.

Great location. It is a 5-10 minute walk to the Harbour. It worked perfectly for our family. The only thing we didn't like was the noise at night from Vivid but that was uncontrollable. Otherwise, great host and great place to stay!
Chloe was a great host. Very easy to get in touch with and was really understanding and accommodating when our travel plans went slightly awry. Apartment is perfectly positioned to explore Sydney .

Great, central location with clean, comfortable beds. Easy to walk to Circular Quay or Pitt Street Mall. Also, easy access to lots of little restaurants and shopping right across the street.

Just be aware there is currently heavy construction on George St which woke us up at 2a on a few nights as they were moving stuff around.

Chloe was very responsive to us prior to our stay. Chloe and her husband were great hosts and very pleasant to deal with and understanding. We were three adults and two toddlers and she had a baby cot and baby bath ready for us. The kitchen was also well-equipped. The apartment is neat and clean and very centrally located, some few hundred metres from the train station.
We were very comfortable at the apartment.
Note: One keycard to get into apartment so we had to coordinate a few times when doing different activities during the day/night, but it didn't really matter to us.
Chloe is very easy to work with and her place is in the perfect location for Sydney
Great location right in the centre of Sydney. Chloe was easy to work with, communicated well and was very flexible when we arrived earlier than expected. Thanks Chloe!

It's super convenient! Wynyard Station is just ard the corner! Heaps of nice restaurants and walking distance to most tourist spots, Darling Harbour, The Rocks, Chinatown! Feels at home always, after a long day tour!

Great location, comfortable bed. 
Great place. 
But, bring earplugs because the roadworks on George St go into the night.
Nice place, plenty of space and comfortable. Great communication.
Lovely apartment! We look forward to staying again.

The apartment is in a fantastic location, very close to public transportation and a grocery store. Plenty of space for our family of 4. Added bonus to have in-apt laundry and we all enjoyed the heated rooftop pool and hot tub. Kitchen was a little light on some supplies (oven mitts/potholder or dish towels), but that was only a minor inconvenience. Chloe was a very responsive host, we would definitely recommend this apartment to others.
The place is in the best location, close to everything. Very clean and spacious
Location is great. And Chloe is a friendly and helpful host. Five star!
Great place, central location and very welcome setting. Chloe is a great host and easy to get in touch with. Our check in and stay was very smooth, thank you very much!
Apartment was as expected. Only issue was getting the keys with the host being 45 minutes late.
This is the second time I have stayed here, it's a short walk to the Rocks. Clean and quiet with a great view. Would stay there again.

Chloe was really helpful with check in and check out on a busy public holiday weekend. The apartment really worked for us. 2 couples with 2 toddlers under 2. There is enough room in both bedrooms for a travel cot and all your luggage. Really central location. It is right at Wynyard station and is a 5 minute walk to Circular Quay, 7 minutes to Barangaroo, 10 minutes to Pitt St mall and a 20-25 minute walk to darling harbour. Plenty of parking around (Sydney CBD prices).

The apartment has a great location,easy to access to Circular Quay,Rock Trains and Darling harbor ,even the supermarket is very close,just 5 min by walk.The apartment was so good and well furnished living room,beds were so comfortable,the kitchen was a bit smaller,but you can find whatever you need.If you are looking for a good base to explore Sydney,this is a good one:))  Chloe is kind too.

The location of this apartment cannot be beat - if you are looking for a central place to base out of for touring Sydney's beautiful attractions, I highly recommend this location. The responsiveness of the hostess, Chloe, was terrific! All and all, a very pleasant experience.
Central location, clean, comfy and easy to access! Chloe was very easy to reach and very accomodating with everything!

Great location, very convenient and everything you would need can be found in this apartment. For the location, the price is of amazing value. Walkable distance to the local attractions. Chloe is friendly and easy to communicate with, will definitely recommend her apartment for others seeking a central city abode that doesn't break the bank.

The only down side to the place was that there was road work being done on the street at such an early time. Other than that, everything else was perfect. I'd recommend the place and stay there again.
Fantastic value and so central. Chole is a great host and very accommodating and great communicator. Will definitely stay again.
Great apartment, great location and good value for money :)
Great location and the owner is very easy to deal with. Will stay again.

Chloe has been a fantastic host and quick to respond to our needs. The apartment is just next to a train station, CBD shopping areas & tourist attraction, and not to mention a convenient store which makes it a very ideal apartment for a small family to stay. Will definitely love to stay at the apartment again in our next trip to Sydney.
Great location, lovely apartment, we enjoyed our stay, would recommend Chloe's place.
Great location. Comfortable beds. Quiet for middle of the city. Chloe was very easy to contact and was prompt I. Responding to our requests.
A great place! Amazing location for city sightseeing letting you walk everywhere. Chloe was excellent in helping us out and very communicative!
Great location for a City visit. Good size and very clean.

Chloe's apartment was very convenient for us as it is in a great location. You can easily walk to Circular Quay, The Rocks, Darling Harbour etc if that's what you are in Sydney for. The beds were very comfortable. Chloe was a very good host, very flexible and accomodating. Would highly recommend staying here.
Very good location - easy to access everything & good host - easy to communicate with Chloe.

The location is a few steps to the major attractions of Sydney, very convenient for everything. Chloe is a kind host and offered us the most necessary help. If parking your car down the apartment building even for short time remember someone must stay in the car to tell the inspector that you are leaving soon.
Chloe was a ray of sunshine and went out of her way to meet us early.
Great location! Nice place. Would recommend
the apartment was such as chloe showed in her photographs, everything was  clean and right.the best was the location

The perfect place to stay for a trip to Sydney! It’s so Central, only 5 minutes to Circular Quay and just across the road from a supermarket which was very convenient! The apartment itself was clean and tidy and had all the facilities we needed for a few days stay in Sydney, would 100% stay here again!

Chloe's place was the perfect location, as we love to walk to everything downtown.  The 2 bedrooms were great for 2 couples, and the washer/dryer saved us.  Chloe's communications pre, and during stay were fast, and helpful, including meeting us with the key.  And value was Excellent 5 of 5 stars!!

Great unit in a perfect location . I can certainly recommend. 

There was works going on in George Street which was a bit noisy.
Great location and value for money. Chloe was pleasant to deal with and was happy to accommodate us dropping our bags off early. Will definitely stay here again on our next trip to Sydney.
Spacious. Great location with the city, piers, services and sights all in walking distance.

Lägenheten är definitivt inte för 5 personer då det inte finns utrymme för mera än 4 personer.
Vi fick inte information om det inte fanns 5 sängar.
Nödlösningen med en luftmadrass var inte acceptabelt.
Lägenhetens läge var utmärkt 
Heltäckningsmatta i lägenheten är inte bra då den kräver en extremt god städning vilket kan ifrågasättas eftersom det låg så mycket med damm på kylskåpet i köket och köket är helt integrerat med vardagsrummet. De 2 sovrummen var helt ok men det var nästan omöjligt att få utrymme i vardagsrummet med den uppblåsbara luftmadrassen, som inte kan sägas vara en säng utan en NÖDLÖSNING. Lägenheten skall inte hyras ut till 5 personer, för 4 personer är den OK

Chloe was super helpful when we arrived, even helping us with our many bags up to the apartment. The apartment is well stocked with pretty much everything you'd need, we only cooked once or twice but everything you could need was there. 

The apartment is in a great location for seeing the sights. 3 adults and a baby were comfortable, albeit slightly squished, especially in the bathroom which is a tight space, we only just had room for the baby bath and adult to shower at the same time, but we managed ok for 5 days, but that would be our only comment, everything else was great.

We'd certainly recommend staying at Chloe's place!
Very conveniently located. Chloe was very helpful and the apartment is great.

The apartment is very conveniently located, very close to the opera, the transport hub at at Circular Key, shopping streets, dining area in the Darling Harbour. The place is cosy and clean, equipped with everything we needed.
The place is very cozy and in great location. Chloe is super friendly and helpful. A recommended place to stay with family. ❤️
Awesome space, awesome location! Definitely would recommend!
Great location however a lot of roadwork around the property.  Very convenient.
Séjour très agréable. L’appart est comme sur les photos. Piscine super sur le toit. Très bien placé et très agréable pour une famille de 4.
Great location in an upscale building.  Walking distance to EVERYTHING!  Communication was flawless.  Check in/ check out a breeze.  Chloe is a great host!

On booking Chloe's apartment, I contacted her several times about check-in due to flights changing. She always got back to me within the hour and was very helpful with directions to her place (even sending pictures of the front door etc.) We had to get a very late check -in and she was very accommodating with this. 
When we arrived at Chloe's apartment it was exactly as it is on the pictures and was stocked with plenty of amenities (tea, coffee, breakfast goods, toiletries and tourist information). She had also very kindly left three Opal cards for us to access public transport easily, which we made use of.
Her apartment could not be more central as within minutes we were in the shopping area or The Rocks near the harbour. As this was our first time in Sydney, this made it very easy to navigate and see all the attractions we had intended to.
She had high speed Wi-Fi in the apartment and the rooftop pool and spa definitely relaxed us in the evenings. We also made use of the hotel restaurant which had very friendly staff and good food. On leaving our holiday the front desk organised a taxi for us and Chloe made the check-out very simple for us.
Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed our trip and would recommend using Chloe’s apartment to anyone looking to visit Sydney’s attractions.

All the communication between Chloe was straightforward and easy. There was a thoughtful welcome gift left and Chloe allowed us to extend our check out by one hour which was greatly appreciated. We’d recommend at any time
地理位置非常好 可以步行到达shopping center 悉尼歌剧院 住的也很舒适

Thank you for having us, and for your wonderful communication along the way. The hotel/apartment is in an awesome location (right across from Wynyard), and close to Circular Quay. There are roadworks on George St, but they didn't bother us at all. It's a very convenient location if staying in Sydney. There were 2 of us staying in the place, and we had plenty of room. The place was very clean too.

Perfect location!  Couldn’t have been easier to see the sites. The apartment had nice amenities and was comfortably cozy. Chloe was easily accessible and responsive. 

Do Consider adding an extra day for luggage storage. Arriving from Dallas on a 6 am flight doesn’t provide many options. We ended up storing luggage at smarte carte in the Rocks which worked out ok.  

We will be back again!
A nice CBD location close to the business district for business travellers. Nice location with lots of local places to dine.
all good!
Great location in the centre of Sydney. Chloe was very accomodating to us, allowing us a late checkout so that our 1-year-old could have a nap.

Great location for (Website hidden by Airbnb) works a bit noisy but only started early on one day. Kitchen well equipped to cook a couple of meals in....lots of options nearby for eating out. Chloe was very friendly, efficient and helpful...perfect host!...
地理位置优越,过个马路就是地铁站,出行非常方便｡
Great location, convenient to everywhere. Bed is comfortable.

This was a perfect location and a wonderful apartment. We plan to visit Sydney more often and have found our place. 
Chloe is great with communication and the check in was super easy.

This apartment is in such a perfect location, everything is within walking distance. It is very cosy and has everything you should ever need. Truly like a home away from home. Chloe was great at replying to any questions we had and her staff member, Crystal was equally as helpful. It just made our first ever trip to Sydney that much more enjoyable.

This apartment (in a hotel) is in a great location in the heart of Sydney's main attractions and easily accessible by public transport. Grocery store, shops, Sydney Harbor, etc were all within very short walking distance as described. 

The apartment itself is spacious and clean. Makes for a good base to prep breakfast and do laundry. Beds were comfy.  As mentioned in the description there is ongoing light rail work but w/ windows closed the noise isn't bad. 

Finally the host was responsive to messages and check in was smooth.
Chloe is always available to help and very responsive.. thank you Chloe!!
Awesome location and super comfortable appartment. Just loved it, felt like home
the house is very good
Chloe was slow to respond, and didn't respond to messages sometimes. Otherwise a great stay! Great location.
Chloe’s place was fantastic for 2 girls on a reunion weekend could walk everywhere , circular quay rocks markets shopping everywhere just great
Great location and wonderful space. A great way to start a trip to Sydney.
Very happy
Chloe was a great host. Very quick to respond and very accommodating. She made my Dad’s stay very easy with early check in and late check out.
Great hosting

This place is in an awesome location, within easy walking distance to several public transport options and many attractions. It is in a building shared with a hotel, and although reception has nothing to do with this AirBnB, it means when you come home at night you feel safe. The apartment is spacious, and it has good air conditioning. There is currently some building work on George Street, but it was not an issue, it's on a par with any other city noise you would expect in a town - we did not notice it at all and it was very quiet at night. We stayed for 6 nights and we were not disturbed by any people or traffic noise at all. The beds were very clean and comfy, there is plenty of linen/towels in the flat, and also some basic food (tea, milk, sugar) and toiletries, which is great when you arrive after a flight. The kitchen has an oven, microwave and gear for cooking at home, and the supermarket is less than 200 metres away, and there are a variety of restaurants etc nearby. The landlady is lovely and super responsive, and sorted any questions etc before we even unpacked. The apartment is very comfortable. Thank you for a lovely stay.
Great location, 2 minutes away from Wynyard station and shops.

This Apartment has got to be in one of the best locations in Sydney. 
Great Host
Chloe was very accommodating especially as we had a very late arrival and we required late checkout. The location is ideal.

늦은 체크인을 부탁하였으나 연락이되지않아 새벽 두시 넘어서까지 기다리다가 다른호텔에 숙박하여야했습니다. 컨디션이 좋지않던 저희 엄마는 이일로 인해 시드니 여행내내 약을 달고 사셔야 했습니다. 호스트와는 결국 연락이 되어 호텔비와 숙박비를 돌려받긴 하였으나, 시드니 도착날과 그 다음날 컨디션과 기분이 엉망이 되어버렸습니다. 예약한 다음날 숙소에 들어와보니 건조기안에는 세탁물이 가득했으며, 부엌선반의 기름은 유통기한이 지난것이 었습니다. 변기도 더러웠으며 ,커피머신의 캡슐은 커피머신과 맞지않는것이었습니다. 숙소바로앞 죠지스트리는 한참 트램공사중이라 시끄럽습니다. 침대는 편했습니다.

name: Cute Cozy Rooftop Apt. 2 BR. Wan Chai MTR
summary: My place is located in the heart of the city. Super convenient. Just opposite to Wan Chai MTR exit A1. 7 mins to the Convention Centre by foot, and 10 mins to Central by MTR. The building is located right at the main street of Wan Chai and it's busy at both day and night. However, the house itself is quiet. The rooftop is on 14/F and the elevator goes up to 13/F. You'll need to walk one flight of stairs to reach there, and enjoy a nice view of rooftop. Self check-in available.
space: The apartment is located at the rooftop with lots of windows. The space is small but very bright, cozy and well organised. Big roof space just outside the door. Great for chilling and enjoy a bit of a view in our city (full of buildings). The three beds are all single bed size (one single bed and another one with a slide out single bed, you can check out the photos).  We will prepare clean towels and bed linens for you.
description: My place is located in the heart of the city. Super convenient. Just opposite to Wan Chai MTR exit A1. 7 mins to the Convention Centre by foot, and 10 mins to Central by MTR. The building is located right at the main street of Wan Chai and it's busy at both day and night. However, the house itself is quiet. The rooftop is on 14/F and the elevator goes up to 13/F. You'll need to walk one flight of stairs to reach there, and enjoy a nice view of rooftop. Self check-in available. The apartment is located at the rooftop with lots of windows. The space is small but very bright, cozy and well organised. Big roof space just outside the door. Great for chilling and enjoy a bit of a view in our city (full of buildings). The three beds are all single bed size (one single bed and another one with a slide out single bed, you can check out the photos).  We will prepare clean towels and bed linens for you. Just as you are at home! Please advice me if you have any feedback and questions. I'd love to
neighborhood_overview: Wan Chai is an unique place packed with old/new culture - historical buildings, local market as well as concept restaurants, bars, coffee shops with western influence. Fun place to explore. Hope you like it as much as I do! My place is located right in the middle of the main street of all the bars and pubs therefore it's very busy at night. Might not be suitable for you if you mind the busy night life activities. The house itself is quiet tho.
transit: To get around:  Wan Chai MTR station, Exit A1, is just across the road from the building. You can also easily take MTR, trams to go to everywhere in the city. From Airport: By bus, you can take A11 to Wan Chai and take off at Fleming Road, Hennessy Road.  By Airport Express, take off at Hong Kong station and then change MTR to Wan Chai, exit A1.
access: Just as you are at home!
interaction: Please advice me if you have any feedback and questions. I'd love to offer as much help as I could.
house_rules: I appreciate you do not smoke in the house area. But feel free to smoke at the rooftop area.

host.host_about: Hello there, I'd like to make Airbnb a great experience for both of us. :)

address.street: Wan Chai, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Nice place.非常方便,就在灣仔地鐵站口,房間小清新,乾淨,設施齊全,兩個小臥室兩張單人床,非常適合朋友閨蜜們一起住｡房東很熱情,在香港能租到這個房子很不錯啦｡

Three of us stayed here while we attended a trade show at the convention center. It was very convenient (across from the MTR exit and taxi stand at the door). Jessica was also kind enough to wait for us when our flight was delayed in arriving by about 2 hours. I would happily stay here again.

Outstanding, unexpected, memorable, unique, picturesque are but a few adjectives to describe Jessica's penthouse. It is one of these listings you can only find on AirBnB or through hearsay from friends. Your first reaction might be surprise or even wondering if you got to the correct place, but it will quickly leave you when entering the cutest, best equipped, cosiest place I've been given to stay at in my many visits to HK. 
It is simply the perfect fit for people who are tired of faceless hotel rooms and who love Hong Kong.
Many thanks for letting us stay there Jessica and be ready: we will be back :-)

This is one awesome apartment. Very private as it is on the penthouse level. Less than a min walk to the entrance of the MTR. The host provides Netflix, nespresso, tea and toiletries. Very spacious rooms and nice beds. The eateries downstairs is very popular with the locals. Very near to a few famous restaurants like Kam's roast. The host also responded very fast to our inquiries. This is one of the best Airbnb we stayed. Highly recommended.
We had such a great time at Jessica's apartment. Great location, and cozy home with lots of light. We will be back. Thank you!

All went well. Internet worked well and tv.  I think for roof top you need lounge equipment.  The shower was great and the beds comfortable.  The area was a bit subject but the convenience to the Hong Kong convention center was great

Fantastic host, Jessica: extremely helpful, cordial person. I cannot express how I appreciate her help and hospitality.
Thank you, dear Jessica.

We really liked this apartment, clean, light, central to everything and Jessica was a delight to deal with.  It's not conventional and has it's idiosyncrasies but for those wanting something out of the ordinary but affordable... book this!
房子私密性很好,干净整洁,有些小心思｡很温馨的房屋,深度睡眠喷雾和绘画本,都体现出房主的用心｡离地铁超级近,过个马路就是｡楼下的美食店也很棒,可以买早餐或是夜宵｡
Excellent location, Jessica is a perfect host, everything needed is there including a Nespresso machine! The rooftop is a wonderful "extra"!
床非常舒服,生活用品一应俱全,比酒店还棒!还有胶囊咖啡机!交通便利,出门就是湾仔地铁站,整体体验非常棒
Great, cozy, rooftop apartment located in the heart of Hong Kong. Easy access to transportation.

Мы останавливались в квартире на 2 дня. Общение с Джессикой было замечательным, очень отзывчивая и приятная девушка, на все вопросы отвечала нам очень быстро. Расположение квартиры очень удобно, центр, вход в метро напротив дома, вокруг есть и магазины, и кафе. 
Квартира небольшая, но мы разместились с двумя детьми. Важно, что действительно чисто, хорошие кровати, белье и полотенца, а также разные приятные мелочи вплоть до зубных щёток .
Мы остались очень довольны своим выбором и можем рекомендовать с удовольствием этот вариант проживания в Гонконге.
Джессика, спасибо!

Excellent location for us 2 work colleagues who were attending a trade show at the Convention Centre. The apartment had 2 small bedrooms with single beds, and was well fitted out with everything we needed. It was very clean and easy to access, check in etc. The highlight was the balcony, where we could relax and have a beer at the end of each long day. I def recommend this place and would love to stay here again.
Perfect location in Wanchai! Super terrasse for breakfast and chilling! Quiet! Jessica couldn'tbe a better host! Highly recommended!

This is a beautifuly-decorated, cosy and comfortable apartment that is close to the MTR and useful shops and ATMs/banks. 

The Nespresso machine and pods and tap filter are brilliant additions, as well as the free toiletries. 

Ideal for two single people/friends travelling. It might have been a bit of a squeeze to use the third bed.

Fantastic to have a private roof with seating area - we loved hanging out there! 

Highly recommended!
It's a very nice place that you can enjoy a great and warm service there, we like it so much.

It's location is great because there is a 7-11 located just opposite of where you stay. You have the MTR right across the street. The owner was quick in replying so I thought the communication was good. It's a good place where you can spend your time with your friends at the rooftop.

It would be great if there is more lightings provided at the rooftop. And it may not be suitable for couples as there are only single beds.

Overall, my friends and I are satisfied and pleased to have came across this apartment. Would definitely consider when going back to Hong Kong.
房子还是挺好的,就是太靠近夜场了,女孩子住在那里不是很方便
地点在湾仔,离地铁站很近,房子虽然小点,但整洁,功能也齐全,房东也很热情,有问必答

The apartment is on a block with some adult businesses -- so if the presence of that offends you, you might want to look elsewhere. It didn't bother us! The apartment was charming. Fantastic location and an incredible value for a 2BR compared to other rentals in Hong Kong. Highly recommended!

Communication with Jessica was super easy, she always replied within minutes. High accuracy - you will find everything like described. We loved the place - it is within walking distance from shops, restaurants, nightlife, public transport and nevertheless quiet. The rooftop area is nice for having a drink although it can get really hot. Highly recommend Jessica's place!

Great small apartment directly across from the MTR station. 2 Bedrooms (with curtains in doorways).  Comfortable beds and comforters with duvet covers. Had a little trouble getting the TV to work. A/C, hot water and Wifi all worked well. Had a fantastic time and would recommend this apartment!
Superb location in the centre of Wan Chai and right by the station - would definitely recommend to any first visitors to the city.

Great for singles and small families. Not so for groups with elderly as need to walk up stairs to the apartment. Although the rooftop area and pipes outside looked old and building had a massage parlour on one floor, the rooftop apartment was bright, cosy and cheery. Aircon was good to keep cool on hot day and bed was comfortable. Instructions and responses were clear. Very near to MTR exit and 7-11. Lots of food options around, including Cafe De Coral nearby, and a stall selling egg waffles and curry fish balls just downstairs. Well-kept place!

Really good and great value for money accommodation. Helpful and spot on host. Superb location for us next to Convention Centre in HK (were there for conference). Good Aircon, from the outside looks a bit dated (as everything in HK) but really nice inside. clean, spacious (to HK standards), good electricity, reasonable wifi speeds, Nespresso machine and capsules. LOVED ID, would return and recommend.
It is actually very great though little bit small
Cosy place very close to the metro.

Unique little apartment on a Wanchai rooftop. Very central. 
On a sunny day, it's like having your own private beach. Bathroom has two windows, really nice light.
Only issues were small mattresses (one"twin" in each time room), and unusable WIFI - really a problem if you have to do work while traveling.
MTR역 바로 앞에 있어서 좋았어요.

My stay in Jessica's apartment was wonderful and highly recommended.  Her communication was very quick with any question I had, and her apartment was easy to find and access.  The building is next to an elevated walkway leading directly to the nearby conference center, so it was the PERFECT for attending events there. AC and internet were flawless, subway access immediate, food options plentiful.  Stay here.
Awesome location, great coffee machine.  Snug apartment but actually well-sized for Hong Kong.
Nice location, easy access!

Great location right next to Wan Chai station! Excellent value for money! Clean, comfortable and much better than expected! 
Free wifi and Netflix a bonus! 
Overall great value!

Super close to the station,  this small clean cool apartment has heaps of welcoming touches that make a difference - complimentary tea/coffee/toothbrushes, Netflix, key safe check in. A very convenient and comfortable place to stay.

This place is such a great find! Stayed here with our 2 year old and loved every minute of it. 3 air conditioners, unbeatable location. MTR is literally 20 metres from the front door. Wan Chai local area is great. Awesome food, just a 20 minute walk to the waterfront. Really quick and helpful communication with Jessica. Highly recommend staying here!

This place was absolutely amazing! It’s literally right across the street from an MTR station. It was a super convenient!

I’d definitely recommend this place for anyone going to Hong Kong!
Great location right next to the MTR, lots of local eateries and taxis. Good value for money and Jessica was great at responding to any enquiries!
Very nice place and location
The place is fantastic. Great location. Great privacy. Every details is well thought of. Plenty of plates and utensils. I would definitely come back to stay here again.

Leuk klein appartementje op de top van de wereld. Kleinhuisje boven op flatgebouw. Van alle gemakken voorzien. Ijskast, nespresso apparaat (zelfs met wat koffie) een waterkoker en voor de liefhebbers tv met netflix. 

Makkelijk vlakbij de metro. In een lekker bruisend buurtje. Inderdaad met wat nachtclubs maar daar heb je verder geen last van en het voelt ook als een veilige buurt). Je bent overal zo met de metro. In de straat achter het appartement zit een iets grotere supermarkt met meer verse producten dan de 7eleven.

Coole Location. Wir kam im Dunkeln an, folgten der Wegbeschreibung, fuhren auf das Dach und waren erstmal ein klein wenig ratlos, ob man da tatsächlich irgendwo wohnen kann..und sahen dann das kleine Häuschen. Sehr privat, und mit der Dachterrasse großzügig und weitläufig im sonst so engen Hong Kong. Die Wohnung selbst ist so wie auf den Fotos. Die Lage ist top. Wir würden die Wohnung wieder buchen.

Location is everything about this unit. Right off wanchai mtr, perfect for business travellers, especially those going to HKCEC. Great value for its size and location. Its hongkong, so its pretty roomy for hongkong apartment size. Host is also very responsive which was super helpful.

1. This place does NOT have an elevator. The elevator goes ALMOST to the floor it's on, but not quite. So if you have mobility issues or don't want to haul your luggage up a few flights of stairs, you're out of luck.
2. The Wifi NEVER works. So better bring your own - even though it says there's Wifi here, there isn't. Doesn't matter how many times Jessica comes over to "fix" it. Guaranteed less than 12 hours before check-in you'll get a note saying "oh the Wifi isn't working, but it should be fixed today!" That's bull. The Wifi never works.
3. The bedrooms are NOT bedrooms - they have NO closets and NO doors.
4. The bathroom spray attachment is held together with a bent, rusty wire hanger.
5. The tap water smells like sewage.
6. Location: Right in the middle of streetwalker alley. If you are either a) a prostitute, or b) looking to pick one up for cheap, this is the place for you. You're a disgusting sex tourist, but hey - have at it. If you DON'T want to stay in someone else's for-pay wet spot, though, avoid this place like the plague.
7. The code for the front entry DOESN'T WORK, so you better hope that the front door is left wide open (yay, security!) or the weird troll that minds the hallway is there to buzz you in.
Great location directly opposite the MTR station. Clean and comfortable. Couldn't ask for more.
Good location cozy apartment
Convenient location to many places of interest and eateries.  No issue getting around.

Jessica’s place is a real gem in Hong Kong. Exactly like described. Great location, great value and great host. It was very clean, homey and can easily fit 3 person. The place is very close to the Subway station and various bus stops. It’s very easy to get around. We also liked that there are so many great food options close by. Jessica was such a great host - she was helpful, responsible and friendly. We would highly recommend Jessica and her place for anyone who’s traveling to HK.
The apartment is lovely and great located. Jessica was a very nice host.

It's a very nice little apartment located a few steps away from Wan Cai MTR. It's well maintained, clean and cozy. Beds are single size, but very comfortable. Shower is good and kitchen has all the necessary tools. WiFi worked fine, but sometimes it got slower (maybe too many people were sharing a same bandwidth?).

It's perfect for two people or small family. Three of us managed to stay comfortably though. Very good value.

Jessica was super responsive to every question that we had! The location is great, it is right in the middle of Wan Chai with easy access to everything you'd want to do, along with the MTR station. Be warned that the area directly to the right of the place is filled with Gentlemen's clubs and if you are a Western man, you will get harrased to join from every establishment you pass. But the location is pretty ideal.

The place is very small, but it really has everything you need. It can't fit much more than two people though. But it was clean and easy to check in and out of. Would definitely recommend!
홍콩 스타일 옥탑방

房子的地点就位于湾仔地铁站出口的对面,公共交通非常方便｡周围的基础设施,例如便利店,饭店应有尽有｡值得一提的是所处的是酒吧一条街,不过即便晚上也不会吵,所以喜欢酒吧就很方便不喜欢也OK｡    设施也是配备得很齐全,基础的洗浴和餐厨用品都会有｡而且房间也特别干净｡    最后一定要说,房主人超好,真的超好!什么问题都会很快回复很快解决｡她还有一个新装修的在同一栋楼里,也很干净而且更宽敞,如果订不到这间建议入住那间的｡
Thanks for a great stay!! Great flat in convenient location!
사진보다는 좁지만 대체로 만족했습니다.
很好的

superb location! Fuss-free check in and check-out. Jessica was super prompt in  her replies and very very helpful. 

good street food and plenty of eating choices around the block, 7-11 across the street. Mtr entrance is just 1min away! will definitely stay here again!
Good location, quick response.
위치가 완차이역에서 30초 거리입니다. 호스트분과 연락도 잘되고 메세지로 도움 많이 주셨습니다. 방 인테리어도 심플하고 이쁘고 이불도 너무 뽀송뽀송하고 좋습니다. 아침마다 커피머신도 유용하게 사용했습니다. 다음에 또 오고싶은 훌륭한 숙소입니다 :-)
湾仔站A1出来就是了､地理位置非常好,走到铜锣湾也可以坐地铁也可以､房间很干净,但是在天台,不过很满意啦､家里还有香味嘻嘻
Jessica人非常棒!很好溝通!房間乾淨舒適,唯一小缺點是用水時馬達聲比較大聲,其他都很滿意｡

Ideal for 2 adults, third can use the slide-out mattress. 

Located in busy business area, but hardly hear anything at the top floor. 
AC's work in all rooms, super clean home with super clean sheets/towels, slightly small rooms/ kitchen / shower, nice big balcony to stretch leg and do yoga.  Refrigerator and toaster present, microwave would have been a welcome good to have. 

Host is super fast to respond and helpful. 

Easy access to pub and restaurant, metro train and taxi at your door (50 Meters and just outside the apartment). Area is safe even late into the night, did not see any issues. Central area to get bus, metro, cab or tram to reach destinations. 

You have to get drinking water from outside. 7 eleven is 100 feet away. 
Overall, liked the stay, no complains.
Very convenient place if you are going to the exhibition center, it's a 7 min walk.
房間與圖片相符,交通方便舒適,房東友善｡

The location of Jessica’s place is nice. Easy to go to the Exhibition Centre.
We had a great time there.

Very central with great, big rooftop. The apartment itself is quite small (typical HK) and there are curtains instead of doors for the bedrooms, but it’s perfect for a couple of friends looking for a convenient and affordable place. Jessica made the entire process very easy and hassle free. Would stay there again!

Great location. To expect to have the guard doing his rounds intermittently at day and night

It is a walking distance away from the Masjid Centre for Halal Dim Sum, about 10 mins walk.
Place is clean

Die Unterkunft liegt direkt an einer MTR Station, zwei Halte von Central entfernt. Die Nachbarschaft ist lebhaft mit viel Streetfood direkt vor der Tür (am Geruch kann man sich allerdings auch leicht mal stören). Alles in allem ein perfektes Preis-Leistung Verhältnis
Great location, easy check-in, and had everything we needed.
This place is great location! Great view from the rooftop! Jessica was quick with replies, always made sure we were set with towels, and utilities! Overall great place!

Very nice airbnb with a really cool and big roof terrace (good for photos). The bathroom could be a little bit cleaner, but that was no problem at all. The water pump in the kitchen is a little bit loud. One of the three air conditioners was broken, but jessica took care of it immediately.

Very good location. There are so much shops and restaurants around. MTR is across the street. Jessica responded very fast and helped as where she could.

The situation is very good, but the 2 bedrooms are very small ( around 5 m2) each.
You must put the luggage in the (Website hidden by Airbnb) you can’t move in thé appartement.
If it’s only to sleep, the appartement is perfect!
great location - you only have to cross the street to the MTR
此處交通方便 下樓過馬路就是灣仔站入口,附近有多家小食店,地理位置很好,離甘記燒鵝 華星冰室 利苑灣仔都是10分鐘路程,非常方便｡

It's very good location where you can walk around Wan chan area.
And you can easily see many bars and food shops.
If you want to stay in Wan Chai area, I'll recommend you this place.
离地铁站很近很方便 楼下也有很多小吃 房间虽然不大但是需要的东西一应俱全 住着很舒适
No big problems I would stay here again with my family.
I really enjoy staying at Jess’s house. The location is grate, really close to the exhibition hall and also close to shopping area and foods. Love it!!!

Second time and once again did not disappoint. 
Jess is great to deal with and the place is fantastic value.
The space is small - but has a lot of character. It’s a stand-alone space on top of the roof - lots of privacy. Great location and value for the price.
湾仔地铁出门就到,非常方便!!!
Very convenient location and nice rooftop flat, perfect for a week-end getaway
Really good location in the city, the location on the roof is pretty hilarious, great it you want an inexpensive place to sleep and go out into the city from

We were very disappointed with this accommodation. We are Airbnb owners. The few  most important things are location, cleanliness and comfort. The accommodation did not offer any of these. Questionable elevator, have to haul luggage up one storey and over pipes; unfinished, poorly plastered walls, ceiling coming apart in bathroom, poor smell from foil oil scent sticks; owner should invest in their real estate and carry out basic repairs to make this tin rooftop shack minimally acceptable.
Because of the so-called central area (which is a prostitution and drinking district), it appears that they can fetch high amounts for seedy accommodation.
Nice place
地理位置极佳,公共交通方便,楼下就有吃的,有生活便利店,生活还是挺方便的｡唯一的缺点就是相对于内地的房子小了些,床品都很干净整齐,适合跟朋友还有家庭居住｡

For Hong Kong standard, the apartment is quite spacious for 3 people as you have living room to relax. On the first day, the room was a bit dirty but Jess handled the issue very well. She sent the cleaner and refund the cleaning fee. Appreciate her hospitality. Overall, it's a good place to stay!
위치가 정말 좋았습니다! 완차이역에서 건물까지 1분이에요! 굿굿

Overall great value and can't beat the location.  The place is definitely small and the beds are twins.  Also, note the bedrooms have curtains for doors to save space so it doesn't get completely dark in the bedrooms.  We had two adults and a baby and the space was just big enough for us.  Wouldn't recommend more people unless you are not going to spend much time there.
겨울시즌에는 조금 추워요. 난방시설이 따로 없고 조그만 라지에이터 하나로는 추웠습니다.
great location, train station is right next to the apartment block. also having the whole rooftop to ourselves was great.

Pleasant stay at a great location in HK. The flat was clean and easy to find. Jess responded quickly to our questions.
I'd stay here again when I'm in the city.

Perfect location to all of the activity. MTR station just across the street. Jess’s instructions were excellent for getting in to her place. It was flawless! Amenities are basic but we were comfortable staying there.

Jess’s place is absolutely perfect! A little rooftop gem in the heart of HK! She was quick to reply and was super obliging to assist with storing luggage. Can’t wait to get back HK and stay here again!
Jess's place is nice and cozy! Lovely and convenient, right in front of an MTR exit so very easy to find.
완차이역 A1출구 바로 앞에 있어서 너무너무 편했어요! 바로옆에 편의점도 있어서 너무 좋았습니다. 집이 생각보다 작았지만 큰 불편함은 없어요.
地點真的很好 ,房間設備都蠻齊全,有雀巢膠囊咖啡機,但提醒要自帶膠囊,非常棒的房子!
很不错,尤其是天台的感觉,非常棒!

위치가 너무너무 좋았어요 공항에서 ael타고 센트럴에서 환승하고 완차이역으로 오면 바로앞에 숙소가 있었어요! 바로옆에 맥도날드랑 편의점도 있었고 주변엔 간단히 맥주한잔 할수있는 곳도많아서 너무 좋았습니단 ㅎㅎ 무엇보다 Jess가 친절해서 좋았어요!! 
(숭겅응 잉잉당 항장망중닝깡 꽁 덩챙굥강셍용!!)

name: HABITACION SINGLE en el  BARRIO DE SANTS-MONTJUIC
summary: Habitación con vista a la calle, barrio comercial frente al Mercat Nou, Supermercado y tiendas en el entorno, a  pasos del metro L1 (roja)  L5(azul), buses D20 y 50. Cercano a  la Plaza de Sants, Sants Estación  (Renfe), Parque de Las Industrias, Plaza España y Montjiuc
space: Habitación luminosa exterior en agradable piso en el barrio de Sants, a metros de la Línea 1 y 5. Estaciones del metro  Plaza Sant y Mecaut Nou, también los buses D20 y 50,  balconcito, con derechos, barrio comercial cercano a la   Estación de trenes Sants (Renfe), Parque de Las Industrias, Estadio del Barça  Camp Nou,  Plaza España y el Montjiuc,
description: Habitación con vista a la calle, barrio comercial frente al Mercat Nou, Supermercado y tiendas en el entorno, a  pasos del metro L1 (roja)  L5(azul), buses D20 y 50. Estaciones del metro  Plaza Sant y Mecaut Nou, también los buses D20 y 50,  balconcito, con derechos, barrio comercial cercano a la   Estación de trenes Sants (Renfe), Parque de Las Industrias, Estadio del Barça  Camp Nou,  Plaza España y el Montjiuc, Uso de:Cocina, lavadora, microonda, calefactor y  Wi-Fi Se les orientará para que conozcan la ciudad y la disfruten Barrio de Sant.Montjiuc.Pisos frene al remodelado nuevo Mercat Nou, zona peatonal nueva, supermercados, lineas de metro y autobuses . neighborhood_overview: Barrio de Sant.Montjiuc.Pisos frene al remodelado nuevo Mercat Nou, zona peatonal nueva, supermercados, lineas de metro y autobuses . En barrio céntrico muy comercial
notes: Take care not to lose the keys, since for the replacement you will have to pay € 150 by the guest Cuidar de no perder las llaves, ya que para la reposición se tendrá que pagar € 150 por parte del huésped

house_rules: In the kitchen leaving what looks clean and respect the sleep of the neighbors. The towel hanging on the bedroom balcony to dry. Off lights and electrical appliances when not in use. In the bathroom not to wet the soil, if this happens please let dry. Thank you for taking recommendations for conviviality Take care not to lose the keys, since for the replacement you will have to pay € 150 by the guest En la cocina dejar limpio lo que se ocupa y respetar el sueño de los vecinos. La toalla colgarla en el balcón del dormitorio para que se seque. Apagar luces y aparatos eléctricos cuando no se utilicen. En el baño no mojar el suelo,  si ésto ocurre dejar seco por favor. Gracias por tomar estás recomendaciones para una buena convivencia Cuidar de no perder las llaves, ya que para la reposición se tendrá que pagar € 150 por parte del huésped Take care not to lose the keys, since for the replacement you will have to pay € 150 by the guest

host.host_about: Soy una persona muy sociable y gentil, soy transparente y me gusta conocer personas de otros países e intercambiar culturas. I am a very sociable and gentle, I'm clear and I like meeting people from other countries and exchange cultures.

reviews.comments:
Gostei muito de hospedar no apartamento do Jorge. Uma pessoa muito agradável. Conversamos em português e inglês  
Me senti bem à vontade. A localização é ótima. Há supermercado na frente do prédio. O “Metro” está a menos de 300 metros da porta. Eu recomendo.

La experiencia en el apartamento de Jorge ha sido muy buena. La localización es perfecta cerca de metro y estación de Sants, además de varios supermercados. El estado del piso es perfecto, aunque yo básicamente hice uso de habitación y baño (soy de los que pasa poco en casa jeje).
Además, me han ayudado con cualquier duda que he tenido y me he sentido a gusto.
Muy recomendable.

Jorge and Xavi were great host!! We communicated perfectly, even without proper english or spanish :D. The room was perfect size for solo travelers like me, and its only 15 minutes to the city center.
I'd definitely stay at Jorge's place again the next time im in Barcelona!
Muchas Gracias Jorge!

Jorge provided very accurate information, he is always willing to help and respect very much privacy. He is flexible, always in good mood, it was very nice spending few days in his apartment. The place is very close to transport and in a very nice neighbourhood.
I highly recommand Jorge and his apartment.

I spent 3 nights in Jorge's House and it is really amazing, I liked the room very much, The house is very clean and everything is as described
Jorge was very welcoming & everything was arranged (Keys, Internet Access, Room, ...), He showed me the rest of the house as well

The location is great, within walking distance you can reach Plaça d'Espanya with nice shops along the way, I have to say also that the price is great
I am considering visiting Barcelona from time to time because it is great & sunny city, I know where I am going every time for Accomodation, Thanks again Jorge

Jorge was very flexible about my arrival to his flat. The provided room was very clean and really nice. For that price you  can not find better offer! Location is close to city center. Fresh market is right in front of the flat with lot of fresh fruits, vegetables and seafood. Great place in great city!

A very nice host in a very nice neighborhood. Very close to all the public transport to the airport and to other cities through Sants Train Station; and buses to everywhere. Walkable distance to plaça d'españa and direct buses to the beach.
Really nice flat, very well located, in a lively district with everything you need in a couple of meters.
Jorge is very friendly, speaks both English and Spanish and is always more than happy to help. And a big plus is that you can use the kitchen too.
Definitely would stay there again and strongly recommend it!

Jorge is a friendly host even given we had a bit of language barrier. He provided me with a warm welcome, a clean room and a fresh bed and towels. Also, I had my own shelf in the fridge, kitchen storage, etc to store my grocery.

The room is smaller that I expected, but it is the room on photos and it has everything I need so no complaints on that.

The location is perfect, in a local residential area with lots of small shops and cafes nearby and without tourists crowd.
Local market is across the road from an entrance, a jamoneria is in the house. Three different big supermarkets are at few minutes of walking distance.
Placa Espania about 15 minutes to walk. 
2 metro stations are close and main Barcelona railroad station also in walking distance so easy to visit other cities nearby.

Overall I had nice experience and I would recommend staying here.
Jorge was an excellent host. The place was clean and has everything one would need. Would definitely recommend staying here.

Everything about the experience at Jorge's house was splendid. Jorge himself is a kind and incredibly loving human, big smile and there to help however he can. The house itself is so cute, beautifully appointed and centrally located. He was there to welcome me upon my arrival with a map of the city, a cold bottle of water, and advice on where to head with just such warmth. The room came with it's own balcony, and the house in addition to being adorably decorated was immaculately clean. I highly recommend Jorge to others.
I had a wunderfull time at Jorges place. Thanks again

This place was absolutely perfect for a solo traveler. Comfy bed, tv, internet, desk, and a balcony that I ended most nights gazing into the stars or watching the people walk on the street below.

Jorge was an excellent host and when I arrived gave me a run down of Barcelona and how to get around. I happened to have booked my trip during El Merce, which is a 4-5 day long festival that happens all over the city. 

The location is absolutely perfect if you intend to use the Barcelona Metro (which I recommend), it is near the D50 and D20 buses as well as Mercat Nou or Sants metro station. Talking about 5 minute or less walk to any of these stations. From there you are connected to all of Barcelona and it rarely took me longer than 30 min to get anywhere. 

Last tip! If you like Japanese food and buffet's there is one just a few minutes away called Koyo, about 10 euros gets you unlimited sushi, gyoza, and etc.!

Place was perfect for me, when I travel I don't spend too much time in my accommodations other than to sleep or rest. I will most definitely be back as Barcelona is way too big to see in even 5 days! Truly a home away from home.
I felt like home while spending time here. Barcelona was a great city and worth to visit. Jorge was a nice host even we did not communicate very well. Would recommend this place!

Jorge est un hôte formidable et arrangeant! le quartier est trq sympa avec un marché très vivant au pied de l'immeuble et 2 stations de métro à proximité. L'appartement correspond exactement aux photos, propre!
Merci Jorge!

La cama y la casa eran muy cómodas. Todo estaba en su sitio y era muy fácil manejarse en la cocina porque todo estaba a mano. Tanto Jorge como otro compi que estaba allí son muy amables. La convivencia con ellos es muy fácil.
Muy recomendable, Jorge es super amable, te sentirás como en casa!
I can fully recommend Jorge Place . Metro station few minutes by walk shops and restaurants around. Everythink was fine
¡Excelente!

La estancia en el apartamento es súper cómoda, Jorge es una persona muy atenta y servicial, dispuesto siempre a ayudar, la ubicación es excelente, tienes el metro, tren y bus muy cerca para desplazarte por toda Barcelona, el barrio es muy tranquilo, las calles de Sants son ideales para salir a caminar.

Jorge es un anfitrión super atento, disponible y amable. Su piso esta conforme con las fotos y muy limpio. El barrio (Sants) es tranquilo y fue perfecto para une persona que venia a trabajar. Lo recomiendo sin reserva.
He is a perfect host. I'm very satisfied with the accommodation.
Jorge's place is so cool and cute. It's so close to public transport to whisk you all over Barcelona, there is a supermarket across the road andafes plenty of restaurants and cafes around.
The location is convenient and Jorge is a great host.

Jorge es sin duda una persona excepcional desde mi llegada fue increíblemente amable! El lugar muy limpio y acogedor y su hospitalidad desde el primer minuto te hace sentir muy bien recibido!
 Siempre muy atento y ayudando a cualquier duda que se tenga.
 La ubicación perfecta, cercana a la estación de trenes y del metro y un lugar muy tranquilo y cómodo!
 Sin duda volveré a hospedarme con él! Estoy muy agradecido!!!
非常漂亮而且整洁的小屋,交通方便,旁边有个很漂亮的市场,Jorge是个非常热情的主人,他会和你很详细的介绍周围的情况,指点你如何最方便的到达各个景区,非常感谢他,这是一次非常棒的体验

This listing is a for a bedroom in Jorge's apartment in the Sants neighborhood. The bedroom is small but comfortable. The apartment was clean and Jorge was a very attentive and thoughtful host. There was a bit of language barrier, but there were no problems. I think the low cost of the listing makes this listing a very good value. I would return.
Excelente ubicación, cerca del metro Mercat Nou y Sants, Jorge es un host súper amable y respetuoso.

Jorge is very nice host, he responses very quick and very helpful
The room is only for 1 person, but it’s clean and comfortable. The location is very good with the super market next door and just 5’ walking to all bus stations and train stations.
High recommend this place for any solo traveler.
Amazing experience with Jorge, we had a constant conversation and everything went smoothly. The place is very nice and clean, the position is perfect. Highly recommended!

Jorge é uma pessoa sensacional. Um ótimo anfitrião. Super recomendo a estadia. Fica perto do metro, de lojas, restaurantes, supermercados e 15/20 min da estação sants. Ambiente muito limpo e aconchegante.
Everything was great.
Una casa preciosa y un anfitrión de lujo! Tiene todo lo que uno necesita para disfrutar de días increíbles!

En la casa de Jorge de verdad se siente en casa por el cariño que se nota en cada detalle. Es superlinda gente, muy complaciente y todo sale bien fácil de organizar, una mezcla genial entre anfitrión y compañero de piso. La ubicación es perfecto.

Mi experiencia ha sido muy buena. Jorge es una persona muy atenta, sociable, resolutiva. La habitacion ha cumplido mis espectativas. Destacaria la limpieza de las zonas compartidas. Diria para alguien muy sensible que a veces escuchaba  el radio del vecino tras la pared, pero a la hora de dormir siempre ellos lo apagaban. En la zona hay mucha variedad de bares y sitios para pasear. Mercado esta enfrente y alli puedes comprar comida casera hecha al dia y muy rica. Asi que sin necesitad de grandes gastos comes como en casa.
Considero que el precio de la habitacion y la calidad son excelentes. Volveré.
Was nice to stay with Jorge and his friend. Central location and nice small balcony.
Jorge очень отзывчивый и гостеприимный . Все в квартире очень чисто и уютно. Провела в этом месте почти 2 месяца. Рекомендую для поездок
Definitely would recommend to anyone looking for a room to crash in for a couple of days. Jorge was a great host and very accommodating.

Jorge was an excellent host. His place is beautifully decorated, much nicer than the photos suggest. The room was small but perfect for a solo traveler. Jorge was very helpful with the metro system and other tips. Great stay and I would totally stay here again.

I had a great stay in bcn.
Thank you!
excelente anfitrion muy hospitalario

Jorge was an incredibly accommodating host, and upon my arrival, he took the time to give me a map of the metro and some tips on getting around the city. He was very friendly in general and genuinely interested in my activities for the day, but respected my privacy as well. The room was small but cozy, and the entire flat was very clean and organized. The apartment was also conveniently located directly across from a market and within a few minutes walk from 2 metro stops. There were plenty of small neighborhood cafes within walking distance with decent options for breakfast and lunch. I would definitely come back and stay again!

The appartement is very clean, calm and bright and the room is perfect for 1 person.
The metro will take you very quickly to the center of Barcelone, so it really worth it.
Jorge has been an excellent host and allowed me to leave my suitcase the last day.
Perfect location and hosting! I would love to stay again Jorge’s place next time! Jorge was really nice and kind. Thank you!
Jorge un tipo super atento y servicial. Te hace sentir en casa.

Una habitación single en un piso con mucho estilo y en una zona muy bien comunicada y de buen ambiente. El autobús llegaba más tarde de la hora prefijada y a pesar de ello Jorge me atendió estupendamente. El día de mi vuelta, pude dejar las maletas en el alojamiento hasta la hora que salió el bus y así pude seguir visitando la ciudad con toda comodidad
Jorge is a perfect host! Clean room, clean bathroom, and they got elevator!!!

¡Muchísimas gracias a Jorge por una estadía llena de mucha atención y detalle! Fue un anfitrión muy gentil, mostrando interés en mis actividades diarias a manera de proveer compañía y ofreciendo actividades para realizar juntos. Lo recomendaría a cualquier persona, que quiera un lugar con una excelente ubicación, y un anfitrión gentil y atento.
The home/room is exactly as shown in the photos. Host is very hospitable and home is very clean. Great location as well. Would definitely recommend!
Jorge is a very kind host

name: Master Bedroom in a High Rise Appartment
summary: Clean, quiet, tidy place located at the Lohas Park subway station.  Apartment is located in a grand clubhouse, with facilities including gym, swimming, bowling and a reasonably priced restaurant.  You get the master bedroom, with your own private bathroom. Its located in the Sai Kung district which is well known for many hiking opportunities and great beaches.  Central Hong Kong is within 30 minutes away. Airport is 1 hour away by bus.
space: Super clean and tidy place. There is also a large 65inch TV with Apple TV with netflix enabled so that you can watch all you want. Plus, with the sofa bed its super easy to just crash and sleep over in the living room.
description: Clean, quiet, tidy place located at the Lohas Park subway station.  Apartment is located in a grand clubhouse, with facilities including gym, swimming, bowling and a reasonably priced restaurant.  You get the master bedroom, with your own private bathroom. Its located in the Sai Kung district which is well known for many hiking opportunities and great beaches.  Central Hong Kong is within 30 minutes away. Airport is 1 hour away by bus. Super clean and tidy place. There is also a large 65inch TV with Apple TV with netflix enabled so that you can watch all you want. Plus, with the sofa bed its super easy to just crash and sleep over in the living room. Would love to help out as much as possible as you come on the trip. More then happy to show around popular destinations to see in HK! Quite neighborhood with high rise apartments surrounded by hills. Its build next to a subway station. Super market, and a pharmacy are away by 3 min walk, with other shops located in the subway station itsel
neighborhood_overview: Quite neighborhood with high rise apartments surrounded by hills. Its build next to a subway station. Super market, and a pharmacy are away by 3 min walk, with other shops located in the subway station itself.
transit: Use the subway station to get anywhere in HK. The station is a bit at the corner of HK, and trains come at slow intervals but overall not a problem unless you want to go to city and come back home a couple of times in the day.
interaction: Would love to help out as much as possible as you come on the trip. More then happy to show around popular destinations to see in HK!
house_rules: Sometimes some of my guests stay over the apartment in the sofa bed located in the living room. So please stay quite between midnight - 8am while crossing the living room when someone is staying over.

host.host_about: Hello. I am an engineer and love building things. Started off with software but now build drones & robots as a hobby.

reviews.comments: Great flat located in beautiful lohas park. Far from downtown but the size of apartments and the views are amazing. Perfect for alternative Hong Kong that consists of beaches and surrounding islands. Host is super proactive.  Provides with keys, entry card almost immediately st the entry. No problems at all.

Hamza is a super host. Although we never met in person, he was caring throughout my entire stay. The flat is shared with two international, very nice fellow- (Hidden by Airbnb) . The room has its own, separate bathroom though, which is quite comfortable. Important for TALL people coming to Hong Kong: The master bedroom's bed is big enough to fit you. This is not always given in Hong Kong. I am very happy that I chose to stay at Hamza's place in  Hong Kong.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Hamza was a great host making sure we had everything we needed for our ultimate comfort!!! Highly recommend!!

reviews.comments: Connie的家特别好!地理位置方便,卫生干净,还有无敌夜景,下面就是商场十分便利!Connie人也超级棒~很热情很照顾我们

My experience with Connie was good, the room and the bathroom were really clean as well as the rest of the house. I absolutely suggest to stay in Yuen Long and enjoy the quietness instead of the centre of Hong Kong, in fact in just 40 mins you can commute easily thanks to one of the best transportation system in the world ;)

Connie是位非常热心的房东｡房源位于的小区环境非常好,很安全｡楼下就是商场,离港铁元郎站很近,出行便利｡非常感谢Connie的热情接待｡

Great location.  Cannot believe I have found this place so convenience for everything. Shopping, good restaurant and easy access to every transaction.

name: Old District - Charming Apartment
summary: Charming apartment located in the heart of the city's oldest district. From the interior window, you can perfectly see the Roman columns of Augusto's temple, the oldest relics of the city.
space: The apartment has an area of 55m2 and it can accommodate up to 4 persons, two of whom can stay in a bedroom with double bed and the other two in the living room on the sofa-bed. It is fully-equipped with everything you need during your stay. This apartment is located in one of the most crowded points of the city, a few meters from Las Rambas, Sant Jaume square, ancient Barcino and where nowadays is placed the Generality Palace and the Town Hall of Barcelona.
