neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the old town of Barcelona. As you can see from the description of the apartment, here you can find the remains of the Roman settlement called Barcino. Plaça San Jaume, where the main administrative buildings of the city can be found, is just a few meters away. And exactly here begins Carrer Ferran – quirky street with numerous cheap and tasty restaurants and bars. But don’t worry about food and drinks – in the winding streets of the old town you can find dozens of interesting places to eat and drink with not only local cuisine. Also, this area is ideal for shoppers. El Portal de l' Angel shopping street is full of numerous shops of world-famous brands, and if you want to buy something locally hand-made, hold for Carrerd’Avinyó – long street with different small shops of local designers, including historic workshops, where you can buy real espadrilles, traditional Spanish shoes.
notes: Kindly we remind you that deposit is not included and is payable upon your arrival (it will be refunded to the same credit card after checking the apartment). The amount of deposit depends on the length of your stay. Please take note that utility bills are not included in the rental of a property (internet, gas, electricity, and water).
transit: The nearest metro stations are Liceu (L3) and Jaume I (L4) . As you can see it is the most central location, so getting around the city will be very easy; the easiest way to get to the apartment from Barcelona airport is to catch A1 o A2 buses that go directly to Plaça Catalunya.
access: Refrigerator-freezer, electric heating, widescreen TV, kettle, cot, microwave, double sofa bed, king size bedroom, ceramic hob, high chair, air conditioning, iron, balcony, air vent, hairdryer.
interaction: Guests will be provided with an emergency number in case of problem during your stay. This apartment has a minimum stay of 32 nights.

El depósito será reembolsado en el mismo número de tarjeta de crédito en plazo máximo de 30 días de acuerdo con la Ley de arrendamientos urbanos 4/2013.  2. Recuerde llevar las llaves del apartamento consigo cuando salga del mismo y no olvide cerrar la puerta con llave. La pérdida de dichas llaves tendrá un recargo mínimo de 50€. Si necesita llamar al interfono fíjese en el número del piso para no molestar a los vecinos.  3. Por favor, apague las luces y los electrodomésticos cuando salga del apartamento. Debemos hacer un uso racional de nuestros recursos. Si el gasto del agua, luz y gas supera considerablemente el estándar mensual, el propietario tiene derecho a cobrar la diferencia entre el gasto establecido y el gasto provocado por el huésped.  4. Y qué mejor oportunidad que hospedarse en uno de nuestros apartamentos cómodos, elegantes y céntricos para descansar o seguir viviendo la ciudad más de cerca.

host.host_about: It is three of us, all siblings, that operates and own this AirBnb Account. "Its A Family Affair!" :-) We are pleased to accept your request and accommodate your stay.

reviews.comments: I rented this apt while my own apt down the street was being renovated and I can't recommend it highly enough. The hosts we're so warm and welcoming and did everything to make our stay as comfortable as possible! The apt is spotlessly clean and tidy and huge!! It has all amenities you could ask for. Location is great with a short walk to the subways and a couple of bus routes. I really enjoyed my stay here and will definitely be telling my friends about it.
Nice appartment in Brooklyn. Everything you need is available. Just 5 minuten walk to 2 subway stations. The host ravanna is very kind!

Our stay was totally convenient and the hoster Ravanna Blue-El was very wellcoming and made us feel at ease. The appartement is well located with the subway within walking distance about 7-10 minutes. Furthermore are the rooms very clean and nicely decorated. Everything which you need is provided, it has a TV, Wifi, towels and the kitchen is well equiped and so on. The neighbourhood is another plus, the house very close to an organic super market and to cosy caffees as well as restaurants with delicious food. For all this reason, I totally recommand a stay in by Ravanna Blue-El.
We went on a family vacation and had a great time.  The apartment was just what we needed.

Ravanna was a great host. He looked after us extremely well and made our time truly wonderful. We were a large group and initially wanted to book 2 separate places but Ravanna let us book only 1 and added more beds into the apartment so that we could stay in one place. He was very helpful when we were there. The apartment was just like it was in the pictures, complete with free wifi and cable tv. The apartment was also very close to grocery stores and subway stations. We were able to shop for and cook food. f we ever have to stay in New York in the future, we'll only contact Ravanna.
Ravanna's place was so comfortable and was truly a home away from home. It accommodated all 10 of us and we enjoyed our stay in NY! Would definitely recommend to anyone!

The place was just as shown in the pictures.  Ravanna was super responsive, though we never actually met him.  His brother Jedda let us in, gave us keys and explained what was nearby in the neighborhood.  He was kind and we could tell we were in good hands.  One thing that was stellar was there were a ton of beds!  Aside from the 3 full beds described, there are at least 4-5 twin fold up cots that would be perfect for larger parties.  All in all, great stay and great hosts.  Thanks friends!

The place is clean and comfy. No luxurious, but enough. Great location, near to various subway stations and bus stops. You'll be in Manhattan within 20-30 minutes. You are 10 minutes from Williamsburg, which was great for me since the nightlife there is awesome. Bedford Stuyvesant is a very safe neighborhood, with small jewels like cozy bars, cafes, wineries, restaurants and friendly people (this one a rare condition in manhattan new yorkers). A boheme experience if you are looking for more than the traditional touristic experience. Ravanna is accessible, always pending on your needs, but never overwhelming. Stay here and you will become an instant Brooklyn lovah'!
I enjoyed my stay from start to finish at Ravanna's place. It was very comfortable and I felt like a really was home away from home.

I just got back from a 4 night stay in NYC at Ravanna & Jetta's location and it was absolutely wonderful! I didn't meet Ravanna directly, as it was his brother Jetta who was taking care of my stay, but let me tell you, he could not have been a more warm, lovely, and hospitable host! I was travelling with my parent's and my dad managed to get the sink stopper stuck in the kitchen sink (of course) - Jetta was 100% understanding and instantly fixed it! When I arrived he also gave me some great tips on where to eat and pick up things like groceries and alcohol, which was really helpful (I needed a good drink after a long day of travelling!).

The apartment itself is exactly as it looks in the photos! Everything was freshly cleaned when we arrived, and the comfortable beds were a welcoming site after my parents were delayed up in Toronto for a number of hours. The apartment is EXTREMELY quiet, and we never heard anyone else in the building, even though we were told there was a group staying below us, which was absolutely wonderful. 

Everything about booking and staying at this location was quick, easy, and very pleasant. I would highly recommend this location to anyone who doesn't want to be in Manhattan and is looking for a more "local" feel to their stay in NYC. With that being said, my parents and I found travelling up or down Bedford (instead of Nostrand) was much better, especially at night to and from the subway lines. The A line was closed for most of the time that we were there, so we ended up taking the G line from Bedford-Nostrand and then connecting to the L line at Lorimer into Manhattan for most of the time we were there and actually really enjoyed that commute, as it allows you to jump off at Williamsburg (Bedford stop on the L line) on your way into Manhattan! 

I hope to be back in NYC in the next few years and would feel great about staying at this location again :)
I can certainly recommend Ravanna's house. It's a perfect place for up to 4 people with Manhattan and Williamsburg/Greenpoint  just a few subway stops away.

Appartement agreable et bien situé.
Le frere de ravanna est disponible et accueillant.

We'd like to thank our hosts for a wonderful stay.  The apartment was comfortable and clean. 

 The master bedroom was very large and provided us with lots of space to spread out.  The second bedroom was smaller but our friends did not seem to complain.  The beds in both rooms were all prepared for our arrival and were very comfortable.  My only complaint about the bedrooms is that the window shades did not really provide much shelter from daylight in the early morning.  Not great for a light sleeper. 

 The kitchen was well equipped but quite small.  I imagine this is normal for NYC apartments and we managed quite easily with the limited space.  We were not anticipating cooking for a party of 10 so the kitchen suited our needs quite well.  

The living room was very spacious and clean.  We were two couples and we had plenty of space to relax and kick back after a long day out in the city.  The wireless internet provided was very useful to plan our dinners and sightseeing routing.  The large flat screen tv kept us entertained during March Madness while we waited for the girls to get back from shopping.

The Norstrand stop for the A and C lines was a 5 minute walk away and took us into Manhattan within 15 minutes.  Taxis on Bedford street were readily available to take us to Williamsburg for some delicious dinners and good bars.

Lastly, the towels provided for us were amazing. I stay in hotels on a weekly basis and these towels were the softest ones I have ever used.

All in all we thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would go back again.  Any questions or issues were addressed quickly.

Très bon séjour dans l'appartement de Ravanna à Brooklyn, fidèle aux photos et aux commentaires précédents !
j'y retournerai avec plaisir !!

Our stay was great, the house was clean and everything was working perfectly: Internet, TV, heating system, hair dryer, housewares. Jedda, Ravanna's brother, was always very helpful, he was waiting for us in the house to give us the keys. On the second day, the kitchen faucet broke, but Jedda repaired at the same day. The house is in a very quiet neighborhood, has two nearby metro stations and a bus stop at the corner. It also has a mini market nearby with excellent quality products. I'll recommending this home to all my Brazilian friends who want to stay in NY.

Me and my family really enjoyed the time in Ravanna's apartment! It was a quite and safe surrounding, but everything you need for great stay in New York City was in walking distance. I highly recommend this place to everyone as it was clean and Ravanna and his family are very helpful in every situation! Thanks again, Ravann for the great stay in your house!

Great place, great host, great experience!  Ravanna's brother was waiting for us upon arrival even with us getting in 2 hours later than planned in the middle of the night.  The place was perfect for us, clean and tidy and even extra fold aways when the kids decided their was no way they were going to sleep in the same bed as their sibling.  Everything we needed was right there.  The place was quiet enough for my husband to even finish writing a paper while we played in the city.  Grocery stores close by within a few minutes walk.  Subway was a close walk as well making it easy to get into the city even with the kids.  YMCA just around the corner.  Our host was very accommodating and easily accessible.  We'd definitely stay here again!

L'appartement était conforme à la description et bien situé dans Brooklyn.
Le jour de notre départ, notre hôte a gardé gracieusement nos valises toute la journée.

Ravis de notre séjour.
.

The house is comfortable and clean. It is a good place for like six people to stay. The subway station is about 10 mins walk from home. Sometimes, it's too exhausted to walk home after a long day walk in New York city. The host, Ravanna's brother, was nice and friendly:) You can absolutely choose this apt. for the vacation.

Our hosts (Ravanna and his siblings who jointly own the house) were great. Jetta was there to greet us, made up an extra bed and told us about the neighborhood. They live on the first floor, so we're almost always available through text or e mail if we needed something. They were also very quick to respond.

Ravanna’s  apartment was great.All equipment was clean and everything was working perfectly : (Website hidden by Airbnb) air-condition. Ravanna’s brother was always very helpful. We felt safe and secure the whole time. We recommend this accommodation.
We really enjoyed staying at Ravanna's place. It's spacious and clean. The hosts were friendly and very helpful!

Great place! clean and spacious, perfect for a 4 persons family. Fine shower, nice tv, and good internet which is important with 2 teenage boys... Only the kitchen was tiny but we didn't use it for comprehensive cooking. Maybe a little bit far to the subway, ca 15 min.
A very pleasant stay!!

A great and clean apartment!

We loved the Ravanna's place, it was beautiful, clean and functional apartment near to subway and grocery's stores. He helped us with a extra bed because we were five people and we were confortable.

The neighbor is safety, we walked back to the apartment around 2am and had no problems. It's near to Manhattan.

Jetta (Ravanna's brother) was the best host, he helped us to find the cell phone on the couch, gave us different chargers for cell phones and was friendly throughout.

If you rent this place to stay, you'll not regret.

We loved our stay in Brooklyn. Jedda was extremely helpful. The apartment was big, clean, and a great deal. We also loved it's location. The owners are so nice that they immediately contacted us when they realized we left our ipad there. He even had it shipped to our address on the same day! This place is great! I HIGHLY recommend staying here.
Ravanna was a great host! The apartment was perfect. I was travelling with my mom and my brother and everything that we needed was available. I highly recommend it!

We were 6 people, 2 adults and 4 kids, and stayed 2 weeks at Ravanna's. This is a true home far away from home. Helpful hosts, nice apartment, cool and safe neighborhood and sufficiently close to grocery stores, subway and railroad. Highly recommendable indeed. We'll love to come again.
Pierre and family.
We stayed three days, Ravanna is a good host! He helped us with our bags as we arrived before check in time. The apartment looks just like the pictures, we really liked !!
Had a blast in NY! The accommodations were even better than expected and Ravanna was such a wonderful host! Would highly recommend!!!

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Ravannas apartment in New York. The apt was clean, stocked with all of the essentials, and provided just enough space to be comfortable for our party of 4 adults. The subway and bus line were within walking distance so we were able to leave the car and use only public transportation the whole time we were there.  Our host was especially gracious and made us feel welcome. I would not hesitate to return in the future the next time I am in New York!

nous avons fait 3 locations par airbnb cet été et la seule où nous avons été accueillis est celle de Ravanna.
Nous avons apprécié qu'il soit là à notre arrivée et disponible quand nous avons eu besoin de lui demander quelque chose.
The reservation was for my daughter and her boyfriend. That had a fantastic time and said Ravannah had Ben very helpful. Thanks
Thanks Ravanna for great accomodation! The apartment was very beatiful and perfectly situated. Everything was prepared before we came.
Excellent location and spacious with two large bedrooms.  Subway within walking distance.

The place was a great! Ravanna's brother, Jeddah, was very accommodating and greeted us when we came in late at night (12:30pm). He even let us check out late (noon) and stored our luggage for us in his room until our flight. The place was spacious and clean and within walking distance of restaurants and markets. If you are coming in late, be sure to check out Black Swan, they serve food until 3pm! This place is great for big groups, as there are plenty of fold out beds in the closet. It is a quiet street which is nice after a long day touring NYC. I would recommend this place to anyone vising NYC. It takes around 35-45 minutes with walking and subway to get to south central park in Manhattan. Taxi rides from Mid Manhattan to the place range about $30-$35. Our lyft ride was $38 from JFK to the house at night with no traffic.
Our stay at Ravanna's couldn't have been better. The apt. Was very clean and convenient. Any requests were immediately attended to. I would recommend staying here to anyone wanting to visit NYC.

Ravanna was there to greet us and graciously carried one of our bags up the two flights of stairs as my travelling companion had unexpectedly injured her leg prior to coming to NYC. He showed us around and we were happy to see that the property was as displayed in the pictures on his site. 
The suite was spacious, clean, and the beds comfortable. All the comforts of home except a couple of wine glasses would have been nice. As it was, we roughed it by having our coffee mugs do double duty, lol!
 Lots of brochures and maps available to help make choices for places to eat and how to get around on the subway. The subway stop was about a 5-10 minute walk through a safe neighborhood. It takes anywhere from 25 to 45 minutes to get to downtown Manhattan, depending on the time of day you travel, with start and end of workday being the busiest (naturally). By the way, I would recommend buying the $30. subway card. We were there for 4 days and easily spent that much in single subway fares.
There's a very well stocked supermart within walking distance and for Mexican we loved the huge tasty burritos at a quirky place called Taqueria Villa Pancho at 1047 Bedford, and another evening very much enjoyed dinner and wine across the street at a place called Black Swan (1048 Bedford).
When we had a question, I wasn't able to get hold of Ravanna by phone or text after our initial meeting but when we resorted to ringing his doorbell we got the information we needed from another occupant of his home.
I would stay in Ravanna's place again. Thank you for making your place available on airbnb!

We had a great time. The apartment is in a quiet neighborhood. A lot of information about what to see/do and how to travel was available.
The bus stops at the corner. Perfect.

Ravanna answered all my questions and was really accommodating. I did not meet him in person, but I met his brother who was really nice. 

The place is about 10 minutes from the subway A/C and 5 minutes from the G. My friend and I --so 2 girls-- came home late one night but we felt safe enough in the neighborhood. The apartment itself was nice. It's really nice to have a complete little kitchen!

Lets start by saying that this apt is perfect for a short or long period of stay. plenty of room, clean and simply. Secondly and most importantly Ravanna is a amazing host. Due to our flight being super early, we were aloud to check our luggage in as soo as we landed and also he allowed us to check in a few hours early as we had been up over night.
the location is perfect and very short walk to the train station. Area was safe (walked to Burger King at 2am and felt completely safe).

Will be staying again same time next year.

Ravanna is very friendly and helpful. When we arrived he explained everything and answered any questions we had. His brother Jeda also helped us early one morning when we encountered a problem with the toilet which he fixed up straight away! 

Our party of 4 enjoyed staying here as we had everything we needed in the apartment itself and it was close to shops, food places, the A train (which takes you straight into Manhattan) and a laundry place to do our washing. We found it very convenient for us. We often stayed out late past midnight and used the subway coming back at night which we found safe doing so. 

The apartment felt very spacious enough for 4 people and although the kitchen is a bit of a squeeze, we didn't find it an issue as it still allowed us to do what we needed and had everything! 

I would absolutely recommend staying here if your wanting to stay in Brooklyn and to have a great experience!

Thanks again Ravanna for the accommadation!

We had a wonderful stay in Brooklyn! Ravanna's place is a few block from the A/C Blue Line which made it very convenient to get into Manhattan. The apartment was clean and free of clutter AND there are two bedrooms - plenty of space for a group!

When we arrived Jeda (Ravanna's brother, sorry if misspelling the name) was there to greet us and even helped us carrying our very heavy luggage. He warmly welcomed us, showed us around and answered all our questions. He even had 2 sets of keys for us which made everything simpler for us.

Our group enjoyed staying in their apartment. Nice hosts, clean and spacious place, close to subway stations, very fun & safe neighborhood, 2 bedrooms and a kitchen with everything we needed! 

My group and I all highly recommend this place as it was convenient to get to the airport and to Manhattan as well. We had a blast, thanks to the brothers!

We had a lovely stay, the location was great, easy to get to the subway, the apartment was VERY spacious, clean and had everything we could have needed.
Thank you for offering your space!!
Notre hôte est très accueillant. Chambre propre. L'appartement est à 10 min à pied du métro.

Super Gastgeber, sehr herzlicher Empfang und bei jeder Frage hilfsbereit. 
Das Appartement liegt genau zwischen 2 U-Bahn Linien ca 7-8 Minuten zu Fuß und mit der Linie A oder C kommt man ohne umsteigen bist zum Time Square. Supermarkt, Restaurants und Bars in der Nähe.... was will man mehr!
Gerne wieder

Ravanna's home was beautiful and convenient. The place was perfect for our large party- we had a very comfortable stay! Our hosts were extremely kind and flexible with our shifting itinerary and coordinating of several people coming to stay! We cannot thank you enough for making our weekend fabulous.

Everything in home was just as described, host was very welcoming. Gave us options on stores close by for our everyday needs! Home was very clean tidy and very cozy a perfect "home away from home" ;) A few blocks down from the subways, perfect for getting around the coty on a budget. Would not hesitate staying here again when visiting NYC . Thanks again
Great listing and host, he answered all of our questions, suggested close grocery shops and was available for our needs.
The reservation was canceled 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We had a great time at Ravanna's place.  Meeting up for check in and check out was very easy.  The photos and description are very accurate, and the location is very convenient if you plan on using public transportation.  Ravanna was very accommodating and willing to work with our unusual schedule and communication was always very quick.  I will definitely book this place again in the future.  Thank you so much!
Very enjoyable! Clean, roomy, overall very comfortable!

Both Ravanna and his brother Jede (not sure of the spelling) were great hosts! I was in a bit of a pinch and needed a last minute place to stay before a snowstorm for both me and my cats (Lettuce & Tomato).  I booked the apartment early in the morning and within an hour they had the apartment ready for me.   The apartment was located on one of those classic brownstone blocks and was clean, quite and spacious.  It really did feel like a home. I am from Brooklyn so I can testify that in this home you will get the true Brooklyn experience.  I hope to visit Ravanna's home again.

Trevz 
AKA Subbnb

Unfortunately we had to cancel out trip on very short notice. Therefore we are not able to describe the experience at the apartment. However, what we can say is that Ravanna offered us to stay at his place at a discount rate next time we come to NYC. We thought that this was very kind and will definitely contact him next time we come to NYC.
My party and I had a great stay. We knew the area so we were comfortable. No complaints at all. If and when possible we'd like to stay again.

The stay was great. We arrived late and the host's brother welcomed us with open arms. The place looked as seen in the pictures and as described. The neighborhood also was good. Will definitely use again on my next trip to NYC

We had a great time!!!!! This was better than we expected!!! You guys are so nice, it was such a relief to be able to spend the day exploring the city then coming back to a safe and comfortable apartment!

Super tel que décrit  confortable et propre nous n'avons pas vu l'hôte mais quelqu'un  nous a reçu a notre arrivée  malgré un retard de notre part. Le métro est a 10 minute de marche. Épicerie et bus au coin de la rue. Par contre si vous y aller en voiture le stationnement pourrais être difficile au moment de l'arrivée et il faut changer de côté de rue pour respecter les heure de nettoyage . Utiliser les bus et le métro vous gagnerai beaucoup de temps et d'argent. Idéal pour les grosse famille nous étions 3 adulte et 3 enfant de 5 à 10 ans .  Allez-y et profiter de New-York.

Ravanna was an excellent host. When our flight had to be rescheduled because of weather, Ravanna was extremely gracious and accommodating. The apartment was in a convenient location with several excellent restaurants close by and just a short walk to two subway stations. Only took us about 20 minutes to get into Manhattan and was a great location for the activities we had planned in Brooklyn. My husband and I traveled with another couple and there was more than enough room for the 4 of us. The apartment could easily have held even more.

The host brother Jetta  I'm sure  I spelled his name wrong . But he was very welcoming meet all of our needs he even helped with the bags. The apartment was beautiful  along with the neighborhood.  We now have a new home when we come to NY again wouldn't  want to stay anywhere else. Thank you guys for all of you courtesy.

Ravanna's brother met us at the apartment. He was very welcoming and even helped us with our luggage. The apartment was clean and looked just like the pictures online. The location was close to the subway and close to stores and restaurants. The decor in the apartment was beautiful.

The upside of this apartment is that there are truly a ton of beds, so it was great that there was enough room to sleep my whole family. The major downside for me was that *very* strong cleaners, detergents, and air fresheners are clearly used to clean this place-- and the smell gave me pretty extreme nausea. I actually opted to stay elsewhere for part of the trip because being in the apartment was so unpleasant. Aside from the scent issue, the apartment itself was reasonably as represented. The furniture was a bit worn, and the doorknob and lock were flimsy, but if it hadn't been for the smell I believe we would have enjoyed our stay. 

I never actually met Ravanna-- his sister let us in, and his nephew (very nicely) brought us more blankets around midnight because I thought replacement blankets might smell less strongly of industrial detergent. However, he was incredibly responsible by phone and text. I think this would be a good place to stay for a big group of people planning to go to NYC and not spend a lot of time in the apartment (and who aren't sensitive to scents, obviously). 

Very sorry to give these nice people a 2-star review, but the apartment unfortunately didn't really meet our needs.
Its a very comfortable place, near to the subway station and with all that we expected. Very friendly people.

Such a great place to stay for exploring NY! We enjoyed the large & comfortable & so well equipped Appartement very much. The hosting by Ravannas brother was so accommodating, very helpful and nice! He welcomes us very warmly at our late arrival and even let us deposite our luggage at our departure day at his place, which was fantastic! Thank you ever so much for these splendid days - we'll come back!
Ravanna is an excellent host. The flat was just what we needed, lots of beds, near the city, and plenty of nice places to eat in Brooklyn. The apartment was lovely.

We had a great time staying in this apartment whilst visiting NYC. The apartment was clean, comfortable and spacious, and the hosts were friendly and accommodating. It is ideally located near several subways, making travelling around really quick and easy, and there was plenty to do in the local neighbourhood. 
I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this apartment to others, we had a fabulous stay and would definitely book to stay again.
Everything was fine - the apartment was big enough for us 5 - everything was ok and how it was described on airbnb...

Ravanna was very accommodating and friendly, offering us advice on how to get around in the city and being available for questions. The rooms were much larger than I was expecting, and the bathroom was nice and clean. She supplied clean linens and towels and overall made the trip very hassle-free. The neighborhood in Brooklyn was really cute and felt very safe, and was within walking distance of some restaurants and very close to public transit. I couldn't have asked for more.

Ravanna's brother and sister were adorable with us during the 4 days we were there. They store our luggage during our last day and were really friendly.
About the place : it was like it was announced,  spacious, very clean, useful. The Wi-Fi works very well. They let us some guide of the city, the grocery is at the corner,  the neighborhood is quite calm by contrast with NYC. It's a perfect place to stay when you want to visit New York City.

I recommend this place to everyone who wants to visit NYC without being annoyed by the noise of the city which never sleeps.

It was great ! Thanks to them for our holidays !
Great place! Great location! Great host! Thank You!

What a great place and neighbourhood! Was a quick walk to transit and surrounded by neat little eateries, and the space itself was clean, simple and pleasant. They also took great care to provide a bed-bug free environment, which was much appreciated. 

Our hosts were friendly and made themselves available to all of our requests. They were also very kind to let us drop our bags off early so we could get a head start on checking out the city. 

Thanks for your hospitality!

Todo excelente¡¡¡, el anfitrion, el barrio y la ciudad.
muy cerca de la linea G del metro y muchos comercios cerca para comprar a cualquier horario.
Volveria sin dudarlo.

Ravanna and his brother were very helpful when it came to providing timely communication and accommodating the needs of myself and the rest of the people in my party.  The apartment is great and extremely comfortable.

We had a great time un Brooklyn and Ravanna's apartment and location were really good for us. We had a few questions and he was extemely helpful. Only a few minutes away from the metro. There is a supermarket 5mn walk . Ravanna was kind enough to keep our luggage before we leave to the airport. I recommend.

Ravanna Blue-El made was very friendly and welcoming from our initial communication. When we arrived we were given a tour of the apartment and were asked if we needed anything to make our stay more pleasurable. Then we were given directions to the nearest train station and convenience store in case we needed anything. The neighborhood was beautiful and peaceful. I would stay here again and do recommend it to any traveler staying in Brooklyn.

Ravanna and his brother were very accommodating and responsive to questions prior to and during our stay in Brooklyn. The apartment itself was great and relaxing especially after a long day's tour around the city and had everything as advertised on the listing. It's also conveniently located to a bus and subway station so transportation to the surrounding cities wasn't a problem.

Tuvimos una estancia muy acogedora. 
El departamento estaba en súper buenas condiciones (limpio y tal como se describe) y el hermano de Ravana fue sin duda un anfitrión muy amable, en todo momento nos preguntó si nos encontrábamos bien, al llegar nos dio indicaciones de donde podíamos comer cerca. 
El departamento tiene buena ubicación, está cerca de la línea G y sin dudarlo, volveríamos a quedarnos.

My son and I stayed for a week and we had a very nice time staying at Ravanna's apartment. It was always a cozy place to return to after our NYC day trips.
It was a true home away from home.
Since our flight landed late I was a bit worried arriving much too late..but all went well and we received a warm welcome.
The subway is quite close and you can get anywhere from there. Shops and restaurants are all around the place.
My son was crazy about the sushi place around the corner.
Thank you Ravanna!
Die Gastgeberin war freundlich, zuverlässig, pünktlich. Die Unterkunft entsprach der Beschreibung. Lebensmittelgeschäfte in unmittelbarer Nähe,  Restaurants leider keine in der Nähe.

Everything about this place was great! We were greeted by Ravanna and she was very friendly. She showed us around the place and there was everything you needed to make yourself at home. She had the necessary beds out for us and they all had fresh linens, and there were plenty of towels too. The kitchen had all the necessary dishes and utensils to make meals; all you had to do was take the groceries. The place was clean and organized. We had no problem with this, but it might be helpful for others to know due to age or physical activity. We had the 3rd floor of the condo, so there are quite a bit of flight of stairs to climb, and the walk to the nearest sub station was about 6 blocks away. Other than that, this place is highly recommended!

We were absolutely delighted with the attention to detail, warm welcome and kind hospitality.  The apartment was pristine - clean, well serviced and exactly as it was described.  We found the neighborhood to be quiet and with easy access to restaurants, groceries and the subway.  We would highly recommend this listing and we will certainly stay here again in the future.

This was a  really comfortable apartment with a good amount of space and a separate window A/C unit in each room, which was very much appreciated in the summer heat! Our hosts were super easy to work with, communicative and flexible, didn't ask for much from us on checkout. The kitchen is pretty tiny, just enough standing room for one person at a time, but as long as you aren't doing a ton of cooking, it has all the amenities you could want -- bagel-sized toaster, microwave, gas stove, full-size fridge, 6-cup auto-drip coffee maker. The shower was great. Tons of nice soft & clean towels/linens, ironing board and iron, even paid-subscription cable channels on a nice big-screen TV. We really enjoyed staying here and felt the hosts took great care of us. The property is within walking distance of a variety of grocery/convenience stores, a few restaurants/bars, and a few different subway stops. As a fairly naive tourist from Oregon, the neighborhood felt a little less safe than I would prefer, but without much NYC experience to compare it to, it's hard to say if that was just my imagination. We didn't have any issues and having my husband with me made it just fine.

We did not meet Ravanna in person, but she was always available via cellphone to answer our questions. The apartment is just as described: it is very spacious and well equipped. Also, it is situated in a nice neigborhood, we always felt safe there. The metro is a 10 minute walk away and offers an excellent connection to Manhattan. There are grocery stores in the immediate vicinity of the apartment. A perfect place for exploring New York!

We enjoyed our stay here. The place was very roomy and spacious. The unit was clean. Lots of comfy linen available. Kitchen was tiny but functional. The owners were very accommodating during our entire stay. The neighborhood had a couple of great markets within walking distance. We would absolutely stay here again. Looking forward to it!

The apartment was very nice and clean. It is located in a nice area with some nice places to go out in the area. The hosts were helpful and very accommodating. We really appreciated the stay and I would recommend this apartment to anyone.
Perfect stay in NYC. Everything you need and all help or tips you need. I really recommend to stay here!
Der Vorzug dieser Wohnung besteht in ihrer Nähe zu Manhattan. Mit der Metro ist man in der Tat sehr schnell dort.

The owners of the apartment (we met Ravanna and Jedda) were both awesome - nothing was a problem. 
The apartment itself was exactly as described...if you're looking to explore NYC then this is what you need.
Thanks again guys,
Paul

The apartment was just perfect! So we were badly delayed from the airport and the host were so understanding and stayed in contact and was greeted so lovely when we arrived. 
The apartment was a 20 min walk from the subway which is great as the line took you straight in to lower Manhattan ( the subway is 24 hours so you don't need to worry about getting taxis or rushing out of the city before it closes ) 
The apartment was just as the pictures! They are lovely friendly hosts. 
There are local bar and food places just down the road! 
Couldn't rave about this place enough.. 
Definitely recommend!

We were warmly welcome and we had the opportunities to drop our luggages before the check-in, that was really convenient for us.
The apartment is very well located, you can easily reach the subway station and there is many places to eat/drink in the area. 
A subway map was also provided to us to find quickly our way.
Some city documentation was also available in the appartment. That could be helpful espacially if you don't have your own guides.
Apartment is as described and clean.

The location is very good. Near the metro station. It is convenient to go downtown. But there is only one bathroom on the third floor.  Our family has 7people. Ravanna is a nice person, gives us enough beds to use.

We all enjoyed our stay here! Not too far from the subway station and we actually found a bar close by before we headed out to the city, Manhattan! It was a workout going up the stairs but we all pulled it through! I'd definitely recommend this place to a friend or  family! Thanks a bunch!

Die Unterkunft war toll und genauso wie beschrieben. Wir sind herzlich empfangen worden, obwohl die Ankunft am späten Abend war. Wir haben uns direkt sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Lage ist gut, mit der U-Bahn ist man schnell in Manhattan. Das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis stimmt. Alles bestens!

Very friendly host. We enjoyed our stay at their place. The apartment is very spacious with a main bedroom, a smaller bedroom and a large living room. The kitchen is very small though. The area is nice with some local shops, cafes and restaurant on neighbouring Bedford avenue.

Excellent accueil et très bon séjour. 
Hôtes très disponibles car habitant au rez de chassée. 
Appartement spacieux et joliment décoré.
L'accès à Manhattan est rapide grâce à la ligne express A.
OMG! I know exactly where I'm staying every time I come  to the city. Love the place and the hosts were awesome.  Could not believe what we paid, for all the we got!

This place was a perfect home base for my four family members and I before I ran the NYC marathon. It was great to have enough space to relax and cook a meal together. The internet was fast, the apartment was clean, and all of our needs were taken care of. Definitely some fun spots nearby to check out too. A great place to stay if you're in NYC with a group!

Ravanna was amazing! Extremely hospitable. The place is amazing, spacious and clean. Also the area is amazing and they were really informed about it all. I'd definitely stay here again the next time I'm in Brooklyn.

We had a truly awesome stay here! I would highly recommend this place to any groups who are traveling to NYC. It was very comfortable, and so nice to each have our own bed and common areas with a table and couch. Check in was very easy, and on our first night, we enjoyed some of the local bars and restaurants. It was also very easy to get to other parts of Brooklyn and Manhattan, with a short walk to the subway station. The street is very pretty, with lots of lovely Brownstones. I would definitely stay here again when I come to BK with a group. Thanks so much!!
Ravanna is a very friendly host, check in was made by him very easy, the kitchen has everything that you may need. The apartment is 8-10 walking minutes from subway

The place was perfect for my family's stay and in a very central location. It was very clean and the host was easy to get ahold of, super welcoming, and friendly. The kitchen supplied all we need and it was spacious enough for 6 people to stay comfortably. They had plenty of towels and washcloths and the beds were very comfortable. I had a great stay here and would recommend it to anyone.

Ravanna is just amazing, he was punctual with the check in time, he help us feel comfortable, told us the nearby places, as well as the stations to get to the city (which are really closed, 5-8 min walk). The neighborhood is quiet, we were getting to the apartment around 2-3 am and is really safe.  We were 12 people, and there was a bed for every single one of us, as described in the add. 

Will stay here again.

We loved Ravanna's Home Away from Home! The apartment was perfect size, clean, and very quiet and private. We never knew anyone else was in the building. Ravanna was so easy to contact ,allowed us to arrive early from the airport, and gave great tips about where to eat in the  neighborhood.  The train station was just a short 10 minute walk away. 
We would absolutely love to stay here again!

This was my very first BNB stay! The apartment was absolutely gorgeous, and had an excellent location. It was just a quick drive away from the convention we were attending. We felt safe, welcomed, and were very happy with how communicative the hosts were. I am especially thankful for them allowing our friends that arrived much earlier than us to settle in without having to wait for us. Thank you so much, I would recommend this place over and over again.

I came to Brooklyn for business and the apartment was perfect. It is well-located, with a well-equipped kitchen, large flat screen TV with loads of premium channels, fast wi-fi, and lots of beds.  There is a large master bedroom, smaller 2nd bedroom, and enough beds and rollaways for a large group. The apartment is on the third floor which makes it quiet and above the street noise. The photos are accurate and the apartment is clean and well-equipped. The bathroom is updated and modern and has a great shower. The host was very attentive and communicated perfectly.  He lives on the first floor and someone is always there to help... like when I locked myself out early in the morning. :) If there was anything that could be improved, the walls are a bit bare in the bedrooms and could use some more hanging decor, if that is what you like. Add high-end designer linens and some more art on the walls, and this place could rent for double the price and still be a great value. As it is, it is a super find!
the location is perfect, short walk to subway, great restaurants and grocery store.  the host is responsive easy to communicate with, would stay again!
Great place to stay. Owners were really nice and helped point us in the right direction. Close walk to the subway and a 15-20 minute walk to Barclays Center.

We made a very last minute booking at Ravannas place, he answered in less than an hour, which we were very grateful for! They were very friendly but the place was a bit dirty. The neighborhood was nice with lots of shops and restaurants and the metro just a few blocks away.

The host's brother greeted us upon arrival and check-in was very easy. He was very polite and even offered to help carry luggage upstairs. The description of the apartment was accurate as it was spacious and had many beds for larger groups, and it was very clean. It was just 2 of us staying in this location because we wanted to explore Brooklyn and still have access Manhattan. We enjoyed our stay here!

Apartment looks like in the photographs. Clean, basic accommodation. Easy 10 minute walk to the subway, but perhaps take an Uber if you have a lot of luggage. Very friendly, non-invasive interaction overall.

We had a very good stay in April. Checkin was smooth and our host was very friendly. The apartment had everything we needed for our weekend. The location was really good and the street (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication with Ravanna was excellent and we used text msgs to make things even quicker. Thanks for a great stay!

Appartement très agréable, 2 chambres dont une très grande. Quartier à 15 min en métro du sud de Manhattan, boutiques, épiceries... Accueil très sympathique, l'hôte a même gardé nos bagages pour notre dernière ballade avant la départ ! Merci !

Accurate description, Ravanna was accomodating to us with an early check in and key exchange. Him and his family are easily accessible and very easy to talk to! Would recommend their place to anyone. Two train stations near by, plenty of restaurants and convenience stores around for your liking! Thank you Ravanna for an enjoyable stay!
Great place exactly as advertised. Accommodating host and great location. Thank you!

My experience at Ravanna's apartment was great! Her place was exactly what my friends and I needed for a perfect weekend away. The location was outstanding, everything was within short walking distance. She and her siblings were extremely accommodating, letting us check in early and even let us leave our bags behind after check out for a couple extra hours until we had our transportation to head out of town in order. No complaints!

Ravanna's place was just perfect for our needs. It's spacious, spotlessly clean and Ravanna was so friendly and welcoming. The beds are comfortable and the living room is cosy with a great selection of cable channels. Ravanna was very laid back & had no issue with our brother visiting while we stayed and bringing his small dog with him which was a massive bonus for us. We felt really at home here.

We had a very comfortable stay. Bathrooms were clean, beds were comfortable,air-conditioning was running. Updated kitchen. Convenient street parking. Overall a good experience. The apt is on 3rd floor with quite a few stairs, so if you have old folks with you, it might be a challenge.

The location is great and only a few stops away from Williamsburg if you take the G train. Ravanna and her brother were very accommodating about letter us leave our luggages in the lobby pass out 10am check out time. Lots of great options for food just steps away. Very diverse and cultural neighborhood ♡

Thank you for this nice stay in your apt. It was perfectly adapted to our needs, very clean. The air conditioner was very efficient during these warm days. Nothing is missing (except maybe a colander for pasta).... The street is very nice with lot of trees and nice houses. It takes around 10min to go to the nearest subway station. I would absolutly recommend this rental !
Thank you again !
N'hesitez pas Brooklyn est un quartier tres typique, la location est tout a fait conforme aux photos, tres spatieuse et propre. Et Ravanna est tres arrangeant !

We found the hosts to be great communicators, both before and during our stay. We were 2hrs late arriving due to a plane delay and they were more than accommodating with this. The space felt very comfortable and clean for our family of 5 and the building was very secure.
Ravannas apartment was in a good location, and was very clean and comfortable. We enjoyed our stay.

Ravanna made my sons & me feel very welcome by greeting us when we first arrived. The accommodations were lovely; exactly as described on the website. The location couldn't have been better for our needs!

It's good value for a large group of 8. Street parking available.
Location is close enough to Manhattan. No frills kind of place.
Charming Flat!

The apartment provided an excellent base to visit Manhattan. The tube station Nostrand is within 10 minutes walk. The neighbourhood is typical for Brooklyn and we liked it very much to walk around and smell the atmosphere. The host was very responsive and friendly. 
We were with 5 persons. The apartment provides 3 double beds. As these are too small for two persons we had to use 2 stretch beds which were available in the apartment. Overall we had a great stay and got great value for money!

房子很不错,三层楼的第三层,和照片中一样干净温馨,每层楼都有独立的厨房和卫生间,厨房稍小,不过一般早餐煮个面煎个鸡蛋什么的完全没有问题｡主人房有两个1.5m宽的大床,而且还有很宽敞的空间可以加床垫,客人房也有个1.5m宽的大床｡
地点距地铁A/C线Nostrand Av站步行15分钟,或者距G线Bedford Nostrand Av站步行10分钟,去曼哈顿交通还算方便｡其中A线是快线,只停大站｡
出门左转几步路就到了Nostrand Ave,有很多食物超市或杂货店快餐店,可以很方便地买到鸡蛋､牛奶､面包､香肠､果汁､各种零食和简单的蔬菜｡
出门右转到Bedford Ave走3个街区(走10分钟)就有个中国餐厅,提供炒饭､炒菜､面等,不过只能外卖,味道不错｡住处一楼有该餐厅的宣传单｡
布鲁克林属于黑人比较多的区域,去地铁站的路上见到的大多数是黑人,但是这里还是安全的,晚上很安静,我们一大家子经常晚上9点多天黑了才回住处,也没发生什么｡
房东不错,有问必答,但也不会打扰你,住了4天,很好的体验｡

She was very pleasant and helpful.  The listing is in the middle of a long block, so the traffic noise is minimal for the area.   Air conditioners work well.  Television is large and has good picture.  Refrigerator and microwave were clean.  Watch the next-to-top step of the stairs, which is spongy and should probably be repaired.

Ravanna & fam were such great hosts. They answered all my questions beforehand and even let us check in early which was greatly appreciated. The location was perfect, to the left was the hood and to the right was the more gentrified side. We were also pretty close to subway stations and only 3 stops away from the Barclay Center. There was 3 of us so there was plenty of room. Would definitely stay again! 
Thanks again!

I had the early arrival, but he was greeted kindly. The rooms are very big, it was very felt good even bed. So also was with the daughter of the 1-year-old, it is the bath and the floor was glad very clean. It might fear a little security for the Japanese. But, it is a very safe place. To stay in the family is very good inn. Thank you very much.

La estancia en la casa fué muy agradable. Todo es tal como aparece en las fotos. Ellos nos estaban esperando el día de llegada para entregarnos las llaves y todo fué muy rápido y sin sorpresas. La casa es limpia, acogedora y con todos los servicios que necesitabamos. Sin duda, si hemos de volver a NY intentaremos repetir esta estancia.

Very close to rad spots and it's in a safe feeling neighborhood. Metro was just a couple blocks away. Also there's a nice amount of space in the common area. Worked wonderfully as a home base for my trip! Also appreciated the communication to get the keys!
Great place to stay! Safe and close to the MTR

My family and me are really happy with this apartment and with host. It was clean and like I expected. And my parents lost a luggage in the airport, and host pick up while we were visiting NY, really thank you.
I recommend this apartment!!
Everything was smooth and easy, the apartment was quite spacious and in a cool and relaxed neighbourhood.
My family and I had a great stay! Easy to find and close to the subway.
We had a wonderfull stay at Ravanna's house! We felt like a real brooklyn family. The house was personal, clean and perfect for our stay. We definitely would recommend this place.
Great place
Great stay. Pleasant,quiet,clean. Recommend/ subway near by.jz.
The house was perfect,  Very cute clean and big house, very close to the subways, deli and resturants!
Had a great stay here. Had everything we needed.
Great host and great place with loads of space. Great value. Ideal for big groups due to the amount of space and beds on offer. Would stay here again!

The apartament is just as seen on the photos... large rooms, great spaces, clean and the temperature was great . Very close to the subway and great restaurants... the host was very kind and helpful...

when we stay here we had very good time. 
the host is very good, kind.
clean room, good position. 
if i go new york again, i hope stay there. 
thank you for everything.
Enjoyed My Stay, the Area Is Calm Stores are open almost 24/7 & the Privacy was great
This was a great stay and Ravanna was a very accommodating and easy host. Would definitely stay again. Thank you!
This place was everything we were looking for! Perfect location!

This apartment is very clean and tidy. It offers a great place to crash after a long day sightseeing or just out about in the city. It's a very quiet block and there are convenient places to grab a bite nearby. Thank you for hosting!

Ravanna a été très accueillante et très disponible pour toutes nos questions.
Cependant l'appartement par rapport aux photos mises en ligne, il  convenait à peu près pour 4 malgré une cuisine toute petite et une vaisselle en quantité variable; cependant il ne nous paraît pas adapté pour 7 personnes comme suggéré dans l'annonce.
Clean, homey and just as described! We loved our stay in this BK abode.

A very nice flat with all necessary facilities and a good location. Everything was nice and clean, plenty of space and very good kitchen with all appliances. The apartment is just 10 min walk from subway and you can take an express A line to Manhattan - takes about 20 minutes. There are some really good grocery shops nearby and the hosts left a bunch of take-away leaflets for us. They even left some umbrellas in the hall for us to use, as it was raining in New York that week. Communication was excellent - Ravanna was always available over the phone, and check-in and check-out were really straightforward and convenient. Would definitely recommend this place, as we enjoyed our stay there.
Great hosts, nice apartment. We had a wonderful stay at Ravanna's place. Strongly recommended.
A great place to stay. Ravanna and everyone we met in the house were very friendly. Would definitely stay here if coming back to NYC - so easy and fast to get into the centre. Very spacious too.
Nice, spacious apartment, exactly as described. Has everything you may need for a comfortable stay. The area was somewhat shabby, though. Check-in smooth, hosts friendly and welcoming.

great location! 
nice and quiet street.
grocery shopping close by and metro short walk away. 
so glad we stayed here during our ny visit!!

Wir haben uns bei Ravanna sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Wohnung war ein Stockwerk unter der gebuchten Wohnung und war optisch ein wenig anders, der Schnitt war identisch. Für uns war es angenehmer, da wir mit einem Kleinkind gereist sind und nur ins erste OG gehen mussten. Der Empfang war sehr herzlich, die Wohnung schön eingerichtet und funktional. Die Anbindung an die Metrostation Nostrand ist perfekt, da man von dort mit den Linien A und C ohne Umstieg mitten ins Herz Manhattan fahren kann.
Wenn wir wieder nach New York kommen sollten, werden wir diese Wohnung wieder buchen!

Die Wohnung ist sehr zu empfehlen. 

Die Lage ist gut, mit der U-Bahn ist man ist man in 30 Minuten in Manhattan. Es gibt auch Busse direkt vor der Tür, damit hatten wir leider zweimal jedoch Probleme, was aber nichts mit der Wohnung zu tun hat.

Die Wohnung liegt im 2. Stock. Dies störte uns aber nicht, da wir bei 5 Tagen Au´fenthalt morgtens gegen 8 oder 9 die Wohnung verlassen haben und dann meistens erst um 22.00 Uhr wieder erschöpft zurückgekommen sind.

Die Wohnung ist sehr sauber und Check-in ist sehr unkompliziert. 

Die beiden Betten im Mastres-Bedroom sind 1,40m breit, ebenso das Bett in einem relativ kleinem Schlafraum. Wir habn es dann so gelöst, dass unsere 4. Person im Wohnzimmer auf einem Gästebett geschlafen hat, was sehr gut geht. 
Das Bad ist sehr sauber und alles in Ordnung.

Einkaufsmöglichkeiten in kleinen Supermärkten / Shops direkt um die Ecke möglich, ebenso einfache Restaurants / Grills.

In allen Räumen gibt es Klimaanlagen, die auch bei 33 Grad Celsius gut funktionierten. Wir haben Sie zumeist aber erst nachts angemacht, zum Einschlafen störte uns die Zugluft und die (normalen) Geräusche.
This place is a great deal in a very hip neighborhood! Everything was clean & in order. Ravanna was super friendly & prompt in communicating. We would definitely book this place again.
The condo was great and clean. Had no issues during our stay. Was just a 5 minute walk to the subways and many restaurants. We would definitely come back for another visit.

Das Apartment liegt ruhig mit mehreren Einkaufsmöglichkeiten. Der Bus hält fast vor der Türe und die Bahnstationen sind zu Fuss sehr gut zu erreichen. Ravanna ist sehr freundlich und hilft sehr gerne. Das Apartment ist sehr sauber und wir zu viert hatten sehr viel Platz. Ich kann es nur empfehlen!

The apartment is in a very quit area with many supermakets around and the bus stopps nearly in front of the door. The subways are near by. Ravanna is such an lovely and helpful person. We were four People and the apartment was big enough for all of us. If you need some pleace in New York this is the right pleace.

Really good value for money. The flat is located close to many shops and restaurants. The metro station is just a 10-minute walk away. Our hosts were extremely helpful - they took care of our delayed luggage which was delivered while we were sightseeing in the city.

Ravanna's place is just as advertised. Easy check-in and easy transport into Manhattan. The area is fine with lots of interesting places within walking distance. Try out the Tip Top bar nearby if you like a proper dive. (Shame there weren't more bars like that one around the area.)
Great host and location!
Nice stay in the apartment and good communication with host
God oplevelse, men gå-tur til subway føltes ikke helt sikkert.
Alles, wie beschrieben. Wir haben uns sehr wohl und sicher gefühlt. In 30 Minuten ist man in Manhattan.
Wir haben uns hier sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Wohnung war sauber, Jetta war sehr flexibel was unsere Ankunft anging. Wir würden definitiv wieder hier mieten!

Appartement quasi conforme à sa description. Il est situé à 15 mn d'une station de  métro express, dans une rue jolie et calme . Aux alentours, il y a de nombreux petits commerces. nous n'avons ressenti aucune impression de danger même le soir. Il y a bien 7 vrais lits. On est à 10 mn en metro express du sud de Manhattan ( en metro omnibus, c'est à 20 mn ). 
Ne pas oublier que la surface de l'appartement ne fait que 70 m2, et que donc à 7 personnes la place est limitée pour les occupants, et que le mobilier en sus y est limité. On dormait à 4 dans la grande chambre, à 2 dans la petite chambre et une personne dormait dans le salon.
détail : les ouvertures de 3 fenêtres comportent des systèmes d'air conditionné. Les photos publiées ne montrent pas le papier peint aux murs.

Really enjoyed our stay at Ravanna's place! Would highly recommend the takeaway on the corner for friendly service and a late night snack. Apartment was exactly as described and perfect for our vacation to NYC!
The apartment is in a great location, and is very spacious. Communication and check in was prompt and friendly. This is a spacious accommodation and well equipped, a great place to relax.

Realmente todo excelente. Solo fuimos 3 y dormimos en las camas Queen muy cómodas (buenas sábanas y toallas). El baño esta muy bien (limpio y remodelado) la cocina tiene todo lo necesario y el living es amplio (cabe aclarar que hay AC en todos los ambientes). Lo único que puedo comentar es los 2 pisos (largos) que hay que subir por escalera (fui con mis padres) y el sillon se hundía un poco pero esta bien para pasar un rato. TV y Wi-Fi muy buenos. Super recomendable por el precio.
Beautiful Brooklyn home

Well located apartment in Brooklyn close to A-line express subway and many local bus services. Bars, restaurants and supermarkets nearby. Spacious apartment with comfortable beds, great wifi and excellent TV. Kitchen area a bit cramped for those of us who like to cook and eat in rather than eating out and use takeaways. Living area a bit rundown and shabby, and the couch could certainly have done with a valeting. Unfortunately previous guests had smoked a lot of something in the apartment and, while Ravanna and her brother attempted to give the apartment a good airing, the smell persisted. We were three older guests and concluded that the apartment was more suited to partying younger people who would be out most of the time.

Picture's of the place, do look better than in reality. Ravanna was nice. Metro is not that close. Specially if you have to walk for 15' at night. The place was at he third floor and no elevator. Many grocery stores nearby. Price is ok.
Really appreciated Ravanna’s place; great location in up-and-coming neighborhood; spacious, clean  apartment; as advertised.  Great host.
Great place to stay in New York
Great!
Great place to stay

It was our first time using AirBnB. We initially had a reservation with another house, but when we arrived, we could not get in contact with the owner. After trying to contact them numerous times, we eventually decided to contact AirBnB directly. They handled it very well, offering to refund a night for us to find a hotel, or we could try to contact another AirBnB in the neighborhood, that's where Ravanna comes in. He graciously accepted us literally minutes before we got to his place. He saved our trip and it was only a block down from where we originally planned on staying. He had a very nice home. Had towels and necessities available, a kitchen with cooking utensils, plenty of bedding to choose. Overall a great stay. Highly recommend.

Easy check-in/check-out process. Plenty of room. Kitchen and bathroom were stocked with common household goods that had probably been left by previous guests, which was convenient and useful. Overall good place to stay for a couple days while in New York.
Great communication and hospitality.
Bel appartement, bel emplacement et propriétaire agréable. A recommander, car quartier animé et chaleureux.

Nice apartment, about 10-12 minute walk to the subway. The beds were very comfortable. The apartment is on the third floor & the stairs are quite narrow and steep so have to be a bit careful. Our second floor neighbour smoked a lot of weed so the whole house stank (however it didn't bother us too much since we were out early in the morning & came back late at nights just to sleep).

I wish there was an opportunity for a later check-out time. 
The rooms were very spacious and gave us an opportunity to come home to privacy after a long day.
Great place to stay in NYC in an up and coming residential area!
Place was extremely clean and had a lot of space for my guests and I. Only a 5-7 walk to the subway, and only took about 25-30 minutes to get to MSG. Would definitely recommend this Airbnb.
Great clean place! Easy access in and out of Brooklyn. Would definitely recommend especially for the price.
Every time I visit, Bed-Stuy offers new surprises, coffee shops, cafes, etc.  spacious 2BR w super comfy beds, new sofa, bright sunny windows. Very clean!  Great value!

BOOOO...
Nor'easter scrapped my trip to NY (March 21 - 24) as flights were cancelled, including mine.  I attempted several times to reach Rivanna about our unfortunate situation, but I continue to get NO reply.  At this point, I am out of pocket $400.00.  This is a big financial hit for a single mom who was just trying to visit her daughter during her college spring break.  I am hoping she will do the right thing and refund my money.  Let this be a big heads up when considering an airbnb.

Jennifer

4 felnőtt és 2 kisgyerek számára is kényelmes, a tisztaság is rendben van. Ravanna segítőkész, gyorsan válaszol minden kérdésre.  A metró 10 perc séta, és  az express játattal egész jól elérhető Manhatten. A környék forgalmas, és a szebbik arcát nappal mutatja.

We stayed at Ravanna’s place for 7 days in April this year and were super comfortable.

The apartment is large with two separate double bedrooms (one very large and one smaller) big living/dinning room and an open plan kitchen.

The building itself is quaint, I really liked the front door! And the neighbourhood has lots of restaurants/shops/delis close by.

I recommend this place and would stay there again.
Prettig huis in een nette straat. Metro is 15 minuten wandelen. Verschillende supermarkten vlak bij waar je alles kan vinden dat je nodig hebt.

Bad idea to stop there for discovering N.Y.
Hosts were invisible, typical these times, and not implied even when we asked them about some good groceries. No recommendations at all about the neighborhood. The worst was that the street is not free parking, you have to move your car on Monday, no sign to warn you about this. We got close to be fined. Except the comfortable beds, nothing exciting.

Perfekte Lage um nach Ausflügen nach Manhattan etc. etwas abzuschalten. Das Viertel selbst läd auch zum Entdecken ein. Check-in und Kommunikation verliefen reibungslos und freundlich. Das Apartment bietet genügend Platz für 4 Personen und die Nachbarschaft ist relaxed. Bis zur nächsten U-Bahn Station sind es etwa 20min Fußweg. Ich würde wieder buchen.

Ravanna's place was convenient and easy to check-in. The description is accurate and had everything we needed. We found it a bit warm and difficult to open windows windows. This is the only criticism. The place is about 10 mins walk from a metro station.
Très bel appartement. Propre. Bien placé près d'une station de métro et de commerces.
Great host and place!  Was 100% as advertised she convenient for getting around BK & NYC.  Would stay again for sure.

Great place in Brooklyn! We would stay again at Ravanna's place. It  was very convenient and easy to check-in and check-out.  The place is about 10 min walking from a metro station. The description was very accurate and the apt had everything we needed.  Very clean and with comfortable beds. Thanks!

This is a standard case of you get what you pay for.  
Super affordable place for large parties to stay which is a huge plus. The amenities are bare basics and nothing fancy.
Rooms are a good size for NYC.
Some pieces of furniture were well worn, others seem brand new.  Appears the host is continuing to make improvements, which is great.
It is a pretty far walk from the A line, but still felt pretty safe even late at night.  Street was also very quiet.
There are grocery stores at each end of the block, which was convenient.
We had some frustration with the fitted sheets coming off every night, leaving us sleeping on the uncovered mattress, which appeared new, but still not a pleasant situation.  I encouraged the host to get mattress covers for the beds and some deeper pocketed sheets.  Hopefully they do.
Host did not respond to any form of contact when we accidentally locked ourselves out one morning.  After a couple of hours with no return contact, we eventually called a locksmith. We buzzed the first floor apartment to ask them to let us through the main door, and it turned out to be the host who gave us a spare set of keys but we still ended up having to pay the locksmith because for driving to the location.  Host never mentioned us trying to contact him.
Summary: cheap place to stay in Brooklyn.  Worth what they charge.
Perfect space for big groups!  Easy to find and very simple to get around In Brooklyn.

Was a great place in Brooklyn. This place is quite small but exceptionally useful!  Has a smaller room with 1 bed and a quite large room with 2 full beds and a well played out family/dining room with a desk area too.  kitchen is very small but useful.
We were surprised at what a great place this turned out to be, wit all the amenities needed and 6 extra foldout beds, if needed.  Would love to return.

We had a great experience in Ravanna’s place. It is exactly as pictured and in a very nice and safe area of Brooklyn. The subway is a 15min walk (the main line that takes you to Manhattan) and again, very safe. We had no issues with the apartment. It had all we need to cook and eat at home.
The train ride to Manhattan is about 35/40min. 
Overall, the only issue I had is that in the post it does not say its in the 3rd floor, and I was avoiding places like that because I had an elderly person with me.  

Other than that, great place, easy check in and check out, nice area!
This place was amazing. Close to the stations and a great way to experience brooklyn. The hosts are very responsive and the place is really comfortable and perfect for groups.

We had a wonderful stay in Brooklyn, I would recommend this apartment to everybody who is visiting New York.  In close proximity of several main metro lines directly to all important parts of Manhattan.  
Compared to our European norms, the beds are rather small, but very comfortable.  Especially after an entire day of walking down NYC, you are glad you have such a good bed.  1 room is rather small, but you need it to sleep, not to dance.
The access to the key upon arrival was clearly explained in a message, so we had immediate access to the apartment.  Whenever we're coming back to NY, we will definitely check the availability of this apartment again!
Alojamiento correcto. Barrio bueno con muchos servicios. A diez minutos andando de las dos líneas de metro que tiene cerca.
Good location, 10 min walk to the A, C, and G trains. Had everything our group needed and was a good deal for the amount of beds available. Would stay here again!
Good communication, good location, plenty of space for 5 people.

Nach anfänglicher Verwirrung zu Beginn als man uns in die falsche Wohnung einchecken hat lassen und unsere Sachen eigenmächtig umgeräumt hat in unserer Abwesenheit, waren wir insgesamt zufrieden. Preis - Leistung unschlagbar, Ravanna war stets für Rückfragen verfügbar. Wir würden die Unterkunft in jedem Fall weiterempfehlen.

Ravanna's place was a nice clean comfy place to stay.  Just needed a place to sleep and take a shower.  A quiet neighborhood that's about a 10 min walk to the A/C metro line.  Great place for bigger groups.  Did not cook but the kitchen is very small.

Location is about 10-12min. walk to the subway. Very spacious and adequate even for large groups of about 6-8persons. However, there was a problem with WiFi during our stay which was a major let down.
Very clean (European standard) , great service and very Nice hosts.
Good option at that value. Close to little markets and not too far from Metro. Met our needs for our short trip to Brooklyn and Manhattan. Thank you!

Great place to stay! Not too far from the subway and nice neighborhood. Apartment was large and clean, and relatively quiet. The check in process was really easy due to the lock box. I was also able to reserve the place same day and arrive later in the evening partially because of that I imagine. Definitely recommend!

Ravanna’s place was better than I expected! Comfortable, roomy, convenient, with everything we needed. Check-in and check-out were so easy, and Ravanna was quick to respond to our questions. Truly a home away from home.

La casa di ravanna è molto bella e spaziosa, i letti comodissimi e il quartiere carino.
L'appartamento è a 10 minuti dalla metro e la zona ben servita.
It was clean and comfortable. My family stayed for a week here, and they were all satisfied.

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour de 3 jours. L’appartement de Ravanna est très bien situé à Brooklyn dans un quartier calme où on peut se garer, ce qui est appréciable. Ensuite Métro!
L’aménagement est bien conçu avec une grande chambre pour enfants ou couple avec enfants et une chambre pour couple.
Il dispose de l’équipement nécessaire pour un séjour en famille.
Le processus d’entrée est automatisé et fonctionne très bien. En revanche nous n’avons eu aucun échange avec personne ce qui est un peu dommage quand on vient de loin. En revanche comme nous étions en retard cela évitait les problèmes de disponibilité.

Logement très agréable et bien situé .. Au milieu de deux lignes de métro A,C et G ( à 10 min a pied)  nous avons pu nous rendre très facilement la où nous le souhaitions !  Nous avons eu des réponses rapides à nos questions lors de notre séjour!  A 6 amis, nous avons passé de bons moments de repos après de longues journée de visites !

Very nice accommodation and well located .. In the middle of two subway lines A, C and G (10 min walk) we were able to make it very easy where we wanted! We had quick answers to our questions during our stay! At 6 persons, we had good rest after a long day of sightseeing !

This is as my second stay in this awesome apartment. Both times Ravanna has gone out of his way to make my stay perfect. Even carried my daughter’s stroller into the house to keep it from getting lifted. I would recommend this place to anyone traveling to NYC!!

This apartment was perfect for our stay in NYC. Plenty of space and a comfortable atmosphere made it very relaxing, with a convenient location. Ravanna was super accommodating and easy to communicate with. Very impressed.

name: crowntown apartment 2b
summary: crowntown apartments opens its gates. Seven wonderfully furnished apartments promise the ideal home base for an unforgettable stay in the city of Porto. The soft opening of the crowntown apartments during the first months of this year offers the ideal time for this.
space: The crowntown apartments are located in the centre of the historic City Porto, in a fully renovated building of the 19th century. The house combines the charme of traditional city apartment and the amenities of current standards. Thereby, the obtained elements of the stone wall and the high rooms captivate, just like the relaxing rain shower and the comfortable Boxspring bed. The apartment is based on the 2th floor and combines kitchen and bedroom within a spacious room. The apartment with three large window doors and with access to a private balcony is flooded by light, and is ideally suited for a couple or two singles.
description: crowntown apartments opens its gates. Seven wonderfully furnished apartments promise the ideal home base for an unforgettable stay in the city of Porto. The soft opening of the crowntown apartments during the first months of this year offers the ideal time for this. The crowntown apartments are located in the centre of the historic City Porto, in a fully renovated building of the 19th century. The house combines the charme of traditional city apartment and the amenities of current standards. Thereby, the obtained elements of the stone wall and the high rooms captivate, just like the relaxing rain shower and the comfortable Boxspring bed. The apartment is based on the 2th floor and combines kitchen and bedroom within a spacious room. The apartment with three large window doors and with access to a private balcony is flooded by light, and is ideally suited for a couple or two singles. The metro station Trindade (focal point of the metro system in Porto) as well as a car are each in less
notes: Individual and personal service in a family atmosphere. We are friendly, uncomplicated and always strive to offer our guests something new - that is our aspiration. Discover the special charm and the personal touch of our house. We would be glad to support you at the discovery of the beautiful city, in English, German, Portuguese, Spanish and Danish. Additional services included - Free WLAN - Final cleaning - Good hints regarding the secrets of the city, such that you can enjoy your holiday to the full   We look forward to welcoming you soon with us!
transit: The metro station Trindade (focal point of the metro system in Porto) as well as a car are each in less than 150 meters away from the building.

host.host_about:
Individual and personal service in a family atmosphere. We are friendly, uncomplicated and always strive to offer our guests something new - that is our aspiration.

Discover the special charm and the personal touch of our house.

We look forward to welcoming you soon with us!

Your hosts,

Christiana & Diego

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Diego is a super nice guy, my train was delay for 2 hours and he waited until 11:00pm for my check in. He was still patient to introduce the place and the attractions to me (thanks again :) )

The apartment is perfect, very clean, tidy and new which is exactly same as the photos. It's like a hip hotel which providing everything you need, for example, slipper, towel, shampoo, body lotion, still water...all is new for you.

The place is so comfortable, I felt like home every time when I came back.

The location is super cool too, you can reach at the central of Porto (most of the attractions) by walk in 5 mins, it's not necessary to take any transportation. It's also very convenient to take metro to the beach side.

Overall I'm fully satisfied with Diego's apartment, if anyone wanna travel to Porto, I would highly recommend this place to everyone.
Nice clean and modern, close to the Metro. Good place to explore Oporto
Muchisimas gracias, Diego. El alojamiento ha sido perfecto. Centrico, tranquilo, económico y con todas las comodidades.
Clean and new studio in the center of Porto with everything you need.
Diego is a great host and his place is amazing. Definitely added a lot to our stay. Thanks for all!
Perfect location for exploring Porto, clean and comfortable apartment and a great host. I recommend this place if you want to visit Porto.
Diego é muito solicito, sempre disponível quando precisei. Apartamento perfeito com uma cama maravilhosa e uma ótima localização. Dá pra fazer quase tudo a pé.

My husband and I had the perfect stay at Diego's lovely residence. The apartment was very clean, bright and with a contemporary decoration. The location was close enough to the shops and restaurants/ bars without being in a very touristy / loud area, which was perfect. Everything accessible by foot. And Diego was a wonderful host, willing to wait for us as we arrived late in the evening, always quick to respond to our questions, and also provided us with great recommendations and his fav spots in the city. Would definitely recommend !
Top accomodation in a very nice area of Porto. Very modern, clean and calm. Diego was super friendly and gave us a lot of very good tipps. We would definetely come back.

The apartment was lovely, spacious and very clean. The location was great, central and just round the corner from the metro. Diego was a great host, there to meet and greet us when we arrived and he had some great recommendations for where to eat and explore. The only slight downside was noise from the guests in the apartment above moving about which disturbed us a bit, but otherwise everything was great.
위치가 지하철 역 근처라서 편리하지만 매우 조용합니다 . 사진과 같이 공간이 넓고 시설이 모두 새것이라 좋습니다. 가장 좋은 점은 모든 문이 번호키로 되어 있고 cctv로 보고 있어서 짐을 맡겨놓고 다니기 편리합니다.

Nice apartment in the city center. 

Diego made everything easy and was very kind with us.

Highly recommended.
