The room was spacious, clean and well-equipped. It almost felt like staying in a hotel room (with the added bonus of a full kitchen). It is located two blocks from a hub metro station and within walking distance of all major sites. 
Diego was a great host - he gave us great tips on what to see and local restaurants. He even made reservations for us for a tour at one of the port cellars. Be sure to use his restaurant suggestions - we always enjoyed our dinners at the places he recommended.
It Was perfect... nothing more to say...

I would definitely recommend staying here. The apartment looks just like the photos. The room was very clean and roomy. Diego met us at the apartment for check in at 11pm and gave us recommendations and made reservations for us. He was extremely helpful! Great location and amazing city!

Diego is a super kind host. He was very helpful. He suggested some good restaurants and activities to do. 
Communication was excellent.
The apartment looks exactly as pictured. Super clean and spacious. The bed was super comfortable!Nothing was missing. Everything was perfect. 
Location was also great. Close to the metro and walking distance from the shopping area and a lot of restaurants.
Diego is one of the best host we've encountered and his apartment was also one of the best we've stayed at. 
Thank you for making our stay so easy and enjoyable!
O Diego é um anfitrião muito prestável. E a casa é incrível. Um ambiente aconchegante e com uma ótima localização.
It was a pleasure staying at Diego's airbnb. He was very responsive and polite, and his airbnb was beautiful, newly renovated, and very comfortable.  Highly recommend!

The apartment is very cosy, clean, comfortable and close to everything. The pictures displayed in the advertisement are totally approved. The communication with Diego was easy, he was a very helpful host.
very good service and recommendations, the best choice in Porto
Simplesmente fantástico.

El alojamiento de Diego es excelente bien ubicado cerca de restaurantes , supermercados y de los hermosos lugares para visitar en Porto.
El departamento está totalmente equipado y es súper cómodo.
Diego siempre estuvo atento, nos recibió y nos dio muchas recomendaciones, que nos fueron de mucha utilidad.
Sin duda lo recomendamos y si volvíera a a Porto me alojaria en el.
Sandra y Ricardo
El alojamiento de Diego es excelente. Tal y como se ve en las fotos. Repetiríamos la experiencia sin dudar. Además es un gran anfitrión y buen consejero para moverse por la ciudad.

One of the best Air b'nb places i've  stayed at. Diego made everything easy, through amazing communication. The place is on a quiet street, away from the hustle and bustle but yet so close to everything by foot. The apartment is clean, spacious, and has all you need for a.comfy stay, with the bonus balcony! I would totally recommend it. We would definitely stay again with Diego when we are back to Porto! Thank you.

Très bel emplacement, proche de la principale station de métro: Trindade, direct de l'aéroport.
Magnifique petit appartement, beaucoup de rangements. Seul bémol, la vue sur les immeubles. Mais comme nous avons passé plus de temps à découvrir Porto, cela ne nous a pas dérangé outre mesure!
Et se sera certainement votre cas. Très bon accueil de Diego, c'était un super séjour!
La casa muy cómoda, especialmente la cama. Diego muy amable, nos dio buenos consejos sobre la ciudad y nos dejó fruta como bienvenida.
Belle appartement tout récent, proche des transports. Un parking "Silo Auto" situé dans la rue à côté où vous pouvez garer votre véhicule pour 13€/jour
Beautiful and clean apartment! Diego was great.

We would highly recommend to stay at Diego's. It's one of the best airbnb we have been in.
The appartment is ideally located and is exactly as it looks like on the photos.
Diego has been very nice and we have had a perfect stay.

Diego was a really good host. The communication with him was easy. He was there when we arrived and explained very well the things to do around (restaurants and visits to do).
The apartment was clean and well-located. The bed was comfortable.
We recommand this place!
Appartement très joli et fonctionnel, bien situé et calme. Diego nous a très bien accueillis et nous a indiqué des bons restaurants dans le quartier. Logement parfait pour un weekend à Porto !

Great place - Probably the comfiest bed I've ever stayed in at an AirBnB. The flat itself was newly refurbished to a very high standard. Coffee pods and fruit as well. Flat is also very well located near the Metro and with plenty of shops nearby. Would definitely recommend.
Loft bem localizado, no centro da Cidade, fácil acesso para as zonas de melhor interesse do Porto. O Diego é um excelente anfitrião.

Diego was very flexible about check-in times, which is great when you're unsure about your arrival time. Upon arrival, there was a bottle of water and some fruit up on the counter which, I don't know if it's standard procedure but it was a very nice (and useful) gesture :)
There's not much I can add about the listing itself. Everything's clean and as described, quiet location but still in the city centre. If you need to work, like I did, the internet connection will not let you down. The space is just nice and cozy and you'll probably want to bring the bed home with you. The only thing I wasn't aware was that the whole building belongs to Diego and everything is rented. So, you might hear people coming in and out, which is absolutely fine.
At check-out, Diego was kind to keep my stuff in the building so I could go around the city free-handed until leaving Porto.
I highly recommend Diego's place and whish him all the best of luck for the future :)

The Diego's apartment is very well situated, very near from the Trindade station (directed from the airport) and not so far from the historic center.
Everything is in compliance with the description.
Great studio apartment and top class host in Diego!

We had a very pleasant stay at Diego's apartment: new, comfortable, spotlessly clean and with nice balcony.
We enjoyed the location, wich is still, central, and quiet, very close to Trindade metro and train station. so comfortable!

The place is great! Clean, close to some main areas yet still feels quiet and secluded. The room is exactly like what it looks like in the photos and answered all of our needs. Diego was a great and helpful host.

La estancia en el apartamento fue perfecto. Muy cerca del centro y con transporte desde el aeropuerto directo. La casa es super acogedora y muy bien equipada. Diego fue muy amable en todo momento y no dio facilidades para el check in y nos pasó una lista de restaurantes a los que ir. En general una experiencia muy buena

The entire house has been professionally renovated by Diego. The apartments are very spacious, super clean, tastefully furnished and fully equipped with e.g. dish washer, balcony,...
The house is located in the city centre. Everything is in walking distance. There are parking possibilities in the front of the house and a car park around the corner. A perfect place to discover the city for a few days or or even longer.

Diego is a wonderful host, extremely hospitable and helpful. His apartment  is fabulous, very clean, quiet and well located. We had a memorable stay made even better by his great advice and recommendations. Nothing was too much trouble.

El apartamento no puede ser más mono y estiloso! Súper limpio y todo un detalle el tenernos preparado unas frutas y agua de recibimiento! 

El sitio es ideal porque pilla muy cerca del centro y a la vez estás aislado de todo el ruido y ajetreo! 

Diego un encanto nos recomendó sus sitios para visitar y comer! Totalmente recomendable 100%

Excellent location to the Trinidad metro station. Very clean and fully equipped. Good size balcony overlooking a private garden. Diego was super with communication and gave us a couple of good tips for our visit.

Diego place was great! In a great location, clean, and very convenient. Diego himself was extremely helpful and efficient - gave me in a minute all the information I needed to know about Porto. Highly recommended.

Très belle appartement bien situé prêt de tout et très calme 
Diego est un hôte d’une grande gentillesse je recommande

Diego was very pleasant and took the time to explain everything we needed to know about the apartment and answered all our questions about our visit to Porto. We highly recommend his place to any one visiting Porto. It's steps away from the subway and close to all the most popular tourist sites. His place is spotless and very bright. It's modern and looks brand new. Considering the location it was also very quiet. Thanks for the water and fruit basket.
perfect spot in a great part of time, Diego was lovely and introduced us to some great places in this beautiful city, many thanks!
Aucun soucis de communication, l appartement est conforme aux photos et bien agencé. Merci a Diego pour ses précieux conseils sur les bus. Appartement et propriétaire a recommander sans soucis
The flat is very beautiful and spacious, we loved it! Diego is really nice and gave us very good advices

This apartment is great, it's really modern, spacious and very clean.
Location is good, walking distance to the centre of town and 2 minutes from the metro station. 
Diego is a great host and gave us good recommendations for things to do in Porto and places to eat at.

We had a great time in Diego's apartment. It is close to public transport and walking distance to the city center. The apartment itself is lovely, cozy and super clean. Plus Diego gave us some great tips to enjoy the best of Porto.

Die Kommunikation mit Diego und der Checkin waren hervorragend und sehr freundlich, er begrüßte uns direkt an der Eingangstür und zeigte uns alle wichtigen Dinge über die Wohnung sowie die Umgebung. Die Wohnung liegt perfekt im Stadtzentrum von Porto. Ca. 3 min von der Haltestelle Trinade sowie dem Zentrum mit Bars und Restaurants entfernt. 

Die Wohnung selbst war wie beschrieben sehr geräumig, hell und sauber. Es gibt genügend Platz für zwei Personen und die Küche ist mit allen wichtigen Dingen ausgestattet. Wir können Diegos Wohnung nur wärmstens weiterempfehlen!

Hemos pasado una noche en los apartamentos de Diego y podemos decir que la elección fue acertada. El apartamento es sencillamente genial, cómodo, limpio, tranquilo para descansar y con una ubicación fantástica para visitar Oporto. En cuanto a Diego ha sido un anfitrión estupendo, ayudando en todo y muy amable y simpático. Sin duda cuando volvamos a Oporto nos alojaremos de nuevo aquí.

El apartamento de Diego es ideal para hospedarse en Porto, está situado en una zona muy tranquila y céntrica, a tan solo 10 minutos del punto de referencia de la ciudad, la Torre del Clérigo, y a 2 minutos de la parada de metro Trindade, por lo que la comunicación con el aeropuerto es fantástica. En cuanto a Diego, todo un encanto, muy simpático y atento en todo momento durante nuestra estancia, también, cabe decir, que nuestro apartamento estaba impoluto y con detalles como agua y fruta de bienvenida. Repetimos!
완벽한 팬트하우스 (한국인 무조건 강추.!!)

Diego's apartment is fantastic! It's small, sparklingly clean and well organized. It's very quiet at night but also very close to many city center attractions in Porto. Diego gave us great tips about places to eat, drink, and sightsee in Porto!

Edifício e apartamento completamente renovado, muito central, bem decorado e extramamente confortável, com todos os apontamentos que se possam desejar, desde café a fruta, passando por chinelos de quarto, Wi-Fi, etc. Altamente recomendado, voltarei a repetir seguramente!!!
모든 것이 완벽한 공간. 싱글이나 커플에게 추천. 깨끗하고 예쁨. 도보 3분 거리의 트린다데역은 모든 메트로가 지나가는 교통의 요지. 포르토의 모든 곳을 도보, 메트로, 버스로 이동 가능. 디에고는 모든 것이 준비된 호스트. 포르토에 다시 머문다면 난 이곳을 다시 찾을 것임.

Alojamiento inmejorable. Nada más entrar un intenso pero relajante olor te invade, el edificio está nuevo, impecable, todo limpísimo y perfecto.  Ninguna pega. Ojalá podamos volver pronto. Diego un anfitrión de 10 que a pesar de que se retrasó nuestro bus, nos esperó con una sonrisa y con un mapa listo para explicarnos las zonas que podíamos visitar! Recomendable 100%. Al lado del metro, del centro y de tiendas mas pequeñas o supermercados

O apartamento fica em pleno coração da cidade do Porto, a 2 min da estação de metro da Trindade, portanto, a localização é ótima, perto da maioria dos locais de interesse (histórico) da cidade!! 
O Diego, foi um excelente anfitrião, colocando-nos sempre à vontade para lhe colocar questões, a qualquer hora do dia ou da noite.
Quanto ao apartamento em si, estava muito bem limpo e organizado contendo todas as comodidades necessárias, até para uma estadia mais longa do que um fim-de-semana (que foi o meu caso).
Sem dúvida, um dos melhores Airbnb em que já estive! Recomendo 100%!
Muy bonito e impecable el apartamento! estuvimos muy cómodos, volveríamos sin dudarlo.
Fomos muito bem recebidos, o Diego foi muito simpático. O apartamento é muito acolhedor, limpo e cuidado, e está bem localizado. Recomendo!
Perfect ! Everything was clean! Its quiet. Close to center. I highly recommend

Très bel appartement, très bien situé pour visiter Porto. L'appartement est récent très propre, lumineux, spacieux et offre tout le confort nécessaire. Il est proche du centre et de la station de Métro Trindade qui donne accès à toutes les lignes. Diego est très sympathique et répondra à toutes vos questions. Nous conseillerons à nos amis et proches.
Muy buen servicio. Muy limpio el cuarto. Recomendable.
Un emplacement incroyable, un logement impeccable et spacieux et un service A1. Rien à redire. À recommander les yeux fermés
Estancia corta pero muy agradable. Apartamento totalmente renovado con todas las comodidades posibles, repetiría sin duda

The area was nice and close to the city and the home was extremely clean. After coming into town unprepared, Diego shared a great list of things to see. The place was great, but the service was excellent.
Local que corresponde inteiramente às fotografias. A repetir, sem dúvida alguma.
Excelente hospitalidade e quarto fantástico! Perfeito para um fim de semana a 2 num quarto com gosto, com todas as comodidades e limpo.

O apartamento é ótimo, tanto a nível de decoração e comodidade, como de limpeza. É exatamente como mostram as imagens e tem todas as coisas básicas de que possamos precisar para passar uns dias de férias. A localização é ÓTIMA, pois encontra-se perto de tudo e tem o metro da trindade a poucos metros de distancia. Gostámos muito e concerteza que sempre que formos ao Porto esta será a nossa estadia de eleição! Não nos podemos queixar de absolutamente nada! Mais uma vez, obrigada Diego.
Diego was really kind and the apartment was great! We had a great time in Porto.

Appartamento perfetto in una posizione ottima, servito da tutti i mezzi pubblici, la metropolitana arriva direttamente dall'aeroporto. 
Il riscaldamento con il condizionatore scalda molto lentamente e quindi in inverno può essere un problema.

Nice clean flat that is both really easy to get to from the airport and is within walking distance of the central waterfront. Diego was really helpful giving us tips of where to eat and also helped organise a tour around one of the port houses. Highly recommended!

Vou sempre ao Porto a trabalho ou a lazer e essa foi a primeira vez que fiquei neste Airbnb em particular... e posso dizer que com certeza nas próximas visitas a cidade irei ficar novamente! Apartamento excelente, atendimento 5 estrelas, bem localizado, limpo e ótima hospitalidade. Tudo que você busca em um Airbnb. Parabéns pelo trabalho Diego e até uma próxima estadia.
Logement super confortable et accueil très chaleureux. À recommander pour un citytrip à Porto

Io e il mio ragazzo abbiamo appena passato 3 giorni a Porto e abbiamo alloggiato presso l’appartamento di Diego. Cosa dire..Diego è stato molto gentile, disponibile in tutto e sempre pronto a consigliare le cose migliori. La stanza è meravigliosa, pulitissima e nuovissima e a due passi dalle attrazioni principali di Porto. Lo consiglio davvero a tutti! Rimarrà nel cuore.
This apartment was perfect and I would definitely return. Diego was the perfect host.
cool and cosy! absolutely recommend. thanks diego!

Diego's crowntown is pretty nice, very clean, with comfortable bed and decent facilities, great location close to Dom Luis I Bridge and also metro. Thanks to Diego's help to the advices of city tour as well. I will definitely stay here again in my next visit.
Nova visita e correu tudo bem como da última vez. Diego sem disponível e flexível

Superbe appartement, situé au calme à 3 minutes du métro Trindade. Très bon accueil de la part de Diego, et beaucoup de bons conseils prodigués pour profiter au mieux de la ville en un WE (en particulier la visite des caves de porto Graham's) !

O sítio é top! !! 
Recomendo,  com certeza!

appartement  bien placé prés du métro Trindade.
Équipement impeccable. Très propre
calme ,aucun bruit
Nous recommandons sans auvune réserve

so convenient
& such a great price 
perfect for a short stay in porto
Excelente atención, Diego es muy amable y hospitalario. Queda muy bien ubicado, cerca de todo y súper lindo

This place is dreamy (maybe because it was a kind of romantic trip ;)). Very clean and well designed, and so very cozy. I was staying just for one night, but would have loved to stay more. It is located at a very nice area in Porto, with many nice things around. Easy to use as a center from which you can walk to many places, and really gives you a taste of how beautiful Porto is. That terrace, to die for. There is a close parking facility to the apartment, quite cheap and secure. I am definitely coming back to Porto, and staying here again.
Habitacion muy limpia, no le falta de nada. Tiene todos los detalles que se necesitan, horno, lavaplatos, etc.
El apartamento está genial y Diego es muy amable.
Great little apartament!
Estúdio bem localizado em perfeito estado. Comodo e bem equipado. Fui super bem recebida e todo o o processo de comunicação com o anfitrião foi muito simples. Super recomendado!

This is by far the best airbnb we have ever stayed in.
The location is ideal, just a couple of minutes from the train station, it's very easy to get to the airport and you can get on foot to all the cities attractions.
The flat itself was very clean, and equipped with a very modern kitchen, shower, large tv and comfortable bed. We really liked it that the balcony had a table  which made it ideal for having breakfast while admiring the lovely garden view.

Diego is a magnificent host, he gave us lots of useful tips, helped us book a Port Winery tour and was very prompt at replying to our messages.

Although our stay was short, this flat helped us make the most of it and we will probably return to Porto soon.

Oh and I almost forgot, we really liked the small touches such as the nespresso machine with capsules and provided toiletries.
Melhor lugar para ficar em Porto com toda a certeza!

Unterkunft ist echt top! Sehr zentrale Lage, sowohl zur nächsten Metro (8 Min.) als auch zu einigen Sehenswürdigkeiten (10-15 Min.). Apartment ist groß, hell und hat alles was man benötigt. Diego ist zudem ein sehr netter Gastgeber, der uns klasse Restauranttipps mitgeteilt hat. Ein Aufenthalt bei ihm ist echt weiterzuempfehlen! :)
Das Apartment war sehr sauber und modern eingerichtet. Die Lage ist sehr zentral mit vielen Ausgehmöglichkeiten in der Nähe. 100% Weiterempfehlung

Grab this place!
Well worth it on all levels

Es la SEGUNDA VEZ que volvemos en muy poco tiempo, eso creo que ya dice mucho, pues nuestra primera vez allí ha sido tan satisfactoria en absolutamente todos los aspectos que por eso hemos vuelto. Hemos estado en otro apartamento diferente y nada malo, absolutamente nada malo que decir, al igual que en el otro que estuvimos de la vez anterior, pues son muy similares, y esperamos volver en cuanto podamos, porque estamos encantados de todas las comodidades que tiene, de la zona donde está, porque nunca hemos tenido problemas de aparcamiento, está en el centro turístico de Oporto, con todo a mano, metro, bus, tranvía... Y que decir del anfitrión que no hayamos dicho ya?? Pues que es la amabilidad en persona. RECOMENDABLE 100%

El apartamento es igual que en las fotos, la limpieza sobresaliente y un cuidado muy especial de los pequeños detalles. 

Nos hemos enamorado, tanto de Porto como de este espectacular apartamento. 
 
El anfitrión, Diego, es una persona súper amable y atenta. Tuvimos algunos problemas al llegar, y el estuvo súper atento a nuestros imprevistos. 

Muchísimas gracias y esperamos volver pronto!!!

*Accueil+réactivité+suivi+discrétion+appartement+emplacement= EXCELLENT 
 *Accueil+Inicio + seguir + discreción + alojamiento + ubicación = EXCELENTE !
* Home + responsiveness + monitoring + discretion + apartment + location = EXCELLENT!
Adorei o espaço! Rua bastante sossegada o que é excelente, super limpo e com tudo o que é necessário.  É extremamente central, mesmo ao lando da estação de metro principal e com imensos restaurantes.
Todo excelente!
Nice place, good location. Everything A++

Diego is a sweet and remarquable host, we really enjoyed our trip in porto thanks to him : the room is very bright, well-decorated and equipped, it is central and bodes well with people desiring to discover the city by their own means, on foot. He gave us good pieces of advice and local adresses. Nothing to say otherwise, I highly recommend !
All perfect!

We have lived here for 3 days and totally in love with this place. Cozy, chill and relax staying in the room. Diego was really responsive to the message and provide us lots of travel information of porto. His list of restaurants never disappointed us. 
Definitely recommended if you are finding a place staying in porto

Jesteśmy już po wycieczce do Porto. Wszystko co widzicie na zdjęciach pozostaje w zgodzie z rzeczywistością. Pokoje czyste,, wygodne ,wyposażone. Nasz gospodarz okazał się młodym , uroczym człowiekiem. Wiedza z przewodników to jedno ale wiadomości uzyskane od Diego o tym co zobaczyć , gdzie zjeść jak się poruszać okazały się bardzo przydatne.
Warta podkreślenia jest lokalizacja domu - 5 minut od głównej stacji metra Trindade i blisko do ścisłego turystycznego centrum a jednak w uliczce, która gwarantowała ciszę w nocy.
Polecamy. Beata i Marek
Clean, bright apartment in the heart of Porto, within easy walking distance to anywhere in town. Well decorated and a great space overall!

Apartamento en el centro de la ciudad, puedes llegar andando a todos los sitios. Además, muy limpio y tal y como se muestra en las fotos.
El trato de Diego, maravilloso.

El apartamento es tal y como las fotos: limpio, elegante, espacioso y con todos los utensilios de cocina/baño necesarios. Está muy bien ubicado y Diego es encantador.
100% recomendable

A perfect, modern adaptation in the center of an old City, Porto. Diego is a very gracious host that doesn't stay far from this property so his communication is top notch. This space is a 5 minute walk at most from city center. It is easy to get to and we felt safe walking both during day and at night. Enjoy your stay here and enjoy Portugal! Cheers.

Cozy, comfortable and clean flat in the city center, with nice furniture and close to supermarkets, restaurants and metro station.
It is exactly as it looks like in photos.
Diego is a really kind host, thank you!
Excellent location and good care
Great location and beautiful room!

L’appartement est idéalement situé dans le centre ville. À deux pas de la station Trindade qui vous amène directement à l’aeroport en 30min environ. Diego est un super hôte, nous le recommandons sans problème à toute personne intéressée à visiter Porto! Seul bémol: l’insonorisation de l’immeuble. Sinon, au top!
Très bon accueil, appartement coquet et confortable et très bien situé. Je recommande cet appartement.

We had AMAZING time in Porto! 

Diego was very helpful, pointing us towards the main attraction points of the city.  The appartment was clean, comfortable and at the best possible location.  We definitely recommend Diego's place to anyone who plans to stay in beautiful Porto!
New facility. Neat structure. Easy with smart keys.

We had a lovely stay! It's right next to the Mero and the centre is easily accessible on foot.
The apartment was very nice and clean.
Check in was also very easy and everything went very well. Would definitely recommend!

We absolutely loved staying here! Diego's place is just off the beaten path making it the perfect place to get a good night's rest in the bustling city. The apartment was clean, private and had an a/c unit. We enjoyed exploring Porto and would definitely stay here again!
The place was just as described and looked exactly like the pictures. Great first Airbnb experience!

Appartement impeccable, idéalement situé. Diego est un hôte sympathique et réactif.
Je vous le recommande vivement.
Super schönes Zimmer!
Great location, secure and very comfortable. Diego is super helpful and quick to respond to any queries.

Perfect apartment for couples. Spacious, clean, bright and in a great location in the city. Close to the metro but on a cozy side street. 15-20 minutes by foot to all the main attractions. Diego was very helpful and easy to contact whenever we had questions.

We would definitely stay here again.
포르투는 정말 좋았어요. 도시도 멋졌고 우리가 묵었던 숙소, 호스트, 모든것이 완벽했습니다

Diego's place exceeded our expectations. The apartment is beautiful. The bed is so comfortable and we slept really well here after walking Porto's streets. Diego was an amazing host. Check-in and check-out was seemless and he was great with communication. We hope to stay again and can't recommend it enough.
Great place. Everything as promised and fantastic service from Diego. Apartment was great!!
Excelente alojamiento. Inmejorable. Todo muy, muy bien. Gracias.

Het appartement is groot, schoon en van alle gemakken voorzien. Het ligt in een rustige straat op ongeveer 10 minuten lopen van het centrum. Diego is een goede host; reageert snel op vragen en heeft ons verschillende tips gegeven over wat we konden doen. Een absolute aanrader!
Great studio apartment to discover Porto, would definitely recommend :)

Diego was very good (quick) at communicating with us, both before we arrived  at his place and during our stay. The place is fairly large and was everything we expected it to be.  The bed is very comfortable and the AC works great and is adjustable. Short walk to everything we wanted to see/do. 

Diego also provided very good restaurant suggestions in the area.

Diego was a wonderful host; he offered an early check-in to accommodate our redeye flight, he had a personalized list of his recommendations for our visit, and even let us check out late. We arrived to an air conditioned apartment, a huge bottle of water, fresh fruit, and a personalized checkin. The bed was also really comfortable! Would highly recommend Diego's place for your next trip to Porto, a city that we totally loved.

This is a hidden gem Airbnb. It is located in a very convenient part of the city, steps from the Trinidade station and minutes from the city center. The apartment really is above and beyond — from an instant expression machine to a refrigerator and excellent water pressure this is a luxury Airbnb with an excellent price. It is safe and Diego is very kind and generous. He allowed us to stay a bit past check in time to make it easier for us timing wise. When I come back to visit Porto, I will certainly book this one again. Highly recommended for any travelers who appreciate a special touch.
I will definitely recommend this lovely apartment to my friends who will visit Porto in the future.

quick check in, great location, sparkling clean apartment with little balcony. The bed sheets were litte bit too heavy for me, it was too hot and also would be nice to have opportunity to have curtains front of the windows not only the big wooden doors. But none of the less it is a beautiful place in a loevly neighbuorhood

I usually don't write reviews but the host, Diego, was over the top great. Had ton of recommendations and went out of his way to make reservations for us. The location was great and it was easy to get anywhere.  A quarter mile from all public transportation and a mile or so walk from the main attractions.

Hôte charmant et appartement très agréable et très bien situé. 
Nous avons passé un agréable séjour.

The accommodations were outstanding. The place was modern, clean and comfortable. Impeccable place. It was quite a surprise because when we pulled up to the area there were a lot of shuttered doors and old looking buildings but you find Diego’s brightly lit door and once you enter it is amazing. You are in an old part of town which is what we wanted and there were lots of shops and bakeries on every corner. Diego was so helpful and a delight. There is a parking garage a block away which was awesome because parking on the street is hard and you have to pay by the hour. About 10 euros a day for safe parking. If you want to visit Porto I would recommend staying here

Diego's apartment is just wonderful: clean, central with everything you could wish for including a lovely balcony. The little things, like a very comfortable bed, amazing shower and good air conditioning made our stay truly special. We felt like we were staying in a very nice hotel. Don't hesitate for a moment and book this place, you will not regret it.

Diego é um excelente anfitrião, muito simpático e prestativo.
Nos recebeu pontualmente na nossa chegada, inclusive ajudou com as malas...
O espaço é realmente o que aparece nas fotos, talvez melhor, muito organizado e limpo. Destaque para cama que é de excelente qualidade para uma boa noite de sono!!
Obrigada Diego!!!
Superschöne, sehr zentrale Wohnung. Toller Balkon und unkomplizierter Kontakt!

Everything about Diego’s place is stellar. From location to a sparkling clean unit and local tips, Diego goes above and beyond standard hospitality. When my train ran over and I didn’t have internet to connect to and let him know I’d be running late for check in, he was still standing at the door waiting for me. Despite being late, he still had a warm disposition while showing me the apartment and giving local tips to the Porto area. Can’t say enough great things but I will say this - the bed!! AMAZING. Fluffy pillows, comfy sheets and he even lays out slippers and towels for you. Truly a five star Airbnb experience
It feels like a luxury hotel but with the perks of an apartment. Would definitely recommend!
역이랑도 가깝고 호텔같은환경이여서 너무 좋았어요 엘레베이터가 없었지만 diego가 캐리어를 옮겨줘서 좋았어요 추천해요
정말 좋아요. 위치도 ! 다음에 가면 또 묵을 겁니다

기대했던것보다 훨씬 좋았던 숙소입니다. 호텔 수준의 청결함을 기대하실 수 있으시며 여름에 오셔도 에어컨이 있어서 방을 매우 쾌적하게 사용할수 있어요. 디에고의 응답속도는 매우 빠르며 매우 친절합니다. 포르투에 다시와도 묵을 의사는 100%입니다!

Diego’s place was flawless which was super clean and highly maintained. Beddings were extremely comfortable and there is an air-conditioning which keeps the room and beddings free of humidity during hot season. When we contacted Diego his response were super fast and always helpful. Best Airbnb experience so far would definitely be back!
Super stylish nice and cozy appartement! Really close to everything! And most comfy bed i ever had in an airbnb! Obrigado thank you!! Totally recomend!

Well situated,  an easy walk to the river.  The space was light and airy. 
Diego was very helpful with all our questions.

Stay was great! Communication was very quick and accommodating. Place was very clean, quiet and surrounding area was conviennent for walking, food, and ease of parking nearby. Would highly recommend and stay again in future!
Super!

The apartment, the host and the overall experience can be described with just a single adjective: impeccable. The location is very nice and central and at walking distance from almost everything. The apartment was spotless, bright and very cozy and aesthetically pleasant, yet spacious and practical (dishwasher included). Nice balcony. Diego, the host, was always welcoming, nice and very prompt to reply since the moment we booked to the checkout. Definitely recommended!
房东人很好 很热情 给我们了当地游览的建议和当地美食的推荐 房子比想象的要大 很干净
숙소의  청결도, 위치, 편의시설등 어느 것 하나 모자라지 않고 너무 좋았습니다. 천장이 높고 창문이 있어서 원룸이라도 답답하지 않고 2명이 지내기에 충분히 넓고 깨끗합니다. 위치도 지하철역과 가까워 공항 및 기차 타러 가기 편리했고 번화가에서 약간 떨어져 있어 밤에는 조용하고 숙면에 도움이 되었어요. 100퍼센트 다시 가고 싶은 곳이에요.
Bel appartement à Porto bien situé (transport en commun), très calme et lumineux. Tout est à disposition dans l’appartement et Diego est un hôte très accueillant.

Really good location, 10-15 min walk into the heart of the city, and near lots of great restaurants and cafes.  Communication with Diego was easy and he was a very accommodating host.  The apartment is one room, plus bathroom, with plenty of space and a good kitchen.  The WiFi was slow/didn’t work much of the time, however this may have been a one off and I have fed back to the host.  Overall I would recommend.
Nice place, excellent location.

Appartement bien situé à 5 minutes de la station trindade. Ideal pour rejoindre les rues commerçantes et les berges du douro à pied. Nous avons passés un bon séjour. L’appartement est calme, confortable et propre. Diego est disponible et tres sympathique. Je recommande

Everything was great. Place is just as nice as pictured, if not better. Nice little balcony, Nespresso machine. Location is good, easy check-in and keyless entry. Place was very clean and they'd setup hotel like amenities (slippers, shampoo, etc.). Highly recommend!
Quick, easy and exactly what I needed. Very comfortable bed and had a good sleep too! Nice terrace spot too at the back - amazing location and speedy communication. Highly Recommended.
엘레베이터가 없어서 체크아웃 때는 좀 힘들긴 했지만 체크인 할 땐 Diego가 짐을 올려다 줘서 괜찮았어요. 시설은 제가 이용해 본 에어비엔비 숙소중 최고구요 Diego도 굉장히 친절했습니다. 다시 포르투에 온다면 여기서 묵을 예정이에요
Hospitalidad inmejorable. Buena calidad en él apartamento. Ubicación perfecta. 100% recomendable

Studio très propre et fonctionnel 
Très bien situé, central et à proximité immédiate de tout!
Je recommande

Apartamento impecable, tal y como se ve en las fotos. El balcón es un gustazo, la cama súper cómoda, y Diego se adaptó a un cambio de última hora y fue muy amable conmigo. Cuando vuelva a Porto pretendo repetir.

Great place, and very clean.. 5 mins by foot from Trindade subwaystation. Al the main Porto sites are within reach by foot. Diego is a great host; friendly, fast respond in communications and very helpful.. 5⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

호스트 친절히 맞아주고
관광코스까지 잘 설명해줬어요.
체크인 2시지만 12시에 도착한다고 하니 바로 사용할 수 있게 해줬구요.
어메너티 제공되고, 네스프레소 커피머신, 웰컴 과일까지 다 좋았습니다.
특히 깨끗했어요. 구석구석.
정말 다 좋았는데 한가지 굳이 말하자면, 엘리베이터가 없어서 캐리어 무게가 좀 있어서 힘들었다는 점. 체크인 할 때는 호스트가 올려줬어요.
Adorei vou tornar a voltar

I would recommend this Airbnb to anyone, as it is one of the best I have ever stayed in. The apartment was very clean, stylish, and open. Diego was very helpful, letting us check in early and recommending places to eat. The apartment is in a great location and made it very easy to walk into the center of the town and to other places we wanted to go in less than a 15 minute walk.
Great appartement, central in Porto and nicely furnished. The bed was really comfy and the shower was  nice!
This place is perfect. The bed is VERY comfortable and it is in an amazing location with plenty of great restaurants nearby. Highly recommend.

Totally outstanding trip, the accommodation was perfect, the pre-communication, check-in, local assistance were all a credit to Diego, well done, will recommend to others and be back to this beautiful city.
Great place and good location.

O apartamento do Diego foi uma ótima surpresa! Muito bem localizado, próximo dos principais pontos turísticos de Porto. O apartamento é muito bom, com todas as comodidades e além disso fui muito bem recebido pelo Diego, que me indicou diversos locais para ir na cidade!
Diego was very friendly and helpful. Apartment was great too. Will definitely book here again for the next stay

It is amazing place. Very nicely placed close to all main Porto places. Apartments are very stylish and amazingly clean with air conditioning (heater) and all stuff you might need. Diego is extremely positive person with best attitude :) If we will ever comeback to visit Porto we will surely stay at this place once again.

Un apartamento que cumple todas las espectativas , limpieza impecable ,  muy comunicación con diego, atento .Muy céntrico , no es necesario vehículo.
Un 10 .
Excellent appartement. Nos bagages ont été perdu par la compagnie aérienne et Diego nous a grandement aidé à les récupérer!
Excelente

Прекрасная, теплая даже зимой квартира (кондиционер), продуманный стильный дизайн интерьера, очень много места для ваших вещей, кофемашина и капсулы (много) к ней. На кухне есть все для готовки (масло, соль, перец, посуда), прекрасная ванная со всем необходимым вплоть до одноразовых тапочек, удобный вход в апартаменты по коду. Очень рекомендую этот вариант!

We had a lovely stay in Diego's apartment. You can reach everything by foot and Diego gave us some great tips along with a map of Porto's city centre. The apartment was very clean and it was equipped with everything we needed. Would recommend it :).
Obrigada!
Diego was an excellent host!
Buena ubicación, se puede ir a todos los sitios andando. El apartamento tal y como se muestra en las fotos. Un 10.
Todo impecable. Repetiría sin duda

name: 73. SPACIOUS 2 BEDROOMS IN A PERFECT LOCATION!
summary: BIG AND BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT WITH 2 BEDROOMS NEAR ST-LAURENT BOULEVARD, PERFECT FOR A QUIET STAY. CONDO IS WALKING DISTANCE TO THE SUBWAY, RESTAURANTS, BARS, SHOPPING AND ALL THE SERVICES. 2 COMFY BEDS, WI-FI AND MUCH MORE!
space: Spacious apartment on the 2nd floor - 2 bedrooms with 2 real beds  - super clean - one sofa-bed - washer (detergent included) and dryer  - coffee maker (coffee, filter and sugar included) - Well equipped kitchen with an open space with the living room. - bed sheets, blankets, duvet covers, pillows, towels included! - you will find other amenities such as a first aid kit, iron, iron board, micro-wave, toaster, kettle, hair dryer
description: BIG AND BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT WITH 2 BEDROOMS NEAR ST-LAURENT BOULEVARD, PERFECT FOR A QUIET STAY. CONDO IS WALKING DISTANCE TO THE SUBWAY, RESTAURANTS, BARS, SHOPPING AND ALL THE SERVICES. 2 COMFY BEDS, WI-FI AND MUCH MORE! Spacious apartment on the 2nd floor - 2 bedrooms with 2 real beds  - super clean - one sofa-bed - washer (detergent included) and dryer  - coffee maker (coffee, filter and sugar included) - Well equipped kitchen with an open space with the living room. - bed sheets, blankets, duvet covers, pillows, towels included! - you will find other amenities such as a first aid kit, iron, iron board, micro-wave, toaster, kettle, hair dryer Make yourself at home! You are welcome to use any appliances and all the essentials in the apartment I'm always on my phone and I check my account religiously. Feel free to contact me for anything, I live near by and will be more then happy to help. LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION... The apartment is a block away from St-Laurent boulevard, one of
neighborhood_overview: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION... The apartment is a block away from St-Laurent boulevard, one of the most lively and vibrant street in Montreal. Walking distance to many good restaurants, coffee shops, park, mont-royal,  bars, clubs, shopping. 15-20 mins walk to Downtown.
transit: -The metro Mont-Royal is about a 12 minutes walk.  -There is a taxi stand on the corner.  -You can rent a ''BIXI'' bicycle on the corner.   -Most of the main attractions are walking distance!
access: Make yourself at home! You are welcome to use any appliances and all the essentials in the apartment
interaction: I'm always on my phone and I check my account religiously. Feel free to contact me for anything, I live near by and will be more then happy to help.
house_rules: #1 - Enjoy your stay and make every moment count! -  Check-in is at 3 pm local time. If the apartment is ready earlier, I’ll let you know. Check-out is normally at 11AM, but I’d be happy to extend it as long as I don’t have a cleaning scheduled. Just let me know.   - Please be respectful - No smoking inside the apartment, you will find a can with sand on the balcony.  - Please remove your shoes when you get in the house. - No loud parties or excessive noise, we don't want to have problems with the neighbors.  - Please do not leave dirty dishes in the sink to add to the normal cleaning of the apartment.  - Don't forget rule #1. Thank you in advance!

reviews.comments: Antoine was a wonderful host, always responding in a general timely manner, and his place was great. The location, the cleanliness, the size, etc. we're all amazing and made our stay very easy and enjoyable. When asked, the host even recommended good bars/restaurants within walking distance from the place. I would definitely recommend this place to a friend!
Great place, beautiful space
I enjoyed my stay. Place is huge and clean. Close to most nightclubs and bars. Which is what I came for. Lots of restaurants. Pereira provide respect and privacy. Highly recommend the place

I recommend this apartment without hesitation.  We had a great stay! The place was clean and so spacious!  The location is unrivaled!  And what can I say about the host's responsiveness - simply EXCELLENT!  Can't wait for our summer visit - I hope we can stay here again!  Thank you to our wonderful hosts!
Great place! Clean, spacious, and close to all the best streets for shopping, food, and nightlife! Only complaint was the beds were crazy uncomfortable.
A very large, clean apartment, located right in the middle of the Plateau.  Antoine was prompt and helpful.
What a great host.  I left my computer mouse behind and Antonio had it mailed to me.  Above and beyond for customer service.

très bon logement. bien placé et propre.
rien à signaler

We had a great stay at Antoines place. It is a very spacious and clean apartment and is perfectly located to everything you could think of. 
Antoine was super fast in answering any questions we had.
Totally recommended!
Do not be wary of the exterior of this place. Very safe area.

Très bon emplacement dans Montréal proche du centre historique, à proximité des transports en commun (métro et bus), restaurants, magasins d'alimentation... Quartier très sympa et cool sur le Mont Royal. L'appartement est plutôt spacieux, très propre, quoique un peu sombre du fait d'un 1er étage sur cour (pas gênant quand on se ballade toute la journée), bonne literie. Une terrasse très agréable en été pour prendre le frais.  Un hôte formidable, Antoine, toujours prompt à répondre à toutes les questions.
Excellent location. Walking distance to some great bars & restaurants.
Location is great, finding a parking spot might take some time (busy weekend) ...
A great apartment in the middle of town, very nicely set up and Pereira was very easy to communicate with.

The apartment has a very good location. It is around the block from one of the famous poutine places in the city.

Antoine was very communicative and responsive. The apartment is spacious and clean. The covered balcony and large bathroom are great and were much appreciated. 

We were total 4 people and the sofa bed was appropriate. We would highly recommend staying here!

We really enjoyed being there. The apartament is just like the photos and the location was perfect. Close to restaurants, public transportation...

Antoine was very kind with us.
We certainly recommend the place.
We would definitely stay there again.

My mom and I headed to Montreal for her first visit to the City and we couldn't have stayed in a more central, well placed, nicely appointed condo. The location was absolute perfection! The condo itself was so clean and quite spacious. I will say, if you plan to make meals, please bring your own condiments since this condo does not provide them. It does have a fully equipped kitchen though.  We came prepared (minus salt and pepper!) but others may not, so just something to keep in mind. I certainly hope to come back again soon, with the husband this time!!

Emplacement pratique pour visiter Montréal. Compter 40 minutes pour rejoindre à pied le vieux Montréal. 
L accès à la colline du Mont Royal est très proche ( 10 minutes à pied )
Appartement correct, très bonne literie.
Peu  de matériel  dans le coin cuisine.
Aucun produit de base fourni dans la cuisine.
La location est proche du Bd St Laurent très commerçant où vous trouvez (Website hidden by Airbnb) autres types .
Great clean place. Close to many restaurants, clubs and stores. Only issue we had was parking. Would definitely recommend!

Appartement propre, spacieux agréable et confortable. super quartier animé, branché à 2 pas du parc Mont Royal à 15 mins a pieds du metro et 40 mins de la rue Ste Catherine si vous n'avez pas peur de marcher!! je n ai pas rencontré notre hôte mais il est disponible par mail. Attention au stationnement dans la rue PV de 53 dollars , sont passés à 5h du matin.  je recommande cet appartement

Logement spacieux dans un quartier sympatique.
Un peu sombre cependant.
Great location on the Plateau and very clean. We needed an iron and one was brought to the apartment immediately! A great host!

My family of four had a great time in Montreal using this apartment as our base.  The neighborhood has lots of great restaurants, good shopping and convenient access to the metro, Parc du Mont-Royal and McGill. No issue with street parking the week we were there but you do need to read the signs carefully and find spots that don't require resident permits. The apartment itself is as you see in the photos with no surprises. Pereira and Antoine were professional, friendly and helpful.
Great location and fun place to stay. Thanks again!

This place was great, no ac but plenty of fans to cool off the place. I am always hot and I was fine. Place was very clean and ideally located. Minor detail that parking was not easy but that can be expected.

Great place in a perfect location, the Plateau is for sure the place you wanna be. The house is very nice inside and was very clean upon arrival. Would recommend this place to anyone wishing to stay in Montreal.
This was pretty much as advertised.   The host was responsive.  The area is up and coming
The location is great! As mentioned in another review, no air conditioning, but there are fans and there's cross ventilation.
Great and spacious place! Excellent location!!!

Location is perfect if you are wanting to be downtown, near all amenities and close to bus lines and the metro. I would like to add however that the comfort of the apartment was low. We never wanted to spend any down time in the apartment. If you are looking for a place for the sole purpose of sleeping - great option. But if you are looking for a place to be able to feel comfortable in the space if you have an hour to chill I would look elsewhere (couch was uncomfortable and smelled slightly, beds were extremely stiff, kitchen chairs were also bad to the point of needing a pillow from bedroom to aid in comfort). During the evening the outside noise travelled into the bedrooms, as if the windows were open, but that was minor considering we were downtown. Place is presented as the photos but our main issue was comfort.
Good location
Great street location, parking was very easy, neighborhood is wonderful. Very responsive to messages. I would definitely stay again! Thank you for your hospitality!
Had a fantastic time in Montreal and that was in large part staying in this wonderful apartment! Would definitely stay here again when I come back to Montreal.

We had a great stay at this place, it was big and absolutely central. It just looked a little more cozy on the photos than in reality. But if you spend all day in the city, the apartment is perfectly fine.

Appartement très bien situé sur le Plateau. Les modalités de prise possession et pour quitter, très simples. Appartement super propre. Nous avons adorer notre séjour. Excellent rapport qualité / prix.
Un agréable séjour. Tout était parfait.
Super logement, immense. Très bien situé. Lit assez confortables. Seul bémol : mal isolé, on entend les voisins et les voitures comme s'ils étaient dans la pièce.
Great location. Really spacious.
Surprisingly cozy despite the minimalist style.. very easy to live in. Secure building in a central area, i absolutely recommend this spot!

The apartment is very well located - just off St Laurent in the Plateau. The space is much bigger than it looks in pictures! There is also a charming, leafy balcony. Beds were a bit small, and the blinds didn't make bedrooms very dark, but it was quite enjoyable nonetheless.
Awesone

Such an amazing, clean and spacious place to relax in! The rooms are light and airy.

It an amazing basecamp for exploring the Plateau, such a wonderful part of Montreal.

I recommend this place and will be back.

Thank you.
Great location! Easy check in and check out.

We have enjoyed our staying at this apartment very much. The location is perfect, and the apt. is spacious and comfortable.  The only thing we missed is air conditioner, which the apt. doesn't have (the listing does mention that, but we missed this info. and it was so hot!!). Besides that, a perfect experience!
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great place to stay. Clean and awesome location. Would stay again.

The space was just as listed! Great communication & when I asked for a later check out Antoine was more than gracious enough to allow it! 

The couch & beds are super comfy! The patio was also a big plus. 

Downside is if you are a peraon who gets really hot & heat bugs you there is no AC but fans were provided so our stay was nice & cool! 

Will stay here again no problem!!

Emplacement ideal en plein coeur du Plateau Mont-Royal, près de toutes les commodités. L'appartement est spacieux. Par contre, les frais de ménage sont un peu excessifs. Il y a une terrasse qui pourrait être agréable mais qui est laissé à l'abandon et qui n'a pas été nettoyée lors de notre venue. 
Je recommande néanmoins cet appartement.

As we are not from Montreal a few things came as a surprise due to my assumptions, such as the lack of air conditioning that made for a very warm stay at 30 degrees, and there's no parking available. Do not park out front or you will get a $62 ticket. The host was very quick to respond to questions, the place is immaculately clean and spacious, and it is reasonably close two lots of tourist attractions and great restaurants.
Host was really responsive and helpful. Check-in and out was a breeze. Nice big space and the back porch was a nice bonus to have, especially when the nights cooled down after a hot day
Great location, okay amenities. The space is huge and feels a bit empty. It was very nice to have access to a private patio.
Spacious and comfortable apartment in one of the best neighborhoods - great to walk around. Check-in and communication was very easy. It was ideal for my business trip, definitely recommend

The apartment was clean, comfortable and spacious. A bit more decor would help as it was a bit empty and stark but fine for a brief stay and conveniently located. The only issue for us was parking, which is a nightmare like everywhere else in Montreal. We wound up getting a $63 ticket because we didn't check enough of the signs on the street. Even the police seemed confused about the parking regulations. Be forewarned.
Great location!  Good value for money.
We had a wonderful stay here!  We have been to Montreal many times and have never explored this neighbourhood and it's super central.  Huge apartment and super clean.
Nice clean place i an excellent location.
Super efficace, grand et propre! Je vais y retourner c’est sûr!
Place is very convenient. Photos are not the same as the in person. Not much natural light and it was very dark in the house. Overall is a good stay.
The apartment was very clean and spacious, and central to some great areas of Montreal. I would come again anytime!!
We had a great stay. The appartment is bigger that it appears on the webside. Everything was really clean. Nice neighbourhood. The only Thing is That the appartment is a Little Bit sterile.

L’appartement est super par contre l’hôte ne répond que par téléphone et n’a répondu à aucun de mes 3 mails... ce n’est pas très pratique quand on est étranger et que les appels au Canada nous coûtent cher... sinon tout était parfait et très bien situé !
good place in the heart of le plateau. note there is a staircase.

My daughter and I stayed for four nights at Antoine's airbnb.  We loved the location, the keypad check in was brilliant.  It eliminated the need for keys.  We could walk everywhere from this location.  The space was exceptionally clean and tidy.  The only downside for us was the people who are up above this space.  While Antoine cannot control this, if you're a light sleeper I would recommend taking earplugs.  I slept in the bedroom closest to the front door and didn't notice it as much at night time as my daughter did who was in the other bedroom.  Other than that our stay was perfect.  The Netflix was a nice added bonus.  Thank you.
Glacial!
Really big space, lots of room! Very clean. Great location.
Just as expected. Lovely place to stay

This is a spacious apartment for up to 4 people in an interesting part of Montreal. Lots of restaurants and bars, but located in a quiet side street.  15 minutes walk from the Metro and a short ride into downtown. Well-equipped for cooking if you need a quiet evening in. We made good use of the washing machine and dryer.

Spacious but sparsely furnished especially in the kitchen. OK if you intend to eat out. Also you can hear the neighbours above, insulation not great. But Antoine is a great person to deal with, very responsive when you ask for extra blankets for instance

Spacious flat. Very clean and Antoine is very friendly and responsive.
The flat could be better equipped in the kitchen especially where you can find the minimum. No baking dishes for instance making the use of the oven impossible. But if you ask Antoine, he will bring you what you need.
The flat is lacking natural light. You need the lights on all the time in the living room.
Beautiful place, a lot of space. Excellent for 4 people
House is good

Uninspired apartment with mattresses so old and hard that sleeping on the hardwood floors became a tempting option. One bed slanted and threatened to send you there anyway. The post-apocalyptic back alley where this was situated was very noisy on Friday night. Not a great option.
Dangerous exterior stair access. Noise from adjacent AirBNB units very loud all night... foot steps from people walking in adjacent apartments (without shoes) @ 2am/ 4:30 am / 7:30 am

This is a great place in an ideal location. It is close to Mont Royal Park and St Lauren Boulevard which are great spots. The place was tidy and several key amenities were available. Would highly recommend to stay here :)
A bit chilly but overall a very nicely stay. Convenient location!
The place was awesome - super clean, spacious and the location topped it off.
Wonderful location, lots of space, and a clean apartment. So close to so many things!

Very much enjoyed our stay in Montreal. 
Due to extreme cold and a snow storm was stuck inside for a day, and found the apt nice and comfortable.

This apartment was just as pictured. There was lots of common/open space, which was great when spending time at the apartment. It was a bit noisy (you could clearly hear outside traffic and other building occupants) but that’s to be expected in a busy part of Montreal. Clean and a great location, would definitely stay here again.

This was the perfect place to stay to celebrate my birthday in Montreal for the weekend! The location is PERFECT, everything was just as expected and we were really satisfied with our stay - it’s very simple, and you can definitely hear everything in the building hahah but no major problems - it has all the basics you would need and the location is totally worth it! :)

name: Top Location Fully Equipped 1 BR downtown condo
summary: My place is 650 sqf 1BR condo -Renovated Hardwood floor throughout, ceramique at the entrance, ceramic at the kitchen and washroom. You’ll love my place because of heat of downtown-3 min walk to Guy and Lucien Allier Metro and Concordia University. There is restaurant, convenience store and pool in the building complex. My place is ideal for  couple or single person or two friends looking to enjoy Montreal downtown
description: My place is 650 sqf 1BR condo -Renovated Hardwood floor throughout, ceramique at the entrance, ceramic at the kitchen and washroom. You’ll love my place because of heat of downtown-3 min walk to Guy and Lucien Allier Metro and Concordia University. There is restaurant, convenience store and pool in the building complex. My place is ideal for  couple or single person or two friends looking to enjoy Montreal downtown
house_rules: - - No parties or large gathering - -No walking in the condo with shoes - -No Smoking - - A very minimal cleaning fees is charges, so guests are expected to leave the place in the same condition they get it - ID required at check-in -No Pets

reviews.comments: Great Stay. Nice Place. Would stay again.

We had a great stay. Nice, spacious apartment in a great location. It was easy to travel around the city from here. The host was very kind and easy to communicate with. I would definitely recommend staying here.
Drew's place is the perfect place to stay if you're looking to explore downtown Montreal!

name: PRIVATE ROOM WITH WIFI
summary: It's a private room with wifi in a family house, in a very good zone in the center of Barcelona, with bus and underground around. The room is equipped with a desk, a television with Netflix and Youtube, a closet, and air conditioning. We can put up to one or two beds.
space: The room is really big, about 10 meters, with a big closet that you can use, a desk, a mirror, a seat and television. It has a window but only it gives conference to the building since it is an interior flat.
description: It's a private room with wifi in a family house, in a very good zone in the center of Barcelona, with bus and underground around. The room is equipped with a desk, a television with Netflix and Youtube, a closet, and air conditioning. We can put up to one or two beds. The room is really big, about 10 meters, with a big closet that you can use, a desk, a mirror, a seat and television. It has a window but only it gives conference to the building since it is an interior flat. The room is in the entry, so enter to the room is very easy. The bath is in the corridor. I'm always available to help you in whatever you need in person or via message in airbnb. The zone is very well communicated, you can go to Plaza Catalonia (downtown) in bus in 15 minutes. Or go to Sants Station which is 10 minutes walking. The nearest underground is the (Blue) L5 station Entença, buses are 54, V9, H8, 59... In the same street you can find enough supermarkets, where you can find whatever you want.  Also you can
neighborhood_overview: The zone is very well communicated, you can go to Plaza Catalonia (downtown) in bus in 15 minutes. Or go to Sants Station which is 10 minutes walking. The nearest underground is the (Blue) L5 station Entença, buses are 54, V9, H8, 59... In the same street you can find enough supermarkets, where you can find whatever you want.  Also you can find many restaurants where you can have breakfast, lunch, and have dinner. It's a very well communicated and secure zone at any hour, there are three parks near by where you can go to take fresh air. You can go to the downtown walking or with bus. We are ten minutes walking to Sants Station Underground: L5 stop "Entença" Bus: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: Barcelona is very well communicated,  you can always do transfers to go where you want. Underground: L5 stop "Entença" Bus: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
access: The room is in the entry, so enter to the room is very easy. The bath is in the corridor.
interaction: I'm always available to help you in whatever you need in person or via message in airbnb.

reviews.comments:
Honestly speaking my stay at Esperanza's place was very amazing that I enjoyed it a lot. To begin with Esperanza and her family are very well coming people and socially interactive, that you feel to be at home. Esperanza's well come was special from the other places I stayed in so far that she explained me every thing including the bus and tram stations before my arrival. And also she explained me that when I arrive at her place, I will find some body to well come me and that was very true that she herself welcomed me.
Up on my arrival to her place she explained me every thing regarding the use of amenities in the room as well as the facilities in the neighborhood. She printed out maps for public bus and metro transport as well as for supermarkets and restaurants in the neighborhood.
The room has a heater, air conditioner, a very large flat screen TV, a very large locker, a light bulb near by the bed with a small locker. There is also a nice chair with wheels and a corresponding big table. With this spacious room and the various amenities it has, I have really enjoyed my stay as a student. There is also shared bathroom with alternatives(meaning two bathrooms) as well. There is secured wifi and a laptop friendly environment. Since I will be staying for three weeks and since I am a student she has specially allowed me to use the kitchen and the washing machine and that was wonderful for me.
Regarding location of Esperanza's place, it is centrally located that you can get every thing including supermarkets, cafeterias , metro station  at walking distance of less than 3  minutes.
In conclusion Esperanza's place is a place I would like to stay in when ever I come back to Barcelona in the future and it is also a place I will advise my friends all other people to stay at.

It is my second time to stay at Esperanzaz's place and for sure it will always be my first choice when ever I plan to come to Barcelona in the future.

Esperanza and her family are a very kind and caring people, highly well coming. 

Esperanza's place is centrally located, very near for public transport access(just 2 min walk to the metro station), full choice of supermarkets and restaurants nearby including a 24 hr serving supermarket.

Esperanza's room is a clean with all the amenities available as mentioned on the website. It is also a quiet place best suited for students like me.

I could not believe when I finished my study and was about to leave Esperanza's family. I wish I would stay with and continue having a great time with such a respectful family, but as a matter of nature I had to go for my study in another country. But for sure Esperanza's place will always be my first place when ever I am planning to come to Barcelona in the future.

I was very much astonished when Esperanza's Dad and Mom surprised me with gifts, not only this her Dad has also given me an all way lift right to the airway during my flight. I am very much grateful for their family.

Finally I would say Esperanza's place is a place that I will recommend for my best friends and all other people.

With the best regards!

Kusse Koirita, Ethiopia
Very Warm and Friendly Host that makes you feel Home.
La chambre est au calme avec une table de travail, une armoire. Serviette de bain fournie ainqi que savon et shampoing. Esperanza est disponible, gracieuse, discrète.

This is the third time I am staying at Esperanza's place since I liked it very much. I have written my detail reviews during my previous stays.

Worth while mentioning is that Esperanza's place is already a nice place and additionally each time there are new things which are added to comfort the guests. For example this time I found a refrigerator which is private for the bed room. There is also a boiler for tea etc in the room which is present since beginning.

Thus I would recommend Esperanza's place for all who would like to spend a nice time in the center of Barcelona.
很开心这次旅行住在这里,房东很热情,介绍了我们好吃的饭店和经典的菜品,家里也很干净,离米拉之家和罗特约之家都很近,去海边也不远!下次再去巴塞罗那,我想我还会住在这里!

ﾍﾟﾙｰ人一家と同じ部屋に住むわけですが､鍵のかかる個室があり､またﾄｲﾚも2つあるので不安はありません｡異文化を体験するには良いﾎｽﾄです｡ただﾊﾞﾙｾﾛﾅはどこでもそうですが､ｱﾊﾟｰﾄの玄関には表札がありません｡だから､どの呼び鈴を押してよいのかも分からない｡必ず事前に電話で連絡を取り合うことをお勧めします｡交通の便は優れてます｡Sants駅の隣のﾒﾄﾛ駅です｡ｱﾊﾟｰﾄの前には清潔で美味しいﾀﾊﾟｽの店があります｡

My experience at Esperanza's place was flawless. The building is near Metro blue line L5 Entença station, many bus stops arround the corner and barely a 15min walk to the Sants train station if you get there by train R2 from the airport.
There are supermarkets and restaurants in every block arround the building and in front of it. The prices are reasonable with good quality.
The room is next to the door so it's easy to access, the beds and the sheets are clean and you get a bath size towel each. There is a huge smart TV with a Netflix subscription so you won't get bored in the room. You also get a mini refrigerator with drinks (water, colas, etc.) and some welcome candies and a big bottle of water.
The bathroom is also close to the room's door and it has everything you need (hot water, soap, shampoo, conditionner, etc.). 
I really recommand this place and Esperanza for being such a friendly, very communicative and helpful host. Thank you for everything.

Esperanza was very accommodating! She took the time to give recommendations on what to do - for example, she told us about a fair near the beach that only happens one week in the year. It was really fun and we wouldn't have known about it otherwise!

Other pros:
+ clean room (exactly as pictured)
+ clean bathroom (gave us extra towels when we asked)
+ smooth checkin
+ high-tech TV
+ checked up on us regularly to see if we needed anything
+ free water bottles

Some cons:
- a bit far from the central area
- keys for the doors are hard to use

Thanks Esperanza! :)

This was the best experience I have had using Airbnb. Esperanza was very helpful and accommodating. The neighborhood has easy access to buses to get you around the city. Even better, you can take nice long walks to key points around the city.
安静的街区,房主一家人都特别有爱｡位置也还挺方便的｡最喜欢那个复古的电梯哈哈

에스파냐 광장에서 버스로 약 15분 도보로 5분 정도 가는 곳에 위치하고 있습니다. 지하철도 L5나 L3가 가까이 위치하고 있습니다. 

방은 TV 인터넷 에어컨까지 완벽하게 갖추어져 있습니다. 

Esperanza는 주요 관광지를 프린트해서 설명해주는 등 여행을 도와주려는 호스트입니다. 
진짜 이틀밤만 보낸 것이 아쉬울 정도로 좋은 숙소였습니다

I stayed at Esperanza's house for a week and my experience was definitely great! Esperanza gave me many useful advices, such as what to visit, where to eat and local festivals. She has been available to help me for whatever I needed (e.g. a cable for my computer). The room was also nice and tidy, the air conditioner in Barcelona is a must in summer!

Esperanza was very helpful and extremely nice, and was always readily available whenever we needed her help. The room was clean and cozy, just be aware that you are sharing thr apartment with Esperanza and her family. They are all very nice, but it is good to know in advance.

Great little place in central Barcelona that was perfect for my short stay. Esperanza and her sister were very helpful on my arrival, and gave me lots of 
recommendations for the neighbourhood and beyond. Would thoroughly recommend!

Esperenza is one of the nicest people as a host I have met on AirBnB. She was always reachable on her phone and tried to make our stay as comfortable as possible. Her family although were not good in spoken english, tried to help us as much as they could and my brother and me are very thankful for her hospitality. It's a great place for singles traveling to Barcelona.

Esperanza is such a lovely person.  She was quick to contact us and kept in touch from start to finish.  Her place is easy to find and right off of the metro, in a great location near many of the major sights and attractions.  The room was exactly as shown and although it is part of a shared apartment, it is at the front of the apartment and still feels private as well.  Esperanza gave us some great tips of places to see and made us feel comfortable and at home while we were there.  She helped us figure out laundry and even went out of her way to help us print out our boarding passes for a last minute flight when all of the print shops were closed.  I highly recommend staying with Esperanza if you are looking for a friendly, safe, and convenient place to stay on your next trip to Barcelona!

Esperanza place is in a very nice neighborhood. Very safe to walk at night.its a bit far fron city if you have to walk in hot weather but metro and train station is nearby. She lives with her family who are friendly like her but sometimes its difficult to acces the bathroom however she is always there should you need any help
She also puts maps and guides on the table for you to get familiar with the city

The stay with Esperanza was an excellent choice. She was the perfect host and informed us about all the places to see and where to eat as soon as we arrived. For this purpose she had several brochures and folders prepared, showing the sights and how to get there. She also recommended restaurants and showed us where to find supermarkets and other shops needed.
The area was very quiet and even at night it felt save to walk around.
The room is next to the entrance door, the refrigerator is right there when you step out of the room and the bathroom just 3 meters away.
Everything was clean and the necessary utensils (towels, hairdryer, shampoo etc.) were provided for.
Esperanza and her family were very friendly and the next time we visit Barcelona again, we will definitely stay with them again.
Muchas gracias, Esperanza, para todo!

Non sono riuscito ad usufruire dell'alloggio perché siamo dovuti rientrare in Italia a causa dell'attentato a Barcellona. Non posso recensire la camera ma devo dire che Esperanza è stata molto gentile e ci ha aiutato con delle problematiche relative a taxi e aereo per rientrare il più presto possibile.

Esperanza was een perfecte gastvrouw. Bij aankomst was de kamer al helemaal gereed en ze gaf een goede uitleg over alles. De woning zag er heel schoon uit en er was zeker aandacht geschonken aan de faciliteiten in de kamer. De badkamer deel je met de rest van het gezin maar was bijna altijd beschikbaar. Ook waren de bedden prima en kun je Netflix kijken op het mega tv scherm in de keuken. Esperanza was altijd bereikbaar voor vragen en ook kon ze leuke tips geven wat je in de buurt kon doen. Al met al hebben wij een fijn verblijf gehad bij Esperanza en haar familie

Nice room and warm atmosphere. Esperanza and her family are incredibly kind and always helpful. Room big enough, desk and netflix on an incredible big screen tv just in front the bed! Absolutely suggested!

Esperanza is a great host. She is very kind in offering details and suggestions of your barcelona trip. Even though F&B is not included, they gave me some authetic food on catalunya day. This place makes you feel like home when you are away from home. Gracias por todo Esperanza!
excelente atención y gran anfitriona

Esperanza's a wonderful host and the room she rents out is great!  My mother stayed there for a few days while visiting me here in Barcelona and she had only great things to say about her experience.  The room is very large and in really good shape/really clean.  Esperanza was really flexible with our check-in time when our flight was delayed and was always quick to respond to my messages.  She provided a lot of brochures about things to do around the city so you have a ton of stuff to look at to find things to do around the area.  The room was right in the front so it's a very independent space even though her family lives in the same apartment.  It's a little further away from the main attractions in the city, but there is a bus stop and a metro very close to the apartment so it's not too hard to get where you want to go.

I stayed during New Year. The location was little bit far from city center, needed a transportation but for new year’s event was good place! Esperanza is friendly girl and her family are also very  kind! She completely prepared a room for comfort staying in Barcelona! I really recommend there!
Atención esmerada y todo lo necesario. Lugar tranquilo, limpio y en buena zona

name: 1分鐘到高鐵西九龍站､地鐵柯士甸站､機場和港珠澳大橋巴士A22站    10分鐘到中港城碼頭､海港城
summary: 步行1分鐘: 高鐵西九龍站 (大大減少搬運行李的時間) 地鐵柯士甸站 (直達迪士尼､海洋公園､亞洲博覽館､紅磡體育館及昂坪360等) 機場大巴A22站 (機場､港珠澳大橋過來都可以坐) 樓下十多間香港有名餐廳 (點點心餐廳､隨便雞煲及老趙越南餐廳等) 步行10分鐘: 中港城碼頭 (可坐船到澳門或珠海) 尖沙咀海港城 (全香港最大的購物商場) 機場快線九龍站､地鐵佐敦站 步行5分鐘: 西九龍巴士站 (方便你出行不同旅遊景點,包括旺角､尖沙咀､中環及一些偏遠的郊區) 佐敦附近的網紅餐廳 (澳洲牛奶公司､翠華餐廳､媽咪雞蛋仔､麥文記雲吞麵) 廟街､油麻地警署
description: 步行1分鐘: 高鐵西九龍站 (大大減少搬運行李的時間) 地鐵柯士甸站 (直達迪士尼､海洋公園､亞洲博覽館､紅磡體育館及昂坪360等) 機場大巴A22站 (機場､港珠澳大橋過來都可以坐) 樓下十多間香港有名餐廳 (點點心餐廳､隨便雞煲及老趙越南餐廳等) 步行10分鐘: 中港城碼頭 (可坐船到澳門或珠海) 尖沙咀海港城 (全香港最大的購物商場) 機場快線九龍站､地鐵佐敦站 步行5分鐘: 西九龍巴士站 (方便你出行不同旅遊景點,包括旺角､尖沙咀､中環及一些偏遠的郊區) 佐敦附近的網紅餐廳 (澳洲牛奶公司､翠華餐廳､媽咪雞蛋仔､麥文記雲吞麵) 廟街､油麻地警署 我是土生土長的香港人呢,熟悉香港環境,歡迎隨時詢問香港各景點
interaction: 我是土生土長的香港人呢,熟悉香港環境,歡迎隨時詢問香港各景點

host.host_about:
土生土長的香港人,廣州暨南大學畢業,所以能講流利普通話､英文､廣東話｡(威信號: igaryps)
熟悉香港各景點和餐廳,歡迎各地房客詢問｡持有香港和內地駕駛執照｡
以前於Monalisa Bridal Salon任職婚紗攝影師｡現職音樂演出組織人､貝斯手｡閒時喜歡健身和打籃球｡
有幸成為Airbnb民宿房東,有機會與世界各地的遊客分享不同的故事 :)

address.street: 尖沙咀, 佐敦, 油麻地, 柯士甸, 九龍, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: 홍콩에 6개월간 인턴십을 하게 되어 월세계약을 하기전에 묵었는데 숙소가 편리하였습니다. 무엇보다 호스트분이 너무 친절하셔서 홍콩에서 적응하는데 많은 도움을 주셨습니다. 여행으로 오시든 출장으로 오시든 많은 도움을 주실 것 같아요.

This room in Gary, the host's, condo is really great! Simple, comfortable, clean and cozy. With the queen sized bed and the table space, the room is just big enough to fit two or three luggages. The shared bathroom is across the living room, and I had no trouble at all accessing it. Most importantly, I felt safe here (for a girl in her early 20s traveling alone, this is really important haha). Gary is a down to earth guy who is very caring. He met me at the Austin subway station upon arrival and showed me the way to this place. When I left for the airport, he helped me get to the Kowloon station. No problems communicating in English! 

This location is PRIME. It was perfect for a short visit to Hong Kong because it is at the center of everything and easily accessible. Everything is actually walkable in the area. Definitely worth every penny, and if I ever get the chance to visit HK again, I would stay here!
房子離柯士甸地鐵站好近,交通便利,去旺角都好方便｡gary好熱心,話唔識路就馬上嚟地鐵站帶路喇｡host 好大靚仔,房子乾淨整潔,絕對有下次喇!

非常不错的住宿体验｡屋主是一个音乐人,高大威猛,也非常亲切｡房间尺寸的话,在香港地里面是可以接受的了,床非常舒服也很干净｡屋的坐落很方便,出门过马路转右就能看到柯士甸地铁站,转左也能直接步行到佐敦｡去迪士尼乘地铁的话五十分钟到｡客厅里面都是摆着屋主的音乐器材,偶尔也能看到屋主的乐队成员出入｡环境很安静,楼下也有很多食肆,吃饭不成问题｡我跟朋友住了两晚,途中去了迪士尼和旺角购物都是非常方便的｡谢谢屋主的热情招待,下次有机会再来这边住!

v nice experience. the host is a musician, who is v tall and dashing, also friendly and nice. comfy bed and, room size is large enuff for place like HK. location is nice too, crossing he street u can see Austin station but also can walk to Jordan where it's nearby. took us 50 mins to get to Disneyland. the living room is full of instruments of host and also can see his band members sometimes. quiet place there and plenty of eateries downstairs. my friend and I spent two nights,  went to yau ma tei shopping and Disneyland and the experience is super alright. again thanks Gary for the hospitality and look forward to staying ur place v soon!
床真的好舒服呀!房东好好真是太喜欢Gary了,交通特别方便
very nice!
Gary is a very nice gay, a handsome man. He is very kindly and can give you everything you want, give advises for your stay at Hongkong. It's a wonderful trip at Gary's home.

非常好的入住体验,房东是个大帅哥哦,而且非常的热情;到达当天亲自前往地铁站接,人很nice;推荐给我楼下的餐厅也很好吃,1.5M的双人床是比外面的小宾馆都要大的;看我们三个人,刚好空出一间房,就免费给我们加一间｡房间内充电器,洗漱用品,牙刷等等全部都准备齐全｡
位置就在柯士甸A出口,出站即是,坐地铁或是/步行前往周边油麻地､海港城都在15分钟左右的吧;推荐下他家楼下711北边的一间甜点店,里面的芒果糯米糍非常非常的好吃｡
房子位置很好找,并且交通真的很便利,在入住前Gary会主动联系,我们第一次来经验不足,他还出来接我们回家,很感动｡房间干净舒适,楼下很多茶餐厅,随便找了两家味道都不错,所以就算玩的晚了一些也不必担心回家会饿肚子｡很愉快的一次住宿体验,已经将这家民宿推荐给小伙伴们,并且我有机会再来香港应该还会想要住这里,Gary加油哟
房主人很好,热心又周到｡房子靠近地铁站非常近,地理位置相当好,吃饭逛街都很方便,离尖沙咀步行就能到,房间也很舒适｡房主本身还是乐队成员,可以很愉快的聊天｡综合来讲,性价比非常高,以后有机会一定还会入住的
房东人非常棒
房屋地理位置非常好,离公交地铁都很近,去香港岛那边也很快!By the way,Gary真的很热心,服务也很周到!我们拍太平山顶夜景时需要三脚架,正好Gary有就接我们拍了,效果好很多!!总之,这是一次非常棒的体验~

개리가 구룡역까지 나와주어서 숙소를 잘찾을수있었습니다. 개리네집은 구룡역에서 걸어서 5분 거리에 위치하고 침사추이는 걸어서 대략 20분정도 걸립니다 샴푸.타올.린스.바디워시.칫솔.치약 이 모두배치되어있고 두명쓰기엔 방이좀 좁다라는 느낌을받았지만 크게불편한점은 없었습니다. 밴드준비로 개리 밴드친구들이왔는데 좁은집에비해사람이많은편이였고 착하지만 배려가부족하다고 느꼈습니다. 다른것은 다 만족스러웠습니다. 개리는 정말친절하고 잘생긴호스트였어요♡
交通十分便捷｡A22来去机场非常方便,去香港其他也有便利的各条巴士｡吃东西更是很方便｡感觉蛮好｡
Gary 人很nice,回答问题很耐心的｡家里也很干净整洁,床很舒服｡位置交通方便,附近吃饭逛街购物都很方便｡

A nice host, a nice room and a nice trip! It's very close to the Austin metro station. Gary是個地道的香港人,給了我們很多遊玩的建議,滿足我們各種需求｡房間也比照片好看,而且整個房子都很整潔!!Gary是個貝司手,相信很多音樂愛好者都會喜歡上他的房子的!房間所處地段很好,交通便利,鄰近佐敦尖沙咀,走幾分鍾就可以到廟街和海港城,可以很好的體驗的繁華都市的夜生活,也很方便去購物｡
非常好的房东,谢谢这次热情的招待
房东人超级礼貌,友好!会主动联系并且耐心沟通...最主要是,地理位置非常方便,住宿环境很温馨,床很舒服!!度过了开心快乐的时光……下次见!
房东Gary人很好  很细心准备了必需品 也乐于助人下次还会来住

一直都有去香港玩的習慣,但這是一次最好的住宿經驗｡

Gary很親切並熱心,很好相處｡他願意分享香港的景點與觀光路線,也樂意為旅客建議行程｡

房子的地理位置交通便捷,方便又很容易找到,鄰近住宅區域,晚上也蠻安靜｡樓下有7-11和食肆,很方便隨時會餓著的人=)

房間整潔舒適,有一些很吸睛的心理類書籍,Gary也很樂意分享書籍與閱讀心得｡公共區域乾淨整齊,浴室有他貼心準備好的不同功效的洗髮沐浴產品｡

這是一趟讓人身心愉快的旅程!下次去香港絕對會再次入住!

謝謝Gary的接待=)

又帅又有才华的房主
特别有家的感觉 东西全的也是没谁了
棒棒哒

房子在地铁站出口,非常容易找到
房間整潔乾淨,采光充足,具有獨立衛生間&廚房
房東既熱情又有耐心
a good place for overnight in hong kong, near transport- metro, train to airport, It is walking distance to shopping place. the room is comfortable and enough big in Hong kong.
gary超nice 而且好耐心回答我地噶问题 房间挺干净的 有什么不懂也可以问他 附近也很方便 楼下就有711 附近都有好多野食 茶餐厅 附近就地铁站 好方便 一次超级满意噶旅行

Gary人很好,入住前给过我们很多建议｡到达香港的第一天给了我们很多指引,虽然我们当时因为手机网络问题错过了那些指引,但误打误撞找到地址也说明了真的很靠近地铁口(柯士甸A出口,文华楼,手机没网络的朋友可以记住这个)｡
      房间很整洁,洗发水､沐浴露､饮用水､吹风机,排插什么的都准备好了的,真的像家一样｡楼下的食肆也很多,想要体验一把香港的本土生活的话选这是很好的欸~
Gary是一个很nice的帅哥,充满音乐梦想｡他的房间离地铁柯士甸站非常近,尤其适合短期到港访问办事的单身人士,当然在办事之余,也可能步行到附近的庙街夜市闲逛｡
It takes literally 45 minutes to the airport... which I thought was typical real estate PR copy..
gary是个非常热心和懂礼貌的房东,对住客非常关心,我们第一天刚到他就提早在巴士站头等我们接我们回家｡gary家的床也挺大的,两个人睡绰绰有余｡住的地方离地铁站非常近,巴士站也就5分钟,gary人特别好,回复特别快,非常满意｡
房东人超级好,个人原因造成入住时间的更改,也超有耐心的解决了问题!交通很便利,到香港旅游的小伙伴一定不要错过哦~
很好

Gary家里的空间意外的比想象中要大很多,房间整洁舒适,夜晚休息周边环境也十分安静｡交通方面非常便利,出门正对着柯士甸站,步行前往尖沙咀地区也只需要20多分钟｡
Gary本人十分热情友好,对于一切问题有问必答,在入住过程中也提供了诸多周到的服务｡综合而言是一次十分愉快的入住经历,下次有机会到香港还会再考虑入住｡

房东是一个超级热心之人
房间相对这个价格不错的
离地铁也近,出行很方便
有什么不懂的,房东都能一一解答和给出他的参考意见
房间整洁,床软活,不过,个人还是喜欢硬一点的床

总之,一次不错的住宿体验,好住宿不如好房东,哈哈哈
房东gary是个很热情的人,当我们找不到地方的时候,他还特地出来找我们｡房子很靠近地铁站,楼下也有很多餐馆,非常方便｡如果还有机会再来,我一定会选择他的房子｡

Gary's apartment is located in central HK between two MTR stations (Austin and Jordan) which made our stay very convenient and accessible. He personally greeted us at the station when we first arrived and walked us to his apartment just 1 minute away. The room was very clean and just as pictured. Although Gary is also living in the apartment, we felt we had the privacy we needed for our stay. He is super friendly and easy to talk to, fluent in both Cantonese and English. He was also a great resource in answering our questions about the city. This has undoubtedly been our best AirBNB experience, would definitely stay here again and highly recommend
房东Gary非常nice!住的环境等都很好!有不懂的地方都可以问房东!交了个朋友｡非常感谢

Best stay in Hong Kong. We would definitely love come and stay to Gary's place if we come back in Hong Kong. Close to MTR station, restaurants, shopping malls,  and night life in temple street. Only less than 40 mins from the airport.
刚下飞机看到可以评价了就立刻来评价来啦!这是一封来自13度的大连的评价哦~Gary的家位置很好找,房间又很整洁干净,喜欢音乐并且对住客非常nice,特别照顾每一个人｡真的是又贴心又温暖｡我和jess都觉得这是一次超级棒的住宿体验｡如果还有机会去香港,一定还会选择这里｡极力推荐哦!
Gary is an incredibly nice host! Very passionate and responsible! And I would still like to live at this place whenever I pay a visit to Hong Kong. Perfect place : )
