很感谢房东Gary!全程不厌其烦地为我解答各种关于香港交通,购物,餐饮,景点等等等等问题!即使再忙也会很准确的帮助我!很开心的一次旅行,交到了很帅气的香港朋友!是的,Gary很帅气!乐队一员,很有才华!选这里就对了!

柯士甸地铁站一出出口 就能看到啦｡离红磡很近,很方便看演唱会的｡房东Gary非常nice,会提前与你联系,告诉地址,如果你有什么不清楚的关于入住或者香港攻略问题,他也很热心为你解答｡Gary推荐的 房子附近的点点心茶餐厅很好吃｡ 距离佐敦地铁口步行1.4公里,有澳洲牛奶公司等小食店｡吃饱散步回去｡
房间很干净,地理位置方便,房东超nice,没有什么理由不推荐入住!
好!
房东很热情啊 来到地铁站接我们了 离柯士甸很近呢 是蛮不错的居住选择呢 by the way 房东很帅
很棒的一次入住体验,去我们要逛的景点都很方便,两个路痴也能轻松记住地址~房东也很贴心的提供旅行资讯和帮助,是值得选择的住处~
房东是一个超级nice的人,很贴心很细致的帮助我们更好地完成旅行｡住宿的地理位置也非常方便出行!赞!
Gary是个大帅哥,人很好,服务周到,房子大,这在香港很难得,位置也不错,距地铁口超近,中港城,海港城,码头,维多利亚湾这些地方走路十几分钟可达｡一次逾快的体验｡
Gary非常nice,很仔细的告诉我们要怎么找到他家,房间也很干净,准备的物品很齐全,遗憾的是我们行程太紧张了,都没有好好跟Gary交流聊天,希望今后有机会能在香港再见｡

是很热情的房东✊
房子设备完整/采光良好
交通便利/去各区都很方便
第二次在这里住咯 gary人真的特别好 很热情 住的非常舒适 而且距离地铁站不是一般的近 离尖沙咀也只有十几分钟的步行 地点很好
房东人很好,交流基本没问题｡也很体贴,来的时候我们找不到路,也有来接我们｡离港的时候,也送我们到了最近的巴士站(///▽///)
Thanks for his friendship and helpfullness. Gary is nice host.  Apartment lokasyon excellent.  I advice to everybody.
房东先生超级帅!房子位置也很棒!下次来香港一定会继续住这里!
The spicy chicken steamboat jus next to the unit. And the dim sam (点点小)is very nice!

嘻嘻Gary超级nice!
房间很整洁,很温馨!离地铁站很近出去也方便啦,走到尖沙咀也挺近的｡还送我去机场快线(/////)
Gary很贴心的来地铁站接我们 房间很舒服 地理位置很方便 楼下的点心店真是太好吃啦 公用卫生间也比想象的方便许多
Gary人特别好,他家的房间特别舒适,浴室特别干净｡不用说太多话,就两个字总结:完美｡
离地铁很近啊,旁边也有很多很多好吃的店｡人也很好交流啊~是一次很棒的旅行啦!(˶‾᷄ ⁻̫ ‾᷅˵)

The place was very conveniently located. It's close to many bus stations, subway stations, convenient stores, and many good restaurants.  The host is super friendly and interacts with the guests. He enjoys giving tips and advices on local eats and where to go. The bed and sleeping is room is very comfortable and he had prepared many things in the room that travelers might need.

Gary特别特别友善和耐心,精通音律､摄影和健身,住所面积很大,很干净(是学生心目中的豪宅),靠近MTR佐敦站,走几分钟可以坐E23和A22去机场,是正宗的市中心｡附近有一家点点心广东早餐店和一家有缘小叙西安饭馆,绝对是年轻人体验香港Airbnb的首选!

鄙人在香港读书,相信我,不会错的｡
房子地方非常方便 2分钟到地铁站是真的 房主非常热心提供我需要的 床睡的比较舒服 在香港地方有这么一个家也很是舒服 下次有机会也是选择这里的
特别棒,房东还带我们去找好吃的,住宿地点去机场很方便

Gary家非常棒,已经是第二次入住了,非常满意｡住在Gary家,不单单交通非常方便,更喜欢的是,和Gary一起聊天,一起玩耍｡
Gary's house is very great. I love it very much, because it has perfect location, which means there are various kinds of restaurants and  several supermarkets in the street. You can buy food, drink or even commodity conveniently.
房子和房东都炒鸡好 我很喜欢 交通很便利

Gary was a great host having provide accurate information to guide me to this place and gave recommendations for food outlets nearby. He also provided a temporary SIM card which was unexpected. All in all, good location and value for money!!
嗯为了看红馆的女排比赛去的香港,房子去红馆很方便,楼下即到地铁站和巴士站,打的士也算挺方便,房间住的挺舒服,很干净,即使在路边也不吵,房主超级nice,帮忙提供了很多路线和攻略,不错的一次体验啦~~
超好的房源!房东超棒!位置超棒!哪儿哪儿都超棒!如果你能看到这条由心评论,请选择Gary｡
這裡交通便利,去哪裡都很方便……下次一定還會再來的~謝謝熱心健談的Gary
Gary真的超级超级好,很帅,声音很好听,而且超贴心啦,有什么问题找他都能解决ʕ •ᴥ•ʔ 房间很干净,洗漱用品什么的都很齐全,像家一样很温馨,所以每晚都睡得很好•ᴗ•家里放了一些贝斯,架子鼓,感觉超酷的ʘᴗʘ房间的位置离地铁站超近,出行很方便｡下次再去香港还会住这里的真的是性价比超高的房间,下次还会住这里!也会推荐给朋友的!正在找房间的小伙伴不要犹豫了(๑❛ᴗ❛๑)

非常非常非常推荐来香港玩的小伙伴住在这里!房间东西非常齐全,还为内地来的准备了内地的插座｡公用厕所不是什么大问题,来的住客素质都是比较高的哈~我们来的时候隔壁住了外国友人,只怪自己英语水平不够,不然的话就和他们与房东一起畅谈了哈哈哈｡
最重要的是房东真的是一个非常细心贴心的人,他会早早的联系你告诉你来的具体路线｡我们不知道午饭吃什么的时候还放下手中的事情亲自带我们找去他推荐的老店吃东西,还帮我们取了号,一级棒｡而且房东还是个玩音乐的文艺青年,人也很帅,强烈推荐!!
房间挺好的,打扫的很干净,房东人超级好,很热心,帮助推荐我们需要去的地方｡非常满意的一次住宿｡
很遗憾因为行程更改未能入住,但Gary非常热情好心,去之前安排了我很多细节,非常贴心,期待下次到香港时入住
房间很干净并且各种用品都准备的很周到｡Gary人超级好又帅又很绅士而且好可爱啊,和Gary聊天是很有趣的｡房间离地铁站只需要过个马路,楼下的糖水店和点心很多而且很好吃｡住在这里真的不想走!还有机会来香港一定会再住在这里｡
房间很整洁,晚上周围环境也很安静｡冲凉房干净,热水充足｡楼下就是地铁站,去哪里都很方便｡房东又高又帅,普通话英语都非常标准｡交流无障碍,态度也非常好｡下次来居住还是会首选这里｡这里重点好评房间的床非常柔软舒服,躺下基本上都是秒入睡
离地铁站很近,去哪都很方便,而且附近就有一个很大的购物中心｡Gary真的非常热心,会热情的与你沟通,并主动为你提供有需要的帮助｡
Gary超级贴心,专门来接我们｡房间也很干净,我们刚到的时候他正在熨床单,超级贤惠哈哈哈,我的皮肤容易过敏,平时住酒店都有可能会过敏,Gary家住着就完全不用担心｡另外Gary会非常贴心的为我们准备药膏,以后去香港都会选择Gary的房啦
Gary这里非常棒!人很好,很贴心的服务,非常聊得来!住的地方也很方便,总之性价比超高!下次还来!
首先地方很接近地铁,房间也干净,重点房东好靓仔,又玩音乐,又好客,无得顶!
非常热情､英俊的房东
房东人超好,我们没有找到位置还下来接我们,还认识了一个成都的小姐姐,房间很干净,性价比也很高(⊙o⊙)哦,楼下就是地铁站,附近走几步就有商场,去海港城也可以步行,附近也有像澳洲牛奶公司和翠华这种有名些的餐厅,虽然只待了两天一夜｡但是体验超棒｡下次来一定还住这里,希望每次都可以交到各种有趣的住客｡

Gary is a nice host. His apartment is close to Austin MTR station, 1 min walk. The room is clean and well kept. There are many restaurants and convenience stores around the apartment. And definitely, the price is reasonable in Hong Kong, such an expensive city.
十足的暖男,看來下次更加值得期待:)
房东超级棒!预定完就及时回复我,加了 (Hidden by Airbnb) 做了沟通｡ 来之前又跟我联系｡还发了视频到达的路,很清楚｡位置很方便｡柯士甸站A口｡步行去佐敦也很近｡离庙街也很近｡房东又帅又又优秀｡给了很多帮助｡性价比很高｡下次还来这里!!!
交通非常便利,出门就是地铁站~房间虽然不大但干净整洁~该有的东西都有而且品质高~床也很软睡着很舒服!我Gary哥又帅又贴心,会照顾到每个房客,提供各种温馨小服务~客厅摆满了乐器晚上还可以听Gary哥的乐队排练,超级酷~我和小伙伴住的很开心!

Gary's place is in prime location and close to restaurants, malls, bus / subway stations. Gary gave detailed direction from airport upon arrival and the room is very clean and tidy and equipped with everything I need for the short stay. He even suggested places to rest in the airport when heard my flight was delayed due to typhoon after check out. I would definite recommend Gary and his apartment!
台风原因延迟了很多才到达基本上就只睡了几个小时的床,下午还匆匆忙忙地出门｡结果后面房主小哥帮我把东西收出来整理房间给下一位住客｡所以我呆的时间也不长｡但是房主小哥非常nice,帮忙查了路线还给了很多信息方便我一个没有网络和电话的原始人能在凌晨的风雨里找到他们家(´･ω･`),可以说是相当棒的｡

Très bon accueil. L'appartement est très bien situé puisqu'il se trouve entre deux stations de métro (Austin et Jordan). Gary est très réactif aux messages et peut donner des conseils pour la visite de la ville. De plus, il est soucieux du "confort" des ses voyageurs. Chambre propre avec en plus une clim qui fonctionne très bien.
地理位置真的很不错,去机场有直达班车,落马洲过来也只需要转一次地铁,去尖沙咀旺角中环都非常方便｡房东Gary长得帅有才华且super nice,非常热心主动的告诉给我们介绍路线和景点｡总之性价比真的很高,下次来香港应该也会选择这里｡

The place is next to subway station that's convenient to everywhere. Gary is nice and talkative, you can ask him for help whenever you need it. 
Gary has a large collection of music CD which mainly includes rock, metal, pop etc., it suddenly made me recall my teenage years when the first time I saw it.

香港我来过很多很多次了,这一次入住Gary的公寓是我觉得最舒服的一次,首先价格很适中在寸土寸金的香港绝对算得上性价比高了,其次Gary很热情也很周到,他会尽自己所能为你营造出一总家的感觉｡另外对于旅途在外的人来说换洗衣服是一件很麻烦的事,尤其行程在三天以上的,香港又是个热带城市,但在Gary的家这一点可以不必担心,洗衣机可以帮你解决很多问题｡附近的食肆完全可以靠步行来参与,连地铁费也省了｡所以说这一次的旅途是我很难忘的,下次一定会在去麻烦Gary啦………

Im so glad I found Gary's place for my brother and I to stay at for 2 nights. 

The host: Gary is a very helpful host. He made sure to send me the directions to his place and he even came down the building to help us with our luggage. He was very quick to reply to messages and he made us feel welcomed and safe. Even after check out, he made sure we got to the airport on time and safely.

The place: Gary's place is very convenient. It is very close both to Jordan and Austin stations. There's a lot of eating place around the area as well and it is walking distance from the Temple street. It's pretty safe and quiet at the area. Take note, Gary is a musician so he has lots of instruments in his living room. Nonetheless, the rooms were clean and comfy.

Overall, my bro and I were satisfied at our stay. Thanks, Gary, for everything!

I needed a place to crash for one night and Gary's place was fantastic value for money given HK's hotel rates. His responses to queries were prompt and helpful. He was also extremely flexible on check-in,  which was important for me because I arrived in HK at 12 midnight. Room was clean and tidy. Toilet/Bathroom was ok, and within expectations given price. Living room was cluttered with musical instruments and equipment (Gary's a bassist), but it didn't bother me.  Location was decent (near MTR) and still somewhat walkable (15mins) even from the Kowloon Airport Express station. This is important for red eye travellers,  as while the Airport Express runs past midnight,  the MTR lines connected to the Airport Express cease operations around 1220am or so,  which means you might not be able to get to your place via MTR at that time. Building is in a very local area though, somewhat analogous to Manhattan's Alphabet City, so it might not be entirely suited for luxury seekers.  All things considered, room was great value,  and Gary was a fantastic host!

Gary真是太棒了高大帅气~我还没定好他的房间就已经开始帮我解答香港旅行的各种问题｡然后在我门去之前就贴心想到帮我们推荐和预定餐厅~果然网红餐厅别人排好长的队我俩去了就进去了｡然后到了机场到了他家的车站~怎么去他都有小视频~巨贴心｡到家之后房间也跟图片一样~本来我们想买牙刷用完扔掉的但是Gary有帮我们准备好~然后问什么他都马上告诉我们还会发定位~他不知道的他也会帮我们去查~还有就是我老公想邮寄东西~他主动告诉我们地址然后又帮我们约上门取货,东西不可以邮寄,他又主动说自己去深圳可以帮我们快递~不要太贴心太赞吧~赶上过节他也会贴心发来祝福~这是我第一次旅游住民宿~好幸运遇到Gary~很多担心因为有他我就不担心了~一共五天什么都很方便自由~吹风机充好的Gary都帮我们准备好~啊还有洗衣机冰箱都可以用~离车站也近~有很多地方走路就到,虽然我已经在香港走到崩溃~所以看见这条评论的人们~来香港选择民宿的话就定Gary家吧绝对没错!再次感谢Gary让我们的香港结婚纪念旅行顺利度过~手动笔芯!

Gary est un hôte attentionné. Il vit au 11eme étage dans un immeuble populaire. La station de métro Ou MTR appelé AUSTIN est en zone de travaux étendue. Il y a 2 changements de stations pour se rendre à l’aeroport ( attention si vous êtes chargés de bagage). Avec le métro vous pouvez facilement vous déplacer. Le bigbus ( plus onéreux) vous ballade dans la ville avec 3 itinéraires différents. Gary habite dans une zone commerçante. Je recommande our une ou deux nuits et si vous n’avez pas trop d’exigence.

民宿的地理位置非常棒,走路到地铁口只需要2分钟,距离庙街也很近,走路就可以到了｡到海港城逛街走路就到了｡房间舒适干净,洗漱台很有亮点,有女孩子喜欢的很多品牌｡房东很热情,又非常细心,为我们推荐的美食也很好｡我朋友有一些感冒,房东特地找来感冒药,我的拉杆箱掉了一个螺丝,房东专门帮我买了回来,真的很赞｡总之很感谢帅气的房东这几天的照顾｡
非常热情的Gary,香港少见的大house,设施也非常的全备｡
第一次使用
房子真的很不错啦,交通很便利,楼下有很多吃的,很不错的体验~~
房东小哥非常热情,对于初次来香港的游客可以提供非常好的建议和帮助｡
交通挺方便的,而且楼下附近就是非常美味的点点心点心,早茶完爆添好运
地理位置,靠近地铁站,方便去维港^_^洗漱用品,一应具全,像家里一样,方便游客,有路线指导,游客不用太担心找不到,总的来说,性价比高的舒适选择｡
因为上班的原因,一下子忘记了对小哥的评价   地方位置很好找｡小哥很细心的会照顾到你不熟悉的地方｡
Great host and comfortable room. Definitely recommend!

简直满分 无可挑剔 唯一不足的就是客厅稍微乱了一点 但是
房东人超好超帅 会加 (Hidden by Airbnb) 告诉你注意事项攻略啥的 机场大巴就在附近 不用担心赶不上 强烈推荐
出地铁对面就是 周边有很多餐厅 房东人特别好 又帅又贴心 还给我们制定行程单 房间设施很齐全 牙膏就有四种 竟然还有眼唇卸妆液 可以说是非常完美了
第二次来住啦~非常的喜欢｡下次再带家里人过来住~哈哈哈哈~交通很方便,房东很帅很热情的哦~大家不要错过了｡
很满意的一次入住,基本上想去的地方很快都能到达,gary非常友好,还借了自己的wifi给我们用,这次旅行也买到了自己想要的戒指,再一次向房东表示感谢!
在家耕田久了总要出来看看世界呀!超出预期,干净温馨,Gary阳光热情好客,基本生活设施一应俱全,出来一趟跟在家没两样｡我看中的东西基本不犹豫,谢谢当初的果断Booking,Wow感觉我说再多都不及你来亲自住一趟!强推使劲推!!!
地點方便､乾淨､床足夠舒適､性價比高､房東細心好客｡
首先,房东人真的超级好!!!什么问题都能及时回复,行程建议也很棒!普通话交流无障碍｡住的地方离地铁站很近,有视频指引很好找!楼下有茶餐厅,很方便,也安全,希望下次还有机会再去!!!

地理位置非常好哦,除了地铁口就是单元楼啦｡离油尖旺非常近,离迪士尼也只有20分钟的车程｡
房东热情周到,让我们在这两天住的非常舒心｡本来只是寻求出行方面的建议,房东非常细心的做了两份攻略给我们｡在外面有什么不懂的,房东也会很热情的回复｡
总之选择住他家一定没错啦,以后再来玩儿一定还会继续住在这里~
很优秀的房东,态度非常好｡我早上四点去机场,他也很早起床陪我下楼找出租车,等我到了机场给他发消息了他才继续睡觉｡
房东长得又高又帅,身材也好｡而且非常耐心的帮我们准备各种旅行推荐和美食推荐｡而且有问必答｡住宿周边环境也很安全｡这样的住宿条件在香港这价位很好了｡总之非常满意｡
Gary又高又帅人又体贴!哈哈哈,房源离地铁站非常近 周围又不是很吵 很适合居住
Gary的房间很棒!人也很nice｡这是第二次来这里住｡如果下次来香港｡还要到这里住｡房间整洁｡周边便利 紧挨着柯士甸站｡走几步就到九龙和佐敦地铁站｡非常好｡房东也很贴心｡有出行建议｡非常棒!
Gray真的很周到,在国外呆了十几天,香港是做中转站回国,房间很像国内的家里,温馨｡交通很便利,很好找｡下次去希望还能定到｡
灰常愉快的入住体验,房东热情好客,细节都做的很好｡下次来香港还会选择Gary家♥
房东小哥哥又帅又温柔又体贴~他家的床超软超舒服哈哈哈我跟小姐妹两个属于事精｡｡房东小哥哥都会很耐心帮我们｡
非常非常幸運地住房Gary 的房子,這兩天很謝謝Gary的招待,房子裡面的日用品也很齊全｡希望下次有機會來香港還能住在那裡｡謝謝你這兩天對我們的照顧!nice!

Gary is a very considerate host. When my mom and I arrived in front of the building I couldn’t find the gate, and he came down right away to pick us up. He also suggested very great restaurants nearby. I’d definitely stay here again.

房东人帅心善,给了我们很多出行的建议｡房间很舒适整洁,地理位置也很方便｡下一次来香港还会住这边｡
The host is handsome and thoughtful. Many thanks for advice about touring guide. The room is tidy and cozy. It’s convenient to go everywhere. Looking forward to living here again.
Gary人超级细心,会提前准备好房客需要的旅行攻略及各种生活用品,交通方便床又软lalalalalalablablabla

The place was nice, it was a great estate that is near some interesting tourist attractions. All within the walkable distance. Else it’s few stops away for the nearest mtr station. It is a very convenient place, there’s even airport bus which is cheaper compared to the airport express at a similar travelling time needed. Less the walking too. 

Hope all these info given are useful for you guys to get a great place to stay. For the reasonable price you’re paying.
Gary真的是我見過的最體貼的房東了!會及時回覆信息,並且幫你查找路線和做攻略...很適合懶人房客哦,哈哈~

这次的住宿体验真的特别棒!首先房东是个特别细心的大帅哥｡给我门做了很多详细的观光建议,还说怕我们走一天会特别累给我们每间房的人都特意准备了一个日本的舒缓疲劳的外用药｡而且有问必答｡特别健谈｡
然后是房间床上用品都特别干净,有淡淡的清香｡洗浴用品都是好牌子的｡棉签,化妆棉,牙线,卸妆液,洗面奶等等一切你需要的都有｡你会觉得怎么连这个都有的程度的贴心｡不用自己烧热水｡房东都烧好了｡半夜醒来想喝热水随时有｡总之就是很省事很舒服｡你没有想到的都帮你想好啦｡
真的不知道怎么表达这种舒适感,属于真正的拎包入住｡不用操心任何东西｡下次去香港一定会再选这里~
像家一样舒服｡卫生间备有各种洗头水沐浴液洗面奶,房东提供牙刷毛巾等等,自己什么都不用带｡屋内超级干净,床单都是经过熨烫过铺在床上的｡细心程度第一｡
房东热情,房间整洁,交通方便

十分愉快的住宿体验,房子位置很好,房东也很贴心了,给我们做攻略还给我们拿衣服去洗衣店,总之帮了我们很多｡如果有朋友来hk会给他推荐Gary的房子
Very pleasant experience,the house has favorable location,the host is considerate and very helpful.I will recommend Gary's house if my friends visit HK someday.
Gary很热情 很棒 向他问了好多香港的各种事情 都很耐心的答复了
What a fantasic and wonderful place to stay!

Gary的房子好大噢,在香港属于豪宅了吧,在机场坐A22或E23就能到达,到站下车会发视频路线给你｡很贴心,我们住的是单床房,床很大睡得也很舒服,房间超级干净,比我们之前几次住的房子都干净,然后浴室的话更不用说了,样样齐全,妹子们入住的话压根不用带洗漱用品了,小朋友的洗浴用品也齐全,就是住人特别多的话上厕所是个问题,第一天隔壁房间住了4个人,4个人连着上,有点崩溃,第二天换了批人就没这个问题了,Gary人很热情也很细心,有问必答,住他的房子真的很舒服｡

离地铁站真的是非常近 去哪都超级方便~
房间很大 是我住过最舒服最大的房间了 被单被子都香香的哦~
房东帅哥也太帅了吧☺️且超级暖 知道我要去看演唱会 还给了我驱蚊水~
最赞的是 洗手间 新牙刷 干净的毛巾 好用的洗面奶 卸妆的 洗头洗澡的 都一应俱全 
用airbnb三年来的最佳体验 
不赞不行 非赞不可
房东Gary又高又帅,很贴心仔细｡
gary会提前给你发攻略以及路线,交通方便,去哪都很近,人很细心,很照顾第一次去香港的我!!!五月天万岁!又让我重新认识一座城市!!!
住所靠近地铁站,与海港城和维港也是步行可至的距离｡房间非常整洁,房东会提供各种旅行用品,也会给很多旅行建议｡总之五星好评啦
交通很便利 在市中心 逛海港城 中港城都非常方便 房间很干净 房东很热心
房間很舒服,生活感很強
Gary非常热情,提供了很多很棒的出行建议,公寓位置很好找,设施很齐全便利~
Gary is such a great host! He was so thoughtful and helpful in everything, he even prepared a customized itinerary for us. It was a really good stay!
爱彼迎上订购的这间民宿位于九龙,附近购物美食交通都很便利｡房间干净整洁,温馨宜人,特别是房东Gary周到的服务,给人以家的感觉｡点个赞!

1､Gray是非常好的房东,提前与我们沟通路线､介绍路况､给我们提供游玩建议｡
2､订的房间要比预期好太多,床非常干净舒服,整个单间､整套房子也不会给人压抑的感觉,总之是非常棒､非常幸福的一次住宿｡
3､万万没想到,浴室备有各种化妆棉､卸妆水､洗面奶､沐浴露和洗头水,可见房东想得超级周到,是个实实在在的超级大暖男｡
我来夸夸帅气贴心热情礼貌的房东哥哥!收到超实用的行程建议,晚上到的晚也随时和我们保持联络,入住非常方便,床真的炒鸡软很舒适,第二天我们要去演唱会的,还送我们到了地铁站,叮嘱接下来该怎么乘车…人真的太棒了,下次…下次去到香港会再来der~耶
为了exo演唱会差不多一个月前就pick了这里房间真的超级棒很干净很整洁对于女生来说浴室有各种洗面奶各种卸妆的真的是超级超级棒了房主小哥哥也超暖心昨晚看完con回去递给了我们一支药水说给我们缓解酸痛想去哪里不认识路问小哥哥也超有耐心的告诉我们怎么走给我们发线路 总之真的很幸运订到了这个房间  这里地理位置真的很好想去哪就去哪 位置也很好找 晚上休息周边也很安静 总之强力安利这里  安利安利!
屋子很干净,房主人很好,很重的行李箱也帮我们拎,很热情
感谢提供了一次非常好的香港居住体验,所有方面都非常满意,日后到港必须再次入住,see you next time !!

One of my best experience at airbnb. Gary is a superhost very reactive, friendly who takes time to talk with u, the flay is right in the center and very clean. there are 2 other rooms but it was very quiet and room is also air-conditioned which is a mega+++
thank u Gary i recommend this host 100%!
位置方便 房间干净整洁 洗手间各种用品一应俱全 房东哥哥真的很热情有什么问题问他都会帮忙解决｡简直宾至如归啦!
房东是一位热爱音乐和摄影的男生,很绅士很用心,给到的行程建议和餐厅建议都很ok｡浴室洗护用品很齐全,女孩子完全不用担心洗发和卸妆的困扰｡最重要的一点:床特别舒服｡
Gary人非常热情贴心,房间干净整洁,用品一应俱全,还提供了旅行建议,住址对面就是地铁站,交通很方便｡非常满意,下次到香港还会订这家｡
Gary是一个很热心细心温馨的人,在他家逗留的期间很舒心｡有机会再来他们家
第二次去hk 在airbnb上选了很久 最后选了gary的房子 真的是超级棒 位置很好找 gary会发短视频教如何从地铁站走到家 简直是贴心一百分 还有家里的生活用品很齐全 女孩子完全不担心忘带卸妆洁面的东西哦 洗浴用品也都是gary精心挑选的 很赞 以后去hk肯定还会找gary玩的~
这个地方真的很不错啊!房东小哥哥人也很贴心!值得入住!
真的很好,屋主很热情,还给做了我一份很详细的行程单,房间宽敞干净,日用品应有尽有

This unit is quite big . Mr Gary is very very friendly and helpful .
The location is also very good ,it’s easy to go many place ,I just have a short time there ,feeling very warm ,hopeful next time can stay much longer time .
感谢Gary的热情接待,贴心的准备,房间干净整洁,因为我是有洁癖的人,对此房间都特别满意,推荐入住
超级棒,来之前给我制定了建议游玩的地点和好吃的餐厅｡由于粗心在港期间把港澳通行证之类的证件都丢了,晚上11:00多了还很热心的帮忙查怎么办理｡超级感谢,下次来香港还会来这里住｡
特别贴心,还帮我做了攻略,卸妆液,沐浴露好多种,卸妆棉也准备了很多,沐浴露太好闻,直接买了同款,强推!!!!

住过很多民宿,gary家是目前为止体验最好的,用360度无死角的服务诠释了“民宿”的含义——很性价比､日常用品都有准备(卸妆用品及洗浴用品种类超级丰富､可以满足不同人群的需求)､会主动和我们交流,根据我们的需求给了具体的行程建议(特别细心地做了pdf档)､完全站在“客人”的角度提供帮助(坐地铁出站到他家有几个岔路口容易走错,特别贴心提前发了这段路的“人工指引”视频)……真的体验超级棒,谢谢gary!!!
房东很热情,东西很齐全,还有吉他bass电鼓键盘,超帅的乐手
地理位置很好,走到海港城只需要十分钟左右,离巴士站地铁站也很近,超级推荐!房东哥哥人超级nice,是我遇过最好的房东啦!下次来香港还会选这个的~
房间很干净整洁,位置也很好,出门就是地铁站,去哪里都方便｡房东好的不得了,需要什么给他说一声,马上提供给你,外出游玩的话,会告诉你应该怎么去｡人又很热情,爱聊天,会让你感受到放松,是旅游以来住过的最舒适的地方｡以后去香港的话,还要来这里住｡｡｡
公寓真的挺好的,房东人很nice 回复很快 而且会帮你做一份行程,很详细｡房间也很干净,床特别舒服｡洗漱用品很不错｡反正住在那里整个人都感觉很自在很舒服,只是住了两晚有点赶｡早知道就多待几天

超赞的一次住宿体验!房东Gary帅帅的 超贴心超细心 各种设施完善 还有一些旅程建议 推荐餐厅 让我们省事多了 房屋地理位置超赞 下楼对面就是地铁口(柯士甸站a出口) 附近也有很多巴士站 如果坐船到香港 中港城下了船走过去大概10~15分钟左右就够了很近的  Gary会给你一个详细的指引到他家 如果是想去海边散步也很近而且舒服 房间比之前去香港住过的酒店都要大要舒服 至于安全问题 完全不用担心 大厦住的基本都是本地的公公婆婆 大家都很nice 下次去一定再住!
Gary人很nice,房子里面准备的东西很齐全,房间在hk来说真的是算宽敞的,打扫的也很干净,位置也很方便,一出地铁口就是了,床垫很软,哈哈哈哈哈哈
第一次住爱彼迎的初体验真的是太美好了,房东Gary太多细节的好太多,就不一一说了,总之相信Gary和我们住过的~选Gary没错的!我以后来香港一定还会来住的!
非常愉快的一次旅行｡

The house is beyond my expectation. It's also my first Airbnb experience coz HK hotel gets crazy in summer holidays in terms of price or service. One thing I appreciate the most is the location is ideal for city explorer, whether to take the subway or bus. I'll definitely stay at the house again when it comes to a Airbnb choice:)
房东很好人 很贴心 位置也很好 下次还会再来
非常好的入住体验
非常安静 ｡交通方便 位置特别棒｡洗漱用品一应俱全 很贴心｡

Gary was an amazing host, he was very fast at responding to messages and helpful with directions getting around the city since it was my first time there. The worst thing happened and I lost my wallet almost the moment I arrived to Hong Kong and Gary was nice enough to let me borrow some cash for the few days I was there and help me report my lost possessions. With Gary’s help I managed to remain someone calm and had a pleasant time even though things didn’t really go how I wanted. Many thanks!

房东Gary非常贴心,确定入住时间后就立刻帮助我们规划旅行,提供建议｡入住的时候房东已经以前开好空调,房间的空间绝对算是香港很大的那种了,房间有转换插头,有吹风机,床很软,超级舒服!尤其是卫生间干净整洁,有很多种洗护用品供选择,玩一整天很疲惫,但回来就觉得很放松很舒服,房东小哥哥还给了缓解肌肉疲劳的药膏,如果要去郊区,小哥哥还会给驱蚊药膏!太贴心啦!很赞的香港住宿体验!!!

楼下是柯士甸地铁站,离佐敦地铁站10min步行｡房东也录制了导航视频｡
非常非常棒的房东,很细心很耐心,准备很多种类的日常用品,交通便利就在地铁出口,很棒!
很棒的房子,Gary超級熱情
太太太贴心了!连女士的眼唇卸妆液都有!!体验超级好!

第二次入住啦,依旧很好很满意,对比三个月前第一次来的时候,发现Gary真的一直在不断地完善自己的民宿(尽管之前就已经做得很好很好了)｡这次想提一提大家都没提到一些细节和一些他有不断在完善的方面,他家的吹风机上次来小伙伴就有提到这个风筒很好用而且很好看,这次来观察了一下发现原来是松下的NA45,再次感叹一下Gary对房客真的很好很细心,居然会提供这么一款虽贵但使用感很好的风筒(还有其实其他日用品也是买的口碑好又实用的)｡其次是房间里多了镜子,之前是只有一面大的镜子的,现在还多了一个轻便的镜子,解决了两个女生不能同时在房间里化妆的尴尬(那个轻便的镜子还可以拿着坐在床上化妆一点都不累)｡另外,对于猪精女孩如我跟小伙伴,每次都可以用一堆大大小小的化妆品跟护肤品把桌面堆得超级无敌乱,但这次来我发现Gary还在房间里新添置了一个超实用的收纳盒,可以让我们把化妆品跟护肤品都分门别类地放好,找东西的时候速度max!眼拙如我大概发现了这么多吧,总之第一次来住的房客大概都会觉得很好很惊喜,而再来的房客会再次觉得很好甚至会更惊喜(他真的很有心且认真地在提高入住舒适度)｡

Gary真滴人超级好!从我刚刚订好房间开始 就给我制定了游玩攻略 还推荐了很多好吃的以及shoppin (Hidden by Airbnb) !!!!我和我妈妈到了之后 发现房间特别的干净!房间里有配备 转换器｡卫生间有很多种洗发水和沐浴乳 还有化妆棉和卸妆液 客厅有杯子和水!Gary还提供牙刷毛巾 我是一个有些洁癖的人 特别是公共区域的卫生 这个东西通常是靠租客的自觉性的住了四天下来 除了有个五六十岁的大叔把尿撒在马桶圈(女孩子要坐的那里)也不弄干净之外 其他租客都蛮棒的｡Gary家的地理位置真的超棒的!就在海港城边上一点距离!下楼走一分钟就是地铁站!出行真的巨方便!a nice experience!感谢Gary｡
特别贴心的房东!还给做了行程计划,非常体贴细致｡房子位置也很好,基本满足了我们逛吃逛吃的目的
很棒的一次旅行
非常热情的房东,住得特别舒服呢,房间也刚刚好干净舒适,值得一提的是床真的很舒服!哈哈哈哈,而且离地铁站超近的哦!
第一次去香港 虽然只是中转站 但体验真的非常好了  距离地铁站很近 房间也很舒适 以后去的话还会定这个!
房东Gary特别nice!nice!nice!重要的事情说三遍硬件方面也是一应俱全!住在Gary家里很舒适!
gary是个特别体贴､细心周到的房东,帮你准备了所有的行程计划和你所需要的一切生活日用品…房子比较老,但房间干净整洁,离地铁很近,出行也算比较方便……
房东哥哥很热情,家里用品也很贴心,非常棒的住宿体验
离购物,公共交通都很近,楼下有很多餐馆,很方便｡
超级Nice的房东,还做了详细的行程给我们,推荐了本地的餐厅｡时间有点赶,很多地方没有去成,要去的地方都帮忙推荐了最好的路线｡房间很干净,很宽敞,在香港已经算大的了｡各种生活用品也一应具全,有机会再去香港还会考虑的~
总之以后有机会再去香港的话还会住这里的
房东和房间都很好,房东很热情周到,房间在香港是宽敞的,生活设施也很方便,房间内就像超市一样,洗漱用品生活用品非常的多,而且有很多选择｡房东人很好提供各种出行建议,有问题也会积极回应,入住这几天的体验很好｡
真的很好呀 Gary在楼下帮我把行李拎上去 还跟我讲香港的景点虽然我都去过了hhhhh 楼下好多好吃的 房间就在柯士甸站出来马路对面 有发视频教怎么走 唯一不好的地方就是柯士甸站那个坡真的是拎重的行李上去要累死 房间也挺大的 特别是卫生间里卸妆洗澡的用品不要太齐全 人超nice房间也超干净的 这次是转机过来只住一天 下次再来玩再来住呀
非常开心这次去香港能住到Gary家,预订之后就收到Gary的慰问,以及一系列的出行建议｡到香港之后,Gary还特意关照我们,提前来放行李等等,感冒了还特意跑去买药,烧热水,真的是太温暖了｡感觉就像是住到了自己的老朋友家｡而且家里的洗漱用品真的太全了,感觉自己进了超市一样嘻嘻,床很软,也很舒服……太多的文字也表达不出这次出行的快乐,以后再去香港还是希望能住在这里｡
这次专门到香港打hpv疫苗,第二次住在gary家里,虽然已经过了一年多,但是环境还是和上次一样,干净舒适,房间都很大,生活用品一应俱全,晚上也睡得很好,隔音效果很不错｡今天回程正好赶上香港高铁开通,全是第一批体验坐高铁回内地的游客,从gary家到高铁很方便,不用坐地铁,5分钟的路程,不用担心赶不上哦｡gary本人超热情超有耐心,有任何问题都可以问他,他会尽力帮你解答和解决问题｡
很好
wonderful !
Gary非常热情,出行前给我们做了攻略｡入住也很顺利,有图片和视频,一下子就找到地方了｡Gary还专门出门来接我们,给我们倒水,是非常好的房东~晚上也睡得很好
Gary很好客,屋子里应有尽有,各种网红洗漱产品非常齐全,床很软,舒服又干净~步行前往海港城,维多利亚港,尖沙咀方便到不行,马上推荐给了身边朋友,以后来HK还住这儿~
一次来香港,还会定这家的民宿,房东很乐于助人,友好,贴心帮助游客规划路线,房间很干净,也安静｡
nice!gary很细心跟周到,卸妆水,洗面奶,什么的一应俱全,房间也很干净,这次有些匆忙,下次也要再入住｡
性价比很高房东人很nice
是超级好的房东哥哥,提前一天帮我们规划游玩的路线,附近有什么好吃的好玩的,都很具体的指出来,住房的地方也用视频发给我,到了地铁站也完全不会迷路,女孩子需要的卸妆品洗面奶之类的都给备在那里,真的是很体贴,在那里住的很舒心
Gary 是一个非常热情细心的人,还帮我们做了游玩计划,给了很多的贴心建议｡房间也比较干净,洗浴用品很齐全,洗面奶,卸妆水,卸妆棉,沐浴露,洗发水,各种肤质各种类型的都有,连宝宝用的都有｡而且都是比较好的牌子,兰蔻雅诗兰黛等,这样舍得的房东,强烈推荐｡
Gary’s place is tidy and large. Location is very convenient . He’s got an interesting collection of CDs (and shampoos). And Gary is very nice!
gary人超级好的,讲话都好斯文,住宿都几干净,最好的是位置很好,就地铁附近,吃也很方便

Gary's place is close to Austin statiand Jordan Station. Austin Station connects to West Kowloon and Kowloon stations so you can catch the high speed train to China or the airport express.
The best part of the stay was the AC, and the portable wifi and the amazing assortment of great shampoos, face wash, body washes, and etc.
Gary spoke to me in Cantonese but he is fluent in English. It was how I communicated with him via text.

When we stayed, we saw a lot of different people move through. Everyone was quiet and respectful.
房东超级热情,人很好,百事通哈!设施用品齐全而且品类多多,儿童成人用的都有,买好很多房东推荐的宝贝!都很好用的!下次有机会再来还会选这里哦!
在这里预定也是因为看到评价说房东很好,地理位置交通方便,其实想说的,别人都说完了,我也没什么补充的呢,总而言之,真的是很热情很细心的房东,知道我是来打针购物之后,会帮我查要买的东西的地址,下次还是会选择住在这里
Gary很热情,提前联络告知怎么前往,特别贴心,还给我们做了行程的攻略,下次有机会还会去~
gary很nice,离地铁站很近,楼下附近都有餐厅等,去海港城啥的都方便;洗漱用品很齐全好用,环境很干净,细心的给予出行建议,有疑问gary很耐心回答.最让人感动的是,受寒感冒了gary房东体贴的给我拿来感冒药.下次有机会还会选择入住.

与其说服务周到,不如说让我感到亲切,感动｡香港给我的感受一直都很冷谈,不管是听到的还是看到的｡没想到Gary的细心,关心和耐心让我有很大改观,打消了之前的很多顾虑｡超赞房东一点不假!!!
Gary的房间胜不在豪华,但是真实｡房间位置对于乘坐高铁出行的人简直完美｡距离海港城也很近,很多地方步行绝对足够｡
再一次感谢Gary,希望每一个在外旅行的人都能遇到像Gary一样的房主!

Very convenient, close to MTR Austin / Jordan stop , lots of eateries downstairs, a laundry just around the corner. Gary responses quick and gave clear direction.
位置很好,离高铁西九龙站和地铁柯士甸站都很近,房东热情周到,房间很干净,浴室用品也很齐全,入住体验很棒!
Gari修养特别好,细心,周到,大气｡居室用品都很有品质｡还借移动WIFI给我,很方便｡房间和图片一样,室内外都很通风,所以非常干净,我们睡的很安宁｡交通太便利了,回内地高铁,香港市内地铁站,24 小时过境皇岗巴士都在附近｡还有,周边地道的香港餐厅,味道极好,价格公道｡如同在家中,能在风一样的香港市内,片刻休息｡下次定再来,感谢Gari.
下次来还会住在这里~
真的很棒的体验
房东人超级好 住的也超级舒服
Quiet and clean room with a nice, soft bed. Gary was very friendly and welcoming and probably the best Airbnb host we’ve ever had. Would definitely come back again!
超级贴心帅气的小哥哥,在我们去香港之前就给我规划了旅程还各种告诉我们应该怎么办怎么办,让我们这样的小白都变得从容不迫了呢~然后因为导航不准确,很多都是拍的小视频告诉我们应该怎么走最方便快速｡房间非常棒打扫的贼干净~尤其女孩子头发很多然而家里连一根头发丝都看不到,就可见有多么干净啦~^o^
Gary的房子地理位置超赞,紧挨地铁口和高铁站,无论去哪玩都超方便,最重要的是Gary人特别热情,房间特别干净而且很大,性价比巨高,特别满意的一次体验!
房东热情好客,贴心提示､热心帮助访客并给予很多建议｡洗浴､清洁用品应有尽有,满足不同需求的房客,前面房客洗完澡,Gary会主动打扫清洁再给予下一位使用,很贴心｡下次依然会选择入住｡
没想到住处距离西九龙站那么近｡Gary还很热情地下来接我们,知道我们去看演唱会还告诉我们过去的新公交路线｡并且卸妆水,洗面奶,沐浴露,洗发水,护发素每样都准备好多种,第一次见到这么细心的人｡当初刚定下来的时候还会给做攻略｡下次过去玩的时候再来做房客
很开心一次入住,房东很nice对我们很照顾,生活各个方面都很满意啦｡总而言之,快来入住吧,不要考虑啦~
第三次住在Gary家了,一如既往的热情好客,房间干净整洁,有什么问题他都会帮忙解答哦,交通便利,离地铁站1分钟､离高铁站5分钟路程｡
房东人很好很nice,很热情,我的脚发炎了立刻拿了酒精给我擦,我还没去之前给我做了攻略,可惜我时间不够去不了｡房子的位置很好,出门就是高铁站和地铁站,走一会就到海港城了,超级方便｡这次去是去看WINNER演唱会,离新西游记米线店也不算很远~总之一切都很满意,值得入住｡
Very nice place and super friendly and nice host. Recommend to everyone have a short or long stay at HK.

Gary is Brilliant , Easygoing and Open-minded , Very curious . He is the kind of fantastic companion with awesome personality you want to hang out with. We had a great time during the time I live in his house. I highly and warmly recommend him to any other Guests. Hope to see you soon! 哈哈哈哈哈,有缘再见啦

房间和预期一样干净整洁,房东Gary热情贴心,这次入住是一次不错的体验,下次来港还会继续选择!
nice
地理位置很棒,也很好找,Gary发了详细的视频路径说明,又特地下楼来接｡楼下有很多餐厅可以选择,他会根据你的口味推荐!房屋干净宽敞,浴室有准备各种洗浴用品,对于我这种只待一晚的游客这一点真的很贴心喔｡退房之后Gary也很耐心地帮助我,提醒导航可能不准哈哈哈哈!下次来还愿意住这里~
房间干净整洁,地理位置也很好,出门就是高铁站地铁站,去到哪里都方便,到海港城走路10几分钟,我们在香港两天,全靠走的｡而且房东很贴心,各种牙膏,洗面奶,水乳,沐浴露,还有化妆棉,超赞
地理位置方便,房屋干净,用品俱全,房东人也很好,问的问题回复很快,下次去香港会再预定
gary非常的热情,沟通积极,提供了详细优质的行程建议和餐厅建议｡也很用心的跟我们说普通话交流｡房间在香港这个地方是很宽敞了!位置非常棒,西九龙高铁站五分钟路程,地铁和公交站也非常便利,洗手间里准备了十分丰富的洗护用品,精致!性价比超高,乘高铁赴港旅行的最佳选择
房东非常好!非常细心!我们把他的枕头套搞脏了他也没有说什么!位置特别棒,出门就是地铁站,不远处就是旺角!非常好的一次住宿体验!

强烈推荐!算是我住过的民宿中体验感最好的之一了｡首先位置非常方便,就在地铁站出口的对面｡房主本人也非常热情,很好说话,也给了我们一些建议,就是我本人不太擅长和生人沟通_(:з｣∠)_
房间干净整洁,床也算大的,至少两个女生睡是充足的,充电也方便,提供了转换的插座｡房主还提供了移动wifi给我们｡
洗手间真的巨多东西,像卸妆水,洗面奶,沐浴露之类的,还有好几个牌子,感觉比我一个女孩纸活的还要精致……
总之,综上所述,比较推荐,下次来香港还会订哒
很棒的旅行
经过鉴定,房东是一个热情好客的帅哥,房间很舒适,床很软,卫生间日用品眼花缭乱,值得入住,唯一的问题就是晚上隔音不太好,可能需要排队使用卫生间｡
第一次到香港,选择了Gary的房子,位置炒鸡方便,在尖沙咀,从机场坐A22半个小时就到了,很贴心的房东,斯文､干净,所以房间打扫的也很干净哈哈,牙膏啊洗面奶啊沐浴露啊好多种,自愧不如!在香港这个寸土寸钻的地方酒店价位都比北京高了,能住在Gary家里是很不错的选择!Gary是我跟我老公在香港两天见到的最好的当地人,相比较其他港人的冷漠,他热情地帮我们解决一些小问题,nice!
真的超级超级方便的!从西九龙出来就是地铁站,沿着地下通道一直走,出来就到啦!推荐的楼下点点心餐厅很棒耶!有一个猪猪造型的蛋黄流沙包超喜欢!床很软而且感觉很宽敞,两个人住完全没问题!房东人也很好呀,感觉各个方面都灰常周到!超级推荐哒!
位置很便利,就在高铁站旁,房东人很好｡
会让你们感觉到如家般的温暖｡
Gary是个热情好客的房东,并且会给到很多攻略,地理位置也很好 ,不错的体验,推荐入住
不错哦!推荐入住
真的非常好的体验｡交通十分便利,房东很热情,房间很干净,日常用品和洗漱用品一应俱全｡
房间非常棒 主人很贴心 毛巾洗护用品等都一应俱全 交通也很方便 靠近尖沙咀 如果下次去还会选择gary的房间~

首先是位置非常好,就在高铁西九龙站旁边(从广州深圳过来简直不要太方便),同时也是柯士甸地铁站,离巴士总站也非常近,所以交通非常方便,即便是步行到海港城去购物,去维港看夜景,也是不远的,房子附近的便利店和茶餐厅等很多很近,相当的方便｡房东Gary很热心也很细心周到,给了我行程的建议使得我节约了很多的时间和精力,房间里准备的各种生活必需品一应俱全并且都很好用,总之让我的香港之旅变得非常愉快,Gary这个超赞房东的确名副其实,希望下次再去香港还能入住到Gary家｡
超乎想象的一次居住,早点刷到的话我就把前几天的住宿都换成这家了!房东人超级好,热心､贴心､周到､热情,能帮你给出很多建议,还有行程安排,贴心到意外｡家里非常干净,而且生活用品一应俱全,基本上你需要的东西都帮你想到了｡地理位置也是好到没话说,出高铁站就是家楼下!下次来香港肯定首选这家!

位置近高铁站地铁站
坐机场大巴很方便
房源位置很好找

非常好
房源位置很不错,房东是个大帅哥哦,很热情很热心
很棒,Gary很热情
Gary超热情的,有求必应｡房间干净,床很软,住的很舒服｡卫生间的洗漱用品真的超级多,真的太贴心了｡虽然有其他租客,都是独立房间,大家很安静,完全不会打扰到休息｡我是不担心安全问题,就很放心｡地理位置很棒,出行方便,Gary都会帮忙查路线,提供建议,哪里不懂问Gary就好了｡这次的行程很赶,来去匆匆,下次有机会还会来这里的｡哈哈哈,表情包超可爱呢｡
Gary真的是一个非常好的房东,人超级无敌nice!!!所有东西都准备的非常好,而且很好客!!超棒的!
地點方便,CP值高｡坐車､吃飯或購物都很方便｡房間乾淨舒適,屋主服務很好很貼心｡唯有衛浴要共用,有時要等一下｡
房东是个很热情好客的帅哥,对房客有问必答关心有加,并在卫生间给旅客提供各种各样的洗浴及护理用品,住宿也较干静卫生,値得大家信任｡

name: Private Room with rooftop in  Sheung Wan
summary: Our flat is very well located for anyone willing to visit HK's core city life. In between the night life of Soho/LKF and the hipster streets of Sheung Wan, the building is very quiet. Well sized living room and very comfy L shape sofa to release after a long day of visits. We also have a retroprojector for movie nights ! 1 floor atop, enjoy the private rooftop with barbecue while looking at the highest building of HK Island :) 4min walk to Sheung wan MTR - 15min walk to Central

host.host_about: I'm from France and launching an incubator for tech & social startups in Hong Kong!

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The place was clean and the hosts are really cool people to hang out! It's perfectly located to explore the city! Hope I will stay there again!

HIGHLY Recommended! You can feel really friendly house. The flat was good located. You can go for every where in the city. 호스트는 정말 쿨한 친구고 교류 할 시간은 많지 않았지만 정말 친구집에 놀러간듯한 느낌을 주는 진짜 에어비앤비가 아닌가 싶습니다. 약간의 불편함들도 모두 추억으로 생각 할수있는 분들께 추천합니다!
Great location, cosy and clean place, would recommend !
Very nice and cozy apartment, you get more than you pay for. definitely recommend it for anyone!
Great location in a pretty hip part of Hong Kong. Definitely covers the basics.. strongly recommend!
Place is located near many public transportation. I walked to eat nearby restaurants. If your looking for a place to just crash and great price, this is a deal.
Great Airbnb, great location and value. Nice mattress, plenty of amenities, and a friendly host. I'd definitely come back.
very good ❤
This place is located in a walkable and central area. The hosts are welcoming. Nice rooftop if you want to chill out in the evenings.
This proved to be a very good choice overall. It's in a good location, has everything you need, and even offers a nice roof terrace (weather permitting).

Everything is fine.
it could be better if they change the bed sheet and duvet cover

Overall, it was a nice stay. Mostly as it is situated centrally in a really nice part of the city, which made it a great experience for us. Wifi was also good. However, some things were a bit sub par, even for being airbnb. 

Communication was mostly very good with fast responses, but unfortunately we got directions on how to get the key one day too late, which resulted in some unneccessary stress. Not having a key for our room was also a bit stressful as there was another guest staying in the other room at the same time. Although it was probably a nice person, it would be nice to be able to lock your things away. Not too clean either, but totally fine for just staying/sleeping there.
Decent place at a good location with supportive host.

It was our first time in Hong Kong and it is a very big, exciting and expensive city. Our host was very helpful with local information and made our stay easy-going. Perfect place to stay for low-budget travellers.
Very good space. Would recommend to anyone. Paul was super helpful and made my stay great. Great help when checking in too, helped me carry my heavy luggage up the stairs.
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: The Central Place VI
summary: El The Central Place VI es uno de nuestros mejores apartamentos turísticos en Barcelona, recién remodelado en Diciembre del 2016 de estilo Boutique combinando tendencias chic con el estilo tradicional modernista de Barcelona.
space: The Central Place VI is one of our best tourist apartments in Barcelona, newly remodeled in December 2016 with boutique style and chic trends with traditional modernist style of Barcelona.   This apartment in Barcelona has a great location in the center of Barcelona, very close to Paseo de Gracia, La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Las Ramblas which makes it ideal for business and tourism visits.   It offers maximum comfort having the complete equipment as of Wi - Fi, air conditioning, central heating, flat screen TV  with Apple TV and Netflix available,, DVD, speaker for all types of smartphone and tablet with a USB port for charging, Nespresso machine, towels and sheets.   This holiday apartment is very comfortable and stylish. It consists of a living room with a bright gallery. From the galleries of the living room and bedroom you will enjoy the view of the famous Casa Batlló Gaudi building. It is equipped with a sofa 3 people. In the same area there is a dining table and six chairs. This

neighborhood_overview: The Central Place apartments are located next to one of the most quiet and charming pedestrian streets of Barcelona: Rambla Catalunya. Far from the hustle and bustle but close to major tourist attractions: La Pedrera, a 5 minutes walk. La Casa Batllo, just 3 minutes walk. Plaza Catalunya, Las Ramblas and the Old Town, a 5 minute walk. Plaza Espanya, where the Fira de Barcelona is 10 minutes by subway.
notes: Check in takes place in our office located in Eixample area at Carrer de Bailen 120 near Verdaguer metro station and not directly in the apartment. On your arrival, you have to pay tourist tax which is 2,48€/ adult/night. Applicable only for 17 y/o and above.
transit: The nearest metro station from The Central Place I is just two minutes’ walk. (Passeig de Gràcia Lines 2, 3 and 4).
access: Home service massage available for an additional cost.
interaction: If you have any problem, please contact us and we will try to help you as soon as we can.
house_rules: - Prohibido fumar. - Respetar horas de descanso: de 22:00 a 10:00

host.host_about: De todos los lugares que he visitado Barcelona es la ciudad que más me ha enamorado y ... aquí estoy! :)

reviews.comments: The apartment is fantastic - great location, comfortable, and clean. Leslie was easy to communicate with and everything was as described.

The location is perfect - just few steps from La Rambla and a bit more from Passeig de Gracia. Check in and check out was very easy, Leslie and her colleagues were very kind, flexible and helped us very much. The apartment is very very clean, equipped with everything you need. You would love the lift in the building :)
No any remarks! Will recommend this place for sure!

Es un gran lugar para disfrutar Barcelona  muy cerca de todo. Y muy seguro. Ampliamente recomendable. Ek departamento muy equipado, no le hace falta nada. Repetiria y recomendare a mis amigos y familiares.

The pictures are spot on! We had such a convenient stay and all of our expectations were met and exceeded. Our host responded promptly to our questions throughout the week and never did we feel abandoned or without anything to meet our needs. The beds were comfortable and there is ample closet space to unpack and live properly for a long stay (ours was 8 days). Our party was 5 people and there were plenty of hangers so that everyone could hang their clothes. Having the washer/dryer and dish washer also made for easy clean up. I highly recommend staying in any of Leslie's properties. Her team is professional and reliable. I would stay with them again.
Todo  de acuerdo a los ofrecido. Tuvimos una muy buena estancia.

I really really love this place.
Location was perfect
Host was the best!
If i go back to barcelona, im sure i'll stay here again

This place was amazing for my friends and I. The location was a couple minute walk to the metro and shopping center which was extremely convenient. The place was in the middle of the city and overall great location in a quiet neighborhood.

This apartment is perfectly placed, within a block of the Metro (and the Casa Batllo), and within walking distance of the Plaza Catalunya and even the Sagrada Familia.  Use of a passcode eliminates having to dig for a key, and access to the apartment (by elevator) is excellent.  The apartment itself is spacious and well equipped, including adapters for cell phones.  The only negative is that wifi is somewhat slow and may not permit the downloading of  larger files.  In fact, we had no wifi connection outside of the apartment, so I just sent/checked messages and emails after I got back for the evening.  The kitchen is fully equipped (and the location of the clothes washer and drier), and everything was in working order and very clean.  It was easy to send/receive messages to/from Kim, our hostess, before we went.  This was our family's first airbnb experience, and it was a great one!
El piso es muy grande y lindo. Muy buena ubicación y Kim nos atendió muy bien!!
It was a great experience. Would recommend anybody to stay here. Very spacious, perfect location. Easy check in. Just great!
Great location and great value.  It was a beautiful partner that met all of our needs!!!!!  Loved the welcome bottle of champagne and the coffee!!!
Bons anfitriões e excelente localização. Bom apto, muito bem equipado.

name: Sinta-se em casa na Lapa | Quarto em apartamento

name: Upper West 2BR, Met, Lincoln Center, Central Park
summary: Our family home near Central Park, Lincoln Center, Metropolitan Opera, Natural History Museum, Magnolia and Levain bakeries, Century 21, and the 1/2/3 and A/C subway lines comfortably sleeps 4. Amazing location, warm and tasteful interior with a wonderful outdoor space. Great for couples and families. The apartment is on the fourth floor. It is a walk-up.
space: Our home has a large den / dining area that gets sun throughout the day. We have a large couch, coffee table and formal dining table (seats up to 10 with leaves inserted), with a mixture of antique furniture and rugs and modern furnishings.  A projector provides full-wall viewing of movies. The den opens into a 10x12 foot balcony with south-facing views. The balcony is perfect for breakfast or evening relaxation under the stars, with tables, chairs, a large umbrella and greenery. The kitchen is small, but ample. The master bedroom is spacious, with a queen-sized natural wood bed, desk and closet space. The second bedroom is a cozy and fun child's room with a twin bed, ceiling fan and plenty of books and toys. The bathroom has a full-sized tub, proper towels and plenty of hot & cold water pressure. The apartment is filled with artwork.

neighborhood_overview: You are in one of the best parts of the city, with walking access to the very best parks, museums, theater, ballet, opera and lots of great food and events.
notes: Please be aware that our place is a fourth floor walk-up. We do not have a TV or cable.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Artist and traveler.

reviews.comments: Lesya's place was GREAT!  The only thing I was nervous about going into it was that she/the property didn't have any reviews, so I was nervous about how accurate the listing actually was.  Well, don't (Website hidden by Airbnb) exceeded expectations and Lesya was great to deal with and super accommodating.  I'm still not sure why no one else ever reviewed it, but I can vouch that this place is everything the listing says it is and more!  The only downside is that it is on the 4th floor of a walk up...but one of the best things about it is the outdoor deck which is only that great because it's on the 4th floor.  So, it's totally worth the climb, just be prepared.

This is a fantastic 4th floor walk up that is perfectly centrally located.  There are a number of metro stations within a couple blocks.  Trader Joes is only a block away.  We walked to the theater and all over!  Lesya was very attentive, flexible, and responded quickly to emails.  We would definantly stay here again.

Lesya's place was great. It's a 2 BR apt, which is a great value at that price. Our check-in/out processes were smooth, thanks to her friend meeting us at the apt. UWS is a great neighborhood and the options around for food were fantastic. All in all, we highly recommend this apt.

Lesya and Arthur's place is a gem. Great location, very spacious for NYC standards and communication is very easy. We were able to check-in early and check-out late and Lesya was always responsive and helpful. Definitely recommend.

This place is just amazing! Nice location, quiet, clean apartment and realy nice and friendly host! Recommend for single or family stay, easy access to subway, groceries and attraction around. A few blocks from CP and Broadway. Without hesitation I can call this place one of the best picks overall. Thanks a lot!
Great NYC location. Smooth access and very informative hosts! I would highly recommend!!
Great location. Spacious place.  Great host
Very nice apartment, we loved our stay ! Everything was so close . Lesya was a great host! It was perfect for our family! We recommend 100%! Thanks again!
Top comme petit appartement... new yorkais! Endroit branché et surprenant de par sa déco! Nous avons adoré!

This is a very spacious apartment for New York. Location is also amazing. Very nicely decorated with a unique taste in art. Beautiful rugs. Lots of light. It's a walk-up, so beware if you have trouble climbing stairs, wasn't a problem for us. If I ever need a place in NY again, this would be my first choice.

description: It is a penthouse with terrace, practiced, modern, located 100 m from the famous basilica of the Sagrada Familia. It is very well connected. Optional parking (pvp not included). CON LICENCIA TURISTICA NUMERO: HUTB-010280 The apartment has a nice terrace and smoking is allowed in that space, also has tables and chairs to enjoy your stay. It has a comfortable sofa bed and a comfortable double bed. The apartment is cozy, clean, practical and tastefully decorated. The kitchen has everything you need for your stay, as well as coffee maker and microwave. It is possible to enter after 8.p.m. o'clock in the evening until 00.00, but with an extra charge for night check of 25 Euros until 00.00 and since 00.00 until 6.a.m it cost 50 €(cash payment). It is a 2nd floor, attic, without elevator. Parking optional (pvp not included) The terrace has a green carpet that delimits the area where you can have access. The access stairs to the floor and portería are communal spaces to share with the neighbor
neighborhood_overview: The area of holy family is a very well communicated and very commercial area. There are many food establishments open 24 hours a day. The area has much police control by having the famous cathedral so close; Nevertheless one must be careful with the personal belongings in the street.
notes: Lo mejor del apartamento es el fácil acceso a todos los puntos turísticos, se puede caminar a todos los sitios que tienes que ver! CON LICENCIA TURISTICA NUMERO: HUTB-010280
transit: You can reach the apartment by taxi in 30 minutes (around 35€) or by metro (1hand a half) to the metro station "Sagrada Familia", which is located 2 blocks from the apartment. This metro station belongs to lines L2 and L5.  If you come by car they have near public parking areas (blue zone and green area) and also have a public parking at the junction of Cerdenya Street with Valencia street. If you want some private parking, consult privately available and additional rates.
access: The terrace has a green carpet that delimits the area where you can have access. The access stairs to the floor and portería are communal spaces to share with the neighbors. Important not to open the communal access door to the terrace, use only the private access door to the terrace from the apartment. Parking optional (pvp not included)
interaction: I will be available if you need me. You can call me or text me anytime!
house_rules: Esperamos que puedan disfrutar de una relajada estancia y que nuestros vecinos también puedan descansar durante vuestra estancia.  No admitimos ruidos mas allá de las 10 de la noche. Queda prohibido fumar dentro del apartamento (Sí está permitido en la terraza) y lanzar cualquier tipo de objeto por la terraza. Respetar áreas comunes del vecindario así como actitudes poco respetuosas en la terraza. Excepto en los balcones. No esta permitido hacer fiestas.  Los huéspedes deberán enviar un e-mail al establecimiento para confirmar su hora de llegada. También se deberá volver a confirmar la hora de llegada al menos 1 hora antes de llegar. Recuerde que no disponemos de recepción permanente y que estaremos esperando en el apartamento para recibirles. En caso de que no se presente a la hora confirmada se cobrara un suplemento adicional de 10 euros por hora de retraso. El registro de entrada después de lo habitual comporta los siguientes suplementos: - De 20:00 p.m. a 00:00: 25 € - De 00.00 a 0

host.host_about: Me encanta que las personas se sientan como en su propia casa...  :)

reviews.comments: Tolle ruhige Wohnung mit grosser, gemütlicher Terrasse in unmittelbarer Nähe zur Sagrada Familia. Sauber und mit Charme dekoriert. Exzellente Anbindung an öffentlichen Verkehr. Ich kann die Wohnung wärmstens empfehlen.
El piso muy mono, limpio y práctico, en una zona muy tranquila y cerquísima de la Sagrada Familia y de transporte público. Además, Susana ha estado muy atenta.

Susanna's place is really really great ! The flat is well-furnished , u have everything u need, it's super clean and bright . The location is great , close by la sangrada familia and metro . Susanna is very friendly and welcome , she gave me a lots of helps! I strongly recommend this place .
Excelente apartamento, amplio, bien decorado y equipado, limpio y una excelente ubicación.

El piso es muy lindo, moderno, con todas las comodidades y una excelente ubicación. Es tal cual en las fotos, muy acogedor.
A 2 minutos de la Sagrada Familia, muchas opciones de transporte público cerca.
Susana fue muy atenta, lo que necesitamos pudimos contactarla y siempre estuvo para ayudarnos. Incluso el check in y check out fue muy bien.
Lo recomiendo!
Highly recommendable! Awesome attic right next to Sagrada Familia. Great private terrace where sun shines the whole day. Very clean and hospitable!

Fantastic place! I used to live in Barcelona and I really can't recommend this spot enough!! Amazing patio/terrace, lots of natural light! Great place to rest your head after days of walking the city. Extremely nice and welcoming neighbors, a bit chatty but in a warm way. Awesome location, close enough if you need any tourist information or anything close to Sagrada Familia but it's in a neighborhood that's more predominately lived in by locals. It's close to three different metro lines for easy access to anywhere else in the city. VERY safe and quiet at night, I slept like a baby every night I was there and had breakfast on the terrace. Easy check in/check out, Susana met me and dropped off the key and then met me when I left. Great service! Wifi was fantastic, never had a problem, good speed and reached all parts of the apartment including the patio. I really don't have anything negative to say, it enabled me to have an awesome overall visit back to my favorite city in the world. Highly recommend!

The apartment is very nice, well furnished and very clean. Susana is really a very nice and helpful lady. The problem i had was that there was no internet! She tried very hard to get a connection but it didn't work the whole time I was there which for me was a big problem. I really think that Airbnb should check on this; if this is just a one-off or if this happens often. it is very costly for someone with an Australian phone not to have free Wifi! This is not against Susana who looks after the apartment very well but I do think that the owner should make sure that internet is working.

I stayed in Susana's flat for my first visit to Barcelona - I couldn't have asked for a better experience!

The flat is immaculately clean and in a great location (very close to the Sagrada Familia); despite being in a touristy spot the the flat is incredibly quiet  (it's in a peaceful side street, so no noise from the road!). It's very walkable everywhere, or you can jump on the underground literally around the corner.

I stayed in the flat by myself but it would be suitable for more people - I loved the outside terrace to soak up some sun.

The host, Susana, is lovely and super friendly - she'll go the extra mile to give you advice on activities / restaurants or anything else you may need (try the Churreria on the other side of the road!). thank you Susana!

The apartment is located literally steps from La Sagrada. It's very clean and has everything you can possibly need. Susana was terrific showing us the place and giving us advice on Barcelona. Wonderful experience, thanks!

We very much enjoyed our stay in Susana's flat. Communicating with our host was easy, and Susana was very helpful. The apartment is clean and fully furnished. The terrace is amazing! It's even more spacious than it looks on the photos. At first, we found it a little unusual that the bathroom had a curtain instead of a door, but you get used to it quickly.

A lovely apartment in a quiet area very close to Sagrada Familia and the metro. The apartment is clean and well furnished and we received a very warm welcome from Susana. We were very pleased to find good wifi and air conditioning.  Susana also helped us by arranging a taxi to the airport. There are three flights of narrow stairs to get up to the apartment so save some energy to get up there, but it is worth the climb.

We were interested in being close to Sagrada Familia, and this apartment is very good for that.  And while being within a block and a half of the temple, the street is very quiet!  The apartment is as described and as represented in photos- a clean practical place.  It is a climb up but no problems for us on that.  The AC was needed and worked well.  Susana was a very helpful host.
Top notch place in great location. Susanna was very kind and helpful.

Susana was awesome and really friendly. She showed us around the place and told us everything we should know! Barcelona is a great city and this apartment is in the very heart of it! Well, well worth the booking!!! It is a really nice place with a balcony/terrace area, in a quiet street, right in all of the action.
Las escaleras

The apartment is located very close to Sagrada and has a nice balcony. When we visited the apartment there were ants in the kitchen, the refrigerator was very noisy and there is no door between the bed room and the toilet/bathroom

Susana est très sympathique. Elle nous a très bien accueilli. Malgré nos difficultés à communiquer en espagnol et en anglais, elle a su se montrer très patiente et compréhensive. Merci beaucoup, nous avons passé un très bon séjour à Barcelone. A bientôt!
Un trato excelente y el piso tal y como esperabamos
Susana’s place is central and quiet. Just a lovely spot.

Susana is a fabulous host. Check in was easy and she even offered to help us with our bags. The apartment is really airy and well kept. The bathroom and shower are fantastic and terrace is a great place to hang out. Would recommend her and this Airbnb!
Great place to stay and perfect location. Susana was very friendly and hospitable!
Everything as expected. Smooth communication.

Our host Susana was great
The appartment also
It was a great experience ! In a wonderful city!

l'appartement est très bien placé, très calme et mignon, la terrasse est un vrai plaisir. Susana a été vraiment sympa, elle a tout fait pour que le check in et le check out se passent dans les meilleures conditions. vraiment à recommander!!
Excelente piso, excelente ubicación y excelente anfitrión!
The host canceled this reservation 19 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
We had a great stay! Location is close to arc de triomph and the parc. The bed was really good and we also enjoyed the small balcony! Contact was very smooth and apartment was clean!
Super Unterkunft mit großer Dachterrasse in toller Lage!
Great place, your on Sagrada Familias door step. Clean and spacious. If you want a close bar with friendly staff go to Kadushi  I highly reccomend it.

The place was great, as described. The location was very good so was the apartment. My only comment was about the stairs leading up, they are very narrow and crammed and getting our luggage up was a chore. Otherwise would definitely recommend!
Great apartment and great location

Quick response and very kind.
I could stay very comfortable 
I wanna stay at this accommodation again
사그라다파밀리아에서 1분 밖에 안되는 거리라서 그 점은 매우 만족스러웠으나 집이 꼭대기 층에 계단이 좁아 짐 가지고 오르고 내리기 힘들었던 점이 힘들었습니다
Great little place in a great location , owners are super friendly also

name: Perfect place to stay. Artistic, zen and cozy.
summary: You will have my full apartment. He is very clean and comfortable. Located just near off the famous Ontario and Ste-Catherine drive. There is a lots of shops, pubs, bars and good restaurants. The apartment is spacious, zen and design. There is a bedroom (private) and a sofa bed very confortable if you need an other double bed. It can accommodate 2 or 4 peoples. Easy to take metro Joliette. 8 min to walk. There is a parking in front of the apartment. It’s easy to have a parking on my street.
space: I have a room who is closed by curtains.
description: You will have my full apartment. He is very clean and comfortable. Located just near off the famous Ontario and Ste-Catherine drive. There is a lots of shops, pubs, bars and good restaurants. The apartment is spacious, zen and design. There is a bedroom (private) and a sofa bed very confortable if you need an other double bed. It can accommodate 2 or 4 peoples. Easy to take metro Joliette. 8 min to walk. There is a parking in front of the apartment. It’s easy to have a parking on my street. I have a room who is closed by curtains. You have all the apartment. I'm always available for my guess. Very nice neighbourhood and you don't need a car to do your stuff.  You have many restaurants, coffee shop, boutique, pub and grocery to enjoy Montréal. 15 minutes to downtow. Everithing is close. Olypique stadium. botanical garden, and more. Access to buses is easy and there is Metro Joliette which is an 8-minute walk away. Free parking on the street.
neighborhood_overview: Very nice neighbourhood and you don't need a car to do your stuff.  You have many restaurants, coffee shop, boutique, pub and grocery to enjoy Montréal. 15 minutes to downtow. Everithing is close. Olypique stadium. botanical garden, and more.
transit: Access to buses is easy and there is Metro Joliette which is an 8-minute walk away. Free parking on the street.
access: You have all the apartment.
interaction: I'm always available for my guess.
house_rules: Respect of places. The apartment is for 2 people, but can easily accommodate 4 people. I add $ 10 per night per additional person. No party that would be prone to disturb the neighbors. I ask for the rational. More calm from 23 hrs in the evening. Thank you! :)

host.host_about:
Hi! I'm an artist painter and interior designer. My creative studio is in my apartment. You will see my works. My place is calm, Zen, comfortable and well decorate. I'll be available any time to give to you all informations that you need. You're welcome here! 

À bientot!

reviews.comments: The place was very clean and confortable. Very good communication with the host.

Barbara was an amazing host! She communicated fast and really clearly. Her place looked absolutely amazing, even better than in the pictures! And it was so clean! We will definitely come back to her place the next time we are in Montreal. Highly recommended! Thanks Barbara! :)

The pictures are an accurate representation of the place, for a small apartment it is quite spacious. The apartment is very well decorated, with great interior design. It doesn't look like it but the bedroom is open concept without a wall to close it off and the door is mostly see through, so if you're looking for privacy that might be an issue. 

At night, it can get pretty chilly as there isn't central heating so prepare to bundle up. Another issue I had was the noise late at night, because there is on street parking outside the apartment (which was hard to secure a spot), tow trucks would come around and tow illegal park. They normally alert you with loud sirens before actually towing. Then snow plows would follow to clear out big snow banks. This was annoying as it made it difficult to sleep. The neighbourhood also has many interesting characters.

Other than that, everything was good, keys were easy to access, the apartment was equipped with amenities and was clean. Barbara was also very quick to respond to messages. I would recommend staying here with friends as it's a big space!
Great stay. Clean, quiet, and very well furnished. Pictures are accurate. It can get cold at night in the winter. Definitely coming back when in Montreal.

C'était super!!! Barbara est ultra dispo pour nous aider et répondre aux questions.  L'appart super propre et dégage une atmosphère sereine. On se sent chez soi. Merci 1000 fois et pour une première expérience Airbnb, ça met la barre haute! :)

Barbara's place was great and she was easy to communicate with.  He apartment was easy to find and the check in process was seamless.  Her apartment is beautifully decorated and comfortable the photos and listing are very accurate.  It was nice and clean which is important to me.  It's an up an coming area on island but away from the hustle and bustle of the downtown core.  I had a great stay and would definitely recommend it to others.
A beautiful apartment, has everything you need for a weekend getaway to montreal. Barbara was a great host and available for any questions we had. Would definitely stay here again!
Had a great time at Barbara's place! Quiet and cozy place with a beautiful layout and great location! Definitely coming back sometime in summer!

Barbara's place was conveniently located 3 blocks from the metro and 1 block from restaurants & shops. Her apartment was decorated beautifully and she was very easy to communicate with. Would definitely return :)
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Everything was perfect. 10min drive to old Montréal which is my favorite part. the appartment is beautiful nice open concept. Definitely would stay again.
 
Thank you, Barbara

Barbara is very nice and helpful for everything you asked. Apartment is so clean and comfortable. Its very close to ontorio, you can find many restaurant, markets and cafes. And also metro is very close for walking or ride a bike. Thanks for everything Barbara.
Barbara was a great host - responded quickly to any questions and made us feel comfortable! Her place made for a lovely stay :) 10 minute walk from the metro.
Barbara's place is lovely -- sparkling clean, comfortable and stylish.

Barbara was very easy to communicate with and quick with her responses. Upon check-in we had difficulty with the key, as it was getting stuck and wouldn’t open the lock to the front door. (We also got confused as to which door was for her apartment - it’s the middle one.) Barbara had already left at this point for her own trip, but she came back, got us in and settled and provided a different key that worked better with the lock. 
My friend and I visited Montreal on a weekend where they were experiencing a heat wave, so not having air conditioning was a bit of a bummer. But the place has two balconies, one in the front and one in the back, so we opened the doors and had fresh air coming in through the apartment which was nice. 
Barbara has done a great job in decorating the place. She’s an artist so it makes sense. It’s definitely a cute and stylish spot and friend I left with inspiration as to how we may want to decorate our own places! :) 
Thank you again Barbara for letting us stay at your apartment. We loved the pace and would definitely come back. 
Ps. Love your artwork!

Barbara's place is stylish, spacious and very lovely to stay at, we had the whole place to ourselves and check-in/check-out was very easy. Parking was easy to find on the street, and it had everything you need. Barbara was very responsive, and even though it wasn't her fault that there was a power outage during one of the nights, she helped us find out about the duration of the outage in the middle of the night. Very helpful and friendly host!

Barbara's place was fantastic! Beautifully and thoughtfully decorated, clean, and bright! The bed was so comfortable and i really enjoyed starting my day relaxing on the back terrace. Barbara is very quick with her responses and kind. :)

Barbara's home was absolutely amazing! The location could not have been any better. The night life was amazing! Barbara was very quick to respond and checked up on us daily. Her home was very cute and relaxing. I will be visiting again for sure!

name: Appartement douillet d'un triplex montréalais.
summary: Logement lumineux avec cachet, boiseries d'époque, plancher de bois-francs et plafonds de 12 pieds. Nouvelles portes et fenêtre avec vitrail d'origine.  2 balcons privés (avant/arrière) Sans voisins au-dessus, dans un quartier tranquille, près de boulangeries, cinéma, théâtre et commerces, des parcs et facile d'accès par Métro (5 minute de marche).
space: Style architecturale du début du 20e siècle. Troisième et dernier étage d'un triplex en briques. Les fenêtres sont grandes et laissent rentrer la lumière. Un vitrail coloré tant particulier du style de l'époque est conservé dans la nouvelle fenestration. La chambre privée donne un son point de vue sur la ruelle. La chambre double forme salon et salle de séjour. Un grand balcon privé à l'arrière pour guetter au loin tout le voisinage. Voisinage réputé chaleureux et tranquille.
description: Logement lumineux avec cachet, boiseries d'époque, plancher de bois-francs et plafonds de 12 pieds. Nouvelles portes et fenêtre avec vitrail d'origine.  2 balcons privés (avant/arrière) Sans voisins au-dessus, dans un quartier tranquille, près de boulangeries, cinéma, théâtre et commerces, des parcs et facile d'accès par Métro (5 minute de marche). Style architecturale du début du 20e siècle. Troisième et dernier étage d'un triplex en briques. Les fenêtres sont grandes et laissent rentrer la lumière. Un vitrail coloré tant particulier du style de l'époque est conservé dans la nouvelle fenestration. La chambre privée donne un son point de vue sur la ruelle. La chambre double forme salon et salle de séjour. Un grand balcon privé à l'arrière pour guetter au loin tout le voisinage. Voisinage réputé chaleureux et tranquille. Vous aurez accès à toutes les pièces du logement. L'accès au balcon avant est restreint en hiver. Nous serons à l'extérieur. Restez sans peine car vous pourrez nous rej
neighborhood_overview: L'arrondissement au complet innove dans les projets communautaires, culturelles et environnementales. Leader dans la métropole avec des politiques vertes et écologiques. Les commerce sont locaux et les marchés remplis de produits locaux et des régions avoisinantes. Le parc Molson, au coin de la rue, abrite le patrimoine culturelle de la vie de quartier. Les restaurants italiens, portugais et aux saveurs de l'Amérique Latine occupent les rues plus commerciales ( Beaubien, Saint-Zotique et Jean-Talon), alors que les bistros et pubs de quartiers font modeste figure, certains ont une très bonne réputation.
notes: Nous séparons les déchets alimentaires, les produits recyclables et les déchets pour la collecte dans l'arrondissement.
transit: La ligne bleue et orange du métro dessert les environs. Plusieurs lignes d'autobus traversent la ville jusqu'ici, à noter la 94 (iberville) 18 Beaubien, 10 Lorimier, 67 Saint-Michel, 45 Papineau. Des taxis attendent au coin de Louis-hébert et Beaubien, devant le Cinéma Beaubien. Tous les services, arrêts d'autobus, points d'intérêts, commerces, cafés et restaurants se situent entre 2 à 6 min de marche. Pour les motoristes, se stationner devant sur la rue et suivre les règles de la voirie.
access: Vous aurez accès à toutes les pièces du logement. L'accès au balcon avant est restreint en hiver.
interaction: Nous serons à l'extérieur. Restez sans peine car vous pourrez nous rejoindre ou obtenir de l'aide par échange de courriel ou téléphone.
house_rules: - Nos plantes ne sont pas des décorations, sinon des êtres qui méritent notre respect pour leur travail. Celles-ci sont fragiles et ne devraient pas être manipulés sans soins et nécessité.

reviews.comments: Un typique appartement montréalais chaleureux et confortable.
Endroit propre et acceuillant, mieux que ce à quoi je m'attendais, prêt de tous les services à pied, restaurant et station de métro...etc. Je recommande fortement!!!

We really enjoyed our stay at Richard's place. His apartment was super cozy and had everything you need (good internet, heating, a comfortable bed, clean towels etc.).

We particularly liked how green the apartment was, with a wide array of plants in the living room and kitchen.

It was in a very nice quiet area which was close to nice places to eat and drink. It is also super near a park, which we would have enjoyed in warmer months :)

It was a snowy, rainy and gray few days in Montreal but Richard’s home was a peaceful respite to the foul weather outside. It was a great place to unwind and relax after my busy days at a wine conference. A very homey feel and a lot of charm, sort of the antithesis of slick and modern (which can be a bit soulless.) I didn’t get a chance to meet Richard but he was very responsive to any questions I had and gave me a warm welcome.

Richard’s place is really cozy and sweet. The environment is quite and provides convenient access to supermarket and public transportation. I love the vintage style of this house and all the green inside. A wonderful stay here, Mary Christmas to the hosts!
A very nice place, well located to move around in Montreal. Richard is nice and very reactive. I could only recommend.

name: East Village 1BR Apt with all the amenities
summary: You’ll love my place -- a very clean and fun East Village apartment in a new building with private 400 square foot patio.   My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.  Unfortunately, no pets allowed.
description: You’ll love my place -- a very clean and fun East Village apartment in a new building with private 400 square foot patio.   My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.  Unfortunately, no pets allowed.

reviews.comments: Cody's place is sensational! Spacious and cozy, great bed, bathroom and kitchen - with a huge terrace - all on the ground floor but super quiet and peaceful at the back of the building with views onto the terrace, the rear park abs the 4th St rooftops. All in a perfect location, walkable to everywhere you want to go in the E Vge and LES. A lockbox with the key nearby on the street with a front door code made access and departure a breeze. We'll be back!

Cody's apartment exceeded our expectations for our first time in NY! The place was spacious, squeaky clean, highly accessible, close to everything, and had all the amenities we could ask for. We would definitely stay here again!

This place was great. The apartment was spacious and clean. The patio was a great way to unwind after a busy day sightseeing. The big tv was also a great way to unwind. The kitchen had everything u needed. The air conditioner made it super comfortable.

name: Quiet and Serene  - Perfect for Relaxation
summary: Recipient of the Airbnb "SuperHost" award for consistently high guest reviews The Bungalow is situated on a 1 3/4 acre of jungle in rural East Hawaii. We are located between Hilo and Pahoa and close to whale watching, perfect for long walks along the cliffs at Kaloli point and for listening to the Hawaiian birds singing.
space: The Bungalow has a covered Lanai for enjoying the outdoors and looks out to a Banana grove. There is a small refrigerator, microwave and coffee maker with tea, sugar and coffee for the guests to use. The bedroom is large and the on suite bathroom has a tiled shower with a window where you can view nature while you shower.  Every window has a view of the jungle outside and the bedroom has a large closet and a queen bed. You can lie on the bed and look out the French doors onto your private lanai.
description: Recipient of the Airbnb "SuperHost" award for consistently high guest reviews The Bungalow is situated on a 1 3/4 acre of jungle in rural East Hawaii. We are located between Hilo and Pahoa and close to whale watching, perfect for long walks along the cliffs at Kaloli point and for listening to the Hawaiian birds singing. The Bungalow has a covered Lanai for enjoying the outdoors and looks out to a Banana grove. There is a small refrigerator, microwave and coffee maker with tea, sugar and coffee for the guests to use. The bedroom is large and the on suite bathroom has a tiled shower with a window where you can view nature while you shower.  Every window has a view of the jungle outside and the bedroom has a large closet and a queen bed. You can lie on the bed and look out the French doors onto your private lanai. The owners live next door on the adjacent property.  They will provide fruit and flowers for you upon arrival and check you in. They will be available for any questions that yo
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet and very green with palms, flowers and no traffic or traffic lights.
notes: General Excise Tax Number is GE (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: You will need a rent a car since we are 15 minutes from the airport.
access: The owners live next door on the adjacent property.  They will provide fruit and flowers for you upon arrival and check you in.
interaction: They will be available for any questions that you might have and they enjoy sharing their knowledge of the area and the Big Island of Hawaii.
house_rules: Use: The property is intended to be used for light recreational use. - Smoking and Pets: Smoking is not allowed on the Property (except on the outside concrete patio) and pets are not allowed on the property except outdoor dogs or other domestic pets we may be allowed with prior agreement between the Guest and Homeowner. - Appliances: Only use appliances for their intended uses. - Utilities: Please use the utlilities such as propane and electricity reasonably. Hawaii has some of the highest utility rates anywhere. Our rental fees are based on the reasonable use. Please only use the fans when they are needed and turn them off when you are not at the property. - No candles or anything that must be lit. - House Keeping Service: There is no daily housekeeping service. While linens and bath towels are included in the unit, daily maid service is not included in the daily rate. We provide a few beach towels but suggest you bring your own beach towels. We do not permit towels or linens to be t

host.host_about: We have traveled around the world and have enjoyed meeting people from all over. Lando is from Italy and Diana from California, but we have lived in Hawaii for many years.  We love the Big Island and would like to share our knowledge about what we know travelers expect and appreciate and extend our warmest Aloha from Hawaii to our guests.

reviews.comments: You will need transport. Diana and Lando will do more than enough to ensure you have a comfortable stay. If you're a walker this is the perfect spot!

Diana's place is great for couples and families. A very clean and cosy guest house with all tge basic neccesaties in quiet neighborhood. We felt very safe and comfortable staying there with our twin babies. Diana was very nice and welcomed us  personally although our reservation was last minute and she was busy with the restaurant on New years eve. She greeted us with a bowl of fruits from her garden and provided us with all the necessities that we asked for our twin babies. The place is close to the main attractions of the island - Volcano ntl park, the waterfalls, Hilo market, and lavaaaaa flowing into the ocean! We'd defintely stay at Diana's place next time we're at the island

Couldn't imagine a better setting for my boyfriend to propose to me! Lovely, quiet and very romantic place. It felt like we are in the middle of the jungle! Only 10 minute drive from the main town Hilo with many restaurants. Highly recommend!

Diana and Lando have a beautiful spot in a mostly residential area. the cabins are very simple but very clean and comfortable. This would be a great home base for folks who are excited about getting out and about in the area.

Such a cute and charming place to stay. The little lanai was a relaxing place to have breakfast. Diana was so accommodating, when we couldn't find the house in the dark, she came out in the rain with a light to guide us over, couldn't be nicer!!

Perfect, romantic bungalow Diana and Lando were very thoughtful with friendly aloha spirit. The room was very clean, private, surrounded by lush plants.  Fresh fruit, delicious coffee and beach towels were kindly provided. Location was almost halfway between Hilo and great snorkeling. We would definitely return here and recommend this place to traveling couples.
This place was perfect for us! Very clean, the place was like new. It is one of two stand alone cottages on a large and very private property. Hosts were great!
A very nice, comfortable, brand new bungalow.  Diana was very pleasant and friendly.  It was a perfect location for us as well.  We are looking forward to our next visit.
We had a very short overnight stay. It was a perfect spotless cottage. Diana was so nice and made us feel so welcome. We had a great time at the volcano and this was a great location.

We loved Diana and Lando's place. It was clean, quiet and conveniently located to visit the Hawaii Volcanos National Park and Hilo. Diana was easy to reach, very helpful with advice & directions. Whatever little comforts we asked for such as wine glasses or beach chairs, Diana supplied immediately and happily!  Don't miss going to Lando's Italian restaurant (Cafe Concerto) in Hilo!  The food is great & the ambiance Italian. Lando is from Italy so he insists on locally sourced, fresh ingredients.  We enjoyed every minute of our stay!

To get to this Airbnb, we initially followed our gps by typing in 15 railroad ave, which was a mistake. Definitely use the written instructions provided by Diana to get to the accommodations. It makes things much easier, especially after sunset. We were very impressed with the accommodations. Everything is brand new. It was very clean and they even provided chocolates for Valentine's Day. A nice thoughtful touch. They also provided fruit and water, along with brochures for local attractions. When we first walked in, I was worried because it was quite humid, but after opening the windows and turning the fan on, it cooled right down. The only minor issue I had was that the metal bed frame was creaky. Other than that, everything else was perfect. We would definitely stay again.
Diana and Lando's bungalow was perfect for our two nights on that side of the island. The location was peaceful and quiet surrounded by lush vegetation.
Beautiful place and perfect base to explore Big Island. Thanks for having us.
Beautifully secluded, well equipped and great hosts
Love the location. Quiet, simple and clean.  Diana went above and beyond to ensure our stay was pleasant.
Nice place, would stay again. Alan
Glad that we checked where it was in daylight before heading to Volcano Park, made it easier to find at night. Wonderful, secluded, wanted to stay on patio all day to enjoy the natural surroundings.

Located on a quiet lot along with another slightly larger bungalow. The entry to the house wasn't easy to spot. Recommend to go to the apartment before it gets dark. The bungalow is exactly as described. No air conditioning and definitely requires all windows to be opened to cool down. There is a fan though above the bed. Other than that clean and simple. About a 40 minute drive from Volcano NP and 20 to 30 minutes to Hilo depending on traffic.
Small studio very quiet but their bed made noise.
If your going to stay in Hawaii, Think Eastside !!!! This was a beautiful little bungalow... Wish we spent our whole vacation here ... Mahalo to you both and a Big MAHALO to Gav...

We loved this little hidden bungalow! Wish we were able to stay longer! 
It's the a perfect hide away secluded from everything, but close enough to Hilo if you need anything. Centrally located between Manuakea and the Volcano.
This is a very new and clean room and bath. Super quiet, if that is what you seek. There was wifi, but no radio or TV.

Wonderful little bungalow, absolutely perfect for us on our honeymoon. Very clean and our host added little touches, such as flowers and a little congratulations card, which was very cute. 
Highly recommend.

This was a great stay. It was advertised as quiet and that is exactly what it is. It is tucked into a residential area. No one bothered me at all. It was easy to get into and out of the driveway. Beware that if you turn on a light in the evening the bugs will flock to you. Also the room gets a bit warm during the day
 I made sure to leave the windows open a bit during the day. I enjoyed my stay. Thank you.
房东非常好,给我们所需要｡下次去还会选择｡
Great location and very peaceful!

The bungalow we stayed in was super clean and beautiful and full of amenities. A tropical fruit bowl was a nice touch! We really enjoyed staying there. Diana greeted us with a warm welcome and was super helpful. Thank you so much!
Hi - beautiful place you have, felt like brand new and full luxury! Good communication and loved fruit/flowers!!
This was a great place for a short stay. We stayed one night and the accommodations were better than I expected. Great place for the money!!

Diana and Lando's place is exceptionally lovely - quiet, beautiful, and clean.  The location and accommodations give you a true feeling of being in Hawaii!  They are gracious hosts and I hope to return for a visit next year!  Mahalo nui loa, Diana and Lando!
Such a great little place to stay and we had everything we needed. This location is ideal for visiting Volcano National Park without having to drive all the way to Hilo. This is a hidden gem.
Diana was incredibly hospitable, welcoming, and super knowledgeable about the area. The bungalow was cozy and relaxing in all the best ways. I highly recommend!
Diana and lando's place is great. They also let me borrow snorkeling gear and flashlight.
Verify directions.  Don't use (Hidden by Airbnb) maps
This place was a great find and exceeded our expectations. It's newly built, clean, private and a convenient distance from both volcanos and Hilo. Sounds like you're sleeping in a rainforest!

We spent two days circling the Big Island and wanted a quiet and uniquely Hawaiian place to kick up our feet after a a long day of driving and hiking. Diana and Lando's spot was absolutely perfect. Two french doors opened to a nice patio facing palm trees full of chirping wildlife—no sound of cars or neighbors whatsoever. Their new and peaceful little property is located about 25 minutes outside of Hilo, where our helicopter tour left from the morning of day 2, and 15 minutes outside of Pahoa. Diana recommended Pahoa for dinner which was a cool little town we likely wouldn't have made it to other wise. I will be recommending this place to everyone that I can and would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Great place to stay in the Hilo area. It's a great location for visiting the Volcano Park, and for seeing lava in Kalapana. The apartment is very quiet and clean. Our days there were perfect!
We enjoyed our stay in very nice bungalow at calm area in middle of banana, mango trees, etc. We had everything what we needed it.
Mahalo for a great stay and your kindness! Thank you for welcoming me to the Big Island, I will recall my stay fondly.

The bungalow was comfortable, had all the needed ammenities and it truly was a quiet and serene place to stay with a lot of privacy.  The bungalow is very well kept and clean. Diana and lando even had snorkeling gear, towels and beach chairs for us to use. Everything looks very new. Diana and Lando are the best hosts I've encountered when booking air bnbs. We received a warm welcome when we arrived and she gave us great advice on what to go see and where to eat and even had fresh fruit for us . I would definitely recommend this place when staying in the Big Island.

My husband and I enjoyed our stay very much!  Diana maintains this place very well.  She was very responsive to all messages too.  If you are used to sleeping in a very quiet room you might want to bring ear plugs... you probably want to keep the windows open at night, and birds can wake you up very early.

Once again I want to thank you for your overwhelming genuerosity. There isn't a place on the big island I would rather stay!!! Not only were they super easy to communicate with, but they sent me suggestions on things to do and places not to miss. You don't want to miss this place or these people. Top notch all the way around.
Awesome Place!!!!!

Diana and Lando's place was great for us. It is very clean and in between the volcano and Kona. A perfect hopping spot for that side of the Island. Communication was excellent and all above expectation. There were even fresh papaya and small apple banana waiting  for us
Beautiful bungalow! The fresh fruit was a lovely touch. Diane was very hospitable, and greeted us with the warmest aloha! I highly recommend!!!

Diana was very communicative before we arrived and greeted us when we checked in.  The location is in the rural area and we were definitely glad to find it during the daytime.  Diana went out of her way to provide extra toiletries for us after our baggage was delayed.  The fresh fruit and water was also appreciated!  The location is off the beaten path but great for relaxing - you can hear the birds and enjoy the tranquility of the space.  There is another single unit on the property but no one was there while we stayed and there seems to be enough privacy if they did.  The location is a bit further from Hilo but easy to access and a good starting point for the volcano park and 61g east access viewing.  Overall we were very happy with our stay!  Thank you!
If you are looking for a secluded little hideaway this is the spot...only about 20 minutes from Hilo but a quiet relaxing clean little bungalow, they took great care of us
房間跟廁所很寬敞｡房東非常熱情的迎接和介紹景點,還有附上豐盛的水果及飲水｡住的地方光害少,晚上可以看星星｡
Loved it here. Very clean and organized. Great hosts..they provide you with everything you need for your stay!

Very new, clean and cute bungalow nestled in the banana trees!  Diana and Lando have a beautiful place and we are lucky to have stayed there and extremely satisfied!  We love quiet and peaceful and their place was the perfect fit for us.  Nice location, perfect distance from Hilo and Pahoa.  Loved falling asleep to the songs of the frogs!  We hope to be back in the future!

Diana and lando's property is beautiful! Papaya and banana trees are abundant. You have complete privacy in a detached little home. It is very clean! We loved falling asleep to all of the peaceful forest sounds :)! Morning coffee, a mini fridge, and microwave was a nice touch and convenient for our early departure to the Hilo airport!
Great location for Hilo, tide pools, and Hawaii Volcano National Park!

We had a very nice stay at Diana and Lando's place. The house is private, and completely separate from other houses.
