The place is spacious, clean, modern and has everything you need to have a nice holiday. We had an excellent time down at the lava viewing area which is close to the  house (20 miles down the road). 
Finally, Diana was an excellent host: she sent us plenty of information via email prior to our arrival and made sure we had comfortably arrived. Thank you for everything!

Diana and Lando were great hosts from the start - great communication and thoughtful reception. The accommodations are spacious and lovely, it's like your own private cottage! The most appreciated gesture for us was a late check-out. We had a early morning lava boat tour that required us getting up at 3:30 am. We were so happy to go back to the cottage, sleep, and check out after 3 pm. It was a lifesaver! 
If you have the opportunity to stay with Diana and Lando, I'm sure you'll enjoy it!
Great hosts, clean and tidy place.  Must try cliff walk nearby, would love to visit again.  Thank you, mahalo!

I needed a place close to Volcano National Park and didn't need a ton of space. I wasn't staying a very long time and I would be out most of the day at the park so the size and location was ideal for me. There is a Foodland about 15 min from the house and on the way to the park so I was able to stop and grab food for the day driving around the park. 

The place feels very secluded especially at night because it gets very dark as there is little light pollution. Arriving late at night and in the dark the place was easy to find because it was clearly marked and there was great directions from the host. 

I had issues with my flight so I landed 6 hours after I was supposed to. Diana was so great and genuinely concerned about my arriving since it would after dark. There was fresh fruit from their property waiting for me that is the perfect way to start the day.

I would definitely stay here again.

It was a beautiful secluded spot. Falling asleep to nature never fails to give someone a good nights rest. It was so clean and very roomy. Communication with hosts were great and 10/10 would stay again.

Loved the geckos on the banana plants and all the lizards on the lava rock. This place was close to Pahoa which was important to us. Gets a little toasty inside so I recommend keeping the fan on and all the windows open.

Diana and Lando's place is beautiful, and very true to the photos! It was comfortable, meticulously clean, quiet, and surrounded by beautiful tropical foliage. There was also fresh fruit, a couple of water bottles, beach towels, and some snorkeling gear provided to us. Just be aware that the water that comes out of the tap is rain catchment water (which is common in this area) so be sure to bring drinking water.
Clean and beautiful. This place is wonderful to visit the big island. I spend 2 days inside and it todally worth it.

Prepare more drinking water. The room is wonderful, only a little hard to find it and the connecting road is dark during the night. The room is a single house which is really convenient. The host provides nearly everything you need. Love their room!

Gav was our host for the weekend and was fantastic ! Very very helpful with places to see and visit. Her communication was superb . I highly recommend staying here if you are in this side of the island. The place is well kept and "hidden" but the address given to us led us right there! The snorkel equipment/ beach towels/ coffee / fruit were an amazing bonuses!! It's gets hot at night but fans are provided :) Thanks again.

Overall the Big Island is very beautiful and breathtaking. A couple days before arrival, we were so nervous because it was our first Airbnb experience, but Gavrielle made me feel so at ease with such excellent communication and direction. Place was really easy to find, and just like we've hoped to be, very quiet and cozy. Everything looks new and well kept. We were welcomed with  fresh delicious fruits that we had for breakfast. Yummy coffee and tea on the table, entertainment system that we enjoyed before bed...everything. All in all , I'm glad that we chose this place.  Wanted to stay longer, but I'm sure this will not be the last time. Mahalo again for such great hospitality.

Lieu Super bien pour découvrir les environs de Hilo et la coulée de lave active. Très tranquille et ressourçant ! De plus, les lieux sont vraiment propre et la communication avec les hôtes très facile. Merci pour ce Super séjour qui fut pour nous une expérience tres positive :) Mahalo :)
Super endroit pour découvrir Hilo et les environs !

Cozy and quiet place, enjoyed our stay here. Loved the fresh local fruits Diana and Lando left for us, so yummy! Not the closest to shops and restaurants, but easy to get to nearby towns and a great location as a base to explore the Volcanoes National Parks.
Very clean, well kept home. Perfect for a quiet getaway.

Our first time experience with airbnb using Diana and Lando’s home in paradise was awesome. We arrived at night and got lost looking for their house since the street was dark and it was raining. We called Diana and stayed with us on the phone until we found their house. She was on the street with her flashlight to guide us to their home. She is a wonderful host. The place was clean and perfect for me and my husband. We will definitely go back and use their home if we decide to go back to Hilo.
Alma

We loved our stay.  my wife is a clean freak, she bleaches everything, she loved this place because EVERYTHING was clean and fresh!  thank you so much for a peaceful stay, we had a wonderful night.  we opened the windows, set the ceiling fan on low, and slept deeper than we have in years.  coffee on the lanai was peaceful, and the lush hawaiian backdrop was perfect.  highly recommended for folks seeking a quiet, natural backdrop to their stay.

The bungalow was awesome, cozy, and well accommodated. It had everything we needed, Diana was a great host checking in when we were lost and checked on us when needed. Great first experience using airbnb.

Diana and Lando were fantastic to rent from. They communicated early and gave us plenty of insider tips on places to adventure out to on the Hilo side of the island. The home was extremely clean and spacious. Everything seemed brand new. The ammebities were just what we needed. Diana and Lando provides a small refrigerator, microwave, toiletries, silverware, and a coffee maker with coffee, among other things. We loved our stay!

Diana and Lando’s bungalow is adorable and very clean. My friend and I enjoyed having fruit and coffee (provided by our hosts) on the lanai, while looking out at the unique setting we were in. We had an awesome time!
This cottage has everything you need, and the hosts have added little amenities that make it the perfect retreat. So quiet and serene - I highly recommend it.
Great little place to stay and Diane was an outstanding host. She was so pleasant to talk to. Would definitely stay again. Loved the fresh bananas and papaya she left for us.  A+++ Hosts.
This is a perfect little Bungalo Nestled in a very cozy and private spot. The host is very helpful and the place is spotless. Couldn’t of asked for a nicer place to stay

Eine tolle Unterkunft, super sauber, toller Komfort, ruhig gelegen und für Touren nach Hilo oder den Vulkan Nationalpark perfekt. Es gab sogar eine Kaffeemaschine & frisches Obst. So konnten wir auf der süßen Terrasse des Bungalows direkt den ersten Kaffee des Tages genießen. 
Super Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis, unbedingt empfehlenswert!

Wir waren bereits zum zweiten Mal in dieser wunderbaren Unterkunft. Fantastisches Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis. Super sauber, toll eingerichtet, hohe Privatsphäre, sogar mit eigener Terrasse mit Blick ins Grüne, es gab wieder frische Früchte für uns. Sollten wir wieder nach Big Island kommen, würden wir definitiv hier übernachten.

Very clean and private bungalow in a residential tropical area. The beautiful decor and personal touches - fruit basket and flowers - made it feel luxurious and welcoming. I️ enjoyed listening to the coqui frogs at night and sipping my coffee on the lanai. Although we never met in person, the hosts were very communicative and hospitable. I️ highly recommend this place! Perfect for 1-2 travelers. It is a short drive to different attractions. Mahalo for a wonderful stay!
Lovely, quiet, and fits all the basic needs. An easy drive to Hilo, Pahoa, and Volcano.

Diana is wonderful - very helpful.  Accommodation is new and perfectly clean.  Enjoyed the lanai (porch) and the lovely private setting.  Appreciated the fresh fruit and flowers.  Great to have the refrigerator and microwave.  Big shower stall.  Will definitely recommend to others.

This place is very nice, clean, and private. I like that it is a stand alone building, the passcode key box is convenient. Also enjoyed the fresh fruit and fresh coffee. Definitely would recommend Diana and Lando’s place!

What a lovely space! ‘Tis luxuriously simple. My partner & I were only able to stay for a nightlong getaway, and it was perfect
Some things to note: The area is “residential,” yes, and Diana & Lando are right next door... however it feels more rural in the best way. You’re surrounded by luscious nature in a neighborhood with houses quite spaced out, some with many acres. I was originally hoping to book a place in a more rural setting, and was happily surprised about the location. Also, there is another guest house right next to you on the same lot, which was unexpected and totally great.
We’ll definitely be staying here again!

Oh, and the coqui frogs! I finally get why they’re called that... “Co-QUI!” :)
Serene and quiet retreat. Cute space and loved the fresh fruit, water and coffee!
Welcomed with fresh fruit and  flowers. New, clean, suited our needs well. Location was good for us between Hilo and Volcano.

This was a great little bungalow. Very easy to get to for the area. If I stayed here again I would make sure to bring more re-usable water bottles and hit up some Starbucks or water fountains before heading home. Diana was so sweet and she did provide water bottles, but as someone who works in the environmental field I didn’t feel great drinking from the plastic bottles.

Newly built bungalow surrounded by tropical plants.  It feels very private and secluded.  We were thrilled by the cleanliness!  Also, there was fresh local fruit left for us.  Fabulous experience that we hope to repeat next year!
Moc prijemne ubytovani, uzasne ciste. Hostitele jsou velmi ochotni,mili a velmi napomocni. Misto je strategicky umisteno nedaleko letiste v Hilo a rovnez v blizkosti " lava viewing area".

What a lovely place to relax! Diana and Lando have a beautiful space to appreciate the beauty of Hawai‘i. The space was clean, bright, and welcoming, and Diana and Lando do a wonderful job of perpetuating the aloha spirit. The bed was comfy, and they left some delicious fresh fruit for me to enjoy during my stay. Diana was flexible and met me when I got there and made it clear she wanted to make sure I was good to go. The bathroom had some great amenities, and the room was just delightful. Thank you!
非常好的小屋

Our stay with Diana and Lando was perfect. It was unfortunately the last night of our trip, otherwise we would have loved to stay longer. Diana was super friendly, and offered us fruits from her trees and local suggestions. We would love to stay another time!

Our stay with Diana and Londo was great! A quaint little bungalow located just outside of Hilo, it was perfect for spending a quiet and restful evening. Diana provided directions and recommendations and was very quick to respond to any inquiries. All in all, would stay here again in a second!

We had a great experience staying at Diana and Lando’s. They were super responsive and flexible, as our plans shifted our arrival time. We appreciated the thoughtful touches like fresh fruit and cold water. The bed was large and comfortable and everything was very clean.
일정변경으로 인해 체크인시간이 바뀌었음에도 호스트는 우리의 상황을 이해하고, 변경상황을 받아주었다. 숙소는 새로 지은 방갈로 였다. 그곳은 깨끗하고 예뻤다. 새 건물의 냄새가 조금 난다. 테라스에서 정원을 보며 아침을 먹기 좋았다.

Perfect base for exploring Volcano National Park, Hilo, Pahoa, etc.  Suite was larger than expected, with fresh fruit upon arrival and toiletries.  Diana provided exceptional communication throughout our stay.  I would stay here again.

This place is lovely! We only stayed one night, but certainly wish we had carved out a couple nights here. There are two guest bungalows on the lot, but it still feels very private and comfortable. The place is very clean, the shower is roomy and water nice and hot. Close proximity to Hilo, and we loved exploring the Kapoho Tidepools. Diana met us upon arrival, and even communicated to us that day that an early check in was available—which was a nice surprise. There is a mini-fridge and microwave, so don’t plan on cooking or storing a lot of food. Bring some yogurt to enjoy with the fruit provided by hosts! Yum! Also—Diana offered us plenty of bottled water since the rainwater catchment is not recommended for drinking, but we would recommend saving the plastic by bringing your own refillable bottles full.

We had a wonderful stay. Loved the birds signing in the morning and at night, the peace and quiet, the darkness and mystery of the place. Passion fruit and other delights from Diana and Lando’s garden were delicious. 
I wish we had had more time to soak in the serenity of the place. Conveniently located between the Volcanoes Park and Hilo. A lovely getaway with starry nights.

I highly recommend this listing. It was everything we needed for our week stay on the big island. The extra touches were a great surprise. We never had to spend any money on snorkeling equipment it was already provided. There is also a limited amount of sunscreen, aloe (which we did use) and bug spray which made it nice to sit on the patio at night. Very quiet neighborhood. Loved our mornings drinking coffee on the patio. I recommend this host and listing to others and will be recommending to close friends and family in the future. Thanks for everything!

Clean, quiet, secluded place! We really enjoyed staying at Diana and Lando’s place. Diane was very sweet, even met us in the pouring rain to welcome us! We definitely recommend their place if you’re looking for a place to relax and get away.

Diana and Lando's ohana was the prefect home base for our hiking adventures on the big island. We enjoyed our stay very much. The place was quiet, clean, and private. Our hosts were very well organized and easy to communicate with. Thank you Diana and Lando!

The place is wonderful. Very clean and you are surrounded by nature. You will hear all of nature's sounds, so bring some ear plugs if that will bother you. Convenient drives to get to the volcano or Hilo. Totally recommend staying here.

Diana and Lando have an amazing spot for people looking to get away. It is extremely clean and I found the bed very comfortable. While you are there you can get somewhat of an “off the grid” feel but with just a 10 min drive north or south you can find yourself different shops and restaurants. It is also 15-20 from Hilo.  Also enjoyed the coffee maker, dvds, waters, and freshly picked fruit for enjoyment. Would def I I felt stay again. Thank you guys!
Beautiful place with good facilities and really good, responsive hosts. Must need car, close to National Volcano Park and definitely good for discovering more of the east side of Big Island.

Diana and Lando offered excellent hospitality for our stay! We picked this place because it was close to the Volcano Park. I would highly recommend this place for its cleanliness, communication, local tips, location, and great place.

Thank you once again!
Katarina and Adrien
Wonderful place. We have a great honey moon time in here.

Exactly what the description promises. From Diane’s personal greeting when we arrived to the birds calling at night. It was the wet season when we visited (and boy did it rain) but that only added to the experience for us, sleeping to the sound of the rain on the roof. Our only regret was that our stay was just two nights.

One tip for prospective guests, make sure you have a rental car, you can get to the lava flow viewing area in a few minutes, and Hilo town is likewise not too far away if you’re driving.

Thanks Diane & Lando!

Lovely personal touches. Shampoo, body wash in bathroom; snacks, oils  and lip balm for our use. Fully stocked kitchen and beach supplies. Lovely outside sitting area, Most comfortable bed of our trip! Would stay again in a heartbeat!
Thank you Diana and Lando
Wonderful place to stay. Easy access to the volcanoes. Definitely would stay here again!

If you want clean and simple beauty and everything you could want then this is the place for you. Microwave refrigerator coffee fresh papayas and other fruit..... Lovely accent touches and beautiful artwork that really conveys the feeling of Hawaii Anna. Even the windows had been recently washed and there was good air circulation and ventilation between the windows and the ceiling fan. Very important for my wife and I was the lack of mold and mildew smells this is a rare thing in Hawaii and we really appreciated it
A sweet bungalow that is clean and airy.  The fresh flowers and coffee a special touch.  We enjoyed our stay here very much. Great location for exploring Puna.

Diana and Lando are amazing hosts! They go out of their way to make sure you are having the most comfortable and best experience you can while you are on the big island.

We definitely appreciated the amount of communication with tips and ideas of where we can go and what to do during our stay.

Will happily look to stay with them again during our next time on the big island!

We only stayed for one night but wished we had stayed a few days more. Diana is passionate and welcomed us warmly when we checked in. The place is as described. Diana also gave us some fruits and the papaya is the most delicious I have had in years. The bungalow is clean and very affordable. 

The only thing to watch out for is that it's a bit off the beaten path and I strongly recommend to arrive before sunset in the first night. Diana provided the GPS coordinates, and both the GPS coordinates and street address is accurate in (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps so you won't get lost when using (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps. 

Overall this place is awesome and the birds/insects sing all night long. A very lovely stay and highly recommended.

The bungalow is exactly as described and very clean. It may be a bit hard to find, but Diana and Lando provided us with good directions. There is no A/C, but all windows have fly screens, so you can have a bit of a breeze inside the bungalow. Communication was always quick and easy. We enjoyed our time very much and would stay there again!
Great spot between Hilo and Pahoa. Super clean and comfy, yummy fruits and helpful prompt communications made this stay a breeze.

This place was super clean, cute and quiet! You can fall asleep to the sounds of nature, birds and tree frogs (seriously, who comes to Hawaii and complains about hearing nature?). Even though the main house is right next door, it felt very private and we had a great stay. The one caveat is that there is not a kitchen sink so you have to wash your dishes in the bathroom sink :/
We loved every minute of our stay! The cottage has breathtaking views, wonderful amenities and so many little touches that will make your stay amazing. Mahalo! We will definitely come back soon.
Beautiful gem of a place. Very comfortable and the hosts took care of all our needs. All the extra touches were appreciated. Would recommend to friends and family!

This little bungalow was perfect for us! It was cozy and comfortable, and close to both Hilo and Volcanoes National Park. Unfortunately, we were only able to stay for one night, but we really appreciated all the special little touches that make Diana, Lando, and Lucy such great hosts. They had fresh fruit and bottled water and sent us lots of information about the area and things to do. It didn't have a full kitchen, but did have a small fridge, microwave, and dishes. Great little getaway!

Great place, would stay there again, was quiet and peaceful.  The bungalow was in like new condition with great atmosphere and perfect finishing touches.  All the stuff you would need to go to the beach was provided there for you to use,
Outstanding hospitality ! we loved the villa, and all the thoughtful touches coffee, water, fruit! it was just amazing great value!

Diana and Lando's place was so peaceful and tranquil.  It was a beautiful jungle retreat.  We loved the Hawaiian decorations and the fruit they left for us!  It was a great value, and we'd recommend it to other travelers looking for a unique experience.
Our stay here was wonderful!
Very clean room/bathroom, peaceful location. Exactly what you would need to just escape.

This place is fantastic, exceeded expectations.  It is spacious, clean, quiet & centrally located if visiting Volcano, Hilo, Pahoa, or Kapalaa.  It was larger than I expected or needed, I was by myself, a small family could fit comfortably (if allowed).  Fresh fruit, comfortable bed, quiet & a hot shower was really appreciated.

The house is located in the wood so it is very quiet at night.  We really liked the design of the house, the simplicity and the attention to details. It is very cute and sparkling clean. The host was very quick to respond to our questions and very thoughtful. We arrived late but two bottle of Hawaii water and local fruits already provided  in the house. Too bad that we only stayed for one night. I recommend this place.
Quite secluded location exactly what we were looking for!
We enjoyed our stay here and found it to be very comfortable for our needs. The shower was very nice and we appreciated the body wash and soap.

Wow! We had a wonderful time at Diana and Lando's place. Everything was clean, new and functional. We really appreciated the little attentions : fruits, flowers and movies. Nice outdoor setting with trees and birds... perfect to relax and eat breakfast before heading out for the day.
Very nice place! Quite and comfortable!

This location worked for me coming from Volcanoes Park. I loved the shopping plaza nearby for groceries and takeout. I did not read the details closely and it was hot inside when I arrived, but cooled off quickly after I opened all the windows. No AC if you plan on staying inside on a brutally hot day, and the fan is less than optimal. There is a TV, but strictly for DVD use.  I was able to watch Merrie Monarch online, but only in certain areas was the WiFi signal strong enough to stream on my phone. The space is super clean, there was fresh fruit and bottled water in the mini fridge. The bed is comfortable. The coquis frogs are deafening, and I live on Oahu, so I don’t come to Big Island to hear nature sounds, especially invasive species. Closing the windows cuts the noise by 50%, which you can do if it cools down. Due to the noise, I would not stay here again as I am a very light sleeper. Great place if you can get past this or sleep like a log.
wir waren 3 nächte hier, für uns hat alles gepasst, die lage ist sehr gut und doch völlig idylisch. nancy hat uns begrüsst und wertvolle tipps gegen. wir würden sofort wieder hier übernachten.
Diana was a perfect host - her little hale was spotlessly clean, private, and had everything we needed for our 2-night stay. Easy to get to Hilo, Pahoa, and Hawaii Volcanoes NP. Highly recommended!

Wir wurden sehr herzlich von Diana begrüsst. Sie hat sich Zeit genommen unsere Fragen zu beantworten. Das Bungalow ist sehr liebevoll eingerichtet mit kleinen Details (z.B. frische Blumen, eine Schale voll Früchte inkl. Küchenmesser und einem guten Haartrockner mit Diffusor :-)). Wir würden jederzeit wieder dort übernachten.

Don't look further, it's the perfect place to stay! For one or few nights you won't regret it! Diana is very friendly and helpful! Nice flowers for your arrival,plate of fruits, nice and very clean bedroom and bathroom. A fridge to keep your water / food fresh. We would have loved to stay longer, but we will definitely coming back if we travel again in this area! Go, go, go !

Our one night stay at Diana and Lando's bungalow was just what we needed after a day of adventuring around the Island. Diana was very welcoming upon our arrival and her communication was second to none. The directions given were exact. The place is situated between the Volcano National Park and Hilo so easy to commute between the two places and also the surrounding towns. The bungalow was very clean and had all the essential amenities that you need. All in all, a wonderful stay was had. I would highly recommend a stay here.

FANTASTIC! Diana was exceptional in every way, quick with her responses, friendly on arrival and kindly helped us out when we made a mistake with our booking. The accomodation has all you need for a great stay, beautiful fresh fruit, fans, snorkles and more. It is a great location for exploring Hilo and the Hawaii Volcano National Park. Would love to stay here again!
Lovely place and really friendly host. Great value for money. We would definitely stay here again!

Diana and Lando were great hosts. Their communication was great given most recent conditions with Kilauea. They ensured our safety and answered all questions and concerns. We were so glad we didn't cancel because their bungalow was very special. Fruit, coffee and flowers were such a great touch. Delightful bathroom and loved the traditional yet minimalistic design.

Diana and Lando offer a very special retreat. Eating breakfast on the porch in the morning light and listening to the sounds of the birds is magical. They are great hosts and we enjoyed our stay very much.
Nice bungalow in the real nature.

Diana and Lando are super friendly and helpful. We could check in without any problems and they surprised us with flowers and fruits which was very nice! The apartment is very clean and I can totally recommend it!

Wow! What a place! We were really excited to stay here and then learned about the Kilauea eruption. They messaged us immediately and kept us updated prior to our arrival. The place was exactly as pictured and was perfect for us! It was clean and had great style, thoughtful touches (flowers, fresh fruit), and they were very responsive! We loved listening the the wildlife and sitting on the patio as the sun went down with the glow of the lava in the distance. Hilo itself was very quaint and we loved seeing the stars on Mauna Kea.
Diana and Landon's place was so cute and charming, we had a great stay!
This place is the best near Hilo and the Volcano's .. great price and perfect space.

Amazing bungalow! incredibly clean and spacious. Diane was incredibly nice and even helped us wash a load of laundry. The room was very large and all amenities were provided. Shower and bathroom were large and spotless clean. amazing location, can see pele's glow from the front yard. Highly recommended!

Quaint little bungalow outside of Hilo. Beach chairs and towels were a nice touch, as well as the coffee. However NO AC and it gets very hot inside. Simple, clean, safe, but not much to in the surrounding area.
Awesome little place. Private, spacious, and homey. Felt like a little retreat.

A cute cottage that was very clean and quiet. There is a coffee maker and DVD player. It did get warm when we were there, so we were thankful for the extra fan. It is about 20 minutes south of Hilo in good traffic, but leaving in the morning was difficult and time consuming with the commuters on the only road into town. Just make sure you leave extra time. It was worth it to have peace and quiet with nature at night.
highly recommend!!
Cute and comfy place. Everything you need.  Instructions were easy and communication were good with the host. Very clean.
Woodsy locale, nice privacy, some barking dogs and kokee frog chirps through the night. Take a walking stick if you venture down the road as there are some threatening dogs on the loose!

Diana was a great host! The communication was great, so was our brief meet. (Even though it was late at night). 
Everything was perfect: room was spotless and thoughtfully decorated, the fruits provided was a highlight because they were delicious! Only wish we could stay a few more nights!

Das Apartment war wie beschrieben: idyllisch im Grünen gelegen und mit viel Liebe zum Detail eingerichtet. Alles war sehr sauber, die kleine Kaffeeaschine und der Minikühlschrank ermöglichten ed, morgens den Sonnenaufgang bei einem Kaffee und Snacks zu genießen. Diana war immer ansprechbar und hat sofort auf meine Anliegen reagiert. Als Ausgangspunkt für Ausflüge auf der Hiloseite ideal.

Experience in the bungalow is wonderful. It's quiet and mattress is conformable, and we feel closer to the nature. It's close to kilo and quite convenient to go to national park and MK. Definitely would like to come again
Amazing and relaxing! Great hosts and hope to be back soon
Great place!! Probably the best Air BnB we’ve ever stayed at because both the apartment and the hosts were so lovely. We definitely can recommend this magic place...
We thoroughly enjoyed our one-night stay at Diana's cozy cottage. The space is super comfortable, and Diana is a great host providing all sorts of thoughtful touches.
非常漂亮的房间｡我非常的喜欢｡非常干净､舒适､装扮的很漂亮｡还为我们准备了鲜花水果｡入住之前提供了非常多的旅行信息以及建议｡非常感谢｡希望下次我还有机会可以入住｡
Absolutely beautiful guesthouse located in an amazing location

Diana and Lando were great! Lando came by to check up on us and give us some Maui tips since we were driving Road to Hana the next day. The place was clean and spacious and very convenient to the beach and local restaurants.

The bungalow had everything we needed to make the most of our time.  The location was great for providing a feeling of being far out amongst the natural surroundings yet conveniently located to town and other amenities.

This place was perfect!  The bungalow is adorable and filled with thoughtful touches from Diana.  We were even greeted with fresh fruit from their garden that was delicious!  Diana and Lando were so friendly, helpful, and hospitable and we ended up spending some time with them getting to know them- both so lovely and welcoming!  The bungalow itself is also perfect, very remote in your own little jungle oasis and extremely peaceful.  About 10 min drive to some nice local restaurants.  Would definitely stay again!
Adequate and peaceful. Good choice for visiting Hilo area.

Diana was hospitable from the get go. We felt welcomed and comfortable staying on her property while we explored the Hilo side for a few days. She was very responsive when we needed to reach her. And also provided us with ample information for sightseeing.

The amenities provided were exactly what we needed for our short stay. She even provided beach towels, a beach mat, and snorkel gear! It did not get hot enough at night to require AC, and there's a ceiling fan which cooled down the space quickly. The coquis frogs add a jungle-like ambiance, which was weird at first, but became comfortable white noise after awhile. There is enough space for parking in front of the bungalow.

The host is very friendly and greeted us in a proper way. They sent us a list of the sightseeings and also recommended us many restaurants. 

They also provided us with their organic fruits which are super delicious! 

The place is clean and safe, and you can see the stars above your head at night in the garden.
場所はわかりづらくて森の中ですが部屋とﾎｽﾄの方の対応は素晴らしかったです｡
Excellent, quiet location with great value for money. Enjoyed the fruits and water bottles provided and appreciated the quick responses and detailed information on the area
Outstanding. Exceeded expectations. Great value. Peaceful and clean. Diana was very communicative and helpful. Would visit again!
the place is super clean; furniture and decor are very elegant (also comfy bed). it's within a nice and secluded garden. overall,  great experience.

Diana was a great host. She was very responsive in messages and gave us a lot of good suggestions of restaurants and places to visit. The room is very clean with fruits and coffee provided. Would highly recommend you to stay here if you are on the Hilo side!
Diana was such a great host- giving us plenty of incredible local tips and was super friendly and engaging. Great stay!
Diana's place was a beautiful place to stay, it is pretty close to Hilo downtown and Volcanoes national Park . We enjoyed the thoughtfully decorated place, fruits and flowers on the patio !

While we only stayed at Diana and Lando's place for a quick overnighter, we were so pleased! It was sparkling clean, comfortable, and very affordable. Diana is very kind and gave us such a warm welcome. Would 100% recommend to anyone staying in Hilo, and would definitely book again for any future visits.
Nice place. Won’t regret.
Quiet and comfortable.

This place is very cute and clean.  Loved the space that was offered and the the little added special touches as a greeting card when we arrived along with fresh fruit, Coffee and Tea. Mahalo for everything!
Diana and Lando’s place is very nice!!! It’s clean, tidy and beautiful. I really enjoy staying in their place and they also gave us a lot of advices on trips!!! I really enjoy staying in their place!
A really Tip-Top place.  Very impressed for our first AirBnB.
We loved staying at Diana‘s and Lando‘s place! Everything is just perfect! Great location, wonderful bungalow, amazing host! We can’t wait to come back! Mahalo!

I am a lucky person! This is a beautiful and unusual place. Location is so romantic. The home surrounded by gardens full of green. It was an unforgettable experience and the relax time. Plus, Diana and Lando’s kindness is perfect. They are friendly and provide fruites, cool waters, everything guests need.
Thanks Diana and Lando:)
We loved our 1 night stay at Diana and Lando's place. It was comfortable, clean and they were very easy to communicate with. Will definitely consider coming back when on Hawaiʻi island again.

I had a fantastic time on this island and our hosts were  very welcoming. 

Their place is a little paradise. 
I will return
The host was very enthusiastic, gave us a lot of travel information, and prepared fruit for us, we have a good experience ,just like in our own home.
Great place! Beautiful surroundings made my stay very peaceful and relaxing. Check-in was easy and I had no troubles accessing the place. Very clean! Would definitely stay here again!

Great little bungalow perfect for a couple or a family group combined with the unit next door.  Very clean and relaxing space, was nice listening to the birds come to life at night while sitting on the patio.  Hosts were very responsive and provided fresh fruits which were delicious. Great tips given for sight seeing, wish we had stayed longer than 1 night on the big island. 
Mattress needs a little breaking in but  otherwise fantastic & affordable.
Very clean well furnished little bungalow. Quick response and easy handling. A bit remote for us but for nature lovers a very top location.

Everything was perfect. We enjoyed our stay, it felt like home. Beautiful place and very cozy. Very clean and beautiful equipped Place. The neighborhood is very quiet. We recommend this Place 100%. When we will return to Big Island one day this will be our place to stay at again. 

Mahalo

Alessandro&Chiara

The place is spacious, stylish and very clean! Quiet at night. The papaya fruits the host provided are the best papaya we ever tasted! They responded my messages quickly. They also provided lots of helpful local travle tips. Extradinary service!
Close to the hilo. The bungalow is very clean and snorkeling equipment was really useful. She was very very kind. thanks for everything : ) If I come back to Hawaii Island i want to stay here again.

This place was fantastic! The location was a dream. So secluded and private, but still just a quick drive to anything you might find you need. 

Also, the bed was so comfy!
A tidy, spacious, and lovely place to stay. Perfect retreat style environment with soothing sounds of frogs and nature. Highly recommend staying here!
Wonderful little bungalow with great hosts!

Hospitality was really amazing, I would visit their place again. Fresh fruits kept inside the house was something extra special :-)
Note to future travelers, it can get cold here late in the night(so be prepared) and there are few mosquitoes in the house(they provided a mosquito repellent on request).

Diana & Lindo's place was awesome.  Starting with the location and on to the delicious papaya& bananas awaiting us , along with beautiful flowers.  The bed was very comfortable and we had a large choice of dvd's to watch.  Gav was an outstanding co-host and left us a very sweet note and was also totally on top of everything.  Should we return to the area, we will definitely check for availability for a future booking.
Sparkling clean, beautiful property, great communication!
Very nice place
Clean, peaceful, tropical, and perfect for two!

name: Art deco apartment in Bondi
summary: Relax in this private and peaceful unit which contains everything you need. Located halfway between the famous Bondi beach and gorgeous Tamarama.   In a quiet street, moments away from all amenities: shops, cafes, restaurants and public transports.
description: Relax in this private and peaceful unit which contains everything you need. Located halfway between the famous Bondi beach and gorgeous Tamarama.   In a quiet street, moments away from all amenities: shops, cafes, restaurants and public transports.
house_rules: Guests are expected to keep the place neat, tidy and clean. Please do not wear shoes in the house.

reviews.comments: Every thing was good, we asked for a latter check out and she had no problem!

name: Studio Paisible - Petite Italie
summary: Studio fraichement renove, bois flottant, console de jeux xbox one s , tv plasma. Metro Decastelneau et Beaubien a proximité, épicerie, buanderie. Check in at any time.
description: Studio fraichement renove, bois flottant, console de jeux xbox one s , tv plasma. Metro Decastelneau et Beaubien a proximité, épicerie, buanderie. Check in at any time.
house_rules: Aucune fete, no smoking. Check in at any time.

name: Porto Almada Story Apt Blue by Porto City Hosts
summary: Situated in Porto, a 3-minute walk of Paris Galleries Street. Complimentary WiFi is featured throughout the property. All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available in the kitchenette, as well as a coffee machine. Popular points of interest near the apartment include City Market Bolhao, Clerigos Tower and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 11 km from Porto Almada Story Apartments.
space: Porto Almada Story Blue is a fully equipped apartment, located right in the heart of Porto. All the apartment is very comfortable, practical and modern. Its kitchen has all the regular electrical appliances (microwave, laundry and dish washer) and it also includes a delta coffee machine. It is perfect for a quick breakfast but also for long and more elaborated meals, prepared with local products that can easily be found in the nearby delis and traditional grocery stores. The main room has been separated into two different areas: the living-room, with a nice bed-sofa and cable tv with international channels; and the bedroom, which has a closet, and a bed.
description: Situated in Porto, a 3-minute walk of Paris Galleries Street. Complimentary WiFi is featured throughout the property. All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available in the kitchenette, as well as a coffee machine. Popular points of interest near the apartment include City Market Bolhao, Clerigos Tower and Oporto Coliseum. The nearest airport is Porto Airport, 11 km from Porto Almada Story Apartments. Porto Almada Story Blue is a fully equipped apartment, located right in the heart of Porto. All the apartment is very comfortable, practical and modern. It is perfect for a quick breakfast but also for long and more elaborated meals, prepared with local products that can easily be found in the nearby delis and traditional grocery stores. The main room has been separated into two different are
neighborhood_overview: All the important monuments, squares and picturesque places of the city can be found within walking distance: Lello Bookstore, Clérigos tower, Bolhão traditional market, Rua das Flores, Rua Sta. Catarina, Capela das Almas, and Porto typical narrow streets.  The riverside, Ribeira, one of the most beautiful and colorful areas of the city, is 15 min away. From there you can cross the Luís Bridge to Gaia, where you'll have the best view of Porto. Also, that's where all Port Wine cellars (which do tours and wine tastings) are based. Only 10 min away from the apartment you can also find the trendiest night spot, with all sorts of bars and restaurants.
notes: We appreciate your cooperation to make your stay more enjoyable: - We all have an environmental concern. Please help by turning off lights, air conditioning and other electrical appliances before leaving home. - To maintain a calm environment and show respect and consideration for our other guests and neighbors, we hope you will avoid making noise especially after 10 o'clock. Avoid using portable speakers and amplifiers. - In case of being smoker, we regret, but smoking is not allowed inside the house. Please use the balcony for this purpose.
transit: Aliados metro station is next to the apartment. Bus stops and taxis are also very close by, but once again most points of interest can be found within walking distance.
access: Guests have access to all the amenities of the apartment with complete privacy.
interaction: The Porto City Hosts team is always available to assist and help you have a lovely stay.
house_rules: We would like to inform our guests that we can provide: - Breakfast in the apartment for an additional cost of  8€ - Transfer from/ to the Airport by 25€ (up to 4 people) or 45€ (up to 8 people) - City Tours  - Douro Valley Tours  Property Rules: -Every guest is required to provide a valid credit card number, expiration date and cvc number at the time the reservation is requested. The credit card will be used to guarantee payment for any incidentals or charges not previewed in the reservation -You can drop your luggage at our downtown office, next to Aliados metro station from 9am to 6pm, subject to prior information. -Towels and sheets are included for your stay. The change of towels and sheets is free for bookings of more than 8 per day. -Extra cleaning is available upon prior request, at the rate of cleaning fee. -Toilet amenities will be provided for the first 3 days of the stay. -Extra towels are available on request for an extra fee of 3€ per set of towels per person. -Please als

host.host_about:
Porto City Hosts is a professional tourism management team. All our collaborators are committed Porto citizens who welcome the guests with professional quality and local charm. We make guests feel well accompanied during their stay and we help them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences.
 We are also passionate about travel and new places! We like to know new cultures, landscapes, palates and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, to share new sensations with our suggestions, lived in the first person.
 There are walks by the sea, or boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river, walks through the old streets of Oporto. You can listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, where the Harry Potter writer was inspired, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat francesinha, tripas à moda do Porto, bacalhau or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the Port wine.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Excelente ubicación y atención del anfitrión! El piso esta tal cual como aparece en las fotos, volvería sin duda!
Apartamento muito agradável e estiloso. Tudo funcionando direitinho. Bom para dois hóspedes.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: The apartment is great, and I'd say it's bigger than what it looks on the pictures. Everything was clean, the bed is really comfortable, and the water pressure in the shower is great (that's kind of an important thing for me). The location is perfect, close to most tourist destinations, to lots of cafes and restaurants, and 1 minute away from the Aliados metro station. I recommend the apartment to anyone who wants to enjoy Porto!

name: Rob's Beach Terrace
summary: Across the road from Cronulla  Golf Club and with a 300m walk to Elouera beach, this 3 bedroom house will be the perfect weekender for families with kids or groups of adults. MUST BE A MINIMUM OF 2 NIGHTS.
description: Across the road from Cronulla  Golf Club and with a 300m walk to Elouera beach, this 3 bedroom house will be the perfect weekender for families with kids or groups of adults. MUST BE A MINIMUM OF 2 NIGHTS. Walk to Cronulla Central and enjoy cafes, bars, restaurants and boutique shopping. Cronulla train station and ferry to Bundeena all within a 5 minute walk.
transit: Walk to Cronulla Central and enjoy cafes, bars, restaurants and boutique shopping. Cronulla train station and ferry to Bundeena all within a 5 minute walk.

reviews.comments: This is a great place with plenty of space. If you had a family then this would be awesome
Great place to stay in cronulla.
Very comfortable, close to beach and shops and entertainment. Had a very enjoyable stay and Robert was very helpful and flexible host.
Great place to stay

Perfect Location, close to the beach with a great Golf club across the road. The accommodation is very comfortable and very spacious and nicely decorated. It was great to have a secure garage for parking too.  It fulfilled our expectations and the owner is a great guy. We highly recommend this listing....
Great location, friendly service and comfortable accomodation!
Would highly recommend, Rob and his place were both Great!
Rob's house is such a wonderful place, clean, comfortable and we all loved it! Highly recommended:) Rob is a very nice guy, we all like him a lot! we will definitely come back!!!
Perfect location. Apartment was great clean & better than what we expected. Rob the host was relaxed& was a pleasure to deal with. Nothing too much trouble
Close to beach, shops with outside space, clean, friendly and welcoming host. Great for families and kids ( there are stairs) but didn't affect us. All round 5 stars
Roberts Place was great for our whole family...house was clean and close enough for a stroll into Cronulla mall for coffee or food. Will defiantly stay again if the family heads back to Cronulla
Good location. Value for money if you're staying for at least 2 nights.
Rob's place is definitely a awesome gem! Great location and an even better host. Will definitely recommend Rob's place for others to visit. Thank you for making our visit to Sydney an awesome one.
Robert is a wonderful host, central location, clean and very homely

Robs home is conveniently located only minutes from the local beaches, shopping and dining district. His home can fit 2 young families.  The home was clean and Rob was a great communicater and made our family's Cronulla experience a very memorable one. We will definately be coming back.
Great place to stay, excellent location. Would stay again.

Great stay, easy access to mall and sports club and across the road was the amazing takeaways awesome seafood platters!  Will definetly stay there again. Rob was the perfect host, welcoming and helpful.
Great location - close to beach & shops. Robert communicated well with us as we checked in late after a long drive. Would definitely stay again.

Great house for 2 families - very roomy with 2 bathrooms upstairs and bonus bathroom downstairs. Awesome location. Easy walk to Shark Park for footy and along the beach to Cronulla. Great takeaway and golf club bistro just across the road was very convenient. Rob's excellent communication made the whole process so easy. Highly recommended, would love to stay again. Thanks again Rob
Excellent location good size,made feel very welcome
Rob was a brilliant host and the place was spotless with so much space. It had everything we needed and close to all the local hot spots. We had a wonderful time and would highly recommend.
A great location but comes with very noisy traffic as it is on a round about on a main road.

Robert is a great host, he was very friendly and made sure we had everything we needed (towels, linen wifi ect). The home is great, sleeps a lot of people and has good common areas. It's very clean and neat! It is close to cafes, nightlife and the beach is so close we walked almost everywhere. The area is safe and there is space for cars. Value for money! Would definitely book again! Thanks!

Robert's place was absolutely amazing, it was everything that we imagined. It is in the perfect location for wondering into Cronulla for cafes and shopping, plus only a short walk to the beach. I would highly recommend Roberts home for your next stay.

Robert is a great host - super friendly and accommodating.  His house is perfect  for a large group - lots of beds, bathrooms and living space and really close to the beach and Cronulla shopping centre, restauraunts, train etc.

Would highly recommend and if we're back in Sydney, we'll be looking Robert up!

Thanks Robert for a lovely stay!
Great place, local to everything you need and very homely. The perfect place for our weekend away.

Rob was friendly and so welcoming when we arrived! He gave us tips about the local places to eat and explained everything well.

His place was immaculate and spacious for our family. It's central to a lot of good spots in Cronulla and easily found. No problem getting meals delivered there. 

We'd happily stay again!

Location, location, location.  This place is an attached, two-story condo on the beach block. It's walking distance to the train into Sydney and downtown Cronulla. The neighborhood is safe and the "take-away" place across the street does great "long black" coffee.  

Robert, a great host, welcomed me, my husband and 3 small daughters warmly and we had a WONDERFUL time.
Good location close to the beach.
Great warm place, close to beach and restaurants.

Fantastic location - short walk to the beach and not much further to the shops and many restaurants. Comfortable and clean with a good array of kitchen equipment if you do want to cook. Very comfortable beds. Perfect for a short stay. Railway station within walking distance too.
Rob’s Place was great for our group of friends. Walking distance to the beach and close to bars and shops. He was flexible and easy to communicate with. Very accommodating!
We really enjoyed our stay at Robert’s beach house. Near beach, comfortable and a gracious very helpful host. We will certainly return for more boogie boarding and swims in the ocean pool.
Robert is a great host. Beautiful and clean townhouse. Just walking distance to the beach. Would stay there again.

Excellent location, walking distance to Elouera Beach and a short stroll to Cronulla shops.  Convenience of milk bar, take away food and golf club bistro just across the road. 

Very tidy and functional house, great for families or group.  

Rob is a friendly host who is quick to respond to questions.
Clean and Comfortable great location, suited our requirements.  Thanks for having us.
Clean simple and comfortable. Just what we needed.

Nice place, only downside noisy traffic, no air-con and blinds in bedrooms
Rob is a fantastic bloke and really enjoyed our stay very accomdating

Rob's place is situated close to the beach, take away store and a golf club - making it extremely convenient to travel around cronulla. 

There was plenty of space and the place was neat and tidy. The house was a little hot (it was a >30 degree weekend) but Rob did provide a number of fans to ease the heat discomfort.
Good position wouldn’t recommend staying in summer as it gets very hot but great location and host
Excellent 3 bedroom townhouse with plenty of room and having 3 showers to access was great. location was perfect with very short drive or walks to everything you need in Cronulla
Great location, very clean. Rob was a great host - very flexible and accommodating. Thanks for a great saty!
Robert was a great Host. Communication was great, check in easy. Spare bedding came in handy, and the accommodation was clean, tidy & as described. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend.
Clean, tidy, home close to the best parts of Cronulla. Thank you Robert for opening your home to us.
Great communication and easy check in. The house had everything we needed and was clean and comfortable. Having 3 bathrooms was handy for two families.

A perfect location, central to beach, shops and eateries.
A little loud at nights with some traffic but very comfortable stay with it been clean and tidy and well looked after.
Great location - diagonally opposite Golf Club. Only about 1k to Cronulla Leagues Club in one direction and Main Street of Cronulla in the other direction. Nice clean unit with everything you need.
Enjoyed our stay rob was a such an accomodating host and the pictures don’t do the accommodation justice. A really fantastic stay we hope to come back.
Great place for a larger group
Perfect location and very comfortable
Robs place is the perfect home away from home   I  would recommend a stay at Robs place to everyone
Perfect spot, spotless, easy check in and a block from the beach. Will definitely be back!
Great house, fit 5 adults with plenty of extra space (and beds). 3 bathrooms was very handy! the no aircon wasn’t much of an issue as Rob set up fans in all rooms for us!
Convenient location, very clean and good size rooms. Highly recommended.

Very clean and tidy place, fabulous location near gold club and beach. Amazing coffee/breakfast spot at elouera SLSC 
Rob was a very relaxed and friendly host. 
No breakfast or tea/coffee supplied. 
Thanks rob.

Great location.
Lots of room.
Very clean and well presented.
Rob was a fantastic host. The place was neat and tidy and had everything that we needed. The location is great, a quick walk to the beach and only 15 or so minutes from Cronulla.
Amazing location so close to the beach! The house was clean, very comfortable and had everything we needed.
Roberts place was a great place to stay! Great location great communication. Can’t recommend him highly enough
Great house and location really close to the beach and walking distance to the shops and cafes. Rob was a great host.
Classic beach house at a great beach!  Beach is 1 block away.  Clean inside.
Great location and customer service from Robert! Lovely place with all the perks, easy to stay 8 without any issues.
Roberts place is in a great position and great for large groups or family’s

name: Great 1 Bedroom Apt /Private Rooftop, Sai Ying Pun
summary: Next to Sai Ying Pun MTR and the tram, located between Kennedy Town & Central in a bustling up and coming neighbourhood of HK. Amenities are all around + bars, cafés, restaurants and parks.  We are within minutes on foot to Sheung Wan & Soho. Our place comes fully furnished with a washing machine and everything you need to cook, small oven. One important thing: 8 floor walk-up building no lift but don't worry, you can get on it! We have. An excellent deal for the location and access to HK life!
space: Bright and furnished apartment - great urban and expansive view! Private rooftop with plants ideal for dinners with friends that can easily accommodate a party of 8/10 people around the table.
description: Next to Sai Ying Pun MTR and the tram, located between Kennedy Town & Central in a bustling up and coming neighbourhood of HK. Amenities are all around + bars, cafés, restaurants and parks.  We are within minutes on foot to Sheung Wan & Soho. Our place comes fully furnished with a washing machine and everything you need to cook, small oven. One important thing: 8 floor walk-up building no lift but don't worry, you can get on it! We have. An excellent deal for the location and access to HK life! Bright and furnished apartment - great urban and expansive view! Private rooftop with plants ideal for dinners with friends that can easily accommodate a party of 8/10 people around the table. Access to all the apartment except one room. For further info and once settled, our guests can quite easily reach out to us by email. We respond immediately. Sai Ying Pun is the new hotbed of the urban cool after sunset! Sai Ying Pun MTR station / Exit B 3, one flight of stairs down from our building.
neighborhood_overview: Sai Ying Pun is the new hotbed of the urban cool after sunset!
transit: Sai Ying Pun MTR station / Exit B 3, one flight of stairs down from our building.
access: Access to all the apartment except one room.
interaction: For further info and once settled, our guests can quite easily reach out to us by email. We respond immediately.

host.host_about: Sly Guy EU expat in HK, news junkie, media stuff and the like, writer/reporter, passionate diver and traveler

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: I had a great stay here, the place is clean and convenient, and check-in/out was smooth and easy. Would definitely recommend Sly's flat to anyone looking to spend time on the island.
The flat is spacious and very nice. Host was very comunicative. Rooftop space is amazing.
Great rooftop.
It was nice and comfortable during the stays in his house.:) we felt like our home.and  then nice location.!!! Just 1mins needed to metro.!   Rooftop is very good.

Sly's apartment is an excellent hub for exploring Hong Kong - very well located right next to an MTR stop and close to all that is happening in Central/Soho.  The apartment comfortably fit 3 people, although groups of more than 2 should be aware the hot water runs out quickly, so plan accordingly.

Good value for a flat on Hong Kong Island. Be sure you’re prepared for the 8-floor walk-up; it can be quite a haul after a long day, or with luggage or shopping in tow. The owner is very communicative and gave excellent suggestions for things to do in the neighbourhood. The rooftop patio is great for chilling out after a long day being a tourist. Also, HK flats are small - and this one is no exception. We were a bit uncomfortable there with three people, but it would be much better for a couple. MTR is incredibly close and convenient.

Appartement très bien situé , coller à la station de métro donc déplacement très facile. Emplacement dans Hong Kong plutôt calme avec la terrasse sur le toit qui fait toute la différence de cette appartement propre et pratique. 
Accueil très sympa et personnalisé. Le propriétaire m’a laissé utiliser les murs de la terrasse pour peindre. Très contant merci encore
Place is amazing, definitely worth climbing  up 8 flights of stairs. 100% would recommend.

This flat is right on the metro line which is ideal for traveling around HK! We were greeted by a bottle of wine and Julianne, who dealt quickly with any and all questions. The flat is spacious and quiet with good AC and a nice kitchen space...we cooked a lot! Many street markets nearby with food and also Welcome grocery store, McDonald's, Circle K, if you need. Highly recommend. We loved our time here. Oh...and the rooftop patio is amazing!!

Sly house is very clean and comfy, what you see is what you get. everything is smooth apart from the check in process since the official check in time should be 3pm, Sly said it may not be ready yet so I proposed to get there at 5pm. but there maybe some communication mistakes, end up I get there 8pm. But everything is fine, and I enjoy my stay.
Très bon séjour chez sly : bonne communication et bonne réactivité, appartement charmant et propre, et emplacement central. Un petit plus pour les belles fleurs fraîches!
홍콩에서의 가격대비 위치와 시설은 괜찮았습니다. 하지만 8층에 위치하면서 빌딩에 엘리베이터가 없어서 하루의 마지막에 조금 힘드실 수 있습니다.

Our stay at Sly’s place was excellent. 
It’s a really great location, right next to the MRT as well as some great restaurants/ bars. 
Clean and comfortable it was overall a really great spot. 
You have been warned about the stairs. I won’t lie to you they take a bit of getting used to, but, after a couple of days they are not quite so daunting.

Sly’s place is great! Very convenient location. Sly is wonderful at communication and gave some great tips! We were greeted with a beautiful bouquet of lilies that made the apartment smell fantastic! The stairs can be brutal, but that’s part of its charm! Also, reminder that there isn’t WiFi, no big deal if you have a HK sim :)

name: ★ Bright Sydney CBD Studio Apt With Seaview 108B★
summary: Amazing modern apartment in the heart of Sydney CBD. Freshly painted and recently furnished. Most of the items brand new. Be one of the first to enjoy our brilliant apartment with your family or friends.

Be one of the first to enjoy our brilliant apartment with your family or friends. neighborhood_overview: Located centrally, bus stop almost to all destinations if at the doorstep. One of the biggest train stations, Town Hall station is only 5 mins walking distance. This particular apartment block is strategically located for Travellers, Families or Business People. Major tourist destinations Circular quay, Opera House and Harbour Bridge is only 10-12 mins walking distance. Vibrant Darling Harbour is located in, literally 3 mins walking distance.  Darling Harbour offers many famous and amazing restaurants and bars. Town Hall Train Station is only 5 mins walking distance. We are in the middle of every big and small events and "actions" of Sydney City
notes: We manage many Airbnb properties in the best locations around Sydney city area. Very flexible with check in and checkout times. All the locations have storage areas so early drop off the luggage and storing luggage till late is not problem at all. (Free luggage storage to save the hassle of carrying around). We have a team who is available for 24 hours so no risk of staying without assistance if emergencies happen. If requested cleaning and towels, sheets change can be arranged for a small fee. We use services of high quality bed linen, sheets and towel supplier. So fresh and and extremely clean beddings and towels guaranteed. We can arrange self check in or in person check in. Trying to keep standards up high and provide ultimate hotel like experience in our apartments.  Parking is Available for a fee
transit: Getting around is very easy, because we are located centrally and town hall is 3 mins walking distance. From Town Hall guests can go anywhere in Sydney easily and come to Town Hall from anywhere easily. The neighbourhood is very safe and very entertaining. All the famous restaurants and best clubs of Sydney city in walking distance. Bus stop at the doorstep. Moreover, Queen Victoria Building which attracts millions of people yearly is just few minutes walking away. LOCATION - Cockle Bay Wharf (Darling Harbour) - 2min walk - The Star Casino - 10min walk - SEA LIFE Sydney Aquarium - 5min walk - Mid City Shopping Centre - 5min walk - Circular Quay - 15min walk - Circular Quay Train Station -15min walk - Wynyard Train Station – 10min walk - The Rocks - 15min walk - Martin Place Train Station – 10min walk - Westfield Sydney - 10min walk - Pitt St Mall – 10-12min walk - Sydney Harbour Bridge – 15min walk - Sydney Tower Eye – 10min walk - Town Hall Train Station - 5min walk - Sydney Opera Hou
access: The entire apartment is accessible for the guests.  The building has a pool and Gym Parking is available for a fee
interaction: Dear guests, I treat my guests as GUESTS and friends. I'm available to help if you need and I also live in Sydney Cit
house_rules: Please treat my home as your own.

host.host_about: I love what I do! Meeting new people and making them happy is one of the best experiences in this life. That's why I'm doing my best to be helpful to all guests and assist with anything I can. Welcome to best experience

reviews.comments: My daughter and her friends stayed at Danny's place. Great location, easy check in and check out. Spacious for the group of friends!

This unit was perfect. Great size, brilliant location,  eateries close by, Darling Harbour just a stroll. Massive amount of storage and space in each room, comfy beds, great view. Would definitely stay there again.
condition is not bad just some cockroach position quite good ez to the ferry and to qvb just 15 min walk.Owner pretty good.
The location is really great , walk diatance to harbor bridge and also shopa in center !
Perfect location in Sydney's CBD with great views to both the Darling Harbour and SYD's skyline. Spacious and great for small groups up to 7-8 people. We all of us (6) really enjoyed our stay there!

Danny's house is in a great location! My family and I am able to walk to everywhere! It is only three minutes away from darling habour, we can also have a view of darling ha our from balcony!
All of my family are satisfied with this house and we will definitely choose to live here again when we comes to Sydney next time!

Danny was great in accommodating to poor organiseation on my part and allowing us to drop our bags off early, and we were greeted by his brother. Danny's place was super convenient for a few of us staying in the city, however it is in a serious state of disrepair, including bathroom tap, shower doors, wardrobe doors, balcony doors etc. we're all broken in some way. Furniture was of low quality you could feel it, especially the beds. Just seemed like basic cheap furniture, compared to other Airbnbs I have stayed at, the quality of this was poor. Despite the great location and affordable price, myself and the other guests probably would not stay there again.
great place, great location !!
Danny's place is really nice and bigger than I expected for a city apartment. It was a great location and close to Darling Harbour. Would recommend to stay here.
Great location, clean, comfortable and spacious
Great place in an awesome location. Good value for money.
Such a nice apartment,very comfortable and very convenient,Denny  is a good host, we enjoyed our stay
My Daughter and her friends stayed  one night  at Dannys place, they like it. The place is clean, located in a good area.
Danny is very accommodating. Location is perfect.

Awesome location. So central to everything! No parking but there's a parking station about six doors down and the weekend rates are great! The bedrooms were huge and the beds comfy. I didn't realise there were 3 bathrooms also. We didn't stay in the apartment long but it was really comfortable when we were there. Thanks for having us!
nice apartment. has 3 room. easy walking to everywhere. it is easy to communication with Danny, and he will give you the good suggestion.
Great value as a business apartment for 2-3 visitors
All good.

A great apartment in a central location, close to shops, nightlife and walking distance or quick cab to Cirqular Quay and Darling Harbour. The pictures don't do enough justice - the apartment is really spacious with the added bonus of three bathrooms, which is great for a group! Danny was a very accommodating host and I would definitely recommend this as a great place to stay.

Great location.
Walked 5 mins one way to Darling Harbour. Five mins the other way to Queen Vic Building/ Pitt st shops.
Danny easy to deal with. Gave us early check in.

Danny's apartment was good value - located just a short walk to Darling Harbour and with great views.  It was clean, comfortable and just what we needed for our quick visit to Sydney.  Danny was helpful and communicative from the very beginning of our booking. Many thanks!

Danny's place is very well placed for access to Darling Harbour, Barangaroo and Circular Quay. Hotel level amenities were provided. However, we had difficulty connecting to the wifi and the TV only seemed to work sometimes, so don't stay here if they are necessities for you. Views are outstanding, but city noise can disturb light sleepers.

The apartment is furnished in a very old way and is in some need for repair/refurbishment. The lobby and gym/pool, however, are new and excellent.

Dannys apartment was in the perfect location. Everything on your doorstep. Very spacious apartment, great for girls weekend with 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and lots of wardrobe space. The apartment is a bit tired and could do with some improvements in some places but overall great. Danny was an excellent host. Any queries were answered and dealt with immediately. He also allowed us a late check out. So thank you Danny and see you next time!!

Great Location! Great pool to swim laps! Nice and big apartment! The only concern was that we were 7 friends with slightly different agendas and we were provided with only 2 keys. Other than that, great stay.
Grate host, we didn't have WiFi when we arrived, but he solved the probelm right away by setting up a new modem.
Location was good

Good location, walking distance to China Town, Sydney Opera House, Darling Harbour. Host is nice and helpful. But unfortunately the air conditioner, oven and parts of the stove not work during our stay. Hope host can fix them soon as to bring the best experience to guests. Not bad experience at all.

The apartment is large and suited our family of 6. Danny was a great host and allowed us to leave our bags in the room after checkout time. Some of the apartment was renovated and new but other areas like carpets and kitchen were pretty tired.
Very good location and view of Darling Harbour, easily to reach everyplace in CBD. Danny is so nice to arrange everything, here should be your good choice.
Great apartment in a great location, exactly what we needed for family weekend in Sydney.
Great location to the ICC and the city.  Perfect space for a group of girls travelling. The unit is spacious and beds are comfortable.  Danny is a good host.
Great location in the city, lots of space for everybody& plenty of bathrooms to make your stay easy. Fantastic inner city views. Very clean & comfy beds.

Comfortable and clean apartment, with easy access to famous spots in downtown.  although couldn't see Sydney theatre from the balcony, it's quite near. 

Looking forward to come back to Danny 's place again.
Great central spot with 3 large rooms , no parking in the apartment complex but there's public parking just down the road.
Central location, great views!
nice view!
Great place, great location. Danny was very nice, we would defend come back
Great sized apartment with exceptional views and in a good area. Very comfortable and close to entertainment and public transport etc
Great place in great location. Thanks for hosting us Danny.

Great central location. So easy to get to. We walked all weekend all around the city. View from balcony seemed even better than the pictures! Good beds , linen & fluffy towels. We wished we had another day so we had time to use the pool, spa & sauna. All in all a great place to stay

Very well located and close to darling harbour. The home is spacious enough for 2 families with 3 kids. Danny is responsive and even managed to loan us a travel adaptor after I told him we did not bring any. Will love to visit again.

great location for our family to explore inner sydney plenty of room for us and our three kids. pool and spa down stairs was great option for them swell to burn some energy. few nigly things wifi did not work in lounge area and tv reception average at times. other wise great option for big family of group of friends. good fridge, oven, microwave and washer.
Great location. Close to public transport and a small walk to Darling Habour. Host was very accomodating.

I would highly recomend this property for so many reasons, location, stunning views, cleanliness, comfort, attention to detail, not just one deep bath but 2. Great gym, swimming pool and spa facilities. I felt very spoilt being there and Danny was so attentive, helpful and kind, the perfect host.
Apartment as described. Great location, neat and tidy, great view from balcony. Fantastic.
Excellent location with main attractions minutes away. Good security as well and easy to find
Great, central location. Very spacious apartment. Only issue is that the washing machine did not work

Very convenient location, close to Sydney nightlife.
Nice view of Sydney harbour
Comfortable beds and nice amenities

Great location. Big, bright, spacious and comfortable apartment. Friendly host.
 Nice views.Perfect for families.
Basically a good place to stay
Nice apartment in a great city location. The building had an unexpected plumbing issue when we arrive but Danny organised another apartment for us immediately that suited our needs. A great host.
位置很好!出行方便!沟通及时!设施齐全!
房子床可以住六个人,非常宽敞
Nice location

Danny's place is very close to Darling Harbour and about 10-15 minutes walk to China town. There are a few convenience shops nearby and supermarkets are within 5-10 minutes walk. Food is not a problem at all as Nando's is right opposite of the road and there are cafes within 1-2 minutes walk. Despite being in a prime location, this apartment is located on a quiet street so sleep is not much of a problem. We are a family of 6 adults and 1 toddler and everyone enjoyed the stay.
Great location, and works for a group
Supreme location, fantastic view!
Great location. Very central. Really spacious apt

Great location and nice, clean apartment, the pool, spa and sauna are a great bonus. We visited for the Sydney marathon and so wanted to do some home cooking, the kitchen was moderately equipped and not fully set up for 6 guests to cook and have a big meal. It could be better equipped for this but there was enough to make do and given how many restaurants and cafes there are in the local area, it was not much of a problem.

Danny's place was perfect for the one night before our cruise. It is very close to harbour and easy to get to!
Checkin was good and communication good. 
I would stay here again.
The location is Very easy to find ,and very convenient to tourist attractions .
Place was okay .

Danny was a very good communicator who ensured our needs were met.

His accommodation was in a fantastic location, very accessible to Darling Harbour.

Our family loved Sydney and Danny’s apartment location made it very easy to see all of the iconic spots offered along Darling Harbour and Circular Quay.

We didn’t end up getting the place we booked via Danny because there was an issue with the toilet however Danny immediately helped relocate us to another one of his apartments and it was perfect!!! His response is speedy and he is very helpful.
Good location, close to ferries and restaurants and a short walk to Pitt St Mall. Rooms comfortable with everything you need.

Danny respond promptly and friendly. I didn't meet him in person and my friend checked in with Danny's accompany. The apartment is as same as the pictures while the decoration quite simple. Only problem is that ceiling of one bathroom leaked for the first two nights we stayed which caused some inconvenience. After contact Danny he fixed it, thank you Danny! The apartment is quite close to city center-- walk 7 minutes to QVB  and Westfield shopping center, 10 minutes walk to Hyde park and Sydney tower. Besides, opera house and harbour bridge also on the walking distance. We can easily see the harbour view from the balcony of Danny's apartment which is enjoyable. 
All in all, we glad found Danny's apartment and enjoy our stay.
Great location, good stay, couple of little things not repaired or maintained to the highest standard  but didn't really impact our stay
Great location, good size apartment for 5 adults. Danny provided a late check out in request. Thanks

This apartment was huge and in an excellent location.  You can walk to most major sites within 15 minutes. The TV and wifi worked really well and there were plenty of places nearby to buy food at restaurants and grocery stores. Danny was very nice and easy to communicate with. However, while this apartment can be a great value for a large group, it was a little rough around the edges. For example, the oven was caked with grease and there was an old carpet and doors on the balcony. Also, there were supplies to repair the drawer rollers in the bedroom. However, my 8 year old pulled a drawer out on her foot which took us to the ER for an afternoon so I'm thinking the repair hadn't been completed. Overall a good value and good apartment, but we found it to be a little less excellent than we expected.

Great location.
Easy access and good apartment
Great host and great apartment. Would highly recommend

Communication with Danny was great and we met his brother upon check in. Location is quite favourable to those like to walk everywhere. 20mins walk to fish market, sydney harbour or less than 10 mins walk to the Sydney tower, Westfield, QVB.... slightly outdated with the furnishing however since we only stayed for 2 nights so overall still acceptable.
This place was amazing, deceptively large floor plan, two balcony (city view, harbor view) just fantastic! Would look to book here again when next in Sydney.
Danny is very accommodating and the residents was lovely, clean and exactly as advertised.

Danny's 3 bedroom apartment was as describe on the website.  all of the necessary amenities were set up nicely.  the internet was hard to connect to unless in the bedrooms. but overall it was a great place to stay an in the best location.  Public transportation was very near and many sites to visit were within walking distance or by bus.  We enjoyed the ability to cook or go out to eat.  The apartment was stocked like home.  the availability of a washer and drying made it even more attractive.  Clean and set up great...

Great location, close to everything downtown. Could use a bit of a thorough cleaning and some extra utensils, however, it was close enough to walk pretty much everywhere you wanted to go down by the CBD, so it was a hit with our group!
Perfect location. Few minutes walk to Darling Harbour where Madam Tassaud, Sea Life and Safari is located. Sydney Tower is just around the corner. Loads of shopping places.
nice location!

We had a great stay at the apartment. The view was beautiful and the location was great. Danny was great about letting us leave our luggage in the apartment after check out until our flight that afternoon. Some small things such as scuff marks on walls and wardrobes/doors that dont work as well as they could. But everything was clean and it was good value for money so those little things were not an issue.
The place was very comfortable for our two couples and 2 year old! It was well located and had all the amenities we needed and a great view!
Good location.
Il fratello di Danny è stato molto gentile e ospitale, ottima posizione per visitare Sydney. Migliorerei la pulizia. Gentili nel farci mantenere le valigie dopo il check out.
Great central location would stay again

Danny and his brother's communication was perfect from the get-go ensuring my friends and I were able to check in very late at night. They were very attentive and helpful hosts. The apartment was HUGE!!! photos don't do it justice. Easily hosted a group of 7 guys with ease, with heaps of room to move around.
