Place was clean and we'll equipped, and made me forget that I was staying at an apartment and not a hotel. The location was also top notch, and a short walk to the ivy. For the price, location and the ability to sleep 8 comfortably, this place is a godsend!!!! Thanks Danny, will definitely be coming back.
Great central place to stay in the city.

The place was really excellent.  We were 5 women having a night in Sydney for a show and finding somewhere for 5 single people to sleep was amazing.  We could quite comfortable have been a family of 7 as 2 of the beds were queens.  The location was great. It is very central and convenient.  We could walk easily to the shops, restaurants and Town Hall station.  The beds were all comfortable as were the couches in the living room.  It was very clean with plenty of nice toiletries.  Danny is a wonderful host and the price was very reasonable.  I would highly recommend this place.

Awesome location. Spacious floor plan. Suited 6 of us very comfortably. Great pool. Very clean and presentable. Danny and his brother were always contactable and responsive. Would definitely stay again.
I liked the place.
地段交通非常方便,离达令港和水族馆超近,以后去悉尼还会优先考虑
Really nice apt. Convenient location for traveling to Sydney. Fantastic place.
房子负责人非常好客,会提前一天跟你沟通确切到达时间,楼下见面给予钥匙以及带领进入房间介绍所有相信信息｡房间格局,三个卧室:一个大床房带独立卫生间,一个大床房,一个三人单人床｡客厅有沙发｡房间里有三个卫生间,2个洗漱间｡厨具很齐全｡离歌剧院1KM多点,步行就能抵达;离麦考利夫人座椅也很近2KM多点,步行也能抵达;附近的景点很多,房间干净宽敞!推荐悉尼溜达的朋友入住!赞房子的负责人!

Great location. Great price for 3 seperate rooms. 
Starting to show some wear and tear but does the job. 6 adults easily accommodated.
Very responsive.
Unfortunate cleaners let the room down, travelled a lot but found a few things I def shouldn’t have! Others may have been more offended. Great value for 6 adults in the cbd though
The space was great for a group as large as 7. Very centrally located and convenient. Probably need a pest control though.

What a great apartment in an amazing location. With views of Darling Harbour and Sydney city, this little gem is a great priced apartment in Sydney city. The hosts were lovely and responded quickly to any requests we had. Highly recommended.

Very good location. Plenty of restaurants near by. Danny was extremely fast at communication with us and was more that accommodating.  The extra bathrooms were excellent considering we are a large family.

This home was a true gem we found! The house looked like a model home which was homey and beautifully decorated. They received us with fresh flowers on the table and a basket of wine and goodies. There was everything in the house to make you feel right at home-- all the kitchenware, cleaning supplies, towels, iron/ironing board, hair dryer, shower gel, extra blankets. The beds seemed new and the linens were fresh and very good quality.  It is beachfront property so morning walks were relaxing, the sunset was gorgeous and star gazing at night was spectacular. They also have a closet full of board games, books and a tv. You can buy food at the grocery store and have the most perfect vacation staying home at this property without having to even step out of the house.  Of course, there's a million things to do around here which my family and I did being out or first time in New Zealand but we very much enjoyed every minute of our stay at this house. I would give it an 11 out of 10 and would definitely recommend it. PS- the driveway into the house is a little steep and narrow. It was my first time driving in NZ and with the steering wheel on the right side but I had no trouble getting in and out of the driveway... just be careful and go slow :)

Great place to stay. We were 5 adults and had plenty of room. Location in the city is perfect. Danny’s brother checked us in and he covered everything. Parking very close by at a Wilson car park. Lovely view of Darling Harbour from the balcony.
Great apartment in a smart building with pool/gym, and in a buzzing location. Danny was also very helpful and flexible.
Thanks for letting us stay in your awesome apartment. Mark was great and very helpful.  All in all the apartment was great, it made our time in Sydney amazing. I would recommend your place to anyone.

This apartment was spacious enough for us all... 2 adults and 5 teenagers.  The highlight was being able to sit on one of the 2 balconies and watch the action in darling harbour and the city streets.  The added bonus of pool, spa, sauna and gym was great.  Close enough to walk to the main attractions of sydney (bridge, opera house, eye tower, fish market, circular quay etc...and so many great places to eat, plus close to the main train stations).  The apartment itself could use a bit of maintenance, but was comfortable and neat.  Danny is a great host and communicates quickly.

Absolutely fab location. Very central and a stones throw from darling harbour. Lovely large apartment, comfy beds and plenty of room. Would definitely use the apartment again if we get back to Sydney.

We were very pleased with Danny's place. A super convenient location and very comfortable for six adults. It was tidy and spacious and had everything we needed. We'll ceratinly be back. Thanks for having us, Danny!
Great location, close to CBD and Darling Harbour. Comfortably accommodated a family of 5. Pool and gym were great.
Great location clean and tidy unit, needs a couple of minor repairs but overall good price, good area close to everything.
Danny’s place suited our needs really well.
Danny's place is an ideal one and highly recommended

Danny's apartment was excellent for a large group, Super spacious bedrooms and living rooms. Fantastic location in the heart of the Sydney close to lots of great cafes and restaurants. Would definitely stay again!
Great place, great location its close to the city
Well situated in the cbd area and easy access to most places. Apartment was clean and tidy. Danny was responsive and helpful. A very comfortable and enjoyable stay.
Great location, clean and tidy. The only thing that I can complain is that the sofa bed is too soft for me, but other people may like the softness.

It was great to stay at Danny’s Apt to explore Sydney. Everything about, location, location, location.... it’s walking distance to stations, darling harbour, George Street and Pitt Street, QVB, Chinatown etc. Very nice host and helpful...definitely will be back again. Thank you Danny!

This place was in a fantastic location and we could walk or catch transport to most places.
The reviews did not make it clear that there are 2 separate apartments within the property and we had the studio.
It was very small but adequate for the two of us and we were out most of the time. Great shower. Would recommend for short stays.
Great hospitality!!!! My mother is a hard person and she is very happy !!!!!!
Great host, great location
The location is great! Also the host is very responsive! We loved our stay!

Nice location and quick response. There are few things that need to be fixed in the room but still working well. One problem was someone with a key opened the room while i was sleeping without knocking. It was quite shocking.
This place is in a great location with everything you could want or need near by..
Great location, terrific facilities and so helpful with our requirements. Just a high five all round !
Excellent location and great apartment!
Great location!

Studio apartment in a great location in the middle of the CBD. Close to lots of restaurants and shops. Comfortably fit 4 adults however the sofa bed a bit soft for our preference. Would recommend to couples and small families.

The Apartment is very clean and in a great location, so close to everything in the city!

Danny was a great host and communication was easily accessible

Would definitely recommend!
Central, reasonably equipped, non personal apartment, with the risk of getting disturbed by noisy neighbours night time due to non existing sound isolation from the entrance door.

Fairly good experience overall. The main problem was the sofa bed which is clearly not a good enough quality for 2 people, perhaps suitable for one person. A little trouble as well with the windows who let the cold air in (can be cold in winter when sleeping in the sofa bed, even with the heating on).

On the plus side, communication is good and we were able to check in 2 hours early very easily. The location is very practical to visit Sydney. The pool is nice.

Orher than that you have what you need in the appartement but unfortunately you get the feeling early on that it is clearly not an appartement with people living in it permanently (only 4 knives, forks, spoons, glasses etc, and the atmosphere is quite "cold").

Overall, very good location and practical, with good communication, but the second bed is clearly not good enough. I recommend for 2 people, perhaps 3, but not 4.

The place is central to many landmarks. Town Hall station is just 5 minutes walk away. The place itself is very clean and well-maintained. If you have nothing to do at night because Sydney shops close after 5pm, there is Grace Hotel nearby which includes an Irish pub. There is also a post office just a couple of doors from the Airbnb if you ever need to ship things home. Danny was also very responsive in all our communications which was really comforting.

LOCATION was great, walking distance from Darling Harbor, close easy 12 min walk with luggage from Wynyard Station.  Can get the ferry to Circular Quay and Taronga Zoo, Luna Park, Seaworld, Madame Tussaud and Wildlife Zoo is very close by, everything is walking distance from this apartment.  Reception was prompt and friendly, room was tidy with all you need, washing machine and dryer if needed. It is small, but for a traveler or long stay more than what you will need, 4 people can sleep comfortable.
벌레가 있음

The apartment is in a good location, close to town hall and big shopping centers in Sydney. But it’s much smaller than I imagined, quit narrow for 3 people to live there. And it’s very hard to contact with the host when we found there is no quilt cover for the sofa bed.
Quite a small studio, comfortable enough for 2 but 4 is quite a squeeze as the pull out lounge bed is quite small.

Danny’s apartment is nice and the location is very convenient. However there can be noise from the apartment next door if there are noisy guests staying in there. If you can sleep through the noise, then it’s a great place to stay.

Fantastic location within walking distance of so many of Sydney's sights. Space was definitely a bit more cramped than I had expected, but if you're spending the majority of your time out and about in Sydney, this isn't a huge deal.
Best location for Darling Harbour and opera house. Close to shopping, bus and train.

name: Large Room in Manhattan
summary: Large room in West Harlem. Shared bathroom & kitchen with roommate. Well maintained apartment. 2nd floor walk up (one flight of stairs). 2 & 3 Express Trains around the corner. A, B & C Trains 2 avenues away. One stop from Whole Foods at 125th st and M-60bus to LaGuardia airport. Laundry in building.
description: Large room in West Harlem. Shared bathroom & kitchen with roommate. Well maintained apartment. 2nd floor walk up (one flight of stairs). 2 & 3 Express Trains around the corner. A, B & C Trains 2 avenues away. One stop from Whole Foods at 125th st and M-60bus to LaGuardia airport. Laundry in building. Jimbo’s is cash only Diner, one of my favorite places to get breakfast. Dunkin’ Donuts is around the corner. iHop also around the corner. Morningside Coffee shop has awesome breakfast sandwiches. Key Food groceries is at 145th and Lenox Ave, another market is on 135th between Lenox and 5th Avenue. Whole Foods is one stop down on 125th st surrounded by various shops and restaurants. You’re in the heart of Harlem!
neighborhood_overview: Jimbo’s is cash only Diner, one of my favorite places to get breakfast. Dunkin’ Donuts is around the corner. iHop also around the corner. Morningside Coffee shop has awesome breakfast sandwiches. Key Food groceries is at 145th and Lenox Ave, another market is on 135th between Lenox and 5th Avenue. Whole Foods is one stop down on 125th st surrounded by various shops and restaurants. You’re in the heart of Harlem!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Health and Fitness professional. Work hard, travel often.

reviews.comments: Ricardo is a great host. Highly recommended to stay in his place. The place is a nice and clean one.
Room is even bigger and better than it looks in the pictures. If you want to be in Harlem, this is the spot! Great stay, great host. Super easy to work with.

Great spacious room just a 2 minute walk from the subway. Ricardo was always available to answer questions and was helpful during check in and check out. the place was very clean when we arrived and towels, shampoo, and body wash were all provided! I would definitely recommend this place to any couples looking to explore the city or any solo adventurers.

name: Mike's House- Uilani Room
summary: Our home is a 4bd older style home that has been in the family since 1935. Private room, with full size bed and partial bathroom. We are 7-10 walking distance to Paia town with lots to see and eat. There is off street parking and WIFI.
space: Our home is a 4bd older style home that has been in the family since 1935. Renovations have been made but we wanted to try and keep as much of the original rustic homey characteristics as possible.  Uilani room includes a full size bed, bath linens, beach towels, small lanai equipped with a table, mini fridge, and microwave.  There is a clothes line that you are able to use as well if you choose not to use the one outside or the dryer downstairs in the laundry room.  There is a sink and a toilet in the room.  There is a shared full bathroom with tub/shower with one other room.  Rhys room does have an AC unit.  I do request that when leaving the house to please  turn unit off . The room has a keypad entrance in which you will select a 4 digit numeric code.  This code will be good for your room and the 2 entrances to the house.  You will send me your code upon booking of reservation.
description: Our home is a 4bd older style home that has been in the family since 1935. Private room, with full size bed and partial bathroom. We are 7-10 walking distance to Paia town with lots to see and eat. There is off street parking and WIFI. Our home is a 4bd older style home that has been in the family since 1935. Renovations have been made but we wanted to try and keep as much of the original rustic homey characteristics as possible.  Uilani room includes a full size bed, bath linens, beach towels, small lanai equipped with a table, mini fridge, and microwave.  There is a clothes line that you are able to use as well if you choose not to use the one outside or the dryer downstairs in the laundry room.  There is a sink and a toilet in the room.  There is a shared full bathroom with tub/shower with one other room.  Rhys room does have an AC unit.  I do request that when leaving the house to please  turn unit off . The room has a keypad entrance in which you will select a 4 digit numeric code
neighborhood_overview: Paia is a very laid back town and lots of places to eat with a variety of different flavor a to experience.  It is the midpoint to Hana, 15-20 minute drive to airport (time varies due to traffic), and to Haleakala upcountry.
notes: You will be required to pick a 4 digit numeric code for keypad locks once your reservation is made. Check-in time is anytime from 4pm on We will be happy to accommodate an early check-in if your room is ready. Please inquire with us first. Check-out time is 11:00 am. Late check-out up to 3:00 pm is available for $50. Be certain to reserve this option in advance. I will send an email prior to arrival that will include: room location designated parking area WIFI codes Other (URL HIDDEN) about the house BBPH\(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
transit: There is bus transit located in Paia Town off of Hana Hwy. Paia Town is about a 7-10 minute walk to town and another 15 minutes to Small beach.  There are bicycle rentals in Paia town.  Checkout: (website hidden)
access: I will provide an email that will explain where everything is in the house with pictures.  But you basically have access to all common areas in the house and of course your room.
interaction: I do live on the property and can easily be reached via phone, text, or email.  There is a phone in the house you can use with my contact information
house_rules: No Smoking in House or on lanai’s (You are welcome to smoke outside, please dispose of cigarette butts in the trash) All guests are to park in their designated onsite parking areas provided to them prior to there arrival.  No Loud House parties or gatherings at the house.  House slippers okay in house  Quiet hours  from 9pm - 7am during which time the noise shall not unreasonably disturb adjacent neighbors and other guests staying in the house. No sleepovers of unregistered guests Please rinse sand off before entering house. It clogs our pipes and creates  plumbing problems Please unplug all small appliances in the kitchen when not in use such as  coffee maker, toaster, etc. Coin operated Laundry facility is available on the premises. Please make sure  you shake the sand out of all clothes and towels before putting them into the  washing machine. Do not overload the machine. If there is anything you find lacking in the HOUSE, let us know and we will try to accommodate you. All suggesti

host.host_about: We are born and raised in Hawaii; and part Hawaiian.  My husband was born and raised in Maui all his life.  I was born on Oahu and raised there and the Big Island before moving to Maui about 30 years ago.  We love and treasure our beautiful Hawaiian Islands. Our family includes our 3 beautiful children; Maikala, Nainoa, and Iwalani.  We love our life and never take for granted for what we have.  Live life to the fullest because life is precious and should be appreciated everyday!!!

reviews.comments: Mike's house is a great and budget friendly place to stay, very close to the cool and relaxed downtown of Paia, away from any resort and big tourism area. Best of all Rina is a very nice person who helps you with any question and makes you really feel at home! She helped a lot for our children with many toys and stroller. Now as we are gone our daughter wants to go back to the lanai with the toys. Thanks Rina for everything!

We stayed one week in Mike's House and really enjoyed every second of it. Our room was spacious and nice and the balcony was perfect to have breakfast in the Hawaiian sun. 
The location is great for all kind of trips, and Paia downtown is in walking distance.
Rina provided us with everything we needed, including towels, guides and even a barbecue :)

Thanks again, Rina!!
Rina is wonderful. it is a beautiful place in Paia. It`s the best house to make holiday. Price and service is top!

Our 3-night stay at Mike's House to end our trip in Maui was perfect. Rina is very kind and helping, and the location is great, especially if you want to see the big waves of the north shore or drive the road to Hana. The restaurants and shops of Paia are a short walk away. Our room was well equipped and clean. Thanks Rina!

My husband and I enjoyed 3 nights at Mike's House.  We highly recommend staying there as it was clean, affordable, and walking distance to the beach, shops and restaurants.  Most importantly, however, was the Aloha Spirit that we felt from Rina.  Thanks for a great stay.  We'll be back!

Rina was simply a great host. Like supplying some of the little items that make a big difference when traveling. In our case beach towels, beach chairs, back pack, and bag cooler.

The house was clean and well looked after. The friendly atmosphere was also a plus.

Paia is centrally located and close to the airport. It is a young vibrant area.

The only con I can think of was the bed was a double bed and we are used to something bigger.

Bruce and Shelley

Rina was an excellent host and provided everything I needed, and so was the place, great location, plenty of space and all the amenities I needed. Will definitely come to Rina again when back in Paia.

It was very nice to stay at Mike`s House. Rina is very friendly and she does so much that the people feel well at her place. 
I would definitely come back to this place… 
Thank you so much for everything Rina

Der 6 tägige Aufenthalt in Mike's House war sehr angenehm. Wir würden jederzeit wieder dort wohnen. Das Zimmer war sauber und kann jedem weiter empfohlen werden, sofern einem kleinere Lärmbelastungen nicht stören (z.B. krähender Hahn).

Rina war eine sehr nette und hilfsbereite Gastgeberin. Bei unserem Trip auf den Haleakala stellte sie uns sogar Fliesdecken zur Verfügung.

Unser Zimmer verfügte über eine eigene Toilette, Lavabo, Kühlschrank und Mikrowelle. Die Dusche befand sich in einem Gemeinschaftsbad. 

Nebst Badetüchern und Strandstühlen waren auch Shampoo und Douche bereitgestellt.

Für Dollar 1.50 konnte man die Maschmaschine inkl. Maschmittel benützen. Gedeckter Parkplatz vorhanden. 5-minütiger Fussmarsch bis ins Zentrum von Paia.

It was nice.  It would have been nice to have an air conditioner in the room though.  It gets very hot in Maui, even at night, starting in early May and on.  The rooster in the neighbors yard woke us up in the morning.  If we had an AC we could have shut the door instead of leave it open for the breeze.

But Rina was great and super helpful.  They had a big fridge in the common kitchen we could use, tons of cookware and stuff.  They also left us some beach towels and picnic bags we used for our trips.  That was super helpful!

Staying at Rina's place was very nice. We loved Paia with the little shops, supermarket and restaurants. Especially that you can walk to these places from home is very good.
The double bed we had was a little too small for two adults so we shared the bed with our daughter. 
Rina was very helpfull with tips and every day we saw her in case we had any questions.
Ho'okipa was our favorite beach were green sea turtles coma ashore almost every day to rest.
Mike's House is a really great place to stay. Rina was very friendly and helpful. The  location of the house is really good to travel around the island. I recommend it :)

We really much enjoyed staying at Rinas place! The room was clean and Rina provided us with everthing we needed. They helped us with everything we needed help with and even when our car broke down Rina and her husband were more than helpful! Paia is a cute little town, everything is within walking distance (grocery, restaurants, beach, yoga...) Thank you very much for the late check out end everything, we would definetely stay here again!

très bonne adresse, pas loin à pieds du centre de paia et de sa jolie plage.
chambres propres et fonctionnelles, cuisine bien équipé, internet efficace.
rina est extrêmement gentille et hospitalière.
encore une fois, une très bonne adresse.
Hoku is a very thoughtful and kind host. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at his/her place.

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Rina, qui est aux petits soins avec ses visiteurs. La chambre est agréable et l'emplacement idéal pour accéder  Paia à pied, tout en étant à l'écart de la circulation.

Rina is a great host and we enjoyed our stay there. The location is very easy to find and has everything we need. The house itself is an old one but the rooms are relatively clean, great value for the money.
매우 깨끗하고 모든게 잘 갖춰져있는 집이였어요~ 호스트도 매우 친절하고 기쁘게 맞이해주었습니다!

Rina was an amazing host, she did everything to help me with clear indications to find the bnb. The house was very very clean, she work's hard! I had such a great time there and talking with her.
The house is very well located, close from the boutiques, Mana grocery which is great, beaches, restaurants. 
Felt very safe in the place too and it was calm and cozy :-)
Wish I will be able to go back!

Everything you need to feel at home. Our room had a half bathroom (toilet) and sink. Big room and a private patio to boot. Hoku had everything ready and the communication was excellent. 

The house is located in the small town of Paia, a small little place with food a quick walk down the street. Paia is in the middle of the island so equally convenient to get to Lahaina or Hana.

Amenities for everything you can need. Full kitchen, clean towels, coolers, etc 

Great value and comfy living. Thanks Hoku!
We had a great time when staying at this place! great location and room was very nice! Highly recommended!

Rina was the best host - prior to arrival I received lots of helpful info on directions to the house, parking, and house info.  The room is exactly as pictured, including a nice outdoor space to enjoy the nice tropical weather.  perfect location for exploring north shore or if you want to stay in Paia - walkable to main steets, and just far enough away to be able to avoid any traffic when the surfs up.  I was able to check in early and was greeted by Rina who is a very warm and nice person  and throughout my visit I had privacy but she was near by down the street incase I needed anything.  She not only had packaging tape when I needed it, but she's shipping my flip flops which I forgot to pack. Thanks so much for everything, Rina! I'll definitely try to stay with you again on my next trip!
The accommodations were as described. Fantastic location mere steps from Mana foods if you need organics.. Hoku was in contact for anything I needed.

This was a great place to stay.  Wonderful location in the less touristy Paia.  Loved Paia and this house for it's vintage and local charm.  My boyfriend and I liked that the place was secure.  We felt safe as the house and our room could be locked with a built in keypads.  We had our own mini fridge and microwave in the lanai.  Pictures show exactly what you get.  The place was clean and convenient.  We highly recommend this listing.
We loved the location and the warm welcoming vibe.  Our host was very kind and gave us everything we needed for a comfortable stay.  I would definitely stay here again!

Rina's place is a bit old house and don't expect 'hotel-like' shiny facilities. Nevertheless, I'd like to give the place a high rate. It's a good location if you travel to Maui. Close to Paia town centre and equipped with all you need. (You can even use a phone freely within the U.S!) Parking a car is not a problem at all. Best of all, the host Rina is kind and attentive.

Rina was an exceptional host, providing my husband, my mother and I with a space very last-minute as our flights were delayed.  She did everything in her power to make our stay easy and comfortable, and her space is gorgeous, well-appointed, and exceptionally located.  And the bed was SO comfortable!  Thank you, Rina!

My room was as described.  It was quiet and comfortable and I really liked the sink and toilet I had inside my room.  The full bathroom and shower just down the hall was big and convenient to use.  I loved the full kitchen.  Getting up in the morning to make my cup of coffee and cereal was perfect.  Its good to be able to keep some of one's morning routines.  I loved the enclosed lanai off my room that I could relax in.  The tradewinds coming through the screen windows kept the room very comfortable.  It was a pleasant few blocks walk down to Paia town center to window shop, pick up groceries or get something to eat.  All in all, a great stay!  Thanks Rina.

Perfect location! Near all amenities! Easy access. Clean. Has all the extras you need (towels, etc). Good wifi! Right next to liquor store. Great host! Would go here again. Has three other suites so lots of social opportunity but is set up so you don't need to be social if you don't want to.

The location of the place is very nice and you can walk into the beautiful town of Paia and even do your shoppings without a car. The own parking spot in front of the house is really helpful because the town is always crowded and there are lots of cars.
The room has everything needed. Also the kitchen and the bathroom are well equipped. There's no air-condition but the fans do just fine. The room has an own toilet which is separated by a sliding room. It's a bit weird in the beginning but you can always use the bathroom down the hall. 
We only met Rina once but she's the kind of person you immediately like. If we ever come back to Hawaii we will definitely stay at her place again!

Rina communicated well before we arrived with the information we needed to find the unit, including very detailed directions and a private code to enter the room. The room was quiet and comfortable. We really liked the private balcony and the nice shared kitchen and sitting areas.

Rina was very friendly and helpful. She seemed very organized, providing us with useful information before arrival. The room was better than I expected (Rina also provided beach towels, umbrella, and mats). We used the kitchen, living room, tv, etc. and had a parking space. It was very convenient to have a private toilet and a small porch with refrigerator and microwave to ourselves. The location was close to town, grocery store, and the beach. I would stay there again!
Best experience ever ! Big bedroom for us with convenient toilet . Nice view and nice host !

This is my first AirBNB stay and Rina made my stay! She prepared a very big & warm welcome even before I parked my car. She is so nice a host that my partner and I felt like we were at home. At the "orientation", she introduced everything we should know including very detailed restaurant recommendation for us.

The room was very spacious and cozy, close to downtown.(few minutes walk) and it's very quite at night. Even without AC, the fans and the natural winds gave us a cool feeling. 

Next time in Maui, I'll definitely choose this place again. Thank you, Rina.

Rina's spot was great! The room was clean and comfy with a great little screened in porch. Rina made us feel very welcomed and provided pretty much everything you could need including beach chairs, boogie board and a cooler! It was also a very short walk to downtown Paia and the beach!

Thank you Rina for a wonderful stay in Paia! She thoughtfully upgraded us when there was a cancellation, granted us an early checkin, and also let us store our luggage upon checkout until we left that evening for the plane. All was greatly appreciated! The house was so clean and cute, all around great vibe there. Very quiet place. We were very comfortable. Beach and town is an easy walk down the street. Will also add Rina was always quick to respond to my many questions. This was my first Airbnb experience, I would definitely stay there again and I definitely recommend this house!

Rina is a very friendly and helpful host that provided me with tips and recommendations for my first time in Maui.  The house is very comfortable and quiet and it fit everything I needed for my stay.  Rina was also kind enough to give chocolates and a christmas gift, since it was the holidays!  Wonderful experience.
Good location and a decent place to stay!

I have to say the location is great great great! Walking distance to Paia beach and lots of nice restaurants nearby. Rina is great as well. They have their own parking lots, digit keys, our own balcony. I left my cosmetic bag in the room, Rina even sent it back to me. Highly recommend! I love Maui!
great experience and location. Rina is so nice to provide all the equipment.
Great location, every close to everything! The room is clean and equipped with a full kitchen and lovely snacks:)

Good accomodation! Rina is very nice, you can always contact her. Well equipped and clean common kitchen and bathroom, even sun cream, shampoo etc. are provided. The furniture of the room is relatively old, but okay and the room has its own toilet and sink. It can get extremely hot inside, but there is a fan. The room and balcony were almost (but not completely) clean. Great location for day trips to Haleakala and Hana.
Rina was a great hostess. Spacious room. Was very quiet, so it was easy to sleep. A lot to do in Paia. Would stay again.

We had a great stay in Paia! The room was spacious and the shared kitchen and living room were both fully equipped with everything we needed. Rina is a perfect host: She provided a detailed prescription for the arrival and was very helpful and friendly and always willing to answer questions. We would definetly come here again!

Rina was great at communicating from the start and was always very friendly. She greeted us to show us around and made sure we had everything we needed. The room and house were as described and we enjoyed meeting some of the other guests though we could keep to ourselves as much as possible. We found the location to be amazing for a quick walk into town with the best grocery/health food store just down the street. We also enjoyed the far west end of Baldwin beach for swimming which was a 15min walk. Paia had a lot of traffic downtown but we never found we were stuck in it for long. After exploring the island we felt that Paia was the best place to stay with a great vibe. Thanks again!

Rina is a great host ! Everything was ready for us when we got there. It was very helpful to have a fully stocked kitchen to use , as well as the beer fridge and microwave on our private deck. Good location and an easy walk to beaches and trendy downtown Paia. We had a terrific time , thanks Rina !
Rina was very welcoming and acomodating.....the room was as described... clean and functional with good wi-fi. Access to a great kitchen and living room and full both down the hall was great.

Mike's House was perfect for us.  We stayed from Feb 1 - 5 in the Uilani Room.  The room was neat and clean and had a nice screened-in porch.  There was a really nice spacious kitchen, full bath and living space.  We enjoyed it.  Parking is easy.  And the best part: it is a short walk to town.  It is really easy to stroll from Mike's House to all the restaurants in town and to the beach.  Rina is the hostess, and she was very welcoming.  We arrived early but that was OK for Rina.  And Rina was available by phone if we had an issue.  It was a good stay and I'd gladly go back if I am able to get back to Maui.  I highly recommend Mike's House.

Rina and Mike made us feel very welcomed! The rooms is located in a seprate house from where they live, but since they live close it is easy to reach them if any help is needed. And Rina was great as well! The room was great, thou a bit cold, use the extra blanket if you as we were, staying there in the winter. But great during the hot Hawaiian days.  The neighbourhood, Paia, ended up to be our favorite town in Maui and barely a 10-minute walk away. If we're ever back at Maui we would like to stay here again!

We had a wonderful stay in Paia at Rina's place. The location was perfect being an easy walk to all the cafes and restaurants that make Paia so charming. The room is spacious and comfortable. Rina was so welcoming and has great communications so we would absolutely recommend staying here! Thanks for having us Rina :)

Rina and her place were awesome! She made sure we knew where everything was in the house. Our room was very spacious - very convenient to have a sink, half bathroom and private outdoor deck all connected. The shared bathroom was very nice as well. Location was perfect! Only 10 minute walk to Paia restaurants and shops. Would highly recommend to anyone coming to Maui as part of your stay!!

We had a wonderful time at Mike's House! The apartment is like a shared flat with a maximum of 6 other guests staying with you at the same time.
Our room was shown as on the picture and clean. The bed is 'normal size' (no queensize) so make sure you like the one you share it with. All booked rooms are locked vy keypad with your own number.
The kitchen is one of the best equipped kitchen I ever had at an airbnb place! So you can do giod cooking here. The living room is also nice and we often had chats here with people also loving in the apartment at the same time.
The shared bathroom with the shower is also big, clean and there is free shampoo etc. which is very kind.
So the apartment itsself is very nice and Rina (Mike's wife) makes sure that you feel welcome. She is just a very loving, caring person. She responds directly to questions and helps you with everything. Furthermore she comes to the apartment regularly and takes care of it. Thanks again Rina for everything!
This was really one of the best airbnb places we stayed in. So we recommend to book it ;)

Rina was a very nice and helpful hostess. This was our first time to use airbnb, she made it a very enjoyable experience. The room was clean comfortable and quiet with a good kitchen. The house was in a great location, close to Paia town and beach. Thanks Rina .
Thank you so much rina. Everything was very practical and easy to access. Plus the room we had was very comfortable and cozy! Thank you Rina we will definitely return to your place.
Rina was very accommodating and friendly! The space has an older charm to it with everything you need. I would stay with Rina again.

My stay at Mike's house has been great; I was there a week and enjoyed my spaceous room with own toilet and wash-basin, and balcony (loved that very much!) and was very happy with the use of living room, kitchen, bathroom and laundry room. Nice contact with some other guests. It was also great to have shops and restaurants nearby, especially because I don't drive a car.
The welcome and help (how does that laundry machine work???

Rina was very kind and helpful during our stay. Recommended some excellent restaurants nearby and where the best beaches were. The room was very clean. The room we stayed in had a perfect screened deck to hangout at. Would highly recommend staying here. Thanks, Rina!

We were made to feel very welcome here. Rina was a fantastic host. We would definitely stay again. 
Thank you Rina!!
Our room in Mike's house was wonderful! The bed was plenty comfortable and the attached open patio was a great place to spend an early Hawaiian morning. Wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.
Great, easy and central. I would definitely come back....and this wasn't the first time I've stayed there.
Rina was amazing since the first minute I contacted her. Fluent emailing, easy check in, amazing house well equipped, nice spot on Maui. 100% recommended.
Rina was very friendly and welcoming. Her place was just as described. Comfortable with lots of room. Clean and homey. Great location.

This was my first time using Airbnb and I will have to say, what a first time experience. House was amazing, plenty of space and in believable amenities. This is a must go place and I will be back for sure. Hopefully in the very near future. Thank you Rina you rock!!!

Good email contact with the host. The house fits the causal ambience of Paia to a T. Kitchen was nicely stocked with basics like oils, soy sauce etc that would have made cooking easy, but the restaurant scene in Paia was too good to pass up. Easy walking distance to restaurants and the beach. Was quiet the night we were there, though there are other guests staying.  Room was simple and comfortable.
Good
We had a fantastic time staying in Rina's house !!! Everything was perfect and Rina was very welcoming and very helpful for us! We highly recommend this house :)))

Very accommodating and generous host! Both with the room availability (Room was ready before scheduled check in time, and Rina extended our check out time to accommodate our plans in Paia); and with all of the amenities / items provided in the home for our use. Great experience, would strongly recommend!

Rina was the perfect host. Prompt and helpful when responding to messages prior to our stay and friendly and welcoming during it; while at the same time leaving you the freedom to enjoy their place. Although you are sharing the common spaces with other guests, each private room is big enough for you to feel like you are not getting under each other's feet and the other guests during our stay were all respectful. A very short walk (a few minutes) into the centre of Paia and a great base for both the Road to Hana and the Haleakana sunrise, this accommodation seemed to represent great value in what can be an expensive region. We would highly recommend Mike's House; the listing was everything it promised and the host helped make our stay a fantastic one.

I loved staying at Rina's!! So easy and comfortable. Super convenient and as close as could be to all the great spots in sweet Paia town (Mana natural foods!!). It was clean, well-stocked, private. Everything I could have wanted. I loved having the bathroom, mini fridge, and porch all in my own personal area. I could have easily stayed in my private quarters the whole time, but also enjoyed having access to the main kitchen. Rina was so accommodating and I couldn't have asked for a better host. <3
All the information was clear for access. The place was tidy and clean. Good access/close proximity to shops and grocery. Very happy with my stay. Thanks very much!

The accommodation was basically quite good although a little bit old, but so is most of the Maui homes we saw. The bed was comfortable and plenty of good linen including Beach towels. Location was great for our touring as we had a hire car to get around in.

Rina was amazing! Checked us in when we arrived. Continued to check in with us during our stay. The place was in a great location to walking distance to beach, coffee places, eating establishments! It was quiet and very clean everyday!

Rina is a wonderful host, absolutely nothing negative to say about my stay in Mike's House Paia. Keyless entry is brilliant, bed is unbelievably comfortable (and I am not a good sleeper in strange places, I slept very well here). Kitchen seemed well stocked, though I am not much of a chef so i didn't really take advantage of that. Very warm & inviting common area, and free HBO (not that anyone would watch HBO while in Maui). As they say: Location Location Location. And Mike's house rocked the location, 5 minute walk to downtown Paia which has plenty of food & store fronts (and an awesome Health Food store - Mana foods - the only one on the island). Paia is also the base for the ascent to Haleakala Summit, whether you plan to drive up or do as I did and peddle a bike 10,023 feet in 36 miles... it's a must see experience! If there were one thing that I would offer critical critique on, it would be that the keyless entry door mechanism has a indicator light on the inside that strobes rather bright. When you go dark for bedtime, the strobing white light can be a little distracting for light sleepers like myself. But it's nothing a washcloth draped over the door knob can't cure, and really it's so minor of an issue it's easy to look past. I will most definitely visit Maui again, and there is no doubt in my mind where I will stay... Mike's House! Mahalo Rina...

Rina was an incredible host and the house was quiet, private and had everything we could want. Good price, easy walk to beaches and shops, and generally a lovely place to stay. Will definitely come again when we are next in Paia.
Very communicative host and the location is ideal!

Die Unterkunft im malerischen Paia liegt sehr zentral gelegen um die Insel zu erkunden. Wir haben uns eine Woche in Mikes House aufgehalten und uns absolut wie zu Hause gefühlt! Das Zimmer war sauber und mit der zusätzlichen Veranda auch sehr geräumig! Die Küche ist sehr gut eingerichtet damit man ohne weiteres selber alles kochen kann auf was man Lust hat! Was auch toll war, dass alles was man am Strand benötigt, Stühle, Boards, Schnorchel und Badetücher zur Verfügung standen! Alles alles top eingerichtet um sich wohltufühlen! Rina ist super freundlich, hilfsbereit und nett! Man sieht sie nicht oft aber wenn die gebraucht wird ist sie sofort da! Wir würden auf jeden Fall wieder unsere Zeit auf Maui bei Rina und in Mikes House verbringen! Tip topi Sach gsi......
Super Hilfsonstruktionen und tolle Lage mit sehr gutem Zimmer.

Very nice place, very comfy bed, it was gorgeous with the extra room outside just sitting there and having breakfast. Also nice with the fridge, there is even a line for wet swimming shorts. And there is a water outlet at the entrance for getting sand off.

We do highly recommend this place for Maui.

A_mazing bed
L_ovely host
O_utstanding Kitchen Set Up
H_elpful laundry option
A_wesome Communication  

Eventhough the place is relatively old, its there to make your stay as much comfortable as possible. 

Rina delivers more than the others. Thank you!

Rina 숙소는 편안하고 안락했습니다^^
주방 및 욕실에서 필요한것 모든것이 갖춰서 있어서 부족함이 없이 잘 지냈습니다
다음엔 다시 머물고 싶은 안락한 주택가였다.

Amazing gem of a location and everything you need. Host is quick to respond and gives thorough directions, house instructions and list of activities to do on Maui. I loved the screened in private porch area. Highly recommended.

My stay at Rina's place was great. The room has its own toilet, sink and balcony, and while there were other guests in the house, the place was quiet. Everything was clean and very comfortable, and being able to walk to restaurants and shops in Paia Town was great. I'd recommend Rina's listing for anyone looking to spend some time in Maui.

We stayed at Rina's place for 10 nights and we enjoyed every minute of it!  It's older house but everything was quite roomy, bedroom, porch, closet, toilet room, big shared kitchen and full bathroom.  We spent lot of time in the back porch which is completely screened to keep bugs out especially mosquitoes!  Rina also provided home grown bananas and papayas which were so tasty, best bananas and papayas we ever had, thanks again Rina!!  She also provided more than enough towels including beach towels.  Also it was nice to have our own fridge and microwave!  Well, we will definitely stay again if we get a chance.

Thanks Rina for being such a wonderful host. We had a great stay at your comfortable house. Thanks for being so responsive to our needs and questions. 

Best, 
Jagan and Jayati

Such a great location - half a block from restaurants and shops, and very close to gorgeous beaches! Also at the start of the road to Hana, and a close drive to the Haleakala Summit! Rina was so hospitable and friendly - and our room was perfect! We would definitely stay here again next time we are in Maui!

Rina made us feel at Home, thanks to very good communication it was possible to check in early spontanously. We were also able to leave our baggage there during our Trip to hana. The room was clean, spacious, (except the rooster in the neighboorhood ) quiet and well located with Paia Shops in walk able Distance. The kitchens hygiene has been a little more hostel alike, But it was well equipped. WLAN worked well. Would stay there again!
Comfy place to stay with all the amenities you won't be asking for more.
It was a clean and comfortable stay. We were just looking for a place to crash for one night after our drive through Road to Hana, and this was perfect.

Room was as shown in the pictures. We really didn't stay too long at Rina's place because we checked in late and went off early but communications with her were fast and she was friendly and helpful! The room was well stocked and we even had a toilet in the room itself! Thank you Rina for making our first night in Hawaii comfortable!
The place is very comfy and convenient! It's only a very short walk into town and it's location allows you to skip the traffic coming into Paia from the west. Rina was very easy to deal with.
Rina's place was clean although it looks a little bit used. Paia is great location especially if you are planning to go to Road to Hana. Rina is nice person always ready to help.

"Mike's House" is a simple yet welcoming place in Paia, a short walk to all the cafés, restaurants and shops. It is also a short walk in the other direction to a great yoga studio, for those who are interested, Maui Yoga Shala.
Our room was basic, but clean and adequate, with a screened lanai; it had a toilet and sink, and we shared a shower with another room, which worked out just fine. The kitchen is well equipped and we chatted with fellow travelers here, and there was a lot offered such as coffee, tea and condiments.
What made our stay stand out from the ordinary was the warm welcome and contact with Rina (the host). Communications were very good with her all along. Warm Mahalo, Rina and family!

Rina's place was close to the shops and eatery of Paia. Within walking distance of restaurants and a little longer walk to the beach. The kitchen was loaded with utensils and cook ware. Great place to stay!

Location was so nice.
And Rina was friendly and helpful.
We hope we can return here
Great no-frills spot to get a good nights sleep. Host was very communicative and we were able to walk to restaurants and shops from here which was good bonus.
Very nice place, easy, and private.

This was a great stay! Private enclosed balcony. So close to everything on the north, east and south side. West is a bit removed in maui. Great amenities and walking distance to Paia. Overall great stay

Rina ist eine tolle Gastgeberin.
Sie ist sehr fürsorglich, hilft in allen Belangen und reagiert immer blitzschnell. Alles war sehr gut organisiert und wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.

Awesome place, Rina was a legend! Gave us lots of good recommendations for best local eats, and was super accommodating letting us leaving our stuff at her place for the night we stayed in Hana. Bonus air conditioning too! Highly recommended :)
We stood here for 5 days and we are really happy! One of the things that we loved the most is that Rina provides snorkeling and beach stuff for the guests. The location (Paia) is very nice.

Thank you Rina!! It was a great pleasure to stay at your house. Super clean and nice! I definitely recommend for everybody who reading this review to stay at this home. You’ll love the location and and amazingly affordable. Mahalo Rina!
We will definetly stay here again.  Great energy, great host and great location.

Great location, comfortable and spacious room, very thoughtfully put together to serve the guests to the maximum. Loved our stay and Rina, the host. We stayed for 4 nights and 3 days. 
Ate in the restaurants, shopped in the gift stores, bought groceries at Mana, the store down the street, spent a couple of evenings at the beach and even went to the post office to post a card.  We loved the town. It is a great spot to start off both your "road to Hana" and Haleakala trips. 
We also enjoyed the Hui No'eau Viual Arts Centre a short drive up the street.
Great host. Great communication. Clean place. Very satisfied. Thank you.
Great house beach and veru central and good location.

Rina provided everything I could possibly need! The location was perfect...just a short walk into town. Rina went above and beyond with a host of tips, knowledge, and information to help guide me on my trip and future move to Maui!  Thank you, Rina, with all my heart ♥️ 
Sara

Absolutely loved my stay at Rina’s place!! Communication was fantastic, and Rina made me feel right at home as soon as I arrived!! I loved the room and the private verandah, and it was nice to be walking distance to everything in paia!
I will definitely be back next time I’m in maui!
This is a comfortable place to stay. Easy to go everywhere on Maui.
was great to stay

Clean & conveniently located. We were there for a couple of nights here and although we were out the whole time, it was a cozy room to rest in for the night. The room has an attached patio with a half bath. The main bathroom (shower) is shared. Its a great location as well, with plenty of restaurants in Paia, on the way to road to hana and just ~5mins away from the kahului airport.  Rina was responsive throughout. We perhaps received the most detailed check-in instructions & suggestions for nearby places ever :)

Overall, highly recommended.
위치가 매우 좋고 가격대비 괜찮은 숙소이다! 마을이 조용하고 예쁘다

Rina's place is just perfect for Maui travellers. I stayed at her place with my girlfriend. We had a parking spot, a great room, shared kitchen and shared living room with everything we needed. And we were still close to Kahului considering that we had a car. Sharing the common rooms with other Airbnb guests wasn't a problem at all. On top, Rina is very nice and offered her help whenever it was possible. We had a great stay and definitely recommend staying at her place.

Aloha,
What an amazing host. I accidently ruined sheets when I fell asleep with my ink pen in hand, but she refused my multiple offers to buy new ones! 
The location is close to the beach, excellent organic food store/deli, and a cheap water fill station. Wow, we hardly hardly had to leave Paia! 
Thanks, again, Rina!! We will be back again soon! 
Mahalo!

My husband and I spent a week at Rina's place and we had the most pleasant staying. 
The moment I booked with Rina she responded by thanking me and sent me a lot of recommendations for restaurants, cafes, activities, sights not only in Paia but on the entire island which was super helpful.
Also she clearly wrote the instructions for checking in in case she wasn't there and also, during our staying, she would send messages asking if everything was ok and if we needed anything. 
When we meet her, she was super nice and friendly and explained everything one more time.
You have everything you need in the house and everything was neat and clean. 
The location is amazing, you can walk to all the restaurants, bars, cafes, supermarket and even to, in my opinion, the prettiest beach on the island - Baldwin Beach. Also, it is where road to Hana starts which was really convenient.
Amazing stay, amazing host and we will definitely stay at her place again and recommend it to everyone.
A well kept multiple apartment complex. Private and clean. Rina very pleasant and accommodating. She responded to requests immediately. Very good location.

We had a wonderful time staying at Mikes House and visiting Pa'ia. The location is fantastic. We were able to park our car in our designated spot and walk into town in 5 minutes. It doesn't get any better than that. Our room was lovely. It was big and had a toilet, sink, mini fridge, microwave, and private screened lanai. The communal kitchen was big and full of utensils although we only used it for simple things like cutting fruit. Pa'ia has lots of yummy food options. Rina was really sweet and a great communicator. She even sent a message on check in day to say our room was ready early. Lastly the code entry was really great. It made coming and going so easy especially when my boyfriend and I went out/returned at different times.

Rina's place is a great location to stay. We were close/walkable to everything- downtown, food,markets, beaches. Easy access to hana hwy and quite close to the airport. Our room was clean and spacious, had it's own balcony, mini fridge and microwave. We packed very light for this trip, but Rina provided towels, shampoos, some beach equipment, and great suggestions on activities to do here. We were taken care of really well, check in and check out was really simple. I would recommend this place !

Hi Rina,  we enjoyed our stay very much.  Thoughtful touches like the welcome blackboards on each door, the many fans in addition to the air conditioner, the private refrigerator and screened lanai, easy access to our rooms using the special code, the quick responses to any concerns we had, and most of all your sparkling personality made our stay memorable. Your large airy kitchen and living room and the use of the beach chairs, the shaded parking space, and the short walk into town were convenient and special.  The room rates were fair and though you were living nearby we never felt like we were intruding on you or your family. We definitely recommend your airbnb and hope to stay there again. Warm regards, Janet and Paul MacDonald

Staying at this place was a real pleasure. It's clean, provides everything you need and probably more. Beeing so close to the sea and in beautiful Paia felt vey good.
I really liked, that you can do your laundry at Mikes house for small money. On top of all that, there's to say that Rina is a very lovely and thoughtful host, that answers quick and informative. Thank you for those beautiful days!

Rina was hands down the best host one could ask for. She was warm, welcoming and so hospitable. The room was great, comfortable and I felt very safe. 
I couldn't recommend Rina's accommodation highly enough, she is a superstar. 
Thank you again for having me, I would love to return one day :)
Great Location and Value
Bel endroit pour prendre le temps d’arriver à Maui!!!

This place was amazing for the price. The location was phenomenal and rina was beyond helpful. The parking is super convenient since there is a lot of local restaurants and even a market minutes away. The beds are shockingly more comfortable than I expected. Everything I needed and more was there to use e.g. beach chairs, floatys, wave boards. I 100% would stay here again if I was flying to Maui.

I loved how central Rina's place was to all the activities we wanted to do. It's a great location and easily accessible from the airport. The place was clean, tidy, and very comfortable. Rina is a great host, providing a lot of information and answers to any questions we had. Overall a very enjoyable stay in Paia :)
Loved our stay! Rina was great communicating and our room was perfect! Super easy walk to town for food and grocery, centrally located for beaches, Lana’i and Hana. Wish we could have stayed longer!

We enjoyed staying at Mike and Rina’s place! It was centrally located in Paia and very close to the highway to jump start our journey on the road to Hana! Rina was very responsive and an excellent host! The room was quaint with it’s own lanai and powder room. While we only stayed one night in Paia, it was everything we needed!
Very easy and good communication!
Great place to stay in Paia.

Rina is a wonderful host. She is friendly, communicates well, gave me a lot of good information about Maui and helped me with my needs around stationing my bike. I was very pleasantly surprised about the amount of things made available to the guests. The kitchen is fully equipped and there are other useful details such as the availability of an iron, a hairdryer, first aid kit, Maui guide book, quality shampoo and body wash (not just the cheap stuff), mini fridge and microwave in the room, plenty of towels (including beach towels) and an extra blanket for the bed. I loved having a beautiful little green gecko at the annex to the room (and yes, they leave little craps, but I certainly did not care). This is a very nice place for the price - I highly recommend it!

Rina's place is a great value for it's location in Paia. The space is nothing too fancy, but it's all you need for a few day stay if you're not planning on spending too much time at your place! Very walkable to coffee shops, restaurants, shopping, and beach.
Filled the bill. Basic and clean. Very convenient for walking to town. Our unit had AC, which was a godsend.

We really enjoyed our stay at Rinas house! It was welcoming, relaxing and just minutes from the town and beach!
Rina even helped us out and sent some of our stuff that we had forgot!
The room was warmer than expected but the AC helped a lot!
Thanks again Rina!

Rina was an amazing host!! She was super responsive to our texts/emails and made sure our stay was flawless. Rina was extremely accommodating with a late check in and a late check out which was very helpful!! The place was clean and was equipped with everything you need. Really liked providing beach chairs and towels!!! I highly recommend staying at Rina’s given her outstanding hospitality and the prime location of her house in Paia! We will definitely be back! Mahalo!

The most comfortable place to stay in Paia! Everything we needed was right at our fingertips. Rina provided us with tons of fun activities to do while in Maui and was extremely helpful during our stay. I would recommend her place to anyone looking for somewhere to vacation in maui.
Great location, walking distance to shops and food. Common spaces were clean, bed was comfy, AC worked well. Definitely would recommend!
Une chambre propre, fonctionnelle, et un petit balcon au top pour se relaxer le soir, faire sécher ses vêtements, ou même manger au calme. Un très bon choix.

We enjoyed our stay in Paia at Rina’s place. It was really a comfortable traditional Hawaiian home. It is easy to find and a short stroll into town. We didn’t need our car within Paia which is great because parking there is a challenge. Sharing the common spaces with other guests was really fun. We shared travel stories and learned about where to eat. The great thing about Paia is there are no big resorts and at Rina’s, you’re part of the neighborhood.
Great space within walking distance to downtown Paia and a short drive from Ho’okipa beach. Loved my stay here

I can not recommend staying at Rina’s enough. Not only was she a wonderful, attentive host, the place was lovely and had all the amenities you could possibly want or need. She was fast with responses and local recommendations. The Airbnb is right in Paia town, close to restaurants and shops. And when my flight was delayed a day, Rina was kind enough to let me have a late check out. She really went above and beyond the usual host. Will definitely try to stay here again!

We didn't get to stay at Rina's in the end, as we decided to leave the island due to the hurricane warning (Hurricane Lane). Rina was very understanding and offered a full refund without us even asking, even though this was against her cancellation policy (we cancelled on the day).  Of course these were special circumstances, but we thought it was a very kind gesture nonetheless. Leading up to the trip the communication was great, and she gave us lots of local tips and detailed check-in instructions. Wish we could have stayed, we'll come again another time!
Thanks Rina

Great place!! Short walk into town, close to beaches, restaurants etc. Rina was super friendly and helpful and the room was very clean, comfortable and exactly what we needed for our short vacation in Paia

Big house with a lot of space in the room. There’s a lot of things for the beach like boogieboard, tuba, chair...
Quick response when you write to Rina.
This place is amazing !! Love that !! I will definitely choose again this place !
We had a great time thanks Rina!

This place is well located, a short walking distance to Paia village and the beach. The room was big, clean and comfortable. It even has a sink, a toilet and a small refrigerator. Also, there's a private wide decking in the room where you can eat and hang clothes.
Rina was there to receive us for check-in, she was very kind and helpful and she even let us drop our luggage before the actual check-in time.
The kitchen and bathroom have everything you need.
Ps: As a piece of advice, be mindful of not to leave any food in the room as this may attract insects. Even being careful it could be normal to see insects in the room now and then. Maui is pure nature so this is pretty common.
A great advantage is that each room has its own codelock.
All in all, we would recommend Rina's place to any traveller!
Mahalo!
I had a very nice stay with Rina. She provided a lot of local tips, and was in general very helpful. I would highly recommend staying with Rina when in Paia.

Great location. Walking distance from the beach and all the restaurants in Paia.
Rina is a very generous and responsive host.

Rina is a very friendly and cordial hostess, who is immediately at your side in case of problems.

This accommodation is perfectly located.  In direct walking distance is beside the beach also a small place, which has to offer beside shops and restaurants also the best supermarket of the island (Mana Foods).  So if you would rather cook for yourself, this is no problem at all in the perfectly equipped kitchen. 
 
We especially enjoyed the balcony to start the day with a breakfast before we left to explore the island.

I loved staying here! It was better than expected. Very close to the charming downtown and steps away from a great little market with a good edited selection of goods, food, drinks, beer/wine, and even a few prepared hot foods. More of a quality small market rather than a typical convenient store. 

The place had local Hawaiian character and was clean, comfortable and homey. The whole house/room was thoughtfully set up with everything you could need in the room and attached patio room, and the community kitchen. Having available laundry facilities in the house was nice too. It was really convenient having a code for the main door and room, rather than having to always carry around a key. Read the other reviews that talk more about all these details. 

I really appreciated having my own half bath in my room, and spent a lot of time in the pleasant porch room where you could feel the cool breezes and be protected from bugs. Small lizards make their way through the floor boards (since it's really an outdoor patio but is screened in like a room), but that actually added made the experience more interesting. Rita was a wonderful host and great with communication and responding quickly.

This has been one of my favorite Airbnbs I've stayed at considering the location, price, space, and amenities, and I've stayed in MANY as an avid traveler!
Well located place to enjoy Paia and perfect to do the road to Hana. They also have a very good book with information about Maui.
Our one week stay was fantastic. Nice house and super location! Rina is a great host! Highly recommended place to stay!
this place is a great location and has everything you need!

talk about a. Amenities because there's a common kitchen area and a fridge and microwave  In each Room there are leftovers which are for future guess to use you save a whole lot of money when you don't have to buy condiments or there's something that that you need that's available in the fridge because somebody moved out that morning It's a big old funky house that has everything you need and then some ran out of shampoo guaranteed there's some in the shower that kind of place good jumping off point to   The National Park or the road to Hana

I would recommend Mike’s house to anyone! Rina was an awesome host. I had gone crazy finding travel size soaps and everything which we didn’t even need because she had everything for us! We were there for 2 weeks and felt like home. She was very accommodating. She had very helpful local tips and we even got our rental car from one of her options so believe her when she gives you tips! It is such a home environment. Don’t be scared to use the common areas they are very relaxing and comfortable. Paia also referred to as “hippie town” is in the middle of almost everything so be prepared to drive for quite so time for either side of the island, however, there are some great places walking distance! Overall it was a great experience and we will hopefully stay there next.

Great location for the start of Road to Hana or Haleakala. We didn’t stay here many hours, but the location was perfect for an early morning departure to Haleakala. Very nice lanai and close proximity to town. Wish that we could have spent a few more hours here!
This place is super well-equipped, it has everything you will need. Amazing amenities and a great sense of privacy. I would highly recommend!
Great place, great value.

My wife and I stayed 17 nights at Mike‘s House in the Ulani room. Everything was above our expectations. Rina is such a nice, friendly and helpful person. The communication with her was super. She responded immediately to all our questions. We felt like home from the beginning. The kitchen equipment is very good, so that you can prepare nice dishes. Everything is there what you need and all is very tidy and clean. Our room was very cozy and we had a fridge and a microwave. The house was a short walk - about 3min - to Paia downtown and about 10min to the beach, which we enjoyed very often. If we come back to Maui our third time, we‘ll definitely stay at Mike‘s house again. Many thanks for your hosting and caring about us. Mahalo ❤️
It was everything we needed!!

name: Charming Suite w/Modern Kitchen, WiFi, Flat Screen, Lanai–Kiahuna Plantation #2048
summary: Paradise pampers in this highly upgraded retreat overlooking gorgeous lawns and gardens. It’s easy living with a full kitchen for cooking meals and snacks, furnished lanai, WiFi, flat screen and DVD.
space: It’s paradise perfected! Sleeping four in a king and sofabed, this suite shares Kauai’s easy lifestyle with tasteful island décor, upgraded kitchen with granite countertops and furnished lanai overlooking gorgeous green lawns. Other pleasant perks include a flat screen, DVD and WiFi to stay connected.    Fringing Poipu Beach, this plantation-style retreat immerses you amid 35 acres of tropical gardens. Individually decorated one- and two-bedroom suites feature fullkitchens, ceiling fans and daily housekeeping. Onsite amenities add appeal with a pool, jet spa, beach hut, tennis courts, barbecue areas and restaurant.
