host.host_about:
We are a couple who love to receive and share our home .
In addition to loving this wonderful and unique city , we have a common passion , nature , which lead us to find and rebuild some schist houses in a small abandoned village in the Northeast Transmontano .
Aida has beekeeping as a hobby at the village, she likes also painting and music , Francisco plant trees and is an enthusiastic for classic cars , especially vintage VW 's.
Our dream is to some day live quietly in the countryside and also receiving people from all over the world.

reviews.comments:
We've had an amazing stay in the house! It's perfectly suited & equipped for 8 people, and the terrasse couldn't be nicer. 
On top of that, our hosts were amazing: super reactive, nice and flexible - and Aida was incredibly welcoming and thoughtful when we did the check-in. 
Thanks a lot for everything!
Casa espacosa, bonita e confort'avel. Metro relativamente perto, restaurantes e supermercados perto, o que facilita o dia a dia. O quintal e' excelente para relaxar e comer. Recomendamos!!!!
Belle maison, bien équipée, hôtes arrangeants, rien a redire, juste dommage que ça soit si excentre par rapport au centre historique.

We stayed at Aida & Francisco's for one week with two families (4 adults, 3 children, 1 baby). We found the house was welcoming, spacious and well-divided to accomodate our large group. Aida & Francisco kindly provided us with a crib and high-chair for the baby. They were also very helpful in showing the house and giving indications about Porto.

The three bathrooms, the large living room and the gorgeous terasse made "their home in porto" most practical and convenient. It is fully-furnished, charmly decorated, and it has everything (and beyond) one can expect from a complete house. The dining room and kitchen are small, so we spent most of our days in the warm living rooom or, when weather permits, on the outdoor patio.

The location is residential but slightly remote from the center. Two metro stations are about 12-15min walk, and the center is 25-30min walk. It is therefore better serviced by bus. 
 
There are plenty of services around the home area (groceries, bakery, restaurants). It is mostly quiet at night, except the large front bedroom, which gives on the intersection of two important streets and can be nosiy at night. 

In the end, we found it was the perfect home for our two families in Porto. We highly recommend it.

Maison correspondant parfaitement à la description et aux photos, tres agréable à vivre.
Nous avons séjourné à 3 couples dans cette maison située à proximité de nombreuses commodités. 
Un grand merci à Aida et Francisco pour leur gentillesse et leur disponibilité. Nous reviendrons les yeux fermés lors de notre prochaine visite à Porto.

Nous avons adoré notre séjour dans cette charmante maison! Nous étions 2 familles avec enfants et la maison était parfaitement adaptée. Le jardin est aussi très agréable. Si nous devons revenir sur Porto ça sera chez Aida et Francisco :)
The house is nice and clean but the best of the property is the private garden. Aida and Francisco are friendly people . They gave us a good welcome in the evening.

We had a lovely stay at Aida and Francisco's house in Porto. Their house is cozy, comfortable, clean and filled with lovely details. From the first day on we felt totally at home. We highly recomend this place for your visit in Porto. Thank you very much Aida & Francisco

A great appt, equipped and prepared for your visit with love and attention. An extra thank to Aida for the restaurant recommendation (Churrasqueira Central das Antas). But be prepared to walk to the metro station for 10-15 min. We had a great pleasure stayed there.
Amazing place, climate, space! Everything was great! When we come back to Porto, we totally want to have time at this place again! Thank's a lot! It was a pleasure to be there!

La estancia en Oporto fué magnifica gracias entre otras cosas a la casa de Aida y Francisco. Estuvimos muy a gusto, una casa increíble sobre todo para los meses de verano ya que lo mejor de la casa es ese fantástico patio con barbacoa. Una casa cómoda y muy bien equipada, todo muy bien!!
Gracias.
A charming property with a lovely outside space and bbq. We had a lovely stay and would come again. Use buses and taxis to get into the middle of Porto. The local restaurants and shops are great.

maison cosy et agréable malgré quelques détails à parfaire: four et lave vaisselle fonctionnent mal. le bruit de la ventilation du restaurant voisin ainsi que temporairement celui des travaux de l'immeuble voisin peuvent gâcher le plaisir de profiter d'une cour sinon agréable. supermarché à 5 mn et métro à 15. nous n'avons pas eu le plaisir de faire connaissance avec les propriétaires.
Great house with a nice garden

Trés belle  maison  ,  mais  aussi  trés  bruyante, car trés  mal isolée  autant  phonique  que  par le  jour qui rentre  tôt  le  matin  car  pas de rideaux  fonctionnels.
le bruit de  la  ventilation du restaurant situé  à côté ne  nous  permet  pas  de  profiter de la terrasse  malheureusement.
nous n'avons  pas rencontré les  hôtes  ni à l'arrivée ni au départ .
obligé  de  laisser  les  clefs dans  la boite  aux lettres.

neighborhood_overview: It's located in Condominio Estrelas, Barra da Tijuca. A few meters from the Olympic Center, HSBC Arena and Rio Centro.  There are several restaurants and one supermarket in your door, exactly in front of the condominium. Barra da Tijuca is the highest standard place to live in Rio. The most safe neighbouthood in the city.
transit: There is a BRT station in your door (100 meters from the condominium)  You can go to the beach in less than 10 minutes by BRT It also connects to the Metro, where you can reach Copacabana, Maracanã, City Center and other places! There are also buses that will lead you to all over the city. We provide a printed guide to our guests with maps and information about transportation in Rio de Janeiro. If you prefer travelling by car, there is one private parking lot inside the condominium, free of charge. There is also a taxi company next to the condominium (Villas da Barra Taxi)
access: Guests have access to all the items in the condominium, at no extra cost.
interaction: I'm available to solve any questions promptly thru the Airbnb email system. I'm also available by phone (for confirmed reservations).
house_rules: Horario padrão de checkin: 16h00 Horario padrão de checkout: ate 11h00 no ultimo dia * Animais de estimação são proibidos (qualquer tamanho) * Visitantes são proibidos (todos os ocupantes precisam estar registrados no condominio) * As piscinas do condomínio requerem atestado médico simples, emitidos há no máximo 6 meses. Uma copia deve ser enviada para nós 15 dias antes do seu checkin, e os originais precisam ser trazidos em sua viagem. * O valor da estadia inclui um consumo razoável de energia, sem desperdícios, com os aparelhos de ar condicionado durante 10 horas diárias. Havendo utilização superior, a quantidade de kwh será cobrada de forma adicional.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Hello, I'm Gustavo, I work and live part time in Rio (Brazil) and part time in Lisbon (Portugal). I'm a company administrator and computer analyst, graduated in PUC-Rio in 2006. 

I manage some apartments that belong to my family, and I love to receive groups and families from all around the world.

Hobbies: cooking barbecue and hamburgers, listening to rock and roll, tasting new brands of beers worldwide and going to the beach whenever possible.

Whenever I travel, I like being hosted confortably in spacious places and confortable beds. That's what I try to bring to my guests!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Ficamos no apartamento de 3 quartos no Condomínio Estrelas. 
Gustavo foi extremamente simpático e o apartamento, além de bem localizado, é uma graça!
O Anfitrião mantém um guia com as principais atrações turísticas do Rio e com os principais serviços disponíveis por perto, o que facilita muito a vida de quem não conhece a região. 
Gostamos muito da experiência e vamos repetí-la com certeza!
O Gustavo foi muito atencioso e prestativo!! Adoramos a estadia! Recomendo a todos!

Gustavo's apartment was great. I stayed there with my husband and 5 friends during the World Cup. Even with 7 of us, we had plenty of space. The apartment was well cleaned before we got there, the wifi worked well, and they were extremely friendly at the front gate. The apartment is really close to the brt station, which is a good way to travel if you don't want to pay more for taxis. The taxis can be a bit pricy because this apartment is pretty far from the main attractions like Copacabana, Cristo, and Sugar Loaf Mountain. The only drawback from this place is the location away from the city center. It takes close to 45 minutes in a taxi and 1 hour and 30 minutes on a bus. All in all, I definitely recommend this apartment.

PRO TIP: be sure to visit the Mexican restaurant across the street. Seriously some of the best food we had while there, and the owner is incredibly nice.

Gustavo was a brilliant host. He answered all queries straight away and could not have been more helpful.

The apartment was clean, spacious and well connected to the centre of Rio by the bus routes. We had a fantastic time an would definitely go again.

Thanks Gustavo!
todo excelente gustavo es un muy buen anfitrión
todo excelente
el apartamento es excelente  y si cumplió  con mis expectativas
EXCELENTE ATENCIÓN GUSTAVO Y LUCIANA SON PERSONAS MUY AMABLES.. ME SENTI COMO EN MI CASA
Ótimo apartamento, com bom acesso à região, o centro comercial em frente ajudou bastante também. E a proximidade da estação do brt é bem interessante. Muito bom.

Tivemos uma ótima estadia no apartamento de Gustavo,  só não gostamos da recepção ao chegar no primeiro dia, entramos em contato com Luciana que dizia nos aguardar para nos receber, mas não foi o que aconteceu ela não apareceu, e em tão começamos a negociar nossa entrada pelo celular, foi bem difícil pedir a autorização no prédio para a nossa entrada e de nossa família, ficamos umas 2 horas negociando com o porteiro, estávamos bem cansados e com fome. Mas apesar do previsto gostamos do condomínio, do apartamento que é  bem aconchegante e também dos vizinhos.

We had a great time at Gustavo's apartment. The condominium is fantastic and the apartment has everything that you may need. We have contacted Luciana directly - she was very helpful and we did not have any problems with access.
Deu tudo certo, cumpriu tudo que combinamos e foi tudo muito pratico. Recomendo o Gustavo. Muito simpatico e atencioso

O apt era como descrito  e como eu esperava. Espaçoso, split nos quartos, eletrodomesticos completos como maquina de lavar roupas e secar, liquidificador, ferro, misteira, microondas. A localização é ideal proxima  a vila olimpica e com padaria, mercadinho e varejão na porta!! Além do BRT. Me hospedarei de novo com certeza, só precisa investir num jogo melhor de panelas.
Bonito departamento. Cómodo buen excelente barrio pero lejos de el centro
Apartamento muito bom, exatamente como está nas fotos! O Gustavo e a Luciana foram muito atenciosos! Recomendo!
nice apartment close to the rio centro. Market and bakery just in front of the building entrance.

Muito top, localização excelente, muito perto de praias lindas como a Prainha, Recreio e Grumari. O apartamento tem muita comodidade na frente, muitas variedades mesmo... (comida japonesa, pizza, hambúrguer, padaria, mini mercado, farmácia,  tudo funcionando e top, área  de lazer excelente com uma linda piscina e bar com bons petiscos. p apartamento tem  uma varanda grande 
muito legal. gostamos muito mesmo!

Essa foi minha primeira experiência pela Airbnb, todo o processo de contratação foi rápido, pratico e seguro. Tivemos alguns contra-tempos no checkin e alguns procedimentos de uso do condomínio e apartamento deveriam ter sido mais evidentes. O apartamento poderia estar mais limpo do que encontramos e as roupas de cama deveriam ser brancas, isso dá maior segurança de limpeza. Nada que não possa ser resolvido.

Apartamento muito bem localizado. Tem um centro comercial bem na frente do prédio (pão fresco e todos os ouros itens sempre à disposição) o que facilita demais o dia a dia. Gustavo é muito organizado e o checkin no imóvel é muito fácil. Obrigado Gustavo!!!
Ambiente organizado, agradável e bem localizado.
Não gostei dos serviços de portaria !!!

La verdad que el lugar es lindo, si puedes utilizar los amenities como pileta, gym y sauna, por los cuales pagas el precio publicado, pero necesitas una tarjeta electrónica que el anfitrión nunca te llega a dar a pesar de las reiterados pedidos. La entrada al complejo es bastante engorrosa ya que como no sos propietario, la seguridad te pide todos los datos para entrar y salir todas las veces. El lugar es bastante alejado de los puntos de interés, y para ir y volver se hace complicado por el alto tráfico en las autopistas. No volvería al mismo hospedaje por ese precio, calculando el gasto en combustible y tiempo que se pierde yendo y viniendo.
Gustavo Gracias por tu hospitalidad

apartamento muito bem localizado para quem vai na Jeunesse arena, ótimo condomínio com várias facilidades. restaurante e mini mercado na porta do prédio! o apartamento muito bom, acomodou tranquilo 6 pessoas.

O apartamento é igual nas fotos.
Gustavo responde sempre que solicitado. Nós gostamos. 
Minha maior decepção foi não ter um filtro de água(quem for compre agua mineral) , tbem não tinha pano de prato e um pano de pia. E não tem sal etc, como esta descrito no anúncio. 
Mas foi uma experiência muito positiva.

O condomínio é muito bem localizado e seguro.
Na frente do condomínio tem restaurantes, farmácia e mini mercado.
Região tranquila, pode-se caminhar tranquilamente na rua, mesmo a noite.
O condomínio é muito completo, possui até um bar em frente a piscina, que serve inclusive aperitivos e hambúrguer.
 Ótimo custo benefício!
Senti falta de melhores orientações para a entrada no bloco do prédio.
Quem tem criança pequena deve cuidar, pois a porta do apartamento não tranca do lado de dentro, ou seja, a criança consegue abrir sozinha a porta.
Os lençóis não são brancos, nem as toalhas, e também não tinham aquele cheirinho de amaciante haha, então para hóspedes mais exigentes, o ideal seria levar sua própria roupa de cama e banho.
Não é próximo a praia, leva uns 20 minutos de carro (ou mais, depende do trânsito).

Estes são apenas pequenos detalhes.
Amei minha estadia! Se eu fosse novamente para o Rio, com certeza alugaria novamente o mesmo apartamento!!
Lugar aconchegante, limpo e bem localizado. Acomoda bem 7 pessoas. Banco, supermercado , farmácia e shopping próximo. Anfitrião com excelente disponibilidade!

É como esta nas fotos, o condomínio precisa de pintura mas entendo que local perto de
Praia está suscetível a ficar mais deteriorado mesmo, a piscina poderia ficar até as 22h no verão devido ao calor, mas isso é regra do condomínio, mas de maneira geral são áreas bem cuidadas e tem regra, é isso é otimo pra quem buscar um ambiente mais familiar.

Bem localizado, o apartamento atendeu as nossas expectativas. Além disso, a questão da segurança e qualidade também nos foi bastante agradável. A única ressalva que temos pra fazer foi a respeito das duas televisões só pegar um canal (globo) . Viajamos com meu pai e minha mãe que são idosos e a televisão e um elemento essencial para a distração deles. Embora o Gustavo tenha respondido as msg e tenha se prontificado em pedir pra alguém ir até o apto para verificar o que estava ocorrendo, nada foi feito. Este foi o único ponto negativo é que apesar de parecer simples, não me faria voltar lá com os meus pais.

name: Private 1 bedroom apartment in Redfern, Sydney
summary: Our apartment is positioned in a buzzing neighbourhood known for its trendy bars, cozy eateries and walk-to-everywhere location. We’re less than 400 metres from Redfern Station and only 3 kilometres from the Sydney CBD.  With every convenience just a short stroll away, our home is perfect for both travellers and business visitors. Stay where the action is and experience the trendy side of Sydney!
space: Our apartment provides everything needed to be the perfect base for your stay. The apartment offers 1 bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and a spacious open plan living area leading onto a quiet entertaining balcony. The modern kitchen contains gas cooking and high-quality cooking appliances. Complete with a desk/study area for planning your next day our or working from home, the apartment offers an abundance of extras to make your stay as comfortable as possible.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is positioned on the border of Redfern and Alexandria and is less than 3 kilometres from the Sydney CBD. Throughout the area there are countless cafes, bars, restaurants and parks.  Redfern and Alexandria have a wide range of dining and bars to choose from such as The Lord Raglan, The Dock, Redfern Continental and Kepos Street Kitchen. Neighbouring suburbs such as Surry Hills, Erskineville and Newtown also host an enormous selection of venues to choose from. Known for its café culture and brunch scene, Alexandria is home to some of Sydney’s finest food and coffee such as in warehouse the most sought after cafes in Sydney such as The Grounds and Bread & Circus. Popular nearby parks such as Prince Alfred Park and Alexandria Park offer expansive green space as well as tennis courts, play equipment and a swimming pool.
transit: Redfern Station is a short 400 metres walk which provides immediate access all areas of the Sydney CBD. There is a Bus Stop directly in front of the building providing further convenient access. For a more scenic commute, Sydney’s cycleways can be reached through nearby George Street and span throughout the inner-city suburbs.
access: •Secure access to the building and apartment •ADSL Wireless Broadband •Entertaining balcony  •Queen sized bed •Linen and towels provided •Soap, shampoo and conditioner provided •LED TV’s in living area •Full kitchen with all utensils and cutlery •Espresso Coffee Machine •Washing machine and dryer •Iron and ironing board •Netflix Guests also have access to the building’s communal swimming pool.

reviews.comments: Jess was extremely helpful & a great host. Lovely apartment close to public transport, lots of restaurants & bars close by.

I stayed in Jess' apartment for five days and had a wonderful time. The flat is really clean and in a handy location for getting around Sydney. There's some really nice coffee and brunch places nearby and it's close to the redfern station. 

Jess is a great host and her communication is excellent. Would definitely come back and stay here again.

Had a great stay at jess's apartment.
Place was sparkly clean, bed was comfy, pool was nice. Everything is as Jess said in the description. One stop to central station but spent most of my free time neandering newtown and erskineville. 
There is some street noise but it wasnt enough to bother me if you keep the windows shut its fine. This place was really a pleasant surprise after my last air bnb experience. Thanks for having me Jess 10/10 would stay again.

Great apartment in a great central location near the station and lots of bars and restaurants. Everything was as described and  I really enjoyed my stay. Would definitely stay here again if I find myself back in Sydney!

Perfect location, close from shops and train station, literraly in front of bus stops. Even walking to the center is easy. Redfern/alexandria is a lively neigbordhood, with pubs, barber shop, cofe, etc.
The apparment is really good, everything necessary, just perfect, nothing to add.
And Jess his a really nice host, respond super fast and there if needed. 
Higly recommanded.
Great place to stay, I was in town for work and it was really convenient to the CBD and a very comfortable stay.

Very nice and clean place with all the facilities...very kind hosts...10 min walk from  redfern station and wil hav to climb stairs( no lift) ...loved staying at ur place and definitely would like to be back again
Jess and Matt were great hosts and very responsive. The apartment is centrally located and an easy walk to the train.
Excellent location in a quiet secure building. Enjoyed my stay.

This is the BEST HOST ever!! So sweet and nice! Thanks for taking caring of us, me and my family really enjoy our staying^^ Thank you so much!! You guys gonna love this city as well^^
Sincerely from Abess
这个区域没什么人~走路去Train十分钟｡楼下的Thai Food的炸鸡翅很好吃｡提前到的,房东很客气的提前送来了钥匙,房子很干净很喜欢｡感觉房子隔音不是特别好不过邻居没有很吵｡
Jess's place was perfect for our weekend stay in Sydney! Just a five minute walk to the train station, some nice coffee shops nearby and the apartment itself was exactly as described. Thanks Jess!
Super appartement bien situé à proximité de la gare de Redfern. Bien équipé. On s'y sentait comme à la maison. Très bonne communication avec Jess. Je recommande sans problème.

This a spacious, surprisingly quiet unit given its location on a main road. The amenities are nice with a spacious balcony and outdoor setting at the back. 


Would stay again!

I do not normally care to write reviews but I had to after staying at this apartment in Redfern. The entire apartment is lovely and it is directly near the train station. The value of the property is great. Unfortunately, just about every Airbnb rental does not allow you to have parties or any big events, including this apartment. However, this apartment complex has a pool and a place to grill out (where you can bring people) which really sets it apart from other Airbnb rentals. What really surprised me was the excellent hospitality. Jess is extremely trusting and nice because she would always help me out with any possible inconvenience that I encountered. For example, once I requested to stay one night less because of my financial budget since I am a broke college student. Jess said that's fine and asks if she can pay me electronically (for the night that I would not be staying), but I had to ask her if she could pay me in cash because I had zero in my bank account (It takes a few days to transfer) and I needed the money for food for that week (However, I didn't tell her that). I felt bad asking for the cash to be delivered because I knew she had to take care her 3 - week old baby but it was like essential. Without hesitation, she dropped off the money the next day in cash and she didn't know how much that helped me out. Also, they provide you with a pamphlet that lists places to eat nearby, they give you privacy, jess constantly responds to your text messages immediately, and they have the place refurbished with every possible necessity. You would think that they wouldn't care about you and your stay after you give them a down payment, but unlike most Airbnb's, they want you to have a great stay even after you pay. It's like staying at a hotel. I highly recommend this place in particular because I researched all of the possible Airbnb rentals for hours and this was by far the best-valued one that I could find.

It was an amazing place. Very close to station. Close to supermarket and shops.

Clean, quiet and safe place. Well Done Jess for helping me out and my parents for staying there. You made them feel more than like their house.

Would strongly recommend it and i look forward to come back again!!!!

Spacious and very comfortable apartment. Large terrace that allows you to enjoy breakfast, lunch and dinner outside. Very quiet community area with pool to enjoy in summer. There is also a BBQ in the communal area but it is unusable due to dirt. Apartment 10 minutes walk from Redfern station, with bus stop at the door and very well connected. It is 30 minutes walk from Town Hall and 20 minutes from the University of Sydney. Quiet neighbourhood although somewhat noisy due to traffic. In the neighbourhood, you can find all the necessary services. We were in the apartment for 3 months.
Good location, clean and comfortable apartment. Would recommend.
This apartment was really fantastic. Both Jess and her partner Matt were amazing hosts. Everything was so clean and comfortable. In a great location, really close to public transport and the city.

Jess was very friendly and helpful. 
I didn’t meet her but we talk by message. We arrive to the town at morning  and leave really late and she organise to leave us the appartement at 7am when we arrive and  leave us to leave the baggage until we fly back at night that make our couple of days to Sydney easier. 
The appartement was clean and nice. The bed is really comfortable. 
It’s really good place to stay when you want to be close to town but not in a middle with all trafic at night.
I’m gonna try to be back for sure. 
Thank Jess! 
Hanna.
Great location & very clean. Friendly and accomodating - I requested late check out and then also offered to look after my bags for me if I needed. Quick responses for any questions

Had a great stay at Jess’ place. Jess was very responsive at all hours of the day and Was extremely hospitable.  Very close to transport, parks, cafes and the CBD. Would recommend to anyone looking to stay in the Redfern or Alexandria area.

Beautiful apartment within a short walk of the station which is so close to the CBD. The apartment was clean and extremely homey! We found a lovely cafe near the station which we loved popping into before we headed out for the day. We had a fantastic stay!
This was an amazing stay!  The host is very hospitable, helpful, and the home is lovely.

The apartment is very nice, clean and comfortable! Loved the back balcony overlooking lawn/pool. Location is very convenient, near shops and public transport. Jess was very helpful and friendly; excellent communication. Took care of any situation that arose, as I stayed one month. She’s a super host!

Great location and facilities. Plan ahead however if you require parking - as with most of inner-city Sydney locations availability is difficult to come by. I pre-booked with Wilson Parking and caught a 10 min Uber.

Jess place is perfect, I didn’t want to leave it because have a great location, you can walk to the city And there is a supermarket very close so you can buy everything you need. I think is everything you need!
Jess very responsive to queries.  Apartment very well located for train station into Sydney Circular Quay in 15 minutes. Supermarket close by and numerous places to eat.
Really nice place and the pool was great. Redfern was a new area for us but we liked it a lot. Jess was very fast in responding to our questions both before and during the stay.
Jess' apartment was clean, comfortable & very spacious. Close to train station & supermarket. Great pool & balcony. Also quick response if any queries. Definitely recommended.

name: Self contained studio cabin (last minute standby)
summary: Attention: Late check in - no earlier than 6 pm. Occasionally I have last minute cancellations, booking alterations & all sorts of other unpredictable/unforeseen changes from guests. It's a real pain to try & work them back into the main listing so to keep things simple I just post all those sort of impromptu accommodation opportunities here. Standby bookings on this listing can be added to the ordinary bookings on my other listings for longer stays. See main listing for detailed description.
space: Because we'd like to have as many of our days more relaxed when possible and free to do the things we like, unfettered by a daily obligation to clean and service the granny flat in a very short rigid time frame, we prioritise our accommodation reservations on a 3-2-1 priority: • 2 weeks or more - bookings taken up to 6 months in advance. • 3 nights or more - bookings taken up to 3 months in advance. • 2 nights or more - bookings taken up to 2 months in advance. • No minimum stay - bookings taken up to 1 months in advance. Each of these options has a separate specific listing on our profile. Occasionally, when odd left over days happen between multiple night bookings, we make them available early for shorter stays on the other listings. So if you're getting in early for a single night or two and our accommodation doesn't seem to be available it may be worthwhile checking back later when short stays are opened up for booking on our calendar.  Alternatively (if you are really keen to stay

It's a real pain to try & work them back into the main listing so to keep things simple I just post all those sort of impromptu accommodation opportunities here. Standby bookings on this listing can be added to the ordinary bookings on my other listings for longer stays. See main listing for detailed description. Because we'd like to have as many of our days more relaxed when possible and free to do the things we like, unfettered by a daily obligation to clean and service the granny flat in a very short rigid time frame, we prioritise our accommodation reservations on a 3-2-1 priority: • 2 weeks or more - bookings taken up to 6 months in advance. • 3 nights or more - bookings taken up to 3 months in advance. • 2 nights or more - bookings taken up to 2 months in advance. • No minimum stay - bookings taken u
neighborhood_overview: If you insist on lovely suburban tidy townness, neatly trimmed herbaceous borders, minimalist generic and tediously `nice` hotel decor, or twee boutique pensions this may not be the place for you, but then again you probably should be reconsidering staying in and about Newtown on that criteria.  Our fantastically artistic and creative surrounds (Newtown  / Marrickville / Enmore / St Peters) are one of the funkiest hubs of Australia, a rare inner city island resounding with alternative anti-gentrification energy and and sans bourgeoisie vitality - we live here because we love the community and our home is emblematic of that.
notes: 6 pm CHECK IN - you will not be able to enter the accommodation before this time. (Luggage may be deposited though earlier in the day). VERY IMPORTANT - STRICT CANCELLATION POLICY As this listing is for last minute and often same day bookings there is a strict cancellation policy in place. This means once you have booked your payment is not refundable upon cancellation. Once we confirm your booking request there is no refund if you change your mind or book other accommodation. There will always be a time lag between when you make your booking request and when it is accepted and confirmed - sometimes this is minuscule and we deal with your request almost instantaneously; other times, for other reasons, it may take considerably longer to get back to you.  WE DEAL WITH ALL BOOKING REQUESTS ON THE ASSUMPTION THEY ARE LIVE - It is therefore your responsibility to cancel any as yet unconfirmed booking request BEFORE confirming and paying for alternative accommodation, or if you change your m
transit: Short stroll to St Peters railway station - just a couple of stops to the CBD or the airport (but a short taxi ride may be cheaper). King Street Newtown is close with all its buses. If you're a bit of walker town is not very far away or you're welcome to use one of the free bicycles.
access: Make yourself at home in our spacious yard - vegetable gardens taking shape from which you should be able to pick fresh produce for your cooking. There is a prolific spice garden right outside the kitchen - multiple fresh variants of both Asian and European herbs. Free WiFi access, fresh mangoes, papaya, lemons, dragon fruit, bananas, tomatoes and strawberries from the garden (in season), washing machine, worm farm... Mi casa es su casa - But be aware it is a working art and creative workshop of constantly shifting materials so some will be anarchic , neglected and frankly a bit messy.
interaction: Interact or not as much as you feel comfortable - the granny flat is yours alone while we're likely to be pottering about in the garden. Feel free to grab one of us if you want some local advice or history or philosophical discussions - similarly if you're here for a bit of a look around maybe we can lend a bit of a hand. Apart from that I can be as scarce or handy as you feel appropriate.

host.host_location: St Peters, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about:
Inveterate traveller who has spent a great proportion of my life on the road benefiting from the kindness of strangers - hitched, trekked, bicycled, motorcycled and trained independently to all sorts of far flung and unpronounceable points of the globe. Sometimes for years at a stretch. Extreme tourist as defined by Wikipedia. In between times a performer and photographer and occasionally all of the above simultaneously as photojournalist or touring actor.
I like to think I can tell great stories but I may be wrong...

During my idle hours I enjoy backpacking through universities collecting degrees and living a full life of adventure, discovery and art so if your interests and/or qualifications run to theatre, literature, fine arts, art history or the law then you've a ready partner for intellectual discussion.
A well stocked library is assured for convenient reference.

As you can probably tell I'm more than just a little bit xenophilic, enjoying the company of travellers, creative spirits and those just enjoying the freedom and discovery of the road.

My home is a sprawling quirkily evolving eclectic canvas; part tropical greenhouse and jungle, part improvisation workshop, part art studio, all of a slightly anarchic constantly changing composition. (I would never consider shopping at Ikea or watching any TV program involving adversarial reality and/or bogan house make overs, although I'm always enthralled and inspired by Kevin McCloud and Grand Designs.)

My place is a patchwork of sprawling, overgrown alternative comfortable anarchy.
If you insist on lovely suburban tidy townness, neatly trimmed herbaceous borders, minimalist generic and tediously `nice` hotel decor, or twee boutique pensions this may not be the place for you, but then again you probably should be reconsidering staying in and about Newtown on that criteria.
Our fantastically artistic and creative surrounds are one of the funkiest hubs of Australia, a rare inner city island resounding with alternative anti-gentrification energy and and sans bourgeoisie vitality - we live here because we love the community and our home is emblematic of that.
The vast majority of those who chose to stay with us seem to love it that way.

In any case hopefully our genuine hospitality and relaxed easy welcome will allow you to overlook some rougher edges in evolution and allow us to reciprocate the marvelous generosity we've benefited from in our travels.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you are a new Airbnb member, we have a few recommendations.
These three steps can be done by going to the main page after you login,
click on your name on the top menu for a drop down menu.
Select 'Edit Profile', and then:

1. Submit a photo of yourself on your profile.
2. Submit a phone number (mobile), email address and verify some form of identification [See https://www.airbnb.com/help/question/450 for more information about Verified ID].
3. Fill out information about yourself so we know who to expect.

Thank you.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you are yet to join Airbnb, but are just browsing our place for an affordable place to stay close to Newtown, you should follow this link www.airbnb.com.au/c/smenteith to join up. You will get some free Airbnb travel credit for your second trip and we'll get some Airbnb travel credit too.

reviews.comments: What a great space! Walking distance to Newtown for dinner a big plus. A bit of noise from the nearby Westconnex works.

Steven was lovely from the start & helped me bring my bags in and offered me some fresh strawberries from his garden which I thought was quite nice! The place was quite spacious and on a hot day it still felt cool inside. There was beautiful art around and the location was central. It was easy for me to find a parking spot as well. Even though it was at the back of Steven's place, I still feel like I had a lot of privacy. It was easy to catch a $20 uber into the city (although the train station is close if that's what you prefer). I'd definitely recommend staying here!

Walking distance to Newtown, comfortable and had a nice feel. 
Not on a busy street. 
No aircon, but wasn't an issue for us. We stayed on a hot night and it was fine! 
Small space but has everything you need.

Very convenient location within easy walking distance to the train station and handy to the city.  

Tidy and functional accommodation, good value for money.

Steven was friendly and easygoing and communication was good.

Thanks for having me to stay.
Our stay at Stevens place was great! We were a last minuet booking and everything was organised very quickly :) Comfy bed, close to everything,  and a delicious mango from their garden! Thanks guys
Everything is as described, pretty decent, was in Sydney for a quick work trip and was a good location and spacious unit.
Great value for money eh and not too far from St Peter's station
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
It is a nice place with your family.

Each AirBNB is as distinctive as a  finger print or DNA! Another worthwhile experience, another highly acceptable accommodation. The hosts are creative and cosmopolitan people, offering space for guests is a natural extension of their love for travel and interesting places and people. They were helpful and welcoming. Check in and out was hassle-free and straightforward. St Peters is a growing artistic hub in Sydney and this listing captures that ethos .Convenient to transport, 10 minutes by train from the CBD, comfortable, well equipped, the spaciousness of this listing is a real stand out feature and  3 people could fit in here. Read the description, the owners are accurate in their outline of the space, but nothing could be faulted in cleanliness, comfort and the facilities provided, would be happy to retur
Great spot. 5 stars all the way
Great location short walk to train station
Good proximity to international airport.
Comfortable space in the back yard of the property. Functional and ok for short stays. Some aircraft noise unavoidable being close to the airport. City buses about a 5-10 minute walk.

Excellent quiet convenient  city location with easy walk into Newtown, St Peters train station etc. Great hosts easy check in with everything you need for one night or extended stay. Heater was great and kept us lovely and warm on a cold night. Thanks guys!
Tisha and Jarrah.
Exactly what it says on the tin. Great location, private & clean.
Great host and amazing space. Accurate as per the description.  The dedicated entrance and onstreet parking really helped me relax. WiFi was great too.

we needed a place to stay nearby due to an ill relative, ended up arriving 5hours after we intended but even at 1am Steven came out to greet us and give any assistance. We just needed a place to crash and it turned out to be quite convenient and close to what we needed access to. Would stay again!
Awesome little hideaway in the midst of the urban sprawl.  Was only there for the night.  Cool little pad.  Everything was as described.
I checked in on a stand-by rate and as such Steven's place is good value for money.
Comfortable and clean. Priced accordingly.
Steven is lovely and his place is super cool.

We loved staying here - great location, easy transport into city and 20 min walk to Newtown which was great. Steven was friendly while also giving us space. The room was as described, not fancy but has everything you need and lots of space, it was perfect for us. Thank you we would definitely stay again!
It’s a good place to stay and Steven is a nice guy. Appreciated the place and I had a good sleep at his cabin. Cheers

A great place to stay if you are in need of last minute  or budget accommodation. Steve and Jesse are lovely and specifically came to introduce themselves to me after I arrived.  Parking on the street in the evening was fine and the location was convenient for me to get to roads that took me to the CBD, North Sydney and the Airport. 
As I was in Sydney on business, it would not be somewhere I would normally stay, but I found it safe and convenient. 
Thanks Steven and Jesse for your hospitality.
Fantastic hosts and awesome studio close to Newtown. Will definitely stay there again!
very cute space and very central!
Pleasant, comfortable and clean. There may be some aircraft noise in the morning, depending on the wind direction.
Stayed at Steven's place for a night as I was in transit and needed a place near airport. Clean and accurate listing. Had no issues with check-in. Good value for money.
Great value! Pretty spacious and artistic. The place is away from busy districts, so quiet and relaxing. You have everything you need for your stay. Highly recommended!
Very nice and cosy space, perfect for relaxing
The excelent place to stay at least one night, close to all, and with a natural ambient that help you stay relax and confortable.
Great value!

Steven is a good communicator - prompt, clear and accurate.  The cabin is as Steven describes.  It is a short walk to the lower end of King Street, Newtown, and maintains the traditions of old Newtown.  Marrickville Metro (shopping centre) is very close too for supermarket shopping.  There is a lot of road construction going on at the moment, but Steven's place is a nice, retro haven away from the excesses of Sydney, yet close to the buzz of Newtown, St Peters station, and (as a result) many places connected via public transport.  Steven is the type of host you wish you had more time to spend chatting with.  It is a real 'airbnb' experience - living like a local - a Newtown local.  Steven isn't just someone making a buck, he's offering a local experience.  Steven describes the place honestly...if you want a sparkling Sydney harbour experience, look to the Eastern Suburbs of Sydney.  This is Newtown of old - and the better for that.

Wonderful spot!  You will not regret booking here!
Great host
This place is very reasonably priced and functional. I really appreciated that Steven let my sons stay without me being there, very understanding host!
Very affordable place to stay and this unit is very unique
Steven was very welcoming. Bed was very comfortable. Lovely little place.
Good value for the price.
Excellent location close to airport ... Steven was really friendly and nice... excellent spot for a stop over...Thanks Steven
Really good value, very comfortable stay!
Was really great
Quiet place, very good privacy. Definitely recommended
Terrific stay at Stevens, good location to the main street in Newtown and lovely self contained place for a stop over in Sydney!
V good value and service

I had a lovely stay at Stevens place. He was such a great host, and let me check in super early after a red-eye flight, and was very accommodating. The accomodation was clean and as appeared in photos on AirBnB. Steven was an excellent communicator and was quick with responses on AirBnB chat. Steven also had good tips for navigating the back streets as a shortcut to get to the local train station, and had some great restaurant suggestions. Thanks for a lovely stay :)
Nice cosy self contained accommodation
Cute place! Very homely and Steven is super welcoming.
Lovely
Thanks Steven for your cosy abode, will recommend to my friends if they need a place to stay near the theatre.

친절한 호스트; 저녁 늦게 도착했는데 호스트가 배웅나와주었습니다
내일 아침 먹을게 없어서 마트정보를 물어봤는데 친절히 답변해주었고 자신의 정원에서 손수기른 파파야, 오렌지를 포함해 바나나 등을 가져다 주었습니다

Steven’s place served as the perfect base for a few days in Sydney. I would describe the vibe as offbeat hippie chic - I loved the indoor plant festooned with tinsel and the guitar left for guests’ use. It might not be the newest place (don’t expect things to be showroom clean!), but it’s charming, neat and full of character. Steven was friendly and helpful, and made sure I had everything I needed for my stay.
Great little private space. Good vibes.
Great pad. Good space. Informative host. Terrific location.
Had a great chat and picked delicious snacks straight from the garden. Thank you for the one of a kind experience!
Everything you need. Nicely self-contained and good value.

Mostly was as described, clean, and we had a good stay. We were disappointed though as a big part of our decision to stay here was based on the ability to do washing and when we arrived the washing machine was broken. It would have been great if Steven had communicated this to us in advance as we would have stayed elsewhere.

Steven's studio is well equipped and a convenient walk to St Peters station.  
He's a thoughtful host prior to your visit, your arrival and happy to assist in any way during.
Clean, full apartment with friendly, cosy atmosphere but laid back, not too fussy. 15 minute walk from King St Shops. Good value.
Great place to stay and only about a 10 min walk to St Peter’s station, with a king st and Newtown just around the corner!
Very convenient location and great private space with all the ammeneties . Highly recommend.
Great location so close to the train and airport. Lovely funky vibe to the unit and Steven is a warm and friendly host.
Perfect and quirky little eclectic backyard cabin in Sydney's inner suburbs, close to train station, everything you need and a sense that you could be anywhere in the world!
Great location for getting about that part of town. Excellent value.

Awesome place to stay, especially if you’re into an artsy setting!
The garden is beautiful, filled with surprises! I thought it was cozy, though generous in space & nothing beats great hospitality, Steven looks after you. It was really nice!
Don't stay here...
This space is comfortable and has everything you’d need for a great stay. All interactions I had with Steven were very pleasant and I would highly recommend his place!

Good budget priced accommodation for one in St Peters. Self contained bedsit with all necessary cooking facilities, large bathroom and fans for cooling. Steven was an excellent host. He took me in as a last minute booking and was very flexible on check-in and check-out arrangements to fit in with my travel requirements.

Steven was considerate! 
Bungalow is described accurately. 
Steven had female toiletries which is often over-looked and was nice to see. Place appeared nice and clean, had all the kitchen utilities I needed. Even brought me over some milk for a cup of tea!  Mosquitoes were apparently a bit of an issue, but I didn’t even notice as Steven had gone to measures to try and stop it from being a problem with sprays, creams ect. Had Everything for it and I wasn’t annoyed by one once. 
Just make sure you read about the smoking policy if you’re a smoker, as You must smoke on the street, off the property.  Was great for my quick stay. Thank you!
Great place to stay. Stephen is a great host.

name: Resort style living
summary: Beautiful in any direction you travel. Clean quite home. Very safe neighborhood with a newly built mall about 2 miles away.
space: Newly built resort style living. All brand new amenities. Some snorkel, surf, and hike equipment available for use.
description: Beautiful in any direction you travel. Clean quite home. Very safe neighborhood with a newly built mall about 2 miles away. Newly built resort style living. All brand new amenities. Some snorkel, surf, and hike equipment available for use. Full access to all common area, kitchen, jacuzzi, pool, laundry room, lanai, snorkel equipment, and more. I work a full-time job and when I'm off I'm usually surfing, hiking, free diving, scuba, kite boarding.  Welcome to join me in any activity I am doing during my free time. It's Hawaii. Gorgeous in any direction you go. Bus stop is about a 15 minute walk. Recommend a rental car. I sometimes have a rental car available for discounted rate. Ask if interested Rental car highly recommended. Bus stop is about a 15 minute walk away. May have rental car available.

host.host_about: I enjoy surfing, scuba diving, paddle boarding, snorkeling, hiking, and more. Which makes Hawaii the perfect place to live.  After living in various locations all over the world I am happy to call Hawaii home.

reviews.comments:
Place very clean and quite. The host very friendly.
I recommend it.
Nice place with a comfortable bed! Hosts are easy to communicate with!
Alex’s place is amazing! The area is gorgeous and loved that it was in gated community so safety for sure! He was friendly easy to talk to and great host. If I would totally recommend him to others!
This place is totally titts yo.
Place was awesome! If you are looking to stay in the Ewa Beach area and you’re not staying here you are missing out on a great experience.

100% recommend.  My stay was wonderful.. from the huge comfy bed to the complimentary ride to the airport,  I would urge anyone to stay here if you like quiet comfortable housing with very friendly hosts.  Mahalo!
Great place, nice area, very comfortable.

name: Comfortable cottage near all Balmain's attractions
summary: You have exclusive access to one storey of a traditional weatherboard cottage at street level, no stairs. It is fully self-contained and private. You’ll find this is a typical Balmain neighbourhood; surrounded by historic hotels, harbour-side parks, cafes and restaurants. It's ideal for couples and solo travellers seeking a quiet area with free on-street parking and yet only a three-minute walk to the main shopping area and public transport.
space: The space retains many of its traditional timber cottage features, with the addition of a modern bathroom and well equipped mini-kitchen. The walls are decorated with collected prints, photography and original works by local artists. You will enjoy the sunny veranda and walled front garden.  A mini-kitchen is tucked into a corner of the lounge/dining room. With a bar fridge, microwave, induction hotplate and other appliances, you have everything you need to cook or order-in meals. Cooking utensils, tableware, tea, coffee and some basic ingredients are provided.
description: You have exclusive access to one storey of a traditional weatherboard cottage at street level, no stairs. It is fully self-contained and private. You’ll find this is a typical Balmain neighbourhood; surrounded by historic hotels, harbour-side parks, cafes and restaurants. It's ideal for couples and solo travellers seeking a quiet area with free on-street parking and yet only a three-minute walk to the main shopping area and public transport. The space retains many of its traditional timber cottage features, with the addition of a modern bathroom and well equipped mini-kitchen. The walls are decorated with collected prints, photography and original works by local artists. You will enjoy the sunny veranda and walled front garden.  A mini-kitchen is tucked into a corner of the lounge/dining room. With a bar fridge, microwave, induction hotplate and other appliances, you have everything you need to cook or order-in meals. Cooking utensils, tableware, tea, coffee and some basic ingredients
neighborhood_overview: Eight of Balmain's famous old pubs are within easy walking distance -- The William Wallace, The Royal Oak, and The Dry Dock are literally just round the corner -- all with bistro dining options.  A little further down the street is Mort Bay Park, a great vantage point for watching fireworks displays or starting your harbour-side walk.
notes: A Visitors Parking Permit is available for your use. It must be displayed on the dash of your vehicle to obtain unrestricted parking on the street outside the house. The local Council charges a $131.50 fee to replace lost permits, so please be sure to return the permit when leaving. * There is a walk-in shower in the bathroom, but no bathtub. * There is a portable air conditioner and ceiling fan for summer. Space heaters and electric blankets are provided in winter. * A change of towels and bed linen is included for bookings of seven days. * The lower storey of the cottage is home to two friendly cats who may stray into your front garden. Just shoo them away if they bother you.
transit: Take a ferry to town. It's only a five minute walk to the Balmain ferry wharf near Thames Street for trips to Circular Quay.  The Balmain East ferry wharf (at the end of Darling Street) has more frequent services to Darling Harbour and Circular Quay.  There are buses to the city (442, 441) usually every 10 minutes from nearby Darling Street, three minutes walk from the house. Frequent buses (433, 445) also serve other parts of the Inner West
access: The front door has a digital lock operated by a PIN code that is unique to your visit. The PIN-code entry allows for self-check in. You can arrive at a time that suits you. We are available to meet and greet you - or not - as you wish.
interaction: We are available at short notice to answer questions or assist you in any way we can. All the information you might need is in a printed manual. We will email all essential information when you confirm your reservation.
house_rules: Observance of these house rules would be greatly appreciated: * One or two persons only can stay. * Please leave the property as clean and tidy as you found it. * For your safety and convenience, follow the directions in the house manual regarding cooking, waste disposal and laundry. * If you use the Visitor's Parking Permit it must be returned before leaving. If it is lost or not returned, the local council's $131.50 replacement fee (!) will be charged against your deposit.  * The free standing cottage is divided into separate apartments on two levels. Please respect your neighbours next door and below by keeping noise to a minimum.

host.host_about: My wife Dianne and I have travelled the world  together for over 30 years. Now that we are hosting with airbnb we hope to create the character, convenience and comfort of the  accommodation that we liked in places as diverse as Bali, Provence, Andalusia, Kyoto, Marrakesh and Sicily.

reviews.comments:
Paul and Dianne offer a wonderful cosy cottage . I was so close to everything Balmain has to offer yet the location of the cottage was so quiet and peaceful. This was really a home away from home . 
Paul and Dianne where very welcoming and readily available if needed . The home was clean and very comfortable. 
I will definitely make this my first option each and every time. 
Thanks Paul and Dianne it was a pleasure to meet . 
Regards Nicole

Position .... position .... position. Our digs ticked all the boxes, close to public transport, eateries, markets & much much more. Paul & Dianne are great hosts & very helpful with the attractions of Balmain. The house is well presented with all the comforts of a home away from home. We would definitely stay here again on our next visit to Sydney town. Give Birchgrove a go ..... you will not be disappointed. Jan & Leigh.

Paul and Diannes place really feels like a home away from home. Such a perfect spot and parking in the street is easy and accessible. I love staying at this very homely and cosy cottage. Paul and Dianne are lovely hosts and extremely welcoming .

Paul and Dianne’s place was delightful! Paul greeted us when we arrived and showed us around. The place was compact but very clean and welcoming (they had even had the heaters running so it was nice and cosy when we arrived!). The decor was beautiful, with small vases of flowers everywhere. There was careful thought put into everything right down to the smallest detail, such as the shape of the small vases, two cups in the bathroom cupboard for washing your teeth, and beautiful soft towels. They had provided everything they could think of, which made the stay easy and convenient. 

The parking situation with the passenger wheels on the curb was annoying but location is perfect, less than 5 minutes walk to Darling Street with all its cafes and restaurants. We also walked easily to the wharf and caught the ferry into Circular Quay.

This is definitely an AirBnB we would love to stay in again!

Paul’s place is a beautiful gem. Lovely, tastefully decorated  retreat. Cute little courtyard where we often ate breakfast. The place is well set up for anything you might need. The location is perfect. Close to transport- buses, ferries and restaurants. Our hosts were lovely and we knew if we needed anything they were just a text away. Highly recommend. Jo and Ian

This cosy little cottage is in a fabulous location with so many dining options near by and a short walk to the ferry.  Very quiet street and tastefully decorated throughout. Paul was most welcoming on our arrival and close by should we need anything. Thank you for a great stay.

This place is amazing - in a great location.  Close to shops and buses which enable you to get into the city in around 20 minutes.  The ferry terminal is also close by.  

The accommodation is lovely and most importantly has a really comfortable bed with lovely pillows.  The wetroom was the highlight of the day which houses an amazing rainfall shower as well as attachments.  The hosts provide shower gel, shampoo, conditioner and gorgeous thick towels.  There was also an easy to use washing machine which again the liquid detergent is supplied.

The kitchen is small but very functional.  There is a fridge, microwave (which we didn't use), toaster, kettle and all the cutlery you will need.  Best of all there is a Nespresso machine and again pods are supplied but it might be a good idea to bring your own personal favorites.  

There is plenty of drawer and hanging space in the bedroom.  My only negative about this place is the smell of moth balls in the drawers and wardrobe.  There is also a safe in the wardrobe with an easy to remember code because it is the last 4 digits of your own phone number and this is also the case for the front door so no need to carry a key.

We would definitely stay here again as long as the hosts will have us back!

We had a lovely two weeks here in February.  The place is totally charming, full of character and has a delightful little private garden.  Paul and Diane were wonderful hosts and there were many thoughtful touches such as fresh flowers.  Nothing had been overlooked and everything was high quality.  Lovely comfy bed and pillows and beautiful linens and towels.  We found the location perfect, especially since we had no car.  Just a few minutes walk to the ferry terminal and a few minutes in the opposite direction to Darling Street which is full of shops and restaurants and great little coffee places.  Balmain itself is a wonderful place to stay with its views, beautiful old homes and great vibe, plus easy access to the city.  Highly recommended.
Great host, charming accommodation and fantastic location close to transport, local shops and many restaurants and cafes. Really quite perfect for couples or single traveller. Highly recommend.
A great experience.  Paul and Dianne were very attentive and charming hosts.   The cottage was thoughtfully appointed and was very comfortable  Balmain, an easy commute to the city and a quiet area.
A very neat little home very close to all the best of Balmain .Highly recommenced .
A great place to stay, highly recommended and Balmain is a very good base especially with the ferry so close by. We have already recommended it to some friends.

name: Granja Beach - Apartment
summary: A beautiful and modern duplex apartment 5 mins. walking distance from the Granja beach (and its salty water pool) considered one of the most glamorous sea side areas in Porto.  The apartment has all the facilities, 2 double bed rooms (with private bathrooms), TV, living room and a fully equipped kitchen.  High Speed Internet.  All linens and towels are provided. Access free of charge to the Gym and Hammam in the building from 08h-21h. Possibility to have 2 adult bikes.
space: The apartment is a duplex. There are stairs from the living room to the bedroom area.  Small children need to be surveilled when accessing them.
description: A beautiful and modern duplex apartment 5 mins. walking distance from the Granja beach (and its salty water pool) considered one of the most glamorous sea side areas in Porto.  The apartment has all the facilities, 2 double bed rooms (with private bathrooms), TV, living room and a fully equipped kitchen.  High Speed Internet.  All linens and towels are provided. Access free of charge to the Gym and Hammam in the building from 08h-21h. Possibility to have 2 adult bikes. The apartment is a duplex. There are stairs from the living room to the bedroom area.  Small children need to be surveilled when accessing them. Possibility of having 2 adult bikes available. Gym and Sauna in the building (free of charge). Available by mail and phone: (EMAIL HIDDEN) +(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) You will be 5 mins away (walking distance) of both the beach and the salty water pools of Granja.  There is a bike path and a walkway over the beach all along the southern shore between Espinho-Porto for a splendid walk
neighborhood_overview: You will be 5 mins away (walking distance) of both the beach and the salty water pools of Granja.  There is a bike path and a walkway over the beach all along the southern shore between Espinho-Porto for a splendid walk or run, enjoying the sea, the sun and breathtaking views of “Ribeira do Porto” (1 hour walking, 35 mins by bike). There is a small fishing port where you can buy fresh fish in the morning and a protected dune park area, both at Aguda beach (7 mins. walking distance). The beaches have beach-volley courts, surf and kite surf areas.  For Golf enthusiasts, there is the ”Golf Club Miramar".  One can find several shops, restaurants and bars along the beaches. Also available are small markets, butcher, bakery, pharmacy, supermarket, etc. (5-10 mins. away, walking distance). Espinho's casino is 15 mins away, south (walking distance). The Miramar beach with the "Nossa Senhora da Pedra" chapel built on stone, (location elected one of the best beaches in Europe by the "European Be
notes: No special rules, just treat the place as if it was yours: Please take good care of our belongings, and please leave them in the same condition they were found.  Please remove street shoes when walking inside to keep the wooden parquet in excellent condition.  Please respect neighbours and keep noise to a minimum from 10pm - 7am. Please close windows, switch off lights, and lock the door when going out for the day. Lots of care has been put into the apartment. Enjoy your stay as much as possible. :) No smoking inside. ONLY in the terrace/balcony. Pets not allowed.
transit: You will be in an excellent position to go around (5 mins away walking of the train station), trains every 10/15/30 mins. both to Porto (12-15 mins. total time downtown) and to the south side (city of Aveiro,  40 mins. total time downtown). If coming by car, you have free parking available located in front of the building.
access: Possibility of having 2 adult bikes available. Gym and Sauna in the building (free of charge).
interaction: Available by mail and phone: (EMAIL HIDDEN) +(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)

I'm Portuguese but living in Geneva for a while now.
