address.street: Arcozelo, Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal

reviews.comments:
Die Wohnung ist super genial und hält nicht nur was sie verspricht sondern überbietet es. Sowohl die Ausstattung wie auch die Lage (5min zu Fuss bis zum Bahnhof oder zum Strand). Alles was man benötigt ist vorhanden. Sogar zwei Sonnenschirme und einen Wundschutz für an den Strand.
Zudem stehen 2 Bikes zur Verfügung um entlang der Promenade eine Tour zu machen.
Im Ort hat es in Fussnähe abechslungsreiche Restaurants, auch ein traditionell portugiesisches.
Die Wohnung können wir deshalb vollstens weiterempfehlen.

Merci beaucoup à Joao et sa famille pour son excellent accueil. Nous avons pu profiter de la plage ( 10 min) et de la ville de Porto qui est à 15 minutes en train ou voiture .
Tres bel appartement. Nous recommandons ce logement pour ceux qui souhaitent être au calme et à proximité de toutes les commodités.

El apartamento era perfecto, aún más bonito que en las fotos, el lugar es muy bonito y tranquilo, con la playa a tres minutos a pie y a veinte minutos de Oporto por autopista. Joao y Andreia son encantadores y siempre pendientes de nosotros. Sin duda repetiremos.
Appartement tres agreable et tres bien situe pour visiter Porto et ses environs. Plage et gare a 5 minutes a pied. Promenade le long de la plage tres bien amenagee. Ideal pour joggers et randonneurs.

Respecto al piso muy completo, muy cómodo, muy amplio, montamos bici en familia, además de limpio, la ubicación no puede ser mejor. Esta muy cerca de una estación de tren y así no tuvimos q coger el coche para nada. Vacaciones para todos. ES UNA ESTANCIA PERFECTA PARA CONOCER OPORTO Y ALREDEDORES. Gracias Andreina y Pedro por su recibida, una pareja entrañable.

La casa es magnífica, muy muy limpia y con todos los detalles para sentirte como en tu propia casa. Esta muy cerca de la playa y de otras playas preciosas cogiendo el coche. Además está a unos 20 min en coche de Oporto lo que permite combinar turismo y playa. João estuvo pendiente en todo momento facilitandonos las llegada y recomendaciones para hacer cosas alli. Una experiencia inmejorable y por supuesto recomiendo muchísimo su alojamiento.

Estuvimos muy a gusto en la casa. Las fotos son muy fieles a la realidad y el piso es muy acogedor, espacioso y está muy bien equipado (probablemente el mejor en el que hemos estado, no le falta detalle). A 5 min de la playa andando, cerca de la estación de tren que comunica con Oporto en 15 minutos y con Aveiro y en la zona es fácil moverse en coche para ir a las playas cercanas que son muy bonitas. Joao y su hermano fueron muy atentos con nosotros y dispuestos a ayudarnos y la recepción fue una sorpresa muy agradable. :)

Hemos pasado unos días muy agradables en casa de Jõao y Sofía. Muy cómodos cuando volvíamos de la playa y de hacer turismo. No le falta ninguna comodidad y Jõao se ha encargado en todo momento de indicarnos sitios y darnos consejos para hacer más fácil la estancia
Nous avons passé un très beau séjour, le logement est fidèle aux photos . Je vous le recommande.

We were greeted by the host's relative Pedro who was very welcoming and friendly. Nothing was too much for either Pedro or Joao and the communication was great. 

The apartment had everything we needed and the bikes were an added bonus and helped us get to a great beach nearby. We enjoyed the apartment so much we didn't want to leave! 

The neighbourhood was fabulous, the train station is only a 5 minute walk. There is a local shop less than 5 minutes away with a cafe and a restaurant around the corner which are lovely and reasonably priced. 

We hope to visit again soon. 

Thanks so much for having us :)
Good size, modern and quite residential
Really good time spent there. The appartment is beautiful and quiet. Loved it
La casa es mucho mas grande de lo que parece en las imágenes y la reforma es de gran calidad. Muy recomendable. Equipada con todo. Ideal ubicación. El sitio es maravilloso.
Fui cobrado por algo que não danifiquei. E a justificativa foi que não informei o problema logo que ele ocorreu.
L’appartement est très bien équipé. Proche de la plage. L’hôte est très réactif par rapport aux messages et aux éventuels questions. Super séjour

Tout est excellent dans cet appartement a procimité de la plage et des commerces
Mais un bémol pour le bruit du train
El alojamiento es de alta calidad,  el equipamiento  muy completo, las habitaciones son muy amplias, he tenido una estancia muy cómoda.

Excellent séjour dans l’appartement de João... appartement conforme aux photos et à l’annonce.
Appartement propre, lumineux et très bien équipée. Résidence calme et bien entretenue. La gare est à 10 mn a pieds et nous relie en 20 mn
Nous avons profité des vélos mis à notre disposition chaque jour pour faire les courses ou des grandes balades grâce aux pistes cyclables.
La mer est à 10 mn à pied mais il y’a beaucou de rocher. Nous avons préféré marcher 20mn et profiter de la plage Aguda.
La communication avec João et son frère était réactive et très amicale.
Nous avons profité de leur bonnes adresses pour visiter la région.
Nous recommandons vivement cet appartement.

Nous avons eu un excellent appartement, nous étions très près de la plage!. Il y a eu un petit problème de frigo et on a eu un nouveau frigo le samedi soir à 11:00! Chaque fois que nous avons communiqué avec João les communications étaient très efficaces !

name: Quiet Williamsburg apartment
space: My recently renovated apartment is located off the Montrose L stop and is a convenient 12 minute train ride (4 stops) into the city. The train station itself is located 2 blocks from the apartment and is walking distance to many great restaurants and bars in the area. There is also a laundromat located directly below and a 24 hour convenience store situated at the corner. about the apartment: It features a brand new kitchen, bathroom, dark hardwood floors, brand new fixtures, a reading lounge with exposed brick, cable tv, super high-speed internet (50mbps down) air conditioning, and accommodates 4 with the use of the pullout sofabed located in the living room. Perfect for solo adventurers, couples or small families!
description: My recently renovated apartment is located off the Montrose L stop and is a convenient 12 minute train ride (4 stops) into the city. The train station itself is located 2 blocks from the apartment and is walking distance to many great restaurants and bars in the area. There is also a laundromat located directly below and a 24 hour convenience store situated at the corner. about the apartment: It features a brand new kitchen, bathroom, dark hardwood floors, brand new fixtures, a reading lounge with exposed brick, cable tv, super high-speed internet (50mbps down) air conditioning, and accommodates 4 with the use of the pullout sofabed located in the living room. Perfect for solo adventurers, couples or small families! The L is conveniently located 2 blocks away (2-3 minute walk) and is about 12 minutes from Manhattan and 5 minutes from bedford avenue.
transit: The L is conveniently located 2 blocks away (2-3 minute walk) and is about 12 minutes from Manhattan and 5 minutes from bedford avenue.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: From New York City, love to eat, shoot photos, travel and cycle.

reviews.comments:
Staying at Jae's place was a great first experience for me with airbnb. Prior to confirming booking Jae was very helpful and answered a number of questions about the apartment, the area and transport to Manhattan etc. He replied without delay. 
Jae was really accommodating about my arrival time, and met me at the apartment.
The place is great. Recently refurbished so everything is brand new. It's a great space for two people - maybe four since there is a sofa bed in addition to the double bedroom. The apartment is bright with windows all round and two skylights for additional light and ventilation. AC worked well. 
I loved the local neighbourhood. Nice pub two minutes away (Duck Duck) and a couple of organic delis and an awesome bagel shop for breakfast and coffee (Bread Brothers). The L train station is 5 mins walk, and midtown Manhattan is about ten minutes on the train. I had to commute to the UN building and it took me 30 minutes door to door. 
Jae was a great host. The apartment is family run so they have a vested interest in making it really welcoming. He even left beer in the fridge for me! Highly recommended.

The word Awesome doesnt do it for Jae. He is a top top host. The place is proper and clean. He was very helpful when we booked the place as it was our first time using airbnb. He was there to greet us when we arrived and showed us the place. What an awesome experience using airbnb and Jae's place. I will definitely be using his place again next time. Thank you Jae!

Jae's place was great. Really nice apartment and everything was clean and we even had brand new towels.

It was more spacious than most places you will find in New York and the price is definitely reasonable.

Jae was very accommodating with our check in time and was very helpful with everything we asked about. 

Highly recommend!

We had a wonderful time at Jae's place. He is a very nice host and the apartment is modern, clean and convenient, not far from the subway and shops. Next time we come back to New York, we will contact him again for sure!
Clean, modern apartment, located near train station. Jae was a great host, helpful and quick to respond. I highly recommend and would stay again.
Jae was very professional and responsive. Apartment was nice size, clean and in a great location.

This was my first time using airbnb. Jae was a great host to me and my friends. He have us our space but when we needed help he was always there to help us out :) I would definitely stay at jaes again if ever in the NYC area

Jae was there waiting for us at the door when we arrived, and was there on the phone or through airbnb msgs when we needed him. The apartment is great, really spacious and clean. It has some really good bars and cafés nearby and is super easy to get into Manhattan via the L train just around the corner. It is well worth exploring Brooklyn though. You could spend weeks finding all the little delights of NYC. We didn't want to leave!

We had a great stay at the apartment. The place was exactly as we expected and was really near the L train a few minutes from Manhattan. There are lots of shops, coffee shops and food spots right beside the apartment. I would recommend this place and would stay there again if I was visiting NYC.

Clean, well-stocked apartment in Brooklyn, just two blocks from the L Train. Great bar around the corner too "Duck Duck". Jae is helpful, polite, even carried my (heavy) bag up and down the stairs for me! Thoroughly recommend.

We had a great stay at Jae's apartment, it was very clean, stylish, modern and quiet. Really close to subway and walking distance (about 25 mins) to the main Williamsburg Bedford Ave strip, Jae's place was lovely to come home to after our busy days out. It was lovely having a kitchen, lounge, tv etc. as it felt like a home away from home!

We had a wonderful stay at Jae's apartment. Everything from the cleanliness, to the temperature, was very accommodating. Just a short distance from the nightlife on Bedford Ave. and we took a cab from lower Manhattan to the apartment, that only cost us $13! There is a nice neighborhood bar 20 yards from the door of the apartment, and another decent spot just around the corner. This place is great, would definitely come back and stay again.

appartement très agréable, propre et très calme.
proche du métro. nous avons passé un très bon séjour
et nous recommanderons cet appartement à des amis.

Everything was smooth at Jae's place. It was warm and clean. He has really good communication and helped us out with any questions. I would recommend staying here while visiting NYC. *Please make sure to check the address - the pin on the map didn't quite match the actual location.
very nice, clean apartment in Brooklyn. We would definitely stay here again. It is stocked with just the right amount of amentities, and Jae was very helpful and attentive.

From the moment I placed an inquiry into Jae's apartment I have nothing but good things to say. The apartment is perfect!! The location is perfect! Jae's an excellent host and I look forward to staying it his place next time I am in NYC.

I was in NY for a few days to work (and play) and Jae's place was perfect.

Very clean and recently renovated, with a full kitchen, TV, wifi, cable, etc. Two blocks away from the subway and a short walk to many great restaurants and bars around Brooklyn.

We had a great time and Jae was very nice and helpful.

Jae's place was great!! The place was the perfect size for two and clean/modern...also definitely quiet:) Very close to the Montrose subway stop, which was convenient. Jae is also very nice and replied quickly to emails. My boyfriend and I would stay there again!

Jae's apartment was great! Very clean, very pleasant, & quiet. The location was great too - a couple blocks from the subway, grocery stores nearby & quick eats. The apartment is very simply furnished - but totally comfortable.  The kitchen is supplied very nicely for those doing any cooking (we did zero).  Jae is a great host - great communications, efficient, timely, and very helpful.

We had a great, easy stay & will certainly stay again if possible!

Jae was an amazing host! Not only did he carry my luggage upstairs, he was kind and very inviting. My only qualm with the apartment was how it is listed as a "quite Williamsburg apartment" when it actually was quite loud with people playing music. All that said, it did not affect my stay much at all. The apartment was very clean and was a comfortable stay for 4 days.

Our stay at Jeas apartment was wonderful!! Great   apartment, very clean, spacious and had everything we needed for our stay. Safe location was what both my girlfriend and I wanted and definitely got with this place. Loved how close it was to the train.  Minutes into Manhattan and the L train was very accessible from other lines.  
Our host was great! Always responded very quickly and we were always able to reach him.

It was my 1st Airbnb experience and it was perfect. The apartment is as described and situation is very convenient to visit the city.  Jae was all the week long available for our questions and very quick to answer.

Jae is a wonderful host, flexible and accommodating and a very nice guy who's happy to help orient you to the neighborhood. The apartment is quite lovely and spacious, plenty of clean towels and a comfortable bed, and a great kitchen area. A wonderful place and a wonderful host.

Jaes Appartement und Jae als Gastgeber kann ich nur weiterempfehlen. Wohnung bestens ausgestattet, geschmackvoll eingerichtet, sauber, ruhig, gut gelegen und für drei Personen prima geeignet. Jae antwortete uns zuverlässig und schnell auf alle unsere Fragen!

We had a fantastic time in NY and loved Jae's apartment. It gives you the chance heading downtown within 10 min and is located around the corner of vibrant Williamsburg centre in Bedford Avenue. Everything was clean and the little extra room was perfect for storing our suitcases. Jae was a very nice host and gave us great advise on restaurants, bars and general information. We definitely recommend staying at this apartment.

It was a great pleasure staying at Jae's apartment. The place is very nice. There are many great restaurants and some small grociers with high quality products around. I definitely recommend this apartment. Thank you again Jae!

Great place! Jae was a very good host and very flexible, responded very fast on al queries we had. 

Apartment is nice, clean and quite big (for 2 persons more than fine), good bed. Airco bit loud but we didn't need it at night. 

The neighborhood is not very special in our view, you need to take the subway to bedford av. (only a few stops) or manhattan.
Jae was very nice and made everything very easy. The apartment was clean, quiet, comfortable, and convenient. We would definitely stay there again!

Jae was an awesome host. The photos of his apartment are exactly as shown and he provided us with all the little things you may need (clean towels, sheets, hair dryer and an iron). Kitchen came in handy and there are many organic grocery stores around the area. It's the type of place I'd want to rent if I ever had to move to New York for work.

Loved the skylights - though it did get very bright early in the morning. I suggest you bring sleep masks. Oh, and air conditioning. Air conditioning was great.

Min is a great host, he was waiting for us on our arrival and gave us tips about the area. He was very kind and cooperative by all means.

The apartment was clean and pleasant and is very close to the subway, getting into Manhattan every day was a breeze. It is great for two couples

There are many grocery stores around and the kitchen is fully equipped to cook on the days you don't feel like going out for dinner.

We stayed 18 days and had a great time at this Brooklyn apartment. I would definitely stay here again!
fantastic, deffo revisit next year

Jae was a great host and on time to meet me the day of check in. He gave a detailed tour of the space and answered all the questions I had. The apartment was huge with plenty of space & great natural light from the skylights. Even if you decide to stay in, Jae has cable TV and a great section couch that's easy to fall asleep on. The neighborhood was great with 2 subway options just blocks away and late night stores to get any drinks or snacks if needed. I didn't want to leave & wished it was my place.

Jae was a fantastic host, extremely helpful and accommodating to our travel plans which was awesome. The apartment itself is great, complete breath of fresh air from hotel rooms, particularly since they are quite small in Manhattan. The bed was comfy and lounge and kitchen spaces both great to chill out. Having a fridge to buy local beers and cheese and have a night in was great too.  

Neighborhood was really easy to get around, two train lines close by, the L easy to get around and about 4 stops from the main Williamsburg bars and restaurants. Laundromat two doors down was also very helpful.

Thanks again, would definitely recommend to friends!

We enjoyed our stay in Jae's apartment. The neighborhood is pretty quiet, there are many groceries close to the flat. The subway is 2 blocs away about 5min. The pictures are conform, it's confortable for 4 peoples. Jae is a great host.

Thank you very much to Jae :) It was my first AIRBNB and it was a very good experience :)
We went in his appartment during one week.
When, we arrived, he was here and gave us many informations about the neighbourhood :)
His appartement is very nice, not far to Bedford Avenue (20 minutes to walk) and very near to the subway.
The last day, he was agree for keeping ours lugages before going to the airport !

Jae was a great host. He was there to greet us and was helpful when required. The neighbourhood was great. Great transport links, shops restaurants and bars. We felt safe there. We stayed for two weeks and it was comfortable and practical for such an extended stay.
We travelled all over the city and the apartment was a great base.
We would have no problems recommending it to others planning a trip to New York.
Nice Apartment. Jae was also very nice and helpful. Thanks again!
The reservation was canceled 39 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This was our fist time using airbnb and Jae made it a great experience. He was a great host and even helped us with our luggage when we got there. The apartment looked exactly liked the pictures described. It's also about 2 blocks away from the station, so that was convenient. But, if you're in the city walking around for the entire day and catch the subway back.. those 2 blocks can seem way longer lol.  Also, if you're a light sleeper or plan on taking naps during the day be aware that there is a raver downstairs. He/she likes to bump very loud edm music throughout the day/night. And yes it can be heard throughout the whole entire building. Overall, I would recommend this stay if you're planning a trip to NYC.

First of all Jae was great. Met us there, showed us where everything was, told us all about the area, and allowed me to text questions:) super friendly. The apartment was just perfect and so comfy.  The area of brooklyn was fantastic and we really enjoyed ourselves so much.  We will def use Jae again when we are back in the are!!

Jae was a fantastic host. He was very accommodating to our needs, which we really appreciated. He was also very easy to contact, both before and during our stay. The apartment itself is great (we love the exposed brick), and the photos are very accurate. It's a very comfortable space for four people; it never felt crowded. The apartment downstairs plays loud music at times which is generally fine, although once we did actually feel the bass. The neighbourhood is great! It's less than a five minute walk away from the L train, and you can very easily connect to other train lines once you get into Manhattan. Danny's Pizza is awesome (get the buffalo wings); Dunwell Doughnuts was a daily stop; Cup does decent coffee. I'd definitely come back here again.

Jae was a fantastic host! He was so easy to connect with and went above and beyond to check in on me and make sure I got there OK. 

The apartment is really close to the subway so it was easy to get back to NY and around Brooklyn. The neighborhood feels sort of up and coming. There are a few great bars and restaurants within walking distance. 

I loved that Jae had a no shoes in the house policy. Everything was very clean and tidy. Perfect for two people!

Great apartment - very comfy bed too!!

Would highly recommend.

Very modern and comfy apartment. And great location for either someone wanting to explore trendy Williamsburg or lower Manhattan. We really enjoyed our stay there! Jae was super responsive during booking period and extremely flexible regarding checkin and checkout hours. Would definitely come back again! Jae, thanks for your hospitality!

Jae met us right as we arrived and showed us around. He was very welcoming as was his home.  It was clean and spacious. I felt very safe in the neighbourhood and everything was as described.  It was a  short walk to the subway and there are plenty of stores around if you have an extended stay.  We would definitely recommend and stay here in the future.

Jae made us feel welcome immediately.  He was there when we arrived, helped us get accustomed to the neighbourhood, and was available at all times for any questions we had.  He was a very easy person with whom to communicate.

The neighbourhood is great.  Lots of coffee shops and restaurants nearby.  The subway is less than a five minute walk and is very easy to take into Manhattan.

This place is great and we would definitely stay here again in the future.

Jae is the illist villain. He was super helpful and nice meeting us and setting us up. Any problem we had (of which we just needed some more towels) he was extremely quick to respond and happy to help. The area is great and has bars and food as well as a number of organic grocers and Jae pointed all of this out to us. Easy to get transport into Manhattan and we would definitely recommend staying here.
The apartment is very well located near good restaurants, markets and local bars. Is really quiet and comfortable. Jae is a great host and all the time was on standby to guide us.

What can i say, great large apt compared to Manhattan standards. A real one bedroom in Williamsburg BK 4 stops from the city. Forewarning its a 3rd floor walk up but aren't most NY buildings? Easy access with code entry to building and apt door. Spacious bedroom & kitchen. We ordered seamless a few times & we felt at home. We locked ourselves out but Jae was able to unlock it when we returned from sightseeing. Overall good bang for your buck!
Jae was there when I arrived and helped me settle in. Was always reachable by text and did everything to make me feel comfortable.

Four of us stayed in the apartment, which was clean, tidy and smart. For that number it was maybe a little small as there is no door to the living area, where the sofa bed is, which meant there wasn't much privacy! It was in a nice enough neighbourhood, cafés and bars nearby, walking distance to the busier parts of Williamsburg and easy to get in to Manhattan. We had a few questions whilst we were there and, although we never got a chance to meet, Jae was great at answering the and making sure everything was ok. Would be a perfect base for a couple, I wish we'd had more time to settle in and explore a bit more.

Jae's place was great. Good location off the Montrose L and a comfortable apartment. Jae was flexible about my checkin/checkout times and was very hospitable. I'd recommend Jae's place and I'll stay here again.

My sister and I had a great stay at Jae's place. It was very clean and safe and a good size for the two of us. Jae was very responsive to questions that I had. We didn't really explore the area close by but it seemed there were lots of places to eat and drink. I would definitely stay there again when back in New York.

Jae's place was a great location to explore a great city. Warm, comfortable beds and a nice bathroom and super fast internet. We did not get to meet Jae during our stay but communicating was easy and he answered all of our queries really quickly. I would not hesitate to recommend staying at Jae's place.

This was my first AIRBNB experience and I loved it. I arrived on a red eye flight and was out and about all day everyday so I never actually met Jae, but he was always contactable if I had a question. I didn't go far in the immediate area except maybe to the grocery store, but I did stop at Bedford stop (4 stops away on the L - 5 mins) almost everyday as I just loved to sit in the AMAZING coffee shops and relax before I travelled into Manhattan. I just love the Williamsburg vibe! Subway into Manhattan easy and not more than 25 mins or so. The apartment itself was perfect. I felt safe and had zero worries. Exactly what I needed and would definitely stay here again.

This was my first airbnb experience and it really exceeded my expectations. Jae was very accommodating and easy to communicate with. He met me at the apartment as soon as I arrived in the city and provided me with information about the apartment, neighborhood and gave me some extra blankets for an additional guest. The apartment was perfect for 2 people but could have easily accommodated more. It was clean and bright and in a great location on the border of Williamsburg and Bushwick. The L train is really close and  convenient for getting around Brooklyn and Manhattan. I would absolutely stay here again. Thanks, Jae!

Jae's place was conveniently located in cool and hip Williamsburg. The subway is located two blocks away from the apartment. The apartment was clean and included all the amenities necessary. Jae was very friendly and gave great recommendations around the area. I would highly recommend this place for two things: cleanliness and location.

We were staying for 4 nights at Jae's  apartment and I would go there again without thinking twice. Jae was very helpful and you could contact him everytime you needed something. The apartment is very clean and has all what you need. Stores and Subway are all nearby.

Great!

Jae's apartment is great. It's very well located and is just a short stroll away from number of subway stops. This meant it was still very easy to get in and out of Manhatten within 20 minutes (if you'd rather a taxi, it was approximately $20-25 from midtown). Williamsburg is a vibrant neighbourhood and there are some great bars/cafes near to the apartment.

The apartment itself was perfect for two people. It's a great size and the living space is comfortable. The kitchen is well equipped and there are a few small grocery stores nearby if you fancy eating in.

Jae is a great host - everything went very smoothly and he was on hand if we needed anything. 

I'd definitely recommend the apartment to anyone looking to experience a different part of New York and wouldn't hesitate to stay again if we revisit Williamsburg.

Jae's place is absolutely lovely! He's so kind and hospitable, making sure we had everything we needed to be comfortable. His place easily slept myself, my husband and my two friends and which we were always super happy to come back to after a long day of exploring Williamsburg. I highly highly recommend this awesome space and this super awesome host!

Jae was very friendly and helpful.
He always responded fast and efficiently and the place was exactly as advertised.
We turned up and everything was perfect. There were extra details about the flat that made the stay nicer. There were plenty of towels lotion, shower gel, etc. 
The place was very clean and to sum it all up:

I would definitely stay here again and I porbably will!

Great location for exploring this amazing city. The wifi was fast, Jai was very responsive, the place was clean and all the facilities we needed were close (ie grocery store and laundromat right next door).

We had a great time here.

Booked this location for my parents that came to visit me in the city for a week. Perfectly clean and comfortable, as described in the listing. Only two blocks to the Montrose L stop so mobility is easy.

Some nice delis in the area for supplies etc and plenty of options close by on Seamless if you stay in to eat.

Jae was great for communication from beginning to end and offered tips that only New Yorkers would be aware of.

we had a great stay in Jae's apt! nice & quiet with the basic needs: fast wifi, enough towels, good matresses. lively neighborhood with 24/7 deli's, coffee shops, restaurants. Jae is a perfect host, on time, around, and friendly! i would come back here any minute

Jae greeted us at his door and welcomed us to his home.  We were in Brooklyn for a friends wedding so the accommodations were wonderfully located.  All of the amenities (air conditioning FTW) were great.  Would highly recommend to anyone!

Jae was a great host with very prompt and clear communication from my initial enquiry right through to handing the keys back.

His apartment was perfect for our stay (3 adults) with the bed, bedding and sofa bed all really comfortable.

It's very close to the subway and the local neighbourhood is full of bars and grocery shops and it's no more than 5 mins on the subway to Bedford Ave and then 10 mins into Manhattan - all very easy.

Aircon worked a dream which was perfect for our July visit.

Without doubt I would use Jae's apartment again for my next NYC visit - highly recommended.

Jae consiguió que me sintiera como en casa por su trato tan atento y amable, además como vive en el mismo edificio te da la tranquilidad de que si pasa algo lo tienes cerca. El piso es muy luminoso y agradable y está bastante cerca de la boca de metro. Justo debajo hay una lavandería, por lo que es muy cómodo para lavar la ropa. Y doblando la esquina hay un local el,Duck Duck muy agradable para tomar unas cervezas con gente local del barrio.
Da gusto llegar cada día al barrio después de la visita diaria de Manhattan y quedarte por la zona de Bedford Avenue donde hay un ambiente increíble.
Fantastic apartment and great host.
We loved the place, nice apartment, very clean and spacious. The location was ok. Perfect communication with Jae, he was a great host. We would recommend the place!

A solid place to stay in the New York City area - very clean and no complaints. Jae makes sure to be available for guests needs.  The area itself is safe, and didn't have any problems at all. We walked over to grand st around 9pm to get some french bistro, so it's quite accessible.

I stayed at jae's house since the end of September to early October.
As you can see from the many reviews, his house is really clean, spacious and comfortable. 
I was impressed with his kindness. Whenever I asked him to do some he always kindly solved everything.
And really convenient for transportation. The metro L station is really close. it takes at 5 minutes in his house. Above all the L line take me to manhattan only 7 stops by union square.  Close to anywhere in Manhattan, so we were wowed. 
His house have skylight windows in the living room and the kitchen. Bright day makes bright, rainy day makes graceful. 
I can not forget the memory that i talked with my friend eating delicious bread every morning in New York.

The apartment was great. We arrived late into JFK during a rainstorm and so it was amazing to arrive and everything work so smoothly. Jae was a great host - he has lots of useful information and made our arrival and departure very stress free. The apartment is very well provisioned and extremely comfortable. 
The local area is really nice - the organic market on Montrose is great and there is a big supermarket just up the road. Danny's pizza just next to the apartment is great for a slice and around the corner on Montrose there is a good bar - Duck Duck - serving a great selection of beer. 
We had a great time - would recommend it highly.

Jae was available on email and responded quickly to contact.

Listing description was accurate. 

Neighbourhood was fine.

It was a nice experience staying at Jae's. As we already know the places around Graham street it was easy for us to feel "like home" in this area. One of the best Bagel spots is just around the corner. (Bread Brothers Bagel Cafe). There are some smaller bars and restaurants. The more "fancy" ones you find at Bedford Avenue. The apartement is close to the L train so you are at Bedford as well in Manhattan within a few minutes.
The apartement itself was quite nice for a city trip like this. Wlan and TV are working, theres a big kitchen and enough space to store the clothes. Bed is comfortable. Unfortunately the apartement is clairaudient. The communication with Jae worked without any problems! Thank you for having us!
Puntuale ed educata

I had a great stay. Jae is very responsive and so thoughtful -- helped us get our heavy luggage up the stairs! Wi-fi is fast and great to have cable TV for when you are in the apartment. Loved the two skylights! Amazing grocery store up Graham and a cute, very good bagel shop a couple of blocks away.

The appartment was nice, and in a nice neighbourhood, but a bit far from The subway. It took some time to get to central Manhatten. 
The appartment had an iron, an ironboard and a hairdryer.

Fernando's place is great. Conveniently located by the L train at Montrose. There are restaurants and bars literally a 2min walk away. The place is very clean and Jae made himself available for anything we needed during our stay. Would definitely recommend his place to anyone reading this.

Jae was an excellent host. On hand when we needed him with any questions we had. The apartment was really good with the world's largest oven! It was also lovely and warm during the really cold snow storm. It was in an excellent location with amazing cafes and restaurants nearby (especially loved Dunwell doughnuts!). Would recommend it to anyone looking for an authentic Brooklyn experience.

Great apartment, clean, perfect size, had everything we needed. The location is in the heart of Williamsburg with close accessibility to Manhattan if needed. Jae was more than accommodating and helpful though everything was set up to well we didn't really need any assistance during our stay. Would definitely recommend to other users!

Jea is the best host!
The appartment was fantastic, bright, quite and a lot of space!
To communicate with Jea was great.
We really felt at home!
The bed was so confortable!
We would LOVE to come back!
The area where the apparment is like " le Marais" in Paris. The subway around the corner!
My husband, son and me stayed for 5 nights at Jae's and was super satisfied. The location was great, close to many subway stations, so it was easy getting around.

Jae was really pleasant and super communicative even though he was traveling! Very easy to work with, the apartment was quite clean and modern, the bed was super comfortable and the living room had amazing lighting from a skylight. Great stuff!

This was our first Airbnb experience and we were slightly apprehensive especially as we were coming from across the pond. We chose Jae's due to the excellent reviews and we're so glad we did! 

The apartment is bright, airy and extremely comfortable. It is clearly well looked after and clean, even the towels are nice and soft! 

The apartment is a quick walk to various subways do it was really easy to get to other places, only 15 minutes into Union Square!

Jae was really helpful and very accommodating. We couldn't wish for a better experience really!

Fantastic modern apartment, located in the heart of a bustling part of Brooklyn. Easy direct Metro into Manhattan too, which proved great for our tourist needs. Jae was very accomodating and helped facilitate our request for a late check out on this occasion.
Worth visiting the nearby Graham bar and speaking to the owner 'Tov' for ideas on where to visit.
Jae was a great host. He made the check-in and check-out process super quick and easy. There are many great places to eat and drink nearby and access to the L was right around the corner.
The appartment looked like in the pictures, everything was available (hair dryer, iron). Jae was so nice to organize an earlier check in.

This apartment was perfect great location, very clean, very cozy. Jae was a great host very good communication. I would stay at this apartment again in my next visit to New York. Very close to the train only a few stops from the city.

Es war ein sehr schöner Aufenthalt bei Jae. Wir konnten vorher alles schnell und zuverlässig mit ihm abklären. Das Apartment war sauber und in nur 3-4 Gehminuten war die nächste U-Bahn Station erreicht. Die Umgebung in Brooklyn war ebenfalls gut mit ein paar kleineren Supermärkten in der Nähe.
Alles in allem ein toller Trip nach New York/Brooklyn. 
Luisa & Marcel

Jae's place was amazing. He was an awesome host. He stayed in communication with us whenever we needed him and had some great recommendations for places around the neighborhood go eat, drink, and check out. The flight of stairs to the third floor apartment really wasn't an issue. If anything just exercise after eating all the amazing food Williamsburg had to offer. The apartment is stacked with all the amenities you'd need and the AC wall units kept us very cool during an amazing heat wave. Thanks again Jae!

This is a great apartment - Looks just like it does in the photos and no one lives there, so it's almost like a hotel room. You get in with a keypad, so there's no locks to fiddle with. And it's only a $10 - $20 Uber ride to anywhere in Brooklyn. 

My only complaint is that the cleaning service did not do a great job before I arrived. They forgot to leave towels and I specifically reserved this room to shower and get ready before a wedding. I alerted the host and he was unable to get me towels until the next day. So that was a problem. But I would stay here again - I'd just make sure I brought my own towels this time.

Jae was an excellent host -- he is friendly, helpful, and quick to respond to messages. Check-in and check-out were super easy. His apartment is quiet, charming, and very close to the subway. I would love to stay there again, and would highly recommend it.

Amazing place to call home for a while. Great area with access to subway, citibikes and great food. Quiet neighborhood with a heap of cool people around.

Jae is an amazing host. Helpful, easy to communicate with and very accommodating. Always quick to respond. 

Don't hesitate to book this place, we'll definitely be back.

Jae's place is conveniently located near the metro and other amenities, restaurants & grocery stores are also nearby. Jae was quick to respond to questions & resolve any issues. Access on arrival was also easy.

Jae was quick to respond upon initial booking, and more importantly, was easy to contact after arrival.  Our request for some simple replacement items (linens, shampoo) was hand delivered that day. 
The apartment was clean, quiet and sufficiently roomy for Brooklyn.  Could use a little splash of colourful artwork on the walls though.  
We'd return here again - it was a very convenient place to commute into the city or explore Brooklyn.
It's an amazing place. We had a great time.
Jae's place was so comfy, great space, perfect for a place to chill out after a day of pounding the New York pavements, we would stay again for sure!!

We hebben een prettig verblijf gehad in het appartement van Jae! Er zijn veel leuke restaurantjes in de buurt en je bent zo met het ov in manhattan. 
Jae reageerde snel op de vragen die we hadden.

Jae's Flat is very nice, clean and spacious with everything you need. You don't need a key, so the check-in is very easy. The communication with Jae was good when we were in NYC, the days before I was a little afraid he could cancel because he answered only after I send a few messages. Two things were not so nice in the flat: we had a mouse and a lot of mosquitoes (although there a fly-screens on all windows, so Jae did everything he can, he also suggested to come and lay traps for the mouse) and I don't know if it is a bar around or just neighbors but there was very loud music two nights, so we could not really sleep. But in all it was a nice experience and we would come back.

Jae was a fantastic host. He welcomed us  personally and showed us the ropes when we arrived. Nothing was too much trouble for him. 

The apartment was pretty much exactly as described. It was roomy, had great facilities (we were grateful for effective heating when the weather cooled down) and was really close to the subway.  It's a quick train trip to Bedford Ave, and only another few stops on to Union Square in Manhattan, so a really convenient location. 

There's a full line supermarket a couple of blocks down the street, and some nice bars and cafes in the immediate vicinity. A really fantastic wine shop opened up at the base of our building in our first week there, so we were happy with that! There seems to be a deli on every second corner, not just in Brooklyn but everywhere we went in New York.

All in all a great experience.

Nice, clean and quiet Appartement. Only two blocks from the next Subway to Manhatten. 
Jae answered all our questions and offers us a free late checkout.
There are many places for grocery shopping and cafes and bars in the neighborhood.
We like to come back, to this beautiful place.
The stay at the apartment was great. The location was perfect, and it worked well for our trip.

Die Kommunikation mit Jae war problemlos und er war immer sofort erreichbar. Wir konnten den Checkout-Zeitpunkt kurzfristig nach hinten verschieben, das war super denn so konnten wir noch einmal New York ohne Koffer genießen bevor wir dann zum Flughafen mussten.

Die Umgebung/Nachbarschaft gibt einem zu keinem Zeitpunkt ein unsicheres Gefühl. Es ist sehr ruhig. Wir haben immer mit offenem Fenster geschlafen. Direkt neben dem Apartment ist ein sehr schönes Weingeschäft mit einer sehr guten Auswahl. Die Bahnstation Montrose Ave. ist nur einige Minutesn zu Fuss entfernt und die Verbundung nach Manhatten problemlos. Fahrtdauer insg. ca. 25 Minuten.

Alles in einem ein super Aufenthalt auch wenn das Apartment nicht zu 100% blitzblank sauber war. Wir haben uns zu keinem Zeitpunkt geekelt oder unwohl gefühlt. Wir würden das Apartment in jedem Fall weiter empfehlen.
Danke Jae!

The apt is really shielded from street noise. There's a unit next door that acts as a great buffer. The apt was really cute and updated. For us the location was great; close to friends and the train. The linens were in great condition and the memory foam mattress was really comfortable. Plenty of hot water, dishes, and the heat worked great. We loved the skylights in the living room and kitchen. The one tiny drawback was the wall that divided the two units was paper thin and we could hear just about everything that went on with the neighbors. Otherwise, we'd be happy to book this spot again. Thanks Jae!

Jae's place in Williamsburg is awesome! You get a quiet, nice, clean spacious apartment in a great location. The free street parking nearby makes travel by car possible and having pizza, chinese and corner store delis nearby was very convenient. Jae was quick to respond and made it very easy to check in and check out. My family had a great time staying at Jae's!
The apartment is in a pretty cool location and has everything you should need. Plenty of space and clean. Jae was great.

We had a great stay in Jae's apartment, it responded well to all our needs. First of all, the place was well equipped and had all the comfort we needed. The neighbourhood was also really nice, places to eat, a cool bar around the corner and a subway stop very close by. Jae also helped us by being responsive to all our questions and check-in/out was really convenient. Recommend to anyone visiting New York!

Neat and tidy apartment, close to the L station and also able to walk to Williamsburg Bridge and Bedford Avenue. Decent space, wifi, TV, kitchen and nice light through the skylight.
Our only negative was the neighbours who we could occasionally hear late at night playing music, with loud TV and could also smell smoking but this only happened a handful of times during the week of or visit

It was cozy, central, 20 mins from nyc and exactly what we could have wanted. The bed was comfy, our host was responsive and everything was so convenient. I couldn't have asked for a better place. 

The downside is that the neighbors were incredibly noisy blasting music and you could hear absolutely everything. I will add that it was New Years weekend and hopefully they are not like that other times of the year.

Regardless, it's nyc and you can't anticipate neighbors to be quiet. It's not the woods after all. 

Thanks to the host for being wonderful and addressing every issue! It was so clean and comfy. I will be coming back every time I visit NYC!

Everything as advertised, clean, spacious for a one bedroom, really cool neighbourhood if you're looking for something authentic, affordable and happening.  Jae was friendly and communicated well though we didn't meet him, which wasn't necessary for check in or out.  Very easy & enjoyable stay -- we'll plan to stay here again.  Thanks Jae.
Clean and fancy!!!
Cute and CLEAN apartment. Super comfortable and bright, close to public transportation. Loved it!
Apart from the loud music the neighbours played late at night on the weekends I really enjoyed my stay. The apartment is great and Jae is a fantastic host.

Todo estuvo bien, según lo previsto. 

El sitio no es céntrico pero ya lo sabíamos. El fin de semana hubo obras en la estación de metro más cercana, y menos servicio en la segunda estación más próxima, así que tuvimos que hacer cola en el autobús y andar más. 

Por lo demás, Jae fue muy amable, y nos permitió dejar los bolsos durante unas horas el último día. 

Disfrutamos mucho nuestra estancia

Recomendable.
Great!
The apartment was perfect! Jae was a really frendly and pro host. It was a bit difficult to make contact with him before arrivalt, but that aside, everything else was perfect.
Great spot!

The apartment is really nice and perfect for a couple ! The place is very quiet and  close from the subway to Manhattan. There is some nice restaurant and shops around the apartment. Jae was very kind and give us a lot of indications.
Apt. Bien aménagé dans un secteur très animé

Our stay at Jae's place was exactly as advertised and exactly what we wanted. The location meant that it was very easy to get in to Manhattan via subway and just as easy to explore Brooklyn by foot. Lots of great restaurants and bars in the area as well as a great wine store downstairs. Thanks for an easy stay, Jae!
Nice apartment and cool neighborhood
Fantastic location, accommodation and host!

I booked jae's place for my parents coming to visit me for the weekend. I live in Williamsburg and was looking for something close. The apartment did not dissapoint! My parents loved the modern decor, cleanliness, and the upgraded apartment! It was perfect for them and close to transportation! Next time they visit they will be staying here! Thanks for being a great host Jae!
I've stayed at Jae's apartment twice.  It's a great location!

My wife and I have stayed with Airbnb in New York before and this was by far our best experience. Jae's place was large, clean, quiet and best of all for July, very cool. It was great to get home to each evening after a busy day in the city. Williamsburg is a great part of Brooklyn. What I particularly liked were all the excellent bars and restaurants in walking distance you could pop to (I recommend Westlight and The Four Horsemen) and getting into the city was quick and easy on the Metro. If you have time do pop into Jae's fab wine store on the ground floor - we picked up some excellent gin to bring back to London.

Great apartment in East Williamsburg.  Very clean and plenty of room to relax.  Super convenient to public transportation and not too far from great places to eat.  I enjoyed my stay at Jae's apartment, highly recommend!
Jae was a great host!  We loved the apartment and the location was great!  We had one little glitch when we first got to the apartment but Jae handled it immediately.
This is a beautiful clean apartment in Williamsburg.  It is in a safe and lively neighborhood. Jae is an excellent host.

Cozy and tasteful decorated apartment. Close to Montrose Ave subway. Very quiet location with plenty of nice places to eat and drink within close walk. 2 flights of steep stairs so don't packed to heavily. Great place to stay in Brooklyn!
The apartment was just as described and was a quiet home in Williamsburg. A great use of the small space; the reading nook was so sweet. Very well equipped. I'd stay here again!
Apartment was great. Well connected and good neighbourhood. Jae was an excellent host.
Great location in terms of ease to New York City and very close to bedford ave shops and restaurants. Jae was a great host and extremely easy to contact for the duration of our stay
Fantastic location and Jae's a great host. Internet service went out in the area and Jae kept us informed of outage and getting service back-up. All around a great experience. Highly recommend!

Convenient to subway L (though I understand the L will close for renovation in 2018, making getting into the city more difficult).  Lots of surrounding businesses, e.g. groceries, laundromat, liquor store, restaurants.  The area feels quite safe.
The apartment is up two flights of somewhat steep stairs.  Quite manageable unless you're in poor health or markedly arthritic.  Still, a good location; a perfectly adequate rental.
Great apartment in an awesome neighborhood.  Would definitely book again!

Great location, the place was clean and had everything you could need.  The little extras like a blow dryer, coffee maker, toaster, was really helpful.  The bed was comfy ad the location was great. I had to ask for more towels and sheets for the pullout bed so you might want to ask up front for that if you are using the pullout bed. 

There was some noise from the buildings behind but the bedroom had an a/c fan so I left it on low and it wasn't a problem.  We did not hear street noise. 

I highly recommend!
Clean place with a comfy bed and plenty nearby.

Great location. Very short ride to the city. The laundromat downstairs is also convenient. Great restaurants and bars nearby as well! Jae was easy to get a hold of and responded quickly. Would definitely recommend staying here!

The apartment was exactly what we were hoping for - apartment was clean and well presented. The apartment is very close to the subway. A really cool pub around the corner and some nice eateries nearby - neighboring was fun and lively.
Great place to stay in Brooklyn - close to everything

A very nice, quiet & cozy place. Totally spacious for just a friend & I. Check in & check out were easy since Jae was informative about that. Very convenient to walk to Metro which was a plus. I would definitely recommend the place. Thanks a lot Jae!
Very clean and quiet place. Close to public transportation and food!
Jae's place is spacious and comfortable with excellent amenities and transport links close by. We had a seamless experience- Jae is a great host.
Place was great. Easy to check in and close to subway.

We stayed 5 nights in December at Jae's place, the flat lived up to expectations from the description/pictures and was a short walk from the L line subway. The flat was cozy given the temp outside, and had everything we needed. This was our first airbnb experience.

This was my 6th visit to NYC so I much prefer staying in Brooklyn/Williamsburg - therefore Jae's apartment was ideally located. It was just a couple of minutes' walk to the L train which takes you to Union Square, so also super easy to get into Manhattan. The apartment was clean and spacious - the bed was sooo comfy! The local area is awesome, loads of good bars and places to eat. Would definitely recommend.

His house is spectacular and has the best services, is less than 5 minutes walking from L Train, attention as host is incredible and will help you in every way possible to enjoy the city as If you were part of Brooklyn,
Jae’s place was great. It was perfect for our relaxing weekend. Everything was clean, the bed was comfy, and the apartment is in a convenient location. We would definitely stay here again.

Great location! My boyfriend and I stayed there for five nights and there are some good eats around and it’s two blocks from the subway. Jae provided us with the essentials (towels, hairdryer, etc). I would definitely stay again!

If you’re driving, be aware the neighborhood has alternate side parking. It’s a little tricky to navigate if you’re staying for longer than 4 nights.
Great location and very clean. Gives you a glimpse of what it's like to live in the area.

Very close to the subway, great food around (bagels, Thai food and pizza right downstairs) also there is a lovely laundromat downstairs too very convienant! Cools pubs in the just around the corner! Nice big place with plenty of room to lounge around in! Thanks Jae
Jae's apartment was well located for exploring this part of Brooklyn. The apartment itself was spacious and clean, would come back again soon!

Jae’s apartment was perfect for our visit to Williamsburg. Two blocks from the L which is an easy ride into the city. Two blocks from a lovely grocery store and we found an amazing Vegan restaurant right around the corner.  The apartment was super clean, quiet and spacious. Jae was flexible with our check in and out times. Couldn’t be happier with our stay!
The place was just as described.  It’s on the edge of Williamsburg, not in the heart of it.  Nice clear place overall.  Happy with everything about the stay.

A basic clean place to stay.  

The bed was comfortable.  The apartment is easy to access and feels safe.  

The heating situation was a bit tricky.  The thermostat appears to be locked so we had to open windows to cool off the place at night.  I believe it's set to 72 degrees.  This wouldn't be an issue if you like to sleep toasty warm.

Great apartment in a really handy location for exploring the city. Initially pretty warm in the apartment but Jae kindly came to fit the air con after one night. Would definitely recommend this apartment!

If you're looking for a good, no frills stay in Williamsburg Jae's place is a great option. We were in NYC for a week and were looking for a place to stay outside of the hustle and bustle of Manhattan, but close to public transport to get us from A to B. The L train was super close and very quick for going to and from the main central areas. Thanks Jae for letting us stay at your place!
Apartment is in a great location! Williamsburg has great bars restaurants especially at Bedford Avenue. Close to subway only 5 minute walk to Montrose subway.
The apartment is well located just a few minutes walk from Montrose Avenue subway station. It's clean and quiet. We slept really well. The amenities in the apartment are all that we expected.

Perfekt utgångspunkt för upptäcktsfärder i Brooklyn! Vi bodde två personer hos Jae och uppskattade att komma hem till det här lugna boendet efter långa dagar med sightseeing och utflykter.  Nära till ett flertal tunnelbanestationer gjorde det enkelt att ta sig till utflyktsmål längre bort. Trevlig matplats och ett extra rum där jag kunde sitta och läsa på morgnarna innan mitt ressällskap vaknade!

The apartment was located few minutes walk to the subway, perfect size for two, very clean and comfortable. Air conditioned which really saved us from the heat. Close by to a corner store and a few eateries/bars around the area. Must try the Taiwanese restaurant on the corner across the road if you stay here, so good we ate there more than once! Jae was an excellent host with great communication and very helpful. He replaced the hairdryer that didn’t work and let us store our bags on the last day in NYC which was hugely helpful. A very attentive host. We highly recommend Jae and his place. Would happily stay here again!

The apartment is exactly what we expected. What you see in the pictures is what you get. It is very spacious for two, clean, tidy and air-condition is working fine. Probably because of the time difference, Jae was a bit slow responding to my first question, but thereafter responded quickly. We did receive a comprehensive description regarding key, Wifi (working very well)  and apartment itself. The location is great, very close to the L line, we clocked 32 minutes from Rockefeller tube station to the apartment. And it is close to hip and happening Williamsburg (Bedford Ave). Would definitely recommend this place when visiting New York.

We really enjoyed our stay at Jae's place in Williamsburg. As advertised it was really convenient to the Metro so we could get to Manhattan and other places easily.  The apartment was clean and the mattress super comfortable (at least for us). We were there during 90-100 degree weather so the two A/C window units couldn't quite keep up, but with one unit in the bedroom and an oscillating floor fan, we slept comfortably. Happy to have a coffee maker, toaster, microwave and enough basic cooking equipment so that we could make breakfast before heading out for the day. Good market just up the street for buying some essentials plus a corner convenience store/deli and pizza place right next door. Not a lot of good restaurants or bars in the immediate area but plenty of options just a short bus or cab/Uber ride away. We'd definitely stay at Jae's again the next time we're in N.Y.!

Nice place to stay! Very quiet and clean appartement close to montrose L stop not so far from manhattan. Jae was very friendly and reactive.  Jae a été un hôte très à l'écoute et réactif. L'appartement est situé près d'un arrêt de métro menant directement à manhattan.  Le logement est propre et  conforme à la description. Nous recommandons.
Great apartment in a great location. This apartment made a great trip even better!

Loved my stay at Jae's place. Checkin is super easy, the apartment itself is in a very quiet neighboorhood so I never worried about staying up because of noise! There is a lot of work being done on the L closeby, so that was a bit annoying later at night in terms of the location. The apartment is sparkling clean, and Jae had everything ready for me upon arrival! Definitely would stay again.
The place was very accessible. Easy access to food and the city. Extremely clean and was easy to enter/exit. Little slow on responsiveness but I understand, we all have busy lives. Thank you Jae!
Jae’s place is in a great location and is the perfect space to stay in if you’re looking to take a trip to Brooklyn.
Clean, convenient location but noisy air conditioning units and bit pricy considering all factors.
Enjoyed our stay in Brooklyn and it’s proximity to the Montrose Stn on the L line.

Jae's place is exactly as he describes - it is serene, sparkling clean, and quiet.  It made our stay in Brooklyn a great one.  The apartment has a great layout and he even offered amenities like extra towels and a hair dryer which we really appreciated.  Next time we're in Brooklyn we hope to stay here again.

Nice place.

Easy to access from Manhattan by subway.

Apartment is new and very pretty. It is also clean. Location is very convenient - 4 minute walk from the subway. As the house is old and apartment is on the 3rd floor, it was quite difficult to climb up with suitcases. 
Jae is very friendly and was eager to help with the issues we had with the apartment , but as he was in another country at the moment, communication was very slow.
The flat is very nice and the neighborhood is amazing.

This apartment is better suited for young people because it is a 3rd story walk up via very narrow and steep staircase.  The checkin process is excellent.  The apartment is very clean. The upholstery on couch and chaise needs some serious cleaning.  

If anyone knows Brooklyn and the critters that live in most apartments there - Jae’s apartment is immaculate and clean.  So if you as fit to do staircases and you need clean this is the place for you.

Check-in was extremely easy, and the pictures are a wonderful reflection of the space.  The apt is located to so many great restaurants and bars, and was a fairly short trip on the subway to other areas of New York.  Definitely a nice place to stay!
Jae's house was very clean and cozy. Especially I like the windows on the ceiling. Strongly recommend.
Great location and clean space. Very close to public transit so it is very easy to get into the city and around Williamsburg.

It’s a good location to travel into Manhattan and it has a good shower and the bed is comfortable but overall for the price the place could do with a bit of a tidy up for example the electrical fittings are loose and there are stains and marks around the place
This apartment is located about 2 blocks away from a subway station, so it’s perfect for getting anywhere in the city! It’s a cute apartment. The bed is super comfortable!

Clean and plenty of space for 2 people. You could actually have 3 or 4 if someone wanted to sleep on the sofa or daybead. No coffe for mornings is provided. I have to have my coffee like millions of others! Good location but we didn't take the subway so not sure how far of a walk that is. BYOC
Great location and clean apartment!

O apartamento tem uma ubicacão perfeito, justo na praya com vista espectacular. Alexandre estive attendo todo o tempo
Excelente hospedagem. Tratamento de Alexander  foi exemplar.  Havíamos chegado da Europa. Vôo cansativo e tivemos uma das melhores experiências no Rio. Cidade que amamos. Obrigada Alexander e Equipe.

name: Sunny cactus oasis in the middle of downtown.
summary: Super well located, bright downtown designer loft with heated indoor parking. Walking distance from great restaurants, cafés, shops, markets and groceries. There is also the métro, bus, car-sharing spots and bixis (public bikes). All right around the corner! Enjoy the many rare cactuses on display, a comfy organic bed and a warm fireplace. If you are into cooking, there is everything you'll need to create a gourmet meal. Hope you will love our home as much as we do.
space: 1000 sf of open loft space with 20ft ceilings and tons of daylight. The kitchen is fully equipped with all the tools top chef will need.

neighborhood_overview: So many good restaurants are a short walk away. Our favorite is Kazu, for untraditional japonese food. Soo good. For something cheap but tasty, check out Thali. A hole-in-the-wall Indian restaurant where a full course will cost you no more than 10$. There is Imadake if you are into the japonese bar scene. Copper Branch for a vegan option. A LOT of korean eateries on St-Catherine street.  For groceries: there's the famous Atwater market down the street. A bit closer is the Adonis supermarket where you will find fresh ingredients as well as ready-to-eat meals.
transit: A lot of interesting things are walking distance from the loft. There is also 2 métro station near-by (Atwater and Lionel-Groux). Bus stop on the corner. Bixi bikes in the summer. We have a heated garage if you plan on renting a car.
interaction: We will be travelling but we will be reachable by email or (Hidden by Airbnb) and we will have a local friend help you will anything you need.

host.host_about: Hello there! We are Loc & Marie from Montreal Canada. We are young professionals in our 30's, but more importantly, we are surfers. We travel the world for waves and discoveries.

name: Affordable, comfy and tidy room
summary: My place on HK island is close to city centre. 30 seconds to mtr, 15 mins to Central, 10 mins to Causeway Bay. Many nice restaurants nearby!  You’ll love my place because of the ambiance, the comfy bed, and the neighborhood.

name: Luxury 4 Seasons Lodge
summary: Perfect flat for relaxing family holiday, with all facilities including TV and wifi. Very close to beautiful beaches, and easy access to Porto city, via motorway or public transportation (train). Supermarket, bakery, healthcare, pharmacy @ 200m.
space: Spacious flat, from a big room with private WC up to a generous living and dinning room. The big windows ensure lots of light, making the environment very cosy.
description: Perfect flat for relaxing family holiday, with all facilities including TV and wifi. Very close to beautiful beaches, and easy access to Porto city, via motorway or public transportation (train). Supermarket, bakery, healthcare, pharmacy @ 200m. Spacious flat, from a big room with private WC up to a generous living and dinning room. The big windows ensure lots of light, making the environment very cosy. The guests have access to the entire house, including a balcony where a  small table can be great for relaxing moments. I am available to help in anything, before or during the stay. Very quite neighbourhood, the house is not in a main street, thus ensuring no noise. 900m from the closest beach. 1,7kms from Granja train station (25 min from Porto city center). 20kms from Porto, via motorway.

reviews.comments: El apartamento 100% recomendado, espacioso, limpio, tiene cerca supermercados, farmacia y playas. 100% recomendable
Netter Kontakt mit dem Eigentümer, Unterkunft wie beschrieben, ruhige Nachbarschaft. Gerne wieder bei Gelegenheit
Amazing apartment in a very convenient area between Porto and Espinho. All amenities we could have wanted were catered for. Very secure location. Highly recommended stay!
Superbe endroit, grand, bien placé. Très bon rapport qualité prix. À recommander.
The place is huge and you’ll find everything you need. Rui is always available if you need him. Enjoy your stay.
Acolhedor, funcional e limpo.

host.host_about:
Olá!Estes são o Vítor e a Ana!
São Mãe e Filho que pretendem oferecer a melhor estadia possível aos seus Hóspedes!
O Vítor é licenciado em gestão e adora viajar, conviver com os amigos e conhecer novas culturas.
A sua mãe, Ana, deu aulas durante 20 anos a alunos de ensino básico. É uma pessoa animada e comunicativa!
Eles dão-se muito bem sendo que começaram este projecto juntos, os seus hóspedes poderão contar com simpatia, disponibilidade e alojamento que os farão sentir em casa.

Hi!They are Vítor & Ana.
They are Mom and Son that think about to offer the best stay to their hosts!
Vítor is graduated in Bussiness Managment and he loves to travel, live together with his friends and meet new cultures.
His mom, Ana, she taught for 20 years to basic education. She's a very comunicative and lively person.
They relate well, that's why they started this project together, their hosts can only count with simpathy, availibility and one accomodation that will make you feel like home!

reviews.comments:
Vitor nous a très bien accueilli. Il avait apporté avec lui une carte et nous a montré les endroits à visiter ainsi qu'un supermarché et un café proche de l'appartement. Il s'est également montré disponible et prêt à nous aider au besoin.
Le logement en lui-même est à 3 minutes d'une station de métro qui rejoint rapidement le centre-ville. Il est aussi possible de rejoindre la casa da música en 20 minutes à pied. 
Bien qu'on entende le passage des voitures ce n'est pas dérangeant la nuit. De plus, tout est très bien équipé et propre. Merci !
Muy lindo apartamento, muy limpio. Victor fue super hospitalario y siempre a las ordenes para ayudarnos. Muy buena locación cerca del metro. Zona tranquila y segura!! Gracias

Vitor was an amazing host! He came to pick us up late night at the train station and was very friendly. The apartment was really tidy and cozy with everything you need just a few steps away from the subway. 

Thanks Vítor!
Logement très agréable, tres propre et surtout bien équipé. À 2 min de la station de métro et il se trouve à seulement 10 min du centre de porto pour les visites touristiques.
Appartement tres bien situé et extrêmement fonctionnel. Je recommande
I got the expected service, clean, and renovated apartment.

El apartamento es inmejorable!  Recién reformado y con todo lo necesario, en una  zona residencial con  parada de metro  por la que pasan todas las líneas principales para poder desplazarte por la ciudad.
Sólo hemos estado un par de dias, pero nos hemos sentido como en casa! Nos recogieron a la llegada y nos dieron información sobre cosas que hacer por Oporto. Familia muy acogedora y atentos en todo momento. 
Volveremos seguro! Totalmente recomendable.

Super séjour là bas. Vitor est quelqu'un de super, très gentil, toujours disponible si vous avez des questions. L'emplacement est juste parfait car on est juste a côté d'une station de métro(tram) avec lequel on peut aller directement en ville

Vitor nous a très bien accueilli et s'est montré très flexible et à l'écoute. 
L'appartement est fidèle à l'annonce. Rien à redire sur la propreté !
Logement bien placé pour l'accès au métro. Logement propre et bien équipé mais au rez de chaussée,  ne permettant pas de laisser la fenêtre ouverte . Rue passante et bruyante.

The apartment was very clean and neat. It is located out of the center but that's not a problem at all because of the metro station at the end of the street. Porto is amazing, I would recommend everyone to come see it for theirselves. Victor and Ana were great hosts and responded very quickly to any messages or questions. So, thank you Victor and Ana for everything, we really enjoyed our stay.

Logement accueillant très propre et pratique 
Très bien situé pour visiter cette magnifique ville de Porto !

Ha sido una estancia muy buena, un sitio  para  ir con coche recomendable. Aparcamos en la puerta al llegar allí y solo lo hemos tenido que mover para visitar pueblos de alrededor. Para visitar Porto el metro está a 100m
La casa es como se ve en la foto.
Volveremos y la recomendaremos. Gracias
Very friendly and helpful host. The apartment was cozy and is excellent in terms of price/quality.

Best place to stay!! We recommand 100%! The house is really close from a metro station (1 min walk) and it will take you 10 minutes max to be near the tourists attractions! The appartment is really clean. If you want to communicate with them, do it by (Hidden by Airbnb) because we we’re not able to reach them!

El apartamento es precioso. Queda a 40/50 min de la zona más turística andando, para aquellos a los que no os importe andar es genial. Víctor y Ana son muy atentos y responden rápido a los mensajes. Tenéis parada de metro a 2 minutos andando.
Appartement froid l hiver

Vitor was very nice and very helpfull
Thanks a lot !
I recommend this Host !!
Apartamento simpático em zona de bons acessos.
Bom apartamento e bem situado.

We really liked staying in that flat. It is clean, nice and comfortable, its location and transport links are great. The only nuance - the flat is located on the ground floor and is not particularly soundproof, meaning that you will hear quite well all cars passing down the street and/or your neighbours. Also worth noting for the ones travelling during the winter that the flat doesn't have heating (which is clearly stated in the listing), however there were 3 duvets per person, so it wasn't an issue at night. Overall, it is a great property which definitely worth its price, strongly recommended.
It was pleasure to stay in your apartment.  I needed ealier check in and we figured it out so I would like to say once again big thank you!

Appartement fort bien situé géographiquement par rapport au centre de Porto à deux pas du métro. Seul bémol, l'appartement est situé en rez de chaussée et la rue est passante et bruyante. L'été lorsque les fenêtres restent ouvertes la nuit, cela doit être un peu compliqué pour dormir.
Hôtes attentionnés et très grande facilité pour intégrer le logement.

A very cosy apartment, located in a calm neighborhood, and near a subway station. 
Vitor and Ana were very reactive and communicated us all info we needed.
Séjour très agréable dans un appartement très équipé.
Apartamento muy bien situado. Cerca de la parada de metro.
very nice apartment located super close to the metro station. it was clean and the bed was huge. we were super happy there!
Agradable
Ótimo local. Acessível para transporte público é muito organizado.

Квартира відповідає заявлений ціні, але слід бути готовим, що гуркіт машин прямо під вікнами першого поверху (ширина тротуару близько півметра) зовсім не гарантує вам спокійного сну. Звукоізоляція із сусідніми помешканням відсутня як явище, про що хост чесно написав в інструкції, з якою можна ознайомитись вже після прибуття на місце. Окрім цього на вікні відсутні щільні штори, що повністю обмежує вашу приватність - людина середнього зросту легко заглядає у вікно, навіть того не бажаючи )). Зовнішня ж ролета запобігає цьому, але ж так само, як і доступу свіжого повітря )) Можливо, ми просто не зрозуміли місцевих традицій ))

Great location and really good check in. The location was great with local cafes, shops near by. Public transport was perfect. The studio was comfortable and very clean. Very good communication. Highly recommend. Porto is a great City.

name: Manly Apartment 100m from Wharf
summary: Our beautiful, light filled apartment is the perfect getaway for Couples, professionals & families alike. Located 100m from Manly Wharf Ferries & a short stroll to Many Beach, restaurants & cafes.
description: Our beautiful, light filled apartment is the perfect getaway for Couples, professionals & families alike. Located 100m from Manly Wharf Ferries & a short stroll to Many Beach, restaurants & cafes. Available via phone, text & email :) PB
