reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Perfect location! Easy access to the beach and the corso. Enjoyed the time spent there. Paul was an excellent host and had quick response times while communicating. Would stay here again and recommend to anyone else.
Fantastic location, no need for a car.  Walk to ferry, cafes, beaches and restaurants.  Quiet and comfortable. Great value.
Great location, friendly hosts. Definitely recommended!

Great location, clean apartment and  good hospitality.
I suggest this accomodation.
This is a great spot to stay in Manly. Central, clean and great value. Thanks Paul

Could not recommend this place enough! Was clean, comfortable and central to Manly. 
Paul was quick and efficient in all aspects of communication. Would definitely stay again when visiting the area.
Nice clean place was perfect place to rest after several trips to the beach. Nice place perfectly suited to my family of 4 (my two kids are still haps to share a bed).
Great stay.
Clean, comfortable, well appointed apartment conveniently located to downtown Manly.  A very short walk to the beach, the ferry, and all there is to do in the area.  A pleasure to stay there.

A big thank you to Paul and letting my friends and I stay for one night! Amazing location in a cute, tidy apartment settled in the heart of Manly! Wish we had more time we would've stayed longer! Would recommend to anyone :)
Great location and really clean apartment. Paul was a lovely host, met us at check in and was available on the mobile if we ever needed anything. Would recommend it!

Paul's place was in a fantastic location, very walkable to everything! The apartment was clean and well presented and we appreciated the snacks that were left for us when we were in need!! Paul was very helpful and communicated quickly and clearly. Would stay there again for sure!

An excellent little flat- very comfortable feel.  It was great to come 'home too'.

Paul's place has understated heritage appeal.  The scale and function of the apartment has changed little since its (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) s(?) construction. But the fittings and appliances are all 21st Century. So visitors attain comfort by walking through the door at the same time as experiencing a sense of the past.  This is an experience that should be cultivated.

Paul's place was absolutely perfect. A few minutes walk to shops, ferry, bars and restaurants. Clean, spacious apartment with everything you could want for your stay. Would definitely stay again. Thanks!
Great location, well equipped and really good beds. Very friendly and immediate communications, really easy handling. Thanks for the juice and the coffee in the morning, Paul! I will be back.
It was central and perfect for our stay
The host canceled this reservation 80 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Paul's unit is perfect. Clean and comfortable and central. We had a wonderful weekend and will book it again.

Paul's place is in a fantastic spot right near the wharf, beach and shops. It was perfect for us to use as a base to explore the area, and to jump on a ferry for trips to the city, the zoo and more. Our bed was very comfy and - despite being in the heart of Manly - we slept without an issue. Our kids (8 and 11) were happy to share the other bed and had great sleeps too. Thanks Paul for the prompt communications and the lovely little place.
Paul was very helpful and his place is in a great location, perfect for exploring Manly and Sydney.
Great unit in the heart of Manly.
Paul's place was very central. We had a great stay. The apartment is large, comfortable and very clean. Centrally located and in a beautiful old building.

Paul was a friendly and helpful host. The apartment is strategic-located, walking distance from Manly Wharf. There are wi-fi, towels, shampoo and soap, and many more. I even can get an early check-in and a bit late check-out. Thank you so much Paul!
Apartment was great. Very well equipped. Great stay.
Great location with full facilities

This is a great apartment as a base to explore Manly and Sydney. A simple but clean apartment with everything we needed. The biggest plus is its location being so close to Manly Wharf and great restaurants and cafes.

Het is een top locatie als je naar Sydney wilt dicht bij openbaar vervoer en strand. De woning is geschikt voor 4 personen. Niet overdreven luxe maar een goede basis woning. Wij hebben genoten de drie oma's.

Our stay at Pauls place was very enjoyable. It was clean and comfortable and very central. Only minutes to the Manly Wharf, shops and restaurants. I would definitely stay there again. Paul was very easy to communicate with.
Perfect distance from the wharf and awesome place to stay
Good base for exploring Byron bay!
Great location. Walking distance to wharf, cafes beach shops. Nice and clean. Everything we needed for a family of four.
Great small apartment for 4 people to enjoy all the things Manly has to offer. The convenient location close to the wharf makes it very easy to get to the city. Very nice overall!
The location of this Air bnb is perfect close to all shops, the wharf and the corso. You can even see the ocean from the bathroom and kitchen. We really enjoy staying at this apartment.

Great location and such a cozy place! Paul is a very helpful host and responded all questions immediately. A note to people who would stay there on a Saturday night: be extra careful parking along the street as the place is very close to a popular bar and the Manly wharf. Someone used a marker (thank god not a permanent marker) to sign a signature on my white car and now I have to send the car to polish to be able to get that off completely. There is a public car park next to the place offering overnight parking.

I travelled from Brisbane to Sydney for a function in Manly and the location of Paul's place was fantastic. I was able to easily manage my luggage from the Manly ferry to the accommodation. Clean, neat, and all that was required.

We had a wonderful stay at Paul's place. It's within easy walking distance of The Corso, the beach and the ferry. The house is lovely and open with lots of natural light. The beds are comfortable, we got a great nights sleep! The kitchen is old but has everything you need. Our nearly 2 year old is pretty busy and was interested in everything at her eye level, we brought some of our own toys and the tv was great for distraction! There are some great playgrounds nearby and the beach is great for the little ones. 
Paul is very easy to communicate with and replies quickly with any questions. Would recommend to couples or small families with slightly older children than ours.

This delightful unit is in a fantastic location at Manly, only metres from The Corso. The unit was clean and very welcoming. Both beds were comfortable and there was an abundance of bed linen and blankets. Communication with Paul was prompt and the possession of the unit key was easy. It was a pleasure to stay here and we look forward to a return visit.

Great property. Super close to everything, so could walk everywhere. Beds were comfy, was nice to have kitchen and washing/dryer facilities. Apartment complex was quiet and street was reasonably quiet at night. We really enjoyed our stay here. Just be aware of the spring loaded bathroom window, it tried to take my finger!  Would definitely stay here again.
We had a great time. Location was fantastic close to beach and ferries. Very family friendly. We had everything we needed for a stress free stay close to all the highlights of Sydney.
Great place to stay, perfect location close to all amenities, super clean and easy to locate. We had a great stay!

Great apartment very close to everything you need in Manly without all the noise. Apartment came with all the basics (sheets, towels, parking permit, shampoo, tea) and it’s a short walk to the nearest supermarket, transport, beach, bars, takeaways etc. 
Apartment has two main bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom, living room but also a little sunroom for extra space so it has a lovely feel to it. We very much enjoyed our stay and would happily come back again. Thank you Paul.

What an amazing and spacious apartment in a wonderful area of Manly. So close to everything and also so quiet. 
Paul was fantastic with his communication and very welcoming. 
Probably better suited to families with kids older than our 1 and 2.5 due to the stairs but this didn't take away from our trip or the apartment at all.
We had such a great time! Super handy to shops, beach, buses, nice little kitchen, great to have a washing machine and dryer as well. Apartment was just the right size for our family of 4.
Great location. Apartment is neat and tidy. Host communicates well and with quick responses. Would stay again.

Beautiful place, close to everything, super clean and a quite area and a homely feel! 
10/10 would stay again 
Would of liked the option to check out later in the day but other than that great
Unit is located close to all of Manlys attractions but in a reasonably quiet spot. No parking but carpark (paid) located just around the corner An older style unit but  very clean and comfortable.

Paul’s apartment is in a fantastic  location if you’re wanting easy access to everything Manly has to offer, as well as public transport to other areas of Sydney whilst still being far enough away from the hustle and bustle to enjoy some peace.

Apartment suitable for a family or two couples with two separate bedrooms.

An older style apartment but very clean and comfortable. Great value for money.
Handy place close to beach and shops. Older style but has some character. Checkin process was easy. Thanks Paul
Great clean place with anything one could ask for. Best location for anything. Close to everything incl. public transport, cafes, restaurants, beaches! Wow. You feel very spoiled staying there.
Great location. Clean and affordable. Host very prompt with replying and accomodating for requests. Would highly recommend

Paul was a great host. Great communication. The unit was ideally located close to wharf and beach. We travelled with 2 small kids. No mention of the flat being on the 2nd floor. A bit tricky with the kids getting up and down. The apartment was cosy and well suited to small kids to crawl around. However a bit dusty on the floors and carpets for the baby who was crawling all over the place. If it's a pad near the wharf of manly you are after this is it.

Place is as described; conveniently located to everything you need and easy to find. The apartment is very cute and spacious. We had a great time! Highly recommend Paul's apartment to anyone considering staying in Manly :) Thanks for hosting us!

We originally booked two nights to stay. Unfortunately, the first night we stayed we killed several cockroaches inside the apartment. We killed a large one in the room between the two bedrooms, several small/baby ones in the kitchen, including in the utensil drawer, on the floor, and on the ceiling. Also, a medium sized cockroach got away inside the kitchen drawers. We all were very uncomfortable sleeping there that night. We had to find other accommodations for the next night. We communicated with the owner about the cockroach issue but he says it’s not his fault bugs come in from the outside. He also stated that he had pest control come a week ago. Unfortunately, that didn’t seem to do much for his apartment’s cleanliness, and then became our problem. We were not refunded any amount upon first reaching out to the owner and then also reaching out to Airbnb. My advice is take more pictures than I did. My initial thoughts when seeing a cockroach in the apartment was to kill it, in hindsight I should have taken pictures each time before killing them.
Great location to manly night life
Great flat - 2 decent sized bedrooms, nice living room and well equipped kitchen and really great location. Recommended!
Great location. Very tidy place. Good communication with Paul. Very pleased
Great place, easy to find and very central
The location is excellent - so close to the wharf and the beach. The apartment is comfortable and quiet and has everything that you need.
Location and apartment are fantastic. Everything was clean, tidy and ready for us. Paul is a great host. Would highly recommend staying here if in the Manly area.
Paul's place is in a perfect location for Manly, walking distance to everything we needed. It was clean & tidy & Paul answered our queries very quickly. We would definitely recommend.

The location of Paul's apartment is perfect. It's extremely close to the Manly Wharf and a smaller beach which was great for the kids. Paul was very responsive and helpful. We had a great holiday and were really happy we chose Paul's apartment for our stay.
Paul was very accommodating in regards to our requirements.   Location is walking distance to all major amenities; highly recommend this locale.
Fantastic position in manly - super clean and have everything we needed. Comfy beds and plenty of room for my husband and I and 2 teenage girls! Will definitely stay again!
Great appartment in an amazing location
Very good address, not far from everything : the wharf, the beach, the shops, but still very quiet, perfect ! The apartment is a bit old but still charming.
Pauls apartment is devine. Great location, clean and fun. Just if you have a baby get a lighter pram as you are on the top floor .
Perfect location close to both the ferry and beach. Very clean apartment. Great communication. Happy to have families.
Brilliant location and a lovely apartment. Host Paul was very responsive and a pleasure to deal with. Unhesitatingly recommend this apartment.

Our first Air BnB did not disappoint. The apartment was clean & homely. It was in walking distance from the beach and restaurants in a quiet street. It was the perfect size for the amount of guests we had! 
It was hard to leave the place!
Great apartment, right near manly wharf beach. You can walk everywhere. Photos don’t do it justice!
Très bien situé, ce logement atypique nécessite des travaux.
Apartment was central to everything and very spacious

Paul is a great host, quick to reply and easy to talk to. His place is clean and spacious and right near the main strip in Manly. Food and shops are close by and I didn't have any difficulty figuring out places to eat. It's proximity to the beach is great too!

This is a great apartment, accurately represented in a perfect location near the ferry wharf at Manly.
It was clean, well equipped and we were able to get an early check-in.
Communication was prompt.
Customers do need to be warned, however, that there is a MAJOR construction site next door, and the noise does severely impact the experience.
Great location, clean and a lot of space

It is an old building with three flights of stairs to the (Website hidden by Airbnb) is difficult although Paul does provide a street parking permit for when you get a spot.
The apartment is old but pleasant. Sleeping was very hot and uncomfortable
because of the time of year with no air conditioning or fans.
Location is excellent only a short walk to the ferry terminal, beaches, shops, cafes and restaurants.
Great location and good value for money. Paul’s an awesome host and communicates quickly about anything you might need. One of our fav Manly stays
Very clean! Close to everything and comfy beds! Yay!!!!

Paul’s place was beautiful and in the perfect location and up until early check in things were perfect. Unfortunately he kept quiet about the fact that earth moving works were performed right in front our window Mon-Fri 7:30am4:00pm. The house was shaking and you could not understand your own words.
He gave us one night free, but we would have appreciated honesty instead. It was not a relaxing stay.
Great location to Manly wharf, corso and places to eat out. Very comfortable unit with lots of light and cool breezes.

The apartment was very spacious and in a great location to walk to both the beach and the wharf. Paul was very swift with communication however we would have appreciated a heads up about the building work next door. Great value for such a central location - the bathroom and kitchen are very outdated but work just fine
A very comfortable and pleasant apartment in a terrific location, a few minutes walk from the ferry, the beach , and the Manly restaurants and shops.
Amazing central location right near manly wharf. Spacious apartment with lots of facilities including washing machine and dryer. Comfortable beds. Was great base for our stay with a four year old

The Magical Manly Earthquake Experience.
We woke each morning in our comfortable bed singing lines from classic tunes like "Shake, rattle and roll" or "I feel the earth move under my feet".
If you like an early start, vibrating beds, mirrors, windows, loud noise and a front row seat to view earthmoving and construction machines in action then this is the place for you!
Each morning the show begins at 7AM right outside your kitchen and bathroom windows and continues until 4PM. You will see the amazing performance up close. A large sandpit next door with a huge grey silo in the middle vibrating and spewing out cement dust like a beautiful smoke machine. Enjoy watching the excavators, cement trucks and hard hat wearing performers as they do their thing. As you are so close to the action, the sound quality is excellent - it is very loud. You'll need to book soon as work has already started and this experience may only last until 2020.

The manager/owner of the apartment did not warn us about this exciting daily event happening next door. As you can imagine it was a wonderful surprise for our tired family and really lifted our spirits after a long flight, taxi and ferry ride!

On a serious note, you will want to get out of the apartment early each day and start exploring the beautiful area of Manly and other parts of Sydney. It was a real bonus to return each evening to find our apartment building was still standing, had stopped vibrating and the noise had ended.

If you are still reading and are seriously considering staying at this place then there's something wrong with you but please, read on. The sheets and towels seem clean but the cleaners would benefit from attending vacuum, sweeping and dusting courses. The key pickup location is not secure. The apartment was older but spacious with high ceilings and a few cracks in the walls (not sure if this was caused by the current earth works/construction work).
Good times and memories that will last forever!

Great place with a very convenient location to the Manly Ferry.  Comfy beds!  Super host too boot.  Be aware they they are building a new apartment complex next door so there will be some construction noise in the morning.  I’m an early riser so that was fine but for others it could be an annoyance if you didn’t know.  Will definitely stay again.
Excellent location and great communication very clean and lovely apartment thank you we would stay again

A great space in the heart of Manly, one of the best suburbs in Sydney. While it is an older style apartment it  very spacious, comfortable  and has all the facilities you will need for a short or even long term stay. We've stayed in a few air bnb apartments in Europe and this one is certainly up to standard. Recommended!

Stayed here for one night as we had friends over from England and wanted to show them Manly and have a few drinks. Can’t fault it in anyway at all. Location was perfect, right in the centre of the high street, clean, tidy and the beds were very comfy. Couldn’t have been happier with the value for money and Paul was very quick at responding and keeping us updated. Would definitely stay again!
It is a great location. Near to transport. Near to restaurants.
A great space with easy access to beautiful Manly
Very good value and great location. Very comfortable and spacious and great for 2 couples.
Great location at great price with good communicating host

Great location so convenient to Manly wharf, beaches, restaurants and shops. Clean, neat and well appointed. Hard to find a car park around the flat but parking permit available if you do. All in all we loved our stay. Thanks

Paul's place was perfect, close to the beach and had everything we needed. Paul was extremely easy to communicate with and was very accommodating when we required an extra mattress. Check in and out was easy. It was great to have a parking permit as we left the car and walked everywhere during our stay. Thank you Paul.
Can't beat the location.
Thank you Paul, perfect position, short walk  to the wharf and beach . Lovely flat with everything we needed and felt very safe and at home .
Paul was very helpful and response my questions quickly. His apartment is clean and tidy. We had good time at his place.
Enjoyed our stay. Thanks Paul

We had a brilliant long weekend in Manly and absolutely loved the apartment - very spacious, clean and we loved the older style feel to it. As I am sure everyone is aware, the location is perfect to enjoy all of Manly's many highlights  and could not recommend higher!

It would be hard to find a more convenient space to stay, two minutes from buses, ferry and beaches in fabulous Manly.  Everything you need for a comfortable stay is provided and cafes, coffee shops and restaurants surround you as well as stunning walks.  Would return in a heart beat.  Thank you, Paul.

Well-appointed, clean and very central, Paul’s place is a short walk to everything in Manly. My second time staying here, and I will definitely rebook. You need to be fit to climb the stairs with your luggage to the second floor; if this is not a problem for you, highly recommended.
Would suit two couples very well.
Paul was a great host.  Good communication. Great location. Will stay again next time in Manly
Had a a great stay, the location is perfect. Quick response to emails.
Awesome spot, a lot more room than we expected and great location. Really enjoyed our stay, thanks!
Paul's place is very central to the Ferry, shops and cafes. The heater was cosy and beds & pillows very comfortable. Would recommend anyone going to Manly to look at Pauls place

Clean and tidy apartment, comfy beds and everything required for a short stay, and the apartment block was quiet. Very handy location, close to ferry, beach and Manly shops. I'm sure we will look to book again next time we visit!
Easy communication and check in, and a superb location just minutes from tbe ferry and main township
My partner and I loved our stay. Check in and out was easy and Paul got back to us straight away when we had questions. Great location. We would definitely stay here again :)
Easy, convenient, value. All good
Paul's place was wonderful! Perfect cosy sunny spot for a weekend winter getaway in Sydney! Location could not have been more central or convenient to everything in Manly!
Great location and easy to walk to anywhere. Paul was an excellent host

A very comfortable and well equipped apartment, in an old dark brick building. Fantastic location and a spacious, surprisingly light, sunny interior.
Lots of touches to make your stay easy, good bathroom and kitchen, spacious bedrooms.
It really was living like a local.
Excellent location in the centre of Manly. Walking distance to the beach and other main attractions. Spacious and comfortable apartment. Paul was very friendly and helpful.

Super geoplaced near the wharf
Great place, would recommend staying here
plenty of tea bags. close to ferry and buses
Perfect location in an older style apartment. We stayed here and really enjoyed it. Was a bit chilly at night but delightfully sunny during the day.
Great spot and great apartment

Sweet as
Excellent location. Paul was excellent to deal with.
Good location & quick response!

excellent location in Manly so close to the wharf. A brilliant place to stay!

The location is very convenient to everything Manly has to offer and the ferries to Circular Quay (Sydney CBD). The combination of seaside and bayside is very attractive. The apartment is value for money and parking is included.
Paul’s place is in the perfect location. Walking distance to the wharf, restaurants, shops and beach. Good size apartment and met all of our needs.
Great little apartment with everything you need in the perfect location.  Communication with Paul was easy and quick.
Comfortable apartment & close to everything in Manly.
Great Location and Good Communication from the Host. A few stairs to go up, and parking can be a little annoying, but all and all a great place.
very close to shops and restaurants
This such a great place to stay. Situated so close to everything. This is the second time I’ve stayed here and am sure we will be back next year. Thank you Paul
Amazing location and host! Would definitely stay here again
Excellent location, close to corso around the corner and sweet little apartment

The photos of Paul's place don't do it justice. It's bigger and nicer than it looks and right in the heart of Manly (with beach views from the kitchen). We couldn't fault a single thing. Just a heads up, parking can be tricky but Paul provides his permit and it is on the third floor which wasn't a problem for us or our three young kids but may be if you are injured or have mobility issues. We loved our stay though.

We had an awesome stay at Paul's place! It was only a few mins walk down to the ferry wharf or to the corso - fantastic location. The apartment was really clean and had all of the amenities you needed. What you see is what you get.
Great location!!!!
Great location.
Great location, large space and helpful host!
Great unit close to everything. We stayed several times and it’s great value for money in Manly
Paul's place is in a super location near the ferry and the corso. It was perfect for our requirements  and I highly recommend.  Thx Paul

We stayed at Paul’s place in Manly for three nights. It’s a comfortable, clean two bed apartment with pretty much all the amenities you’d need. The location was perfect - very close to shops, restaurants, the Wharf (where you can catch the ferry to the city) and a short walk to the beach. 

The street the apartment is on was quiet. There is major building works going on next door but it was on the side of the bathroom and kitchen so didn’t bother us too much. Parking on the street can be a bit tricky and as it’s a one way street you can find yourself going round in circles looking for a space.

Paul was quick to respond to all my messages. I was hoping for a bit more flexibility with checking in and out times as we arrived very early to Sydney and had to leave late but there was no negotiating on this. Luckily we had friends in the city who helped us out on both days.

Overall we had a pleasant stay. I would recommend the apartment if you want to stay in a laid back area of Sydney, close to a beach but still with good transportation into the city.
Very well located apartment. A little dated. Some minor easily solved cleanliness issues but overall would recommend for a short break.

Convenient to everything!
An ideal location to really experience all of the beauty Manly has to offer. Tricky getting a park but, you don’t need a car as the city is also a quick ferry ride away.
Nice apartment in the heart of Manly. Just 3 minutes walk from the ferry and a couple of minutes walk to beaches and shops. Definitely would recommend a stay!
Fantastic location in beautiful Manly.

Great location! Within walking distance to the Manly harbour ferry. The place was very clean and the bed was comfy.

Nice, clean and simple style unit, we felt very comfortable, all  rooms are good size.

Positioned in the heart of Manly, walking distance to everything you could need (beach, wharf, shops, restaurants). The apartment was spacious and allowed for 4 people to fit very comfortably. Would highly recommend anyone looking at booking Paul’s apartment to just hit book!
Thanks for the stay, great location
A great place to stay in Manly.. next time we will stay longer!
Extremely good location and very friendly responsive host. Very tidy apartment. Parking space on the street can be hard to find but a Wilson carpark is almost next door.

Well located.

The flat would be great for a couple and is well equipped. It is very central and close to everything you need.
Great thanks lace close to both beaches good price would stay here again
great place and awesome location

Great place in a great location in Manly! The apartment is well stocked and the host was great to communicate with. Check in was easy and also flexible since no other guests were staying the night before we arrived. Thanks Paul!

A charming flat in an amazing location in Manly.
Had everything we needed for our stay, travelling with 2 children aged 7 and 3.
A great space to base ourselves for a few days, with access to several beaches within a very short walk which was ideal and close to shops and restaurants. Yet still in a quiet street so no nighttime disturbances.
Would love to stay again when next visiting Oz.
Thanks Paul for being a great host.
Great place, great location and great host!

Would definitely recommend! Excellent location, lovely, light-filled space, super clean apartment including the linen, comfy beds, well-equipped kitchen, and street parking available not too far away. Paul responds to messages really quickly too. Thank you!

name: 1BR in Wan Chai
summary: A spacious studio conveniently located on a quiet street in Wan Chai, yet within walking distance to public transport and close proximity to major sights on Hong Kong Island (Central, Causeway Bay, Ocean Park, Stanley, Repulse Bay).
space: Homely space with most amenities available for a short or long stay.
description: A spacious studio conveniently located on a quiet street in Wan Chai, yet within walking distance to public transport and close proximity to major sights on Hong Kong Island (Central, Causeway Bay, Ocean Park, Stanley, Repulse Bay). Homely space with most amenities available for a short or long stay. Please do let me know as accurately as possible your arrival and departure time, as I will be out of town during your stay. I will try my best to accommodate your requests before your arrival. Thanks! :) Made internationally famous by the 1960 film The World of Suzie Wong, historic Wan Chai is not just Hong Kong’s party district; by day it’s a pleasant neighbourhood for wandering and shopping. Dotted along Queen's Road East are a number of excellent rattan and Chinese furniture shops that will happily arrange to have your purchases sent home for you or, for competitively priced clothing, try Spring Garden Lane where stalls offload garments originally earmarked for export. Techies won’t com
neighborhood_overview: Made internationally famous by the 1960 film The World of Suzie Wong, historic Wan Chai is not just Hong Kong’s party district; by day it’s a pleasant neighbourhood for wandering and shopping. Dotted along Queen's Road East are a number of excellent rattan and Chinese furniture shops that will happily arrange to have your purchases sent home for you or, for competitively priced clothing, try Spring Garden Lane where stalls offload garments originally earmarked for export. Techies won’t complain about getting lost in the Wanchai Computer Centre on Hennessy Road; a building jam-packed with hardware, software, accessories and other gadgets. And both kids and ‘kidults’ might want to check out Tai Yuen Street; an entire strip of toys touting everything from the latest to the classics.   Source: Discover Hong Kong
transit: Wan Chai MTR: 5 mins walk away Tram Stop: 5 mins walk away Bus Stops with buses to Central, Victoria's Peak, North Point, Hung Hom, Kennedy Town and Stanley are just 1 minute from the house.
interaction: Please do let me know as accurately as possible your arrival and departure time, as I will be out of town during your stay. I will try my best to accommodate your requests before your arrival. Thanks! :)

name: Double Bed in the very middle of Barcelona
summary: It is an old flat, recently reformed in the very middle of Barcelona. You can go every where because it is very well located.  Next to Sagrada Familia, you have different metro lines to go everywhere (L5, L2 and L4). It makes our flat very suitable to go to the beach or to the Fira Gran Via. The bedroom has a double bed (so you can be two friends or a couple). At weekends I enjoy making breakfast, so I can make yours too. I hope you like my flat. Thank you!
space: It is a 3 bedrooms flat. We are 2 (Hidden by Airbnb) living so we have one bedroom left with a double bed that you can use (two people maximum).  There is one bathroom but it is OK for 3 or 4 people. The kitchen is another space you can use and clean up when you finish.

host.host_about:
Hi! My name's Vicente. I'm a 27 years old boy! I'm living in Barcelona but I'm from Seville. I'm a chemical engineer. I love travelling and meeting new people to learn and enjoy as much I can. 

I consider myself a person friendly, creative, loyal and fun.

I'm interested in travelling, visiting different places , learning about them and meeting new people. I like swimming and bike. I like going to the cinema too. 

My degree is one of my passions as well.

In our flat we love cooking. We do great suppers! always Spanish meal! Having dinner all together it's the best way of meeting us and showing you a lot about our gastronomy and our culture. And you can take the chance to teach us about you and you culture too!! ^^

name: Cozy private room with amazing view
summary: We are a family (mom, dad, and son) living in a 3 bedrooms apartment. Our neighbourhood is green & tranquil. 10 minutes walk to the metro station, and ride to the city centre takes about 30 minutes.
space: Though it's not right at the centre of the city, you get to see the rather quiet & natural side of Hong Kong. The apartment is considered quite spacious in this Cosmopolitan city.  It's almost like a resort when you walk into the apartment complex.

address.street: Tseung Kwan o, New Territories, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The residence is as spectacular as it looks in the photos. There's a huge swimming pool downstairs and a mountain (& hiking trail) right behind the building. 

The apartment itself is spacious and super clean, with a proper kitchen, washer, dining & living spaces (something of a rarity in HK).

There are sharing bikes everywhere in the neighbourhood - I enjoyed cycling around the neighbourhood. It's also very convenient to get to places like Sai Kung and Ma On Shan from here. Highly recommended for nature/outdoor lovers. 

Note that it takes about 30-45min (an easy MTR commute) to get to Kowloon or Hong Kong island, but it wasn't an issue for me. 

Winston gave me tons of indie film/music/art event suggestions, and his mum and dad are really warm hosts - I felt like part of the family. I'm lucky to have been exposed to a very different side of Hong Kong that I probably wouldn't have seen otherwise!
No complaints. Was a great place to stay for  the Hong Kong area.  Hosts were very friendly.

It was my pleasure to stay at Winston's place. Room is cozy and is close to the public transportation. Family is very friendly and made me feel like at home. I would definitely stay there again if I get to go back to HK.

It was my great time in HG. Winston's family very hospitable, they invited me to family dinner with typical Chinese food in my first day. Winston was repliying for all my questions very quickly (in (Hidden by Airbnb) ) when I was walking in city and needed help.
房屋很干净,房主很好

I have spent there three months. It is a very clean place, cleaned thoroughly once per week. Washing machine, water filter, kitchen and everything else what is needed is available to the guests. The family is very welcoming, several times they have invited me to try various Chinese dishes and have always greeted me with smiles when I came back to the flat in the evening. The place is at an extremely comfortable and well equipped area. Swimming pool/library/gym and many others such as billiard table are available to the guests after a small fee. The place is 10min from metro station by walk, and the minibus station is just in front of the building. If you do not mind staying with the family, I would highly recommend this place.

The place is great, Winston was not around when I was there but his family was very welcoming and accommodating.  His parents are really good hosts and I got to find out a lot more about Hong Kong when I joined them for dinner from time to time. The apartment is 10 minutes away from the MTR station and 30-40 minutes to central from there. Would definitely recommend staying here.
Good place to stay if u don’t want to be in the center of Hong Kong. Really quiet and peaceful!
Highly recommend this place! Hosts are extremely warm and location is good if you're a student at HKUST. Place is clean and you get a wonderful homely experience! Thanks Winston and family :)

Winston and his parents were very helpful and accommodating and the room was perfect for me. I had a bathroom to myself, and everything was clean and tidy. Tseung Kwan O is a fair way out from central, but if you are looking for a bit more peace and quiet (as I was) then it’s a perfect place. Just be mindful that LOHAS Park (where the Airbnb is located) doesn’t have too many amenities in terms of food, so I would recommending going one MTR stop over to Tseung Kwan O station for food and shopping. Otherwise, a great place to stay with lovely people.

host.host_about:
Hello, 
If you like to feel the history of the istanbul while you are in home, let us accommodate you in one of my appartments. You can also enjoy neiborhood Beyoglu while you are out for dining clubing or museums and art galeries, they are only minutes away from your appartment. You can also ccok in as you will have fully equiped kitchen. This is not an hotel, this is your home in istanbul.

I can offer you 1 bedroom flat or studios in the center of the istanbul,at the location Taksim square meets. For surroundings please give me couple of minutes by reading below.

History of the Location of the apartment: 

The main thoroughfare is İstiklâl Caddesi, running into the neighbourhood from Taksim Square, a pedestrianised 300meter of shops, cafés, patisseries, restaurants, pubs, wine houses and clubs, as well as bookshops, theatres, cinemas and art galleries. Some of İstiklâl has a 19th century metropolitan character, and the avenue is lined with Neoclassical and Art Nouveau buildings.[citation needed] The nostalgic tram which runs on İstiklal Avenue, between Taksim Square and Tünel, was also re-installed in the early 1990s with the aim of reviving the historic atmosphere of the district. 
Some of the city's historic pubs and winehouses are located in the areas around İstiklal Avenue in Beyoğlu. The 19th century Çiçek Pasajı (literally Flower Passage in Turkish, or Cité de Péra in French, opened in 1876) on İstiklal Avenue can be described as a miniature version of the famous Galleria in Milan, Italy, and has rows of historic pubs, winehouses and restaurants

reviews.comments: We were made to feel welcome. He gave good information. The room/studio was clean and comfortable. We liked it very much.

name: Cosy, calm room minutes from CBD
summary: My place is cosy & in a prime location. It's an easy 10 minute walk from Central Station where you can comfortably travel to the best locations in the city, 15 minutes from the CBD where you can visit Sydney's top monuments & shop to your heart's desire. My place is just on the edges of Chinatown where cheap, tasty food is on the menu. Hyde Park is not far from there. It is best suited to solo adventurers (or in twos if one doesn't mind the sofa) & business travellers.

reviews.comments: A nice place to stay for a single traveller. Close to the CBD and close to the Central station, you can easily discover Sydney from Joe's place.  Joe and his roommates were very welcoming and helpful. He gave me all the necessary information and I'm sure we would have had a nice chat but I had to rush out to a concert. The room is small but clean and has a comfy bed. I'd stay here again!

name: Luxury two rooms in Leblon
description: Thinly furnished flat with two bedrooms: one with a double bed and the other with a double bed and a single bed. In all the rooms there are split air conditioning system. 2 bathrooms. Living-room with a little table, kitchen with stoves and oven, fridge and freezer, and a service area with washing machine and space to hang the clothes out. Wi-Fi connection, cable TV, 24/7 lobby and garage. Very good location, one block away from the best beach of Rio de Janeiro, Leblon. In front of the new railway station and near to the best restaurants, bars and hangouts.

host.host_about: Workaholic...

reviews.comments: Recomendo o apartamento ele é exatamente como o descrito. Ficamos extremamente satisfeitos com toda a estrutura de móveis e utensílios do imóvel. lá tem tudo o que o hospede possa precisar. a única coisa que não estava funcionando foi a wifi. A localização é ótima e próxima de tudo (proxima ao posto 12). A prefeitura esta construindo um metro ao lado do apartamento (iniciam as 8:00h e terminam as 18:00h aproximadamente)e por isto teve o inconveniente do barulho, portanto quem tiver o sono leve vai acordar cedo..
Excelente apartamento, muy bien ubicado y con todas las comodidades para una estadia muy agradable en Rio, definitivamente volveré a esta hermosa ciudad y a este placentero apartamento.

La ubicación del departamento es perfecta. A pocas cuadras de la playa, a sólo un par de cuadras de bares y restaurantes, pero al mismo tiempo en un barrio y un edificio tranquilos para poder descansar. Vale la pena, el departamento muy bien, tal como se muestra en las fotos.
Very good apartment, well located close to the beach, restaurants and bars. We had a nice stay in Elaine's place and I tottaly recomend this apartment.

We had a great stay during the world cup, great location out of the hustle and bustle of Copacobana but easy bus trip to every where. 
Short walk to Imponema and catch the Metro. 
The Host was  fantastic, met us address all issues quickly and we had a marvellous stay.

Pros
Great location, couple of blocks away from the beach.
Apartment exactly as shown in the pictures, simple but cosy decoration. 
Fits 6 people comfortably if you use the living room sofa (we were 5). 
Elaine got in touch immediately with information and key handing was smooth. 

Cons
-The windows have no view at all apart from the neighbour`s wall - this wasn`t an issue for us but some people may care. 
-There is a metro construction across the street, during weekdays there is some noise starting in the morning (small issue raised by a light sleeper in my group). 

Overall, I`ll stay there again when I go back to Rio.

O apartamento é ótimo, super bem localizado e limpo. Ficamos em 4 pessoas e as acomodações foram ótimas, camas confortáveis e grandes. Todos os cômodos do apartamento tem ar condicionado, o que ajudou muito.

Estávamos em 4 pessoas e o tamanho do apartamento foi ótimo para nós. Camas boas, ar condicionado nos 2 quartos e na sala. Localização excelente, há 2 quadras do mar, em um local tranquilo, bem seguro. Muito próximo de supermercados, bares, restaurantes e do Shopping Leblon. Saudades do RJ já!
O apartamento é muito bem localizado, realmente é semelhante ao que foi descrito e mostrado nas fotos! Gostei muito e recomendo! Sem dúvida vou voltar!

A localização é excelente, o bairro é ótimo. O apartamento tem excelentes instalações... tudo de acordo com as fotos publicadas. Tive somente um problema, pois quando cheguei ao apartamento ele estava desarrumado o que me deixou muito insegura se havia alguém ainda no local. Para resolver liguei para o telefone indicado e após várias tentativas conseguir falar, mas tudo foi resolvido com a chegada de uma pessoa para limpar e organizar o local. Porem não tive nenhuma explicação nem contato com anfitrião após esse ocorrido. Apesar de considerar isso uma falha ele não se manifestou. Mas no geral as férias foram ótimas. Recomendo.

As instalações do apartamento são muito boas, exatamente como foi descrito no anúncio. A localização é excelente, próximo de bares, restaurantes e da praia. Tivemos problemas com o anfitrião que não preencheu a ficha na portaria do prédio e não nos recebeu. O contato foi feito apenas para saber a respeito da nossa saída.

O apartamento tem uma excelente localização, está próximo aos melhores bares e restaurantes do bairro do Leblon. Embora o anúncio descreva o apartamento com dois banheiros, na verdade só possui um, o outro é apenas um lavabo. No geral as acomodações são ótimas. A anfitriã Elaine poderia ter sido um pouco mais atenciosa, alguns dias tentei contato por telefone para obter o número do ap e não conseguia,  consegui apenas via mensagem do airbnb. Quando cheguei ao prédio, o porteiro não estava informado sobre minha chegada e dos outros hóspedes.

El departamento muy lindo es una buena ubicación de leblon , cerca de mercados , bares , restaurantes etc . Es para 5 persona cómodos , lo único  negativo es que no cuenta con una mesa pero después súper cómodo las habitaciones muy confortables , funciona todo de diez , para recomendar .
Ótimo apartamento e localização. A anfitrião nos recebeu bem e o apartamento estava limpo e arrumado quando chegamos.

El apartamento está muy bien ubicado, tiene todo lo necesario para una familia. Nosotros en nuestra estadía no tuvimos ningún problema.

Altamente recomendable!
Apartamento com uma ótima localização. Excelente infraestutura. Adoramos!
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Localização e tamanho excelentes. Boa comunicação com a anfitriã. A única coisa que deixou a desejar foi a roupa de cama/banho, que apesar de informadas como tendo o básico, foram suficientes, porém, algumas peças pecaram no aspecto limpeza, não passando sensação de limpas.

Já é a segunda vez que alugo o apartamento.
Ele é ótimo, não tenho nenhuma reclamação a fazer, é aconchegante, moderno, um ótimo chuveiro, é muito bem localizado.
Excelente apartamento, localização privilegiada!!

Apartamento nota 10! Processo de reserva e comunicação nota 10! Check-in e check-out nota 11! O apartamento faz jus às fotos e a localização é incrível, perto da praia e perto dos melhores bares do leblon.
O apartamento é muito bom!! Muito bem localizado e tudo funciona perfeitamente bem! Recomendo e voltarei com certeza!!

Tivemos uma experiência muito ruim com esse anfitrião. Depois de tudo a semanas confirmado e aceito , depois de mensagens inbox sem retorno com a combinação de como pegaríamos a chave deste apartamento, somente um dia antes consegui me comunicar com o marido da anfitriã Elaine ( com a mesma nunca consegui falar). Ele nos disse que infelizmente o apartamento  design Leblon reservado não estava mais disponível e nos colocaria num apartamento próximo. Por se tratar de uma véspera de feriadão no Rio de Janeiro não tivemos outra alternativa a não ser aceitar o tal apartamento. Mesmo sendo o outro apartamento uma cobertura muito bem  localizado e maior  do que havíamos escolhido, se tratava de um imóvel em péssimas condições de manutenção! Lâmpadas queimadas, encardido, sujo, roupas de cama péssimas. Eletrodomésticos sem funcionar. Pedimos um simples plug para ligar o microondas e nem isso ele providenciou para a semana que passamos lá! Sempre escolhemos o imóvel não pelo tamanho e sim por quanto organizado, limpo e cuidado seja. 
O anfitrião não teve o cuidado de checar as condições do imóvel antes de nossa chegada, e foi muito desatento e negligente no retorno de solicitações.
Já utilizamos o AirBnB em varias partes do mundo, tenho ótima reputação com todos os anfitriões que passei, mas experiência como essa nunca havia tido! Talvez seja por que o anfitrião não seja dono do imóvel, é uma agencia/operadora de turismo terceirizando locação com vários apartamentos e não tenha o controle do que esta fazendo! 
Sugiro que futuros interessados fiquem atentos pois uma experiência como essa pode estragar uma programação de férias!

O apartamento é excelente, superou as minhas expectativas. Muito bem localizado, há duas quadras da praia, e poucos metros dos melhores bares do Leblon. Praticamente não precisei de táxi para nada. A decoração é legal e moderna, o prédio é tranquilo. O wifi funciona bem, tem ar condicionado em todos os ambientes. O contato com a Elaine e com seu marido, que administraram a locação foi mínimo, mas o necessário. Quando cheguei lá a chave já estava na portaria. 
Ao meu ver, o único ponto negativo é que a geladeira não estava funcionando. O que impediu que eu fizesse compras maiores para armazenar. Como minha estadia foi relativamente curta, tomei todas as refeições, incluindo café da manhã, na rua, que tem ótimas e próximas opções. Recomendo e pretendo retornar.
Em verdade nunca falei com a Elaine, apenas com o Gianluca que atendeu todas as ligações e atendeu prontamente as solicitações.

Apartamento dentro das expectativas. Localização é ótima, as obras do metro na praça em frente pouco incomodam. Deixa a desejar no que diz respeito a limpeza e manutenção, piso manchado, paredes sujas, muito pó..etc. O pouco contacto que tive com o anfitrião foi suficiente para esclarecer todas as duvidas e solicitações.
Tudo excelente!

Bairro maravilhoso! Apto situado em um local perfeito entre os melhores restaurantes e bares do leblon! O apto precisa de melhorias!! Muito cheiro de mofo, traças na cozinha e em um dos quartos! Ar condicionado também precisando de limpeza! Fazendo essas adequações o apto estaria perfeito
Excelente apartamento, localizacao incrivel!
Excelente
Edificio com portaria e bem localizado. Mas acho que o apto esta precisando de uns reparos.

O local é próximo dos melhores bares e restaurantes do Leblon.
No entanto, o apartamento estava imundo. Cheiro fortíssimo de mofo e repleto de traças. Além de uma quantidade enorme de poeira.
As fotos são reais, mas foram tiradas de uma forma que não retratam a atual realidade do imóvel.
Ar condicionados precisam de limpeza.
As roupas de cama e banho precisam ser trocadas.
Ninguém consegue falar com a tal Elaine, apenas com um rapqz, gianluca, que diz ser o marido dela

name: Large Studio New York-Bronx comfortable
summary: My place is close to Bronx Zoo, Patricia's, and Montefiore Medical Center - Weiler Hospital. My place is good for couples, solo , business All kinds of shop are very close, supermarket , restaurant pizzeria, bar. Bus stops across street, Morris park 5 train station 5 minutes by walk. It’s a suitable for business , vacations and a lot other different purpose. Quiet Neighborhood, and very close for reaching Manhattan , just 20 minutes you’ll be in Upper Eastside. Internet Tv, wifi, netflix.
space: Large studio with private bathroom and  private kitchen, I share only a small place where I have my private office room, but the studio is quiet and private, when I need to go in my office I will call my guest. Internet Tv , Netflix. Wifi.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Pietro was a great host, very helpful and kind. The place was clean, private and at a good location in the Bronx. I would recommend this place to everyone!
pierto was a generous host. excellent neighborhood, easy to find parking, properly heated and building security is optimal. highly recommended and i will stay again when i visit new york.

This place is simply too good, too clean and very comfortable. The subway station and the bus station are both close by and the grocery store is right across the street. Pietro is such an wonderful and kind host. He made sure I had the keys on time and helped me check in to the place.Though we met just once he was just a text message away.I would definitely recommend this place.

Pietro was communicative, punctual, warm and generous. His place is exactly as pictured. I am originally from this area and I am happy that it still is a great Italian neighborhood with all the food and drink and character that makes NY so great! It was close to markets and transportation and I got a very good night's sleep. He accommodated me at the last minute for a family crisis and I couldn't have asked for a better arrangement.

This small studio apartment is convenient to Einstein medical school. Close to public transportation including express bus in Manhattan. It was quiet and had the basic ammenities. Pietro was responsive and met me to hand over key. He does not live in the apartment, just has a locked closet with business supplies that he needs to access occasionally, so it’s like having the place to yourself.
Excellent spot, nice safe neighbourhood with excellent public transport options. Literally across the road from a nice supermarket and excellent takeout options in the area

I stayed one month at Pietro's place. Pietro is a very nice person and very helpful. I landed late in NYC and he has been waiting for me to arrive to give me the keys and information about the place.

The place is very well situated, close to everything and in a very safe and quiet area. I never felt unsafe even walking alone late by night. There is a big supermarket just across the street and lots of restauration places (Dunkin Donuts, Patricia's, Emilio's and Delis...). The laundraumat and the bank are close by as well. Morris Park Station is located 10min away by foot: the 2 train will take you to Manhattan.

The place is kinda small but cozy and has everything necessary for a good stay. The mattress is very comfy and there are lots of pillows !

I really enjoyed my stay and I will definetely book again if I ever need a place in the Bronx in the future. I highly recommend Pietro and his place. 

Thank you Pietro ! You are an amazing host !
small place in a safe area. Convenient if you need to visit areas in Bronx
Nice stay, great location near grocery store and restaurants. Pietro was very responsive with any questions

Pietro’s place was an ideal place to stay as a student who was rotating at Weiler Hospital. The studio apartment was a 10-12 minute walk from the hospital - very convienient. The place itself was clean and the perfect size for one person to stay for a month. Kitchen supplies were provided. Bathroom was clean with great water pressure. Pietro was very easy to get in touch with and he checked in to see how I was doing. I would 100 percent recommend staying in Pietro’s place if you have a rotation at the hospital.

Pietro is very nice and accommodating, the apartment is nice, parking on the street nearby is easy, and the area has a lot of restaurants within walking distance. Great place to stay, especially as a medical student who was visiting nearby. The apartment is very close to the hospital.

name: Comfy & Spacious 3BR- Perfect location-Downtown
summary: Located in Crescent street in Montreal city centre, this fully furnished apartment is located the heart of downtown Montreal. Within walking distance from the Bell Centre, Concordia, restaurants, nightclubs, and shops. Lucien Lallier metro station is 5 minutes’ walk away. The apt. offers 3 bedrooms, a living area with flat-screen TV, Wifi, Roku, a fully equipped kitchen and dining area, as well as all the necessary amenities to make sure your stay is as enjoyable as can be.
space: 3 Closed bedrooms for best comfort even for big groups. Lovely unit in an amazing lively neighbourhood in the heart of the city.
description: Located in Crescent street in Montreal city centre, this fully furnished apartment is located the heart of downtown Montreal. Within walking distance from the Bell Centre, Concordia, restaurants, nightclubs, and shops. Lucien Lallier metro station is 5 minutes’ walk away. The apt. offers 3 bedrooms, a living area with flat-screen TV, Wifi, Roku, a fully equipped kitchen and dining area, as well as all the necessary amenities to make sure your stay is as enjoyable as can be. 3 Closed bedrooms for best comfort even for big groups. Lovely unit in an amazing lively neighbourhood in the heart of the city. Always available by message.Any questions you just ask me, I usually respond very quickly! -Right on Crescent street (bars, clubs, restaurants)  -A one minute walk from the famous Saint Catherine Street -A few minutes walk to Concordia university  -5 minutes walk to the Bell Centre (Hockey, Concerts, Shows, etc.) -A few metro stops away from the Old Port of Montreal Metro station Lucien-L'

notes: Apartment is on the second floor, there are no elevators in the building. . Please do not throw things off the balcony or the back stairs (including cigarettes). No smoking or drug use will be tolerated. Bookings for over 30 nights accepted.
transit: Metro station Lucien-L'Allier (orange line) is 5 minutes away. Parking available right next to the building at reasonable rates.
interaction: Always available by message.Any questions you just ask me, I usually respond very quickly!
house_rules: Check-in is after 4pm anytime. A lock-box with the keys will be accessible, and the code will be provided on check-in date. Check-out time at 12pm, late check-out fees might apply if not respected.

host.host_about:
Traveller at heart.
Dedicated to making your stay the best it can be!

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

As I mentioned in another section, it seems the apartment was just put up for rental. All of the furniture and items in the apartment were brand new. There are two bathrooms - one in the common area and one in the master bedroom, which was convenient. Given that the rental was brand new, there was remodeling dust on the floor both in the apartment and on the stairs, which I assume will be cleaned up for renters in the very near future. The wifi is shared with the next door apartment through a wifi extender, and there were some instances in which it was less than reliable. However, when we reported any issues to Andre he was there immediately to fix them. I've not had a remote Airbnb property manager ever be as attentive and quick to fix issues, so everything that I listed above pales in comparison to Andre's attention to the property.
The location was perfect for walking around the city, super close to bars and restaurants. The house was clean, modern, and very affordable for the location.

The location is perfect if you want to be near the restaurants, bars and stores. Is not very recommendable for kids at night, is better for adults. The apartment is big and comfortable for 5 persons. The price is fare related to what you pay.

Très bon logement, à deux pas du métro. Dans un quartier animé avec quelques bars dans la même rue. Il y a aussi des restaurants de tout type dans les rues adjacente (mon préféré étant le sushi à volonté "Sushi Crescent"). Le wifi est un peu faible mais c'est super d'avoir accès à Netflix depuis la TV. Nous avons eu du mal à trouver les clés, pensez bien à chercher un boitier avec un code accroché à la rampe.

The location was perfect and was right next to a ton of bars restaurants and shops. The main issue we had was with the wifi. It was not working the first day but after mentioning this to Andre he did get it fixed. However the signal is still very weak as it is from an extension and was not strong enough to use the tv/roku as these rely on apps and internet. Andre was very responsive and although we were low on soap/shampoo/conditioner he did take note to get more.
公寓地理位置好,在市中心,到景点很方便｡房间整洁且空间大,设施齐全,和图片一致,谢谢Andre!我们会再来的｡很棒!

Overall, Andre's place was a good experience. He was very attentive and responded within minutes with answers to any questions I had. The location is within walking distance to many restaurants and nightlife.

This place is nothing like the pictures. The floors are so dirty you can't walk around without socks or shoes otherwise your feet will turn black. The single bed frame is pretty much broken and barley holding the bed up. The sheets had stains on them and also the master bedroom bed is just on the floor. The smell as well is disgusting. I would not stay at this place again. I would rather be in a one room hotel then this place. Andre was good at first. Always replied back on time but this place is just a mess. Trust me when I say this, book eles where
This apartment is in a great central location,  walking distance to shopping and restaurants.     Andre was a very helpful host.

This is a huge apartment in the center of Montreal. I rented it for a week because it seemed nice in pictures. While the location is perfect (everything is, indeed, close-by), the apartment needs significant updates.
1) Wifi works from 8 in the morning until 18. Despite reporting the issue to Andre and his attempts to repair it, nothing was done neither on the same day, nor on the following. Honestly, I had a better internet when I was in a poor neighborhood of Mexican suburbs. Absolutely ridiculous for downtown Montreal.
2) Bathrooms are just not-appealing. Yes, they work - but I felt disgusting taking shower there. No soap - even to wash hands!
3) Cleaning was barely done. Floors are dirty (you can see it on your feet when walking - they become dark in 10 steps!). Dishes not washed. Cups are dirty.
4) The entrance to the apartment is actually really sketchy. The cafe on the first floor is so bizarre, my fiance was literally afraid to walk in the building! Plus the amount of garbage on the street in front. Moreover, once on the stairs, the light barely works - really dangerous to go down. Forget it if you have problems with mobility.
5) Everything in the apartment is from the cheapest section of ikea. Literally everything. In one room there is even no bed, just a mattress on the floor. Not that the furniture/towels are bad, they can hardly be re-used for long periods of time.
6) As windows go to garbage bins and a hotel, one morning I was woken up at 6 am by a trash-collector cars - it was really loud and long (approximately 30 minutes).

Briefly, 3 stars are basically given for the location of the apartment, I would never consider staying in it again, and I definitely do not recommend it to anyone, unless you do not mind sleeping in a sketchy place with dirty showers and kitchen.

Andre's apartment was just what we needed for a guys trip to Montreal, location was perfect, right beside a couple pubs and 3 brasseurs. If travel needed, you can rent bikes right across the street. Kitchen and living room were big and spacious. Theirs a small balcony in the master bedroom, which also has bathroom with shower in it, other two rooms consist of a double bed and a single. Other than that, this place is right downtown Montreal.

Great location and a great value, the host Andre tended to our needs promptly. It is older building and could use some upgrade and he seems to be working on it. The beds were new and quite comfortable, and so are the washer and dryer.
Fantastic location and a great host. Place doesn't have AC and has questionable construction throughout. Apart from that, it's a great value and I highly recommend it to most.

This is a good location for all of the downtown, and it will accommodate quite a few people at a modest price. 

However, it's an undesirable dark entrance and spartan (if effective) furnishings, no-character Ikea basics. I've left laundry detergent because there was none.

Andre's place is literally in the heart of downtown Montreal. It's very very close to the shopping street & bunch of restaurants and bars. It's pretty clean and specious too. My only complaint is that the apartment doesn't have AC, so if the are coming during the hottest days of the year in Montreal like us (35+ Celsius), the apartment would feel a bit hot to stay during the day time. But, the host does provide a small fan for each bedroom. Overall, combining the location and price, still very recommended this place for group of people to experiencing MTL!
Place wasn't very clean, location is good. Poorly furnished.

Appartement qui convient parfaitement pour des jeunes (18-25 ans), emplacement parfait pour sortir et profiter du centre de Montréal et des sorties nocturnes 
L'appartement est très spacieux mais le manque d'entretien et de nettoyage est flagrant.
Great location, right by all the nightlife. This place is above a hookah lounge. If you are looking for fancy this is not it but otherwise it's fine.
The apartment is big and centrally located. We came for a conference and it was a very practical and accommodated 4 people for a modest price. The place is not fancy but very practical
The apartment location is great. However, the apartment was not as clean as I would have liked.

Es una zona ruidosa de muchos bares cerca y los fines de semana se escuchan en la madrugada personas hablando fuerte, por la mañana temprano nos topamos con gente borracha fuera del departamento

La ubicación es buena por estar en el centro de la ciudad, amplio

Y el anfitrión contesta rápido los mensajes
The location is great and the apartment is huge and has everything you will need to have a great time in the city. We had a great time staying at this place.
You can go downtown  easily and the house is good to stay!! Very nice and beautiful~!
Central location and ample space.

We booked the apartment for 1 week, during Formula1 week in Montreal. I did not stay/see the place - the comments of my team (people in total)
Location:
Was good, central & convenient, area was cool (outside it was a bit dilapidated)
Cleaning = Cleaning and general, is not that it was dirty but sloppy; the fact of not having any cleaning service or new towels during the week should be took into consideration for future apartment stays.
Easy to access with the codes - no key needed.
WiFi good 
Dave was very kind & quick with answers, we do wish him all the best and thank you for all.

The house is spacious and clean.
Downtown is just nearby, with number of restaurants and shopping places.
You can even go to Old Montreal in 15 ~ 20 minutes by walk.
The host is very kind and is prompt to respond to inquiries.
Everything is smooth with this place. Thanks!
We enjoyed our staying. The place has an excellent location.
Dave’ s place is located in a prime area. It is convenient for having a means to visit any place in the city.
Nothing crazy but in a great location.
Nice place near of everything!!!

name: Modern room near the beach.Amazing location!
summary: Enjoy our amazing apartment while we are away. Take a stroll to the nearby beach, enjoy breakfast in a delightful cafe, shop in our local supermarket, enjoy dinner in wonderful restaurants and take a bus to your destination all located in front of the building. Good for executives looking to stay for a period of time or people who enjoy a truly great place.

name: Authentic Oporto
summary: 2 bedroom apartment fully equipped with kitchen, living room, bathroom and terrace.
space: Accommodation for 6 people with outdoor terrace.
description: 2 bedroom apartment fully equipped with kitchen, living room, bathroom and terrace. Accommodation for 6 people with outdoor terrace. Entire apartment. I am always available to help my guests and even to indicate the places to visit "obligatory" in the city and / or recommend restaurants to taste the gastronomy of Oporto. Features a large green space with amusements for children or shadows to read a good book or picnic. Next to butchery (1 m), frutaria (5 m) and restaurant (50 m). Right in front of the bus stop. Easily accessible via the metro (Campo 24 de Agosto station), taxi or bus (nº 206). Whenever possible, I can arrange transportation between the airport and the apartment. Easy walking distance to the most central places of the city (monuments, restaurants, commerce, ...).

transit: Easily accessible via the metro (Campo 24 de Agosto station), taxi or bus (nº 206). Whenever possible, I can arrange transportation between the airport and the apartment.
