interaction: 24 часа на связи с вами
house_rules: Курение, праздники, распитие спиртных напитков, запрещено!

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
La stanza non corrispondeva alla foto ed era molto piccola però Olga e suo marito sono stati nolto carini e disponibili. La casa è pulita e la metro non molto distante. Grazie

name: The Simple Life Beach House
summary: Lovely quiet location, large wrap around deck, family friendly. About 20meters from the front gate to the sand It is a 5 minute walk along the beach to the town centre, ferry, playground, shops and the 'Bowlo'  Accessible by public transport from Sydney by train and ferry. You’ll love my place because of the views, the location, the ambiance, and the outdoors space. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families (with kids).
space: Just a few steps to the beach on a quiet cul de sac
description: Lovely quiet location, large wrap around deck, family friendly. About 20meters from the front gate to the sand It is a 5 minute walk along the beach to the town centre, ferry, playground, shops and the 'Bowlo'  Accessible by public transport from Sydney by train and ferry. You’ll love my place because of the views, the location, the ambiance, and the outdoors space. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families (with kids). Just a few steps to the beach on a quiet cul de sac House, paddle board Usually only by text and phone as needed The best spot at the quiet end of the beach 10 min walk to ferry or bus
neighborhood_overview: The best spot at the quiet end of the beach
transit: 10 min walk to ferry or bus
access: House, paddle board
interaction: Usually only by text and phone as needed
house_rules: Try to leave it as you find it.  No smoking in the house, clean the bbq if you use it  Thanks

host.host_about: Health Professional house proud and responsible

reviews.comments:
A very good place to stay, particularly if you are in Bundeena without a car as the shops are only 10 mins walk away.  Beach very close, with lovely swimming. Altogether a very peaceful place, apart from the noisy kookaburras!  Inclined to be a bit chilly in the mornings (October) until the sun was well up, as it is quite shady, so be sure to take a warm sweater.  
A charming cottage and highly recommended.
Great open plan house, child friendly, close to the beach. Great place to stay.
Very comfortable cottage in fantastic location.  Everything you need for a relaxing beach holiday

Quaint cottage within minutes walk of the quieter end of Bundeena Beach. Surprisingly spacious inside, good facilities (couple of things needing maintenance & cleaning, owner has feedback), paddle board available is in great condition, restaurants/cafes all within walking distance offer great dine-in and takeway options. Beach is often calm and awesome for swimming. Bundeena Ferry over to Cronulla was great. Local IGA has everything you need. Great little place within an hour of Sydney so don't have to waste time travelling all day just to get away for a while. Cheryl communicates quickly and is helpful with questions.
Thanks again Cheryl - Kevin & Faith

It’s a lovely house in a fabulous spot only a minute’s walk from the beach. Very peaceful with a lovely breezy deck, perfect to enjoy a glass of wine while our son ran about. We had a very relaxing long weekend and would definitely come again!
Great location, just off the beach. Good bedrooms not adjoined. Simple house for a beach holiday. Thanks for the weekend away and opportunity to relax.

A great beach house in a secluded, quiet environment. Would love to stay here again. The beach is close, and you can hear the waves crashing all night. The village is a little limited in terms of restaurants, but Cronulla is only a half hour drive away. There's a few cafes and an IGA.

Cheryl’s beach house is absolutely stunning! You can hear the waves while you sit and enjoy breakfast on the deck. My friends and I had a wonderful stay. Cheryl was a very accommodating host, making check in/check out very easy. We would definitely come back!

What a wonderful spot to leave the city behind!  We could've stayed all day in the huge sunny window watching the kids play outside and having naps in the sunshine.  We loved that the house was located at the quieter end of the beach and it reminded me of holidays when I was a child.  If only we could've stayed longer!!

You have a beautiful place, Cheryl, with excellent finishing touches. We loved staying here and loved the round window. Easy walking to the beach, cafes, tennis, Aboriginal rock engravings, local cluba and IGA. Very relaxing  We look forward to coming again!
A fab home, 2 minutes walk to a spectacular beach. Local shop close by too. We loved our getaway
Cheryl’s place is wonderful, we had a great time. Communication with her is very easy. Would recommend the place to anyone looking for a peaceful weekend in lovely Bundeena
A great place & we will return after hearing some points have been attended to.
Had an amazing getaway! Cheryl's house couldn't get any better, loved it !

Fabulous location. So close to the beach and great bushwalking through the National Park. We loved having pre dinner drinks at the community club, whilst watching the sun set over the water. Absolutely beautiful.

What a beautiful location and lovely house. The landscaped garden and proximity to the beach make this stay an absolute treat and the house is very family friendly, with a big sunny deck and lots of space and light. We really loved our stay.

We enjoyed our relaxed weekend away
Great peaceful location 
We loved the gorgeous round window
Great location (a 50m walk to the sand) and the large living room round window and expansive deck were highlights

Great location and beautiful house. On the quieter side of town, just a walk across the road and through a path to the beach, this beach house is beautifully decorated and comfortable. Plenty of space for people in the large dining kitchen and the two bedrooms are apart enough to suit two couples. The surrounds, even in our wet weather, were breathtaking. Great escape from reality with little 3G/4G reception and no wifi!
Comfortable house , very close to the beach and fabulous round window!
Great location for family holidays.

We have stayed at Cheryl's place before - it's a lovely relaxing break.  So close to Sydney but a world away from stress.  Bundeena is a family favourite holiday destination so we keep coming back often.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

A truly peaceful and tranquil place. We fell asleep with the sound of waves and a cool breeze and truly enjoyed the place and its beautiful garden.
Fantastic for couples or families. 
The deck is suited for long dinners or breakfasts in the shade.
The beach is only a walk around the corner.
Basics such as spices and cooking oil are provided.  Will definitely be back one day. Thank you.

Absolutely loved our stay at Cheryl’s. The location is amazing and the house is very cosy. We were 5 people staying which was a bit much for this house as the extra bed was more of a day bed. I would absolutely recommend staying here if you’re 4 people or less though. I’m sure I’ll be back!
Great location and beautiful home.
Lovely spot and a fabulous heritage house with some charming features, big kitchen and nice outdoors. We stayed for a weekend with our two boys and all really enjoyed our family stay.

What a gorgeous property in a spectacular location! We loved the beautiful garden views, lounging on the spacious deck and had everything we needed for a really comfortable beach holiday. This place is beautifully renovated, and it feels completely serene and secluded but is so close to the beach - you can hear the waves at night- and there are so many natural attractions nearby. We’ll definitely be back.

name: Lehua Lanai
summary: Aloha! You are invited to stay at the Lehua Lanai. Located just blocks from the ocean and surrounded by flowers and lush green tropical plants, the Lehua Lanai provides you with your tropical getaway destination and all the modern comforts of home while you discover and enjoy all that the Big Island of Hawaii has to offer.
space: Beautifully furnished 2 Bedroom 1 Bath house with all the comforts of home including a large covered Lanai (patio) with wet bar, comfortable patio furniture, and a hammock for the island nap you always wanted to take. The house is surrounded by a half acre of native jungle for your privacy.
description: Aloha! You are invited to stay at the Lehua Lanai. Located just blocks from the ocean and surrounded by flowers and lush green tropical plants, the Lehua Lanai provides you with your tropical getaway destination and all the modern comforts of home while you discover and enjoy all that the Big Island of Hawaii has to offer. Beautifully furnished 2 Bedroom 1 Bath house with all the comforts of home including a large covered Lanai (patio) with wet bar, comfortable patio furniture, and a hammock for the island nap you always wanted to take. The house is surrounded by a half acre of native jungle for your privacy. Entire house is accessible to guests. Washer and dryer located onsite. There are caretakers onsite to assist with any issues or questions you may have. A rental car is suggested.
notes: A rental car is suggested.
access: Entire house is accessible to guests. Washer and dryer located onsite.
interaction: There are caretakers onsite to assist with any issues or questions you may have.
house_rules: - No shoes in the house

host.host_about: We are a married couple in our 50’s who love to travel and experience all that life has to offer. We are very respectful of the properties we stay at due to the fact that we are hosts as well.

reviews.comments: This home was simply fantastic. Beautifully renovated and clean, with quality furnishings and amenities provided. A splendid lanai, amazing location and great friendly neighbours too :). This was a little piece of paradise. We highly recommend this home to other Air BnB'ers

This house is centrally located and close to Pahoa. This house is very nicely furnished and very comfortable.And clean.  Well landscape and maintain. Michael's farther in law was very helpful. Thank you for everything.

Michael's place was awesome! A beautiful 2 bedroom vacation house. It was super clean. The king  size bed in the master's bedroom was very comfortable. The 2nd bedroom was just as comfortable. Loved the clean white towels in the bathroom. I enjoyed the kitchen! I cooked homemade food almost everyday while on this vacation. Washer and dryer was a plus. The lanai, the hammock, the BBQ, the beautiful sorroundings! We slept at night with all the windows open. The sound, the fresh air, and the beauty of the rainforest put us to sleep and woke us up every day refreshed. 

David and Henrietta, who are the caretakers were great! They were kind, very helpful, and hospitable. We felt at home! We could stay at Mike's place and be super comfortable!

This is a beautiful home! Very tastefully decorated and comfortable with everything you need. The covered lanai is fantastic, great place to relax. The kitchen is well stocked and all the linens are nice and new. There is a healthy population of coqui frogs, chickens and roosters, so if you’re a light sleeper like me, it may be a little noisy.

This home is just lovely! Better than I'd hoped in regards to getting away from our busy week for a much needed peaceful weekend. The area is very private, can't see anyone else from the home or property.. clean and beautifully decorated. Everything you need is there... A quick drive into Pahoa for breakfast and coffee. Close enough to get around to the sites if you want or comfy enough to just stay in. There are small climate pockets to be aware of so if you see it's raining, don't let it stop you because as Michael pointed out before we came, it could be raining down the road and not raining overhead. I would highly recommend this AirBnB! Thank you!

My wife and I had a great stay here.  We stayed for 9 days and felt at home after the first day.  Accommodations were excellent.  Only needed to get some groceries on the way there and we were set.  The lanai is awesome with bar sink BBQ and lots of comfy  seating..  There is a giant hammock there as well for a nice afternoon nap!

The location is peaceful if you don't mind coqui frogs, roosters, and occasional dogs barking.  But if that does bother you, you shouldn't be on the Hilo side of the island anyways.  Lol.  Overall we had a great stay and are looking forward to staying here again.
Absolutely beautiful home! Mike was very responsive and accommodating during our stay. I would recommend his home 100% to others. It’s a great location and the neighbors are wonderful!
Very nice place.  We all enjoy to stay in the beautiful house of Michael.  Everything and more was just perfect even when it rains.  I recommend this place!

Michael's place felt very welcoming. Nicely decorated, lovely touches such as a fresh flower arrangement and local fresh fruit. Comfy beds, beach towels were handy, loved the big screen T.V., plenty of places to lounge inside and outside, and a choir of night time "singing" from the local wildlife.

You will not be disappointed in any way with your stay at Michael's place. It is absolutely beautiful indoors and outdoors, with everything you will need for your stay in the greater Hilo area. Each room is spotless as well as comfortable; you will really enjoy the lanai for a BBQ or just sitting and enjoying the tropical rainforest. David and Henrietta will make you feel at home if you need anything, too-- they helped us with a couple of things and made us feel very welcome to the home and the area. You will not find a better value than this one in the Hilo area so don't miss out!
This home and grounds are absolutely gorgeous. Very comfortable. It included everything we needed. We would highly recommend this house.

Lovely building in a rural area between Hilo and Pahoa. Nice wood furniture inside and pretty comfy beds. Atmosphere is great, we enjoyed hearing the frogs at night. Would stay again if we go back to the big island.

We’ve stayed with many hosts, and several in Hawaii, and this one is a true gem! Easy to find, very private and comfortable, and the stars were amazing. If we had been able to stay longer, we would have made great use of the wonderful lanai as well. Next time we are back on the Big Island, this will be our first choice!

Beautiful atmosphere, secluded but not too far away from everything. The house was beautifully decorated and very clean. My favorite part was the outside garage/entertaining area. it was a nice comfy stay and id love to stay there again!

Michael's place is very secluded. It takes around 20-30 minutes' drive from Hilo airport area. Those who are looking for a place quiet yet close enough to sightsee, Michael's place is perfect for you. And the amenity here is fantastic! From cutlery and ingredients to shampoo and a washing machine--all you need to bring is your simple-packed luggage. You can also appreciate starry night if you just look up the sky. I really recommend this place.

Mike & Monica's home is beautiful, clean, quiet and private. The drive up to the home, you can’t help but appreciate the greenery and landscaping.  The home was equipped with a lot of amenities and it really felt like my home away from home.  The drive out to the home was also beautiful.  It is very close to the main city of Hilo and close to a lot of other areas.  Although I wasn’t able to meet Mike, he was very responsive when I had any questions.
Beautiful home with every amenity you could dream of. Well stocked kitchen, washer/dryer, good quality beds...everything was wonderful. I can’t wait to come back again!

Beautifully decorated, spotless and very private.
It was perfect for us with our two kids. We even got a pack and play without asking.
What needs the most emphasis is the king bed. I think I’ve never slept in a bed that was THAT comfortable. (And I’m writing this review out of my super luxurious bed at the Hilton Waikoloa -just as a reference )

My husband, myself and our two sons just finished our 3 night stay at Mike's Lehua Lanai and can say that it surpassed our expectations. We've stayed at many Airbnbs around the world and haven't experienced the attention to detail and thoughtfulness that Mike's put into his "home away from home".  It's tastefully renovated, extremely clean and decorated with nice touches such as: 
• Large umbrella by the front door
• Corner guards on glass coffee table
• Fluffy white towels
• Lots of extra towels folded in sets and each set wrapped with ribbon 
• Comfy mattresses especially the King size one 
• High Quality bed linens
• Full roll of toilet paper in the holder, folded into a point (just like in a hotel)
• Bright bathroom lighting, great for makeup application
• Lots of pots/pans, knives and utensils in kitchen
• Outdoor bar with living room seating and a hammock on Lanai
• Many more
David and Henrietta who live in the big house on the property were a delight to talk to. They're genuinely nice, hospitable people who truly care about making their guests' stay enjoyable. I'm a light sleeper and despite the assorted noises (frogs, roosters etc.), I had no problem falling asleep and sleeping undisturbed throughout the night. The area is quiet, private and extremely safe. It was a perfect location for exploring the volcano and surrounding area as well as experiencing old Hawai'i.
Very nice place, clean, quiet, well-equipped and confortable. Very nice hosts. I absolutely recommend this place.

This home is both secluded (which we loved) but close to what we needed. After exploring the island it was nice to come home and relax under the lanai and listen to the rain. The amenities were helpful (extra towels, beach towels, bbq,tons of condiments).  This was a great and satisfying stay

We were two couples and had a great stay at Michael's place. The house was as in the pictures, with all the amenities to make a comfortable stay, in a perfect environment. We were aware of the noise of coqui frogs, however for us was even relaxing listening in the nights, but is something you might expect if you are staying in that part of the island. We didn't know Michael in person, but we could communicate with him all time, and we had the care of David, which was really thoughtful. We had a leakage of water, but was quickly solved by David, without causing disturbances to us. The house is well located, in a quiet area, but you need car to move around. We totally recommend this place!
This is an absolutely beautiful property. The grounds are park like. The house is clean, comfortable and stylish. The folks who care for it are attentive and kind. Highly recommend!!
Michael’s place was amazing very clean had everything you would need incredible value well thought out look forward to staying again

Mahalo much for letting us stay in your home! We wished we had a longer vacation to enjoy the tranquility your place has to offer. Thank you for the hammock . It feels like our stay was as if swaying in that hammock. So comfortable! Also, you need to be commended for the excelling cleanliness of the place. We will surely recommend your place to friends.

Das Haus liegt sehr ruhig und idyllisch. Alles ist sehr sauber und mit viel Liebe zum Detail. Es war alles da, was wir brauchten und jeder von uns hing auch gern mal in der Hängematte ab. Beim abendlichen Konzert der coqui Frösche konnten wir sehr gut schlafen und das Haus war auch angenehm kühl. 
Die Kommunikation funktionierte super schnell. 
Wir fühlten uns sehr wohl und würden jederzeit wieder kommen (wenn die anreise aus Deutschland nicht so lange wäre). Vielen Dank und weiter so!

Nous avons passé deux nuits dans la maison. Tout était parfait pour notre petite famille. La propreté était impeccable; les petites attentions; les équipements; etc. Vraiment super ! La maison est près de Hilo et du volcan, facile à trouver et est située sur un magnifique terrain tropical. L’endroit est tranquille et intime. Les bruits de la forêt nous ont enchantés (moins le coq le matin par contre )
La véranda et le bbq sont parfaits pour une soirée. Je recommande vivement cette maison et j’y reviendrais sans aucune hésitation. C’est seulement dommage de ne pas être restés plus longtemps. Merci pour tout !!!

Amazing, affordable place next to the main active Volcano near Hilo. All amenities are present, even the Himalayan Pink Salt. Cars can be parked right next to the house, which may not show in the pictures. It is 1.5 - 2 hours away from Kona side as Big Island is Very Big. We knew that going in. Excellent value. Will surely use it again when we stay near Hilo.

Michael is a wonderful and timely communicator. He was extremely helpful and understanding of our multiple last minute changes due to an approaching hurricane. The house is spacious and well laid out and has everything you would expect and more. The decorations and details are thought out an add to the experience of island living. The home is very clean and the kitchen has everything you will need to enjoy your stay. We so loved the lanai with the view of the well kept and manicured property, lovely colors and sounds abound. This property is not only a great vacation place, but a home (it feels that way), that we were so fortunate to enjoy. Thanks again Michael, David and Henrietta! Hope to see you soon.
We had a great time in Michaels home and would stay again.
Nice and clean place to leave. Enough room for 4 people. The owner provides pineapple and bananas which are delicious. All useful information provided. Love this place and will come back!

Michael’s place is so far the best place I’ve stayed at on the Big Island. Very clean! In Hilo it’s so hard to avoid having red ants in the home or other bugs, but this place had absolutely none even with little snacks left out on the counters. It was well stocked, fresh towels, enough toiletry supplies, great kitchen appliances. I was very impressed. Everything you would expect to have a nice relaxing stay was provided. Such a great place to stay. This is now my go to place when making my annual visits!
Amazing place! Nice and clean house with perfect privacy.

必要なものはすべて揃っており
清潔で
快適な滞在でした｡

The house was lovely and we had an amazing time. Close to downtown Hilo and beautiful beaches. Also close to the volcano national park. The neighborhood the home is located in is beautiful and you get extra  towels, soaps,   comfy beds and clean linens. Can't wait to go back! Thank you Michael!
We had a wonderful time, mahalo!
Great place, very clean and spacious. Everything you would need, big kitchen, very comfortable, and nice details. Beautiful and secluded location, the stars were amazing. Would stay again.

We were so glad we stayed here. The place was very nice with great amenities. It was private and had a yard around it you could enjoy (along with a lava tube in the back!). Our 8 year old really enjoyed looking around for Geckos and playing around the lava tube. It also had a nice covered lanai with relaxing seats, a hammock, an outdoor bar/sink, and a good sized grill. Inside was very nice and clean and had all the amenities we could want. We felt like we were staying at home here. Fans in every room with remote controls so you had the controls anywhere you needed. The things they had here were great quality (pots/pans, oven, washer/dryer,shower, tv/cable, etc.) and not cheap like other places we stayed at. I thought the location was going to be an issue because it was outside of Hilo, but I was actually happy we stayed here because it was more central to the different places we were exploring while on the Hilo side. The house shares a driveway with the Host’s parents house, who were so nice and informative about different places to explore while here. Even tho you share a driveway, you still have complete privacy so don’t worry about that. Overall we give it two big thumbs up. Definitely will stay here again if we come back to the Hilo side.

We had such a good time exploring the Hilo side. We stayed very busy traveling around and Micheal’s place is a great retreat at the end of the day. The home is clean and welcoming and we were really able to unwind at the end of our busy days. The kids really enjoyed seeing the gecko’s around and the frog sounds were entertaining. I would recommend Micheals place to anyone who loves a nice quiet place to relax with the family :) 

Thanks

Rick, Trish and the boys
Michael had an extremely clean, and cozy place that was everything a family of 4 can expect. Thanks for the great few days Michael!

Wer es abgeschieden und ruhig mag ist hier absolut richtig. Viel Natur und hauptsächlich Locals. Es gibt wunderschöne Ecken zu entdecken, welche nicht so überlaufen sind. Das Haus hat alles zu bieten was man braucht und noch mehr (Grill, Waschmaschine, schnelles Internet). Wir waren mit unserer 7 Monate alten Tochter hier und fanden es super. Das Bett ist auch super bequem. David und Henrietta (die Ansprechpartner vor Ort) waren sehr nett und hatten gute Tipps für uns. Wir würden jederzeit wiederkommen und beim nächsten Mal definitiv länger bleiben.
We had a great stay here. The lenai was wonderful and having access to a washer and dryer was super helpful.
Good house nice host
Best air bnb. Would definitely stay over and over again!

Michael’s place was the perfect location when we stayed in Hilo.  It allowed us easy access to most sites on the southeast side of the island.  Our hosts on site were very friendly and helpful, and were great about giving us our privacy.  The home itself was very spacious for our family of 3.  We were traveling with our 8-month old son, and we felt the place was baby friendly.  There was even a pack n play set up and ready for us to use when we arrived!  It was a neat experience being in the outskirts of the rainforest, and listening to all the sounds at night.  Overall, we were very happy with the place.  It was very comfortable, and felt like coming home after a day of sightseeing.

A nice place to stay with pleasant on site hosts.  No beaches within walking distance but centrally located to visit Volcanoes National Park, Hilo, farmers market, and local beaches.  The water system needs to be upgraded with a better filter as the catchment tank currently leaves the water tasting like mildew.  The cooking facilities are great with a nice outdoor patio and grill.
A relaxing comfortable stay with all the amenities you’d need in your own home.
Michael's place is really nice and just what we needed to accommodate our local family members coming over to visit. Extra nice to have the washer and dryer!

We had such a great time at Mike's beautiful home. The house was very comfortable and was tastefully decorated. The landscaping was absolutely gorgeous and you can see alot of pride goes into this vacation home. Great job!

Michael's place is much better than I expected. Me and my wife stayed there just two of us, however the place was spacious enough for more than a family with kids. 
Really enjoyed the lanai with a grill, with a beautifully taken care of garden. 
Definitely will come back again next time, if available :)
Really loved this place! Easy to get to and very quiet at night.

name: 2 private bedrooms and bath in charming house
summary: My wife and I welcome you and your guests to our house! You are renting two private rooms and a private  bathroom. My wife and I stay in the third room. There are a total of 3 beds for your use. My house is in a quiet neighborhood in Kaneohe overlooking the gorgeous  Koolau mountains. 10 minutes walk to bus stop.  You will have full shared access to the kitchen and living room. My wife and I keep to ourselves and are rarely home due to a busy work schedule but are available for questions
space: First bedroom has 1 large queen bed. The second bedroom has two twin size beds. You get both rooms without any additional fees! The two rooms are on the right of the hallway
description: My wife and I welcome you and your guests to our house! You are renting two private rooms and a private  bathroom. My wife and I stay in the third room. There are a total of 3 beds for your use. My house is in a quiet neighborhood in Kaneohe overlooking the gorgeous  Koolau mountains. 10 minutes walk to bus stop.  You will have full shared access to the kitchen and living room. My wife and I keep to ourselves and are rarely home due to a busy work schedule but are available for questions First bedroom has 1 large queen bed. The second bedroom has two twin size beds. You get both rooms without any additional fees! The two rooms are on the right of the hallway Kitchen, washer and dryer, Lanai and BBQ area, private bathroom This is my home that I live in. I am not home much, but I will be available for any questions or issues. I will leave instructions for check in and check out. Car rental highly recommended for this island. However, it is not the end of the world if you don't! Bus stop
notes: The bedrooms each have their own fans and their are ceiling fans in the common room. Usually there is a nice breeze but It is a tropical island so it can get warm especially in the summer.
transit: Car rental highly recommended for this island. However, it is not the end of the world if you don't! Bus stop 5 minute walk with many nearby restaurants and shops including a grocery store and movie theater.
access: Kitchen, washer and dryer, Lanai and BBQ area, private bathroom
interaction: This is my home that I live in. I am not home much, but I will be available for any questions or issues. I will leave instructions for check in and check out.
house_rules: - please do not wear shoes inside the house - please turn off AC when leaving the house

host.host_about: I like fishing and food. I enjoy the outdoors. Finding time to get out of the urban life is a must for me. Catching a nice trout is a bonus!

reviews.comments: Great place to stay! Eric is great guy! Recommending!
Eric was a great host, he made us feel welcomed and made sure we were comfortable. Thank you!!
Sehr nett und hilfsbereit. Das Haus ist toll und man hat jede Menge Platz

EXCELLENT HOME FOR FAMILY 
VERY COMFORTABLE . CLOSE TO SUPERMARKET 
CLOSE TO BEACHES AND HIKES

What a wonderful stay with a terrific backdrop! Eric was helpful and responsive to all of our requests. The place is safe and quiet; and what spectacular spectacular foliage! All the amenities you need in such a tranquil area. Would highly recommend.
Good house and the host is very nice.
Great place with hiking nearby!
非常棒的靠山景色,出行便利

Great value for a  cozy two bedroom stay in a quiet residential backdrop with a mountain view. Eric is a great host and very prompt in communicating with us before and during our stay. He is a great resource. Thanks again!
Eric ist ein sehr netter, unkomplizierter und hilfsbereiter Gastgeber, der jederzeit mit Rat und Tat zur Seite stand. Das Haus ist sehr sauber und ruhig gelegen. Wir würden jederzeit wieder kommen!

This was my first time experience with airbnb and Eric was a very hospitable host! Such a beautiful home! The living room and dining room were large and comfortable, the kitchen well-equipped, and the bedrooms were perfect. He always answered my texts right away if I had any questions. Best travel experience! I never wanted to leave. Thank you for a truly wonderful getaway in Hawaii! Mahalo!

Eric was the best. He is a super friendly host and helped us feel like we were at home. Kaneohe is in the middle with easy travel to the North Shore, Kailua, and Honolulu. We could not have asked for better.

The house is exactly as you see in the picture even better it was super clean it's 30 minutes or 45 more mostly everything Eric was very friendly. This was my first time using the app and it was totally worthy I would go back again!
Great place to stay.  Eric is a gray host.  Very accommodating and understanding.  Would rent again in the future.
The kids loved the XBOX one and the  XBOX 360 and me and my wife liked the Comfort
Eric was a great host! The backyard was a bonus and the views were breath taking. Thanks so much for hosting us!

We stayed in the two bedrooms (with a private bathroom) in Eric's home, and they were both really lovely. We like the location a lot as it is in a really quite neighborhood but conveniently located - a short drive away from downtown Kaneohe and the beach. It's a perfect spot if you want to get away from the crowded Honolulu area! Highly recommend!
Amazing host and comfortable place!
Amazing quiet community close to all activities we had planned. Eric was extremely nice and informative
Great place to to stay especially to visit the windward side of Oahu.

Eric's place was cozy and beautiful. I loved the location. It was in a quiet neighborhood with amazing mountain views and close to stores. Eric was very accommodating and replied to texts quickly. I would recommend this place if you're staying in Kaneohe.

Nice place. Happy to stay
 here

We were staying at Eric's for 3 days and were blown away by how clean the place was! The floors were practically gleaming. Eric also replied very quickly every time we had a question, making our stay very smooth and stress free. The neighborhood was quiet and safe as well with a supermarket conviently nearby. A lot more amenities were provided than I had expected such as the Netflix and video games that my little brother loved. If we ever get a chance to come back we will definitely be staying with Eric again
Excellent location. House is very clean and spacious.  AC worked great in the mInliving area, but it would have been nice if there was air conditioning in the bedrooms.

This was my first time using air bnb and I have to say, this was the best first experience I could've asked for. Eric is very quick to respond to questions/concerns and made check-in very convenient for us. The best part of this home was its location! It's only 10 minutes from Kualoa Ranch for their ATV tour, 25 minutes from Polynesian Cultural Center, 30 minutes from Waikiki and, for food lovers like myself, less than 10 mins to Mike's Huli Chicken and the Poi Factory! Would definitely recommend to anyone visiting Hawaii for the first time or again!

Eric is an awesome host. We barely saw him, but he was always available to contact if we had any questions about anything. The two bedrooms, bathroom, and shared living room and kitchen were comfortable. There was no A/C in the two bedrooms, but it cooled down enough at night for the fans to be enough. There is A/C in the living room/kitchen area so the shared space was always nice and cool. There is also a space outside in the back where you can fire up the grill and have a nice BBQ. Eric was also kind enough to let us use his pots, pans, rice cooker, and coffee maker as well the condiments and spices he had in his pantry. Laundry is also available at Eric's place which was very helpful. Oh! And he even had aloe gel readily available for us!
Great find!

현지인의  생활공간을  체험하기에는  모든것이 가격대비   훌 륭했어요.
친절한 에릭  또한  멋진 호스트였어요.
The place is clean specially the bed is very comfortable and it feels like home away from home

Eric’s place fit my plans well. It was easy to check in when I  was ready. I didn’t need more than a place to sleep and shower this trip and so, for that, I chose Eric’s place for convenience and value.

Eric's place is located in a beautiful and quiet residential neighborhood. It's an easy access to the main attractions to honolulu as well as northern shores. My family stayed there for a week and felt at home throughout our staying. Thank you Eric for hosting us!

We were extremely lucky to have found Eric's place to start our first Hawaiian holiday. The house was lovely, and we stayed comfortably in two rooms; our host very accommodating, so we spent our holiday there while feeling at home. For us this is so much better than staying at a hotel, as we are a family that live far away from each other, and during this holiday we not only toured together but lived together again (making breakfast together, etc.). We didn't drive at all in O'ahu, but everything worked out for us - there is a bus stop close by and we quickly figured out the bus routes. Of course there's Uber too but we used the bus service quite a bit! We loved the house and the neighborhood, just beautiful! Thank you again Eric!
Great place to stay. Clean and quiet and a quick ride to Honolulu or anywhere on the north East side of the island.
Eric의 숙소위치가 쿠알로아랜치 폴리네시안 센터와 가까워서 좋음. 숙소는 깔끔하고 욕실이 별도로 있어서 불편하지 않았습니다. 우리 아들은 숙소에서 xbox를 하면서 재밌게 보냈습니다.

Highly recommend Eric’s two bedrooms. Eric is always responsive to all my inquiries before and after my family checked in. I booked two rooms for my family and we all had happy and comfortable stay at Eric’s house. The bedroom and bathroom are very clean and there is enough hangers in the room. The clothes washing machine and dryer machine are super helpful because it’s hot in Hawaii and we need to wash a lot of clothes after we go to beaches. The living room is big and there are a lot of utensils in kitchen for us to make some simple breakfast. The House is in good distance to airport, Waikiki, and all scenery spot, also close to north side of Oahu island which I recommend the most!!!

Excellent all around! Great value for two bedrooms, bathroom, and use of living/kitchen/dining areas along with laundry. Eric responds promptly with helpful information. He is friendly though you do not see him much. And, his home is very clean. Perfect for our three-generation vacation from age 3 to 60+. Thank you, Eric!
We would definitely come back.

카일루아해변이랑 노스쇼어 중심으로 여행하고 싶어서 선택한 숙소였어요. 조용한 주택가에 있는 곳 인데 깨끗하고 쾌적해서 너무 좋았어요. 에릭도 편안하게 잘 대해주었고 필요한 것들(식자재 및 도구, 수건 여러벌, 어댑터 등)을 세심하고 풍족하게 잘 갖추어 놓아 편했어요. 부엌이 넓어 요리하기 좋았고 게스트들이 놓고간 아이템들을 마음껏 써도 된다고 했으니 요리하실거면 아이템창고를 잘 살펴보시고 필요한거만 쇼핑해도 좋을거에요. 4살 시끄러운 아이 데려갔는데도 잘 지내다가 왔네요. 카 렌트 하실거면 정말 추천하는 숙소에요!!

He is a kind and generous host!
We (2years old kid and me, husband) stayed very comfortably eventhough my kid was very talkative.
I strongly recommend here. Thank u eric!
Clean, spacious place that provided very useful amenities, down to the condiments. Eric responds quickly to any inquiries.
Very clean and modern place. Perfect location for all of the attractions on the windward side and only about 15 minutes into Honolulu. Eric was very responsive and helpful.

Nothing less than outstanding! Eric accommodated my friends and I perfectly.
The place is nice and clean, and has everything you need from a kitchen to a backyard barbecue. 
If you're coming to Hawaii and in need of a place to stay, this place is right for you!

Eric and his wife were a pleasure to stay with.  They are a very friendly couple and easy to chat with.  The house was clean and the back yard was cute.  My kids and I enjoyed that the neighborhood was quiet. We would stay with them again if we were to travel back to Oahu.
Eric has been a great host. The house was very clean. The location is close to Honolulu, Waikiki and the North Shore. Nice and quiet neighborhood too. Quick response times if you have any questions.
We had a great stay at Erics house, great big rooms and a bathroom for our own.

Beautiful palace.
Need car.
When I go to honolulu again, I want to stay.
Thank you!

Ericはとても素晴らしいﾎｽﾄです｡
ｶﾈｵﾍのお家は静かな場所にあり､周りは緑豊かで素晴らしい!

Eric has a wonderful home, and he is the best host you can ask for. If anyone has a question about beaches or local food places he will suggest some great ones. He responds extremely quick online to any questions you might have before you arrive, which surprised me as I visited from Hungary which is 12hours difference!!

They both work long hours, so their home is basically all yours. You really only meet them for a few minutes in the evening when they get home from work. 

2 lovely spacious bedrooms are available and perfect for a family of 4. Clean, spacious bathroom - do ask about how to change to shower, I got a little confused!!! - and a huge diner/living area/kitchen at the front. The back yard is cute, tho it rains a bit pretty much every morning and evening so we didn't really use it. 

Location is perfect, there are buses around but I would 100% recommend renting a car - just so much easier to get round the island. Bus takes forever to get to Waikiki or Kailua even, and let's not talk about the North Shore...There are supermarkets nearby, closest is Times Supermarket, but Windward Mall is pretty close too, only a few junctions away. 

Overall I couldn't have chosen a better place to stay with my family.

Mahalo Eric!
The location of the home is in a quiet neighborhood. Easy access from main roads and close to a lot of great beaches and eateries.
Everything was ok.

such a great place to stay on our trip to the island. amenities were more than I expected and the next person  to rent would definitely notice as well. Too many to list but I'll try. bbq and tables in the backyard, portable a/c in master guest room, full kitchen, coffee, laundry, private bathroom, Netflix, Xbox, own parking spot and the best for last the price. I would definitely stay again with my fam. thanks for the hospitality Eric and Ariel!
Lovely home,  beautiful mountains in the back of their community, sparkling clean, great location and the 2 rooms and private bath were perfect for our needs!  Thank you Eric!

Great stay in a quiet residential neighborhood. I loved the location away from busy Honolulu, but close enough I could get there easily. The access to full kitchen and laundry was the best, and the price couldn’t be beat!

Mr. Eric’s home is beautiful and located in a convenient area, where you have access to the island.  The home is clean, and has everything you need to feel at home. There is also a parking space for a rental car, and nearby transportation.  For a family of four, we had plenty of space and were more comfortable here, than in a hotel.  What a great vacation spot!
Beautiful house in a great location. Easy communication with the host. Would definitely stay here again.

Awesome place! It’s in a quite part of Oahu and the morning are so pretty with the mountains right outside! They have everything you need to stay there, beach towels, kitchen supplies, laundry, everything! Such a beautiful home!
It was very nice stay with family even though the first Airbnb, everything is good for staying as like kitchen, laundry, clean room, communication. I had a good memory of Hawaii as well.

Beautiful house in a quiet neighbourhood, far from the busy and noisy Honolulu. House is elegant and rooms and bathroom were clean and spacious. We didn't meet Eric but we had a chance to talk to his wife Ariel that let us do our things. Will stay again for sure.

This House was very clean and very comfortable when we stayed .
The area was also very quite area and a large supermarket was located rearby, It something keet the mind that we staying at my house.
Many thanks Eric~~~

Eric's place is lovely and definitely sparkling clean. There was space in his fridge for our breakfast food and snacks. The beds were comfy and sheets felt new and soft. We would stay here again and so appreciate both Eric's and his wife's hospitality. Thank you again, Eric!!!

Home is very clean and in a good location.  Eric is very responsive and was gracious in letting us use the kitchen.  

Just note that the parking can be a little tight in the driveway.

This was my first time using a shared space, but it was wonderful.  Eric and Ariel were very sweet and very prompt in responding to my questions.  They do work long hours and very rarely do you see them. I felt extremely comfortable. The house is impeccably clean. I would definitely stay there again and I highly recommend their home.
Amazing place and host. Would love to stay here again in the future!

name: Wander to the Beach from a Cozy Wailea Condo
summary: Mix a cocktail in the kitchenette at this studio-style apartment, decorated in warm, earthy tones. Sip it on the private deck as geckos scuttle around banana palms, or amid lush greenery at the complex’s shared poolside dining area with BBQ grills.
space: Great for a couple looking for affordable accommodations in Wailea.
description: Mix a cocktail in the kitchenette at this studio-style apartment, decorated in warm, earthy tones. Sip it on the private deck as geckos scuttle around banana palms, or amid lush greenery at the complex’s shared poolside dining area with BBQ grills.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located a few minutes’ walk from Wailea and Ulua Beaches. Take a morning jog or sunset stroll along the long paved beach path, which is fronted by five-star hotels, or drive 10 minutes to the world-famous Makena Beaches.
notes: Steve is a firefighter for the County of Maui and Tamara is a stay at home mom who manages our vacation rentals.
transit: You will need a car so get around. You can take a bus but to see all that Maui has to offer we recommend renting a car.
access: Two pools area with out door gas BBQs, Hot tubs and out door dinning. Two blocks from Wailea and Ulua beaches. 10 minutes drive to world famous Makena Big and little beaches
interaction: We live five minutes away from our condos so if you need anything we are here to help.
house_rules: 7 night minimum stay (14 night minimum over Holiday Season Dec 15-Jan 6) 14.42% state tax included in nightly rate $85 clean fee Cancellation policy: 60 days prior to arrival - full refund less $250 cancellation fee.  Less than 60 days - no refund unless unit is re-rented in which case refund will be made only for those days re-rented less the cancellation fee.

host.host_about: Tamara and Steve have lived on Maui since 1996 and our two young children were born and raised here. Steve is a Firefighter for Maui county and works at the Kihei fire station. Tamara is a stay-at-home mom and helps run our vacation rental business.  We have enjoyed owning our homes for their lovely tropical settings, great pool areas, and proximity to the wonderful beaches in Kihei and Wailea. We live five minutes from our properties and take great care to ensure our guests are happy. If you need anything while you are staying in our rentals we are here to help you. We hope to have you as our guests, The Farwig Family

reviews.comments: DO NOT TRUST THESE HOSTS. TERRIBLE RACISTS. We loved the location but the room was so small and smelt so bad. Room got no sunlight. The shower only ran cold water. The pools were all dirty and had lots of kids. Originally the post said "flexible checkout" but then it was changed randomly to 10am when the racist couple Steve and Tamara kicked us out on our last day in Maui. We had no where to go with our luggage and our flight back home was at 3pm
Great host

We absolutely LOVED this location and space. It was WAY better than we expected and the location is walking distance to the prettiest beaches, restaurants and yoga! We stayed in 4 airbnb's on Maui and this was our fave! Please drive to Makena and hang out at the gorgeous beach or take the boardwalk walks in front of the fancy hotels walking distance from Tamara and Steve's place:)
This Airbnb was absolutely perfect for us. Steve is very responsive and the flat is convenient and has everything needed for an amazing stay in Maui!
Loved the place! Amazing location! Short walk to the shops and some really nice beaches.
Great location and great home!  Highly recommend

Everything was great while staying at this cozy studio.  The condo was very clean and well kept.  There was also nice touches such as allowing us to borrow beach chairs, boogie board, etc.  And there is a washer/dryer in the condo which was great!  The complex is minutes away from the beach and a grocery store.  Pretty much everything you would need.

Our room was clean and very roomy. I greatly appreciated all the little extras that were available: beach chairs, blankets, umbrella, lunch box, ice packs, little packets of mustard for sandwiches, tupperwear, snacks, etc. We loved watching the little geckos scuttle around on the banana tree outside and listening to the birds in the morning/evening. Such a great little space, I would go back and stay there in a heart beat! (:

Amazing place to stay.  The "studio" is HUGE.  The lanai is in the back which makes it extremely private.  It was truly like having another room.  The front door also has a screen door which allows for a cross draft with the tradewinds.  The pool and grills are essentially across the driveway.   The grounds are beautifully landscaped.  The complex is extremely quiet.  The location was perfect for walking to Ulua Beach, the shops at Wailea, Wailea Center and Monkey Pod. Tamara and Steve are lightning fast to respond.  Loved staying here.

name: Beautiful Maui Condo By The Beach
summary: Our place is located on the leeward side and close to one of the best beaches on Maui.
space: Welcome to the perfect place to lay your head on the beautiful island of Maui. Located steps from famed Kaanapali Beach and Old Airport Beach (great for snorkeling) and about 10 minutes from downtown Lahaina, it's hard to beat. The place really is ideal for couples. Other amenities include Castaway Cafe, a great little restaurant and bar and a beach shack where you can rent sailboats, paddle boards and snorkel gear.
description: Our place is located on the leeward side and close to one of the best beaches on Maui. Welcome to the perfect place to lay your head on the beautiful island of Maui. Located steps from famed Kaanapali Beach and Old Airport Beach (great for snorkeling) and about 10 minutes from downtown Lahaina, it's hard to beat. The place really is ideal for couples. Other amenities include Castaway Cafe, a great little restaurant and bar and a beach shack where you can rent sailboats, paddle boards and snorkel gear.

reviews.comments: Doris is one of those hosts that goes above and beyond. She really handled everything for us logistically and kept communication open and clear. The place was beautiful and relaxing. I could go on but I will leave it at 10 out 10.

You will not regret visiting Maui and staying at the Villas. The location is perfect.  We love Kaanapali Beach and all the fun nearby. The Castaways Cafe is also on the campus and has great food and staff. Try it!!!

This place is great! Is central located on the west side of the island. A great reef for snorkeling is just a short walk away. The beach walk to Whaler’s village is so convenient! The room was clean and met all our needs. Great place for couples. The lanai overlooks the pool and garden and is a nice relaxing place to enjoy coffee or cocktails. Doris was so easy to work with! She was always quick to respond and gracious with her property. We can’t wait to come back for new adventures!
Best place in Maui!

name: Beauty in Birchgrove
summary: Close to Birchgrove Wharf, Darling Street, Ballast Point Park, Dawn Fraser Baths, Balmain Sailing Club, Elkington Park, Birchgrove Tennis, Birchgrove Park.  You’ll love how the contemporary interior open design blends with the Victorian cottage facade and,  The Location of course!!  Close to the ferry connecting to Circular Quay and Buses.   Our place is good for couples, business travellers, and families (with kids).
space: Our home has a contemporary design that showcases the open, light filled living area. Split level lounge/dining and kitchen areas open up to the courtyard that offers an outdoor, alfresco-like space to enjoy a morning coffee or evening beverage.  We also have some outdoor toddler furniture if you have small children. The main bedroom is upstairs with ensuite bathroom.  Very private, it also offers a small but special view across the neighbourhood to the Parramatta river and Cockatoo island.  A nice reminder of how close you are to the joys of the area. The second bedroom is at the front of the house, furnished with one single bed, it is well appointed as a child's room but could easily accommodate a third adult.
description: Close to Birchgrove Wharf, Darling Street, Ballast Point Park, Dawn Fraser Baths, Balmain Sailing Club, Elkington Park, Birchgrove Tennis, Birchgrove Park.  You’ll love how the contemporary interior open design blends with the Victorian cottage facade and,  The Location of course!!  Close to the ferry connecting to Circular Quay and Buses.   Our place is good for couples, business travellers, and families (with kids). Our home has a contemporary design that showcases the open, light filled living area. Split level lounge/dining and kitchen areas open up to the courtyard that offers an outdoor, alfresco-like space to enjoy a morning coffee or evening beverage.  We also have some outdoor toddler furniture if you have small children. The main bedroom is upstairs with ensuite bathroom.  Very private, it also offers a small but special view across the neighbourhood to the Parramatta river and Cockatoo island.  A nice reminder of how close you are to the joys of the area. The second bedroom
neighborhood_overview: Birchgrove is in Sydney's inner-west, perched on the Balmain peninsula.  The waterfront location and the cafe, boutique shopping precinct of Darling street, feature the best of this "hidden" neighbourhood. Our home is centrally located to the local highlights -   - Birchgrove Wharf for ferries to Circular Quay  - Darling Street for cafe culture and boutique shopping  - Dawn Fraser pools for a refreshing swim, fitness, or inspiration!   - Ballast Point Park for relaxation, views, or just for a beautiful walk. - and so much more . . . .
transit: Ferry  - The F3 leaves from BIrchgrove Wharf (and Balmain Wharf) every 30 minutes in the morning, and then every hour,  if you're working in the CBD, or want to connect to Manly, Sydney's famous Taronga Zoo, Watson's Bay or more. Buses  - The 441 service operates from Grove Street  (3 min walk) every 20 minutes into the City.  Stops include the Queen Victoria Building (15 minute trip), Town Hall Station (connects to every train line in the Sydney network) The Royal Botanical Gardens (Art Gallery of NSW) and the famous Mrs Macquarie's Chair - worth the trip! Car There is untimed, non-metered parking around our home.
access: Guests have full access to the whole home.
interaction: You will be met on arrival and farewelled on departure by the team from Urbankeyz.  They will also be on call for you if there are any special requests or matters needing attention during your stay.

host.host_about:
We are both live busy lives working in creative industries, travelling a lot. When we are home we love nothing more to stick to our local neighbourhood and enjoy everything that we can walk to, which is pretty much everything we need!  

When our home is listed, that means we are working out of Sydney, so the team from Urbankeyz will be taking care of you on our behalf.

reviews.comments: A very well kept house in birchgrove and only a few minutes walk to buses into the city or a slightly longer walk to the ferry. The check in and out process was managed really well. Good size with a nice courtyard space. A pleasure to stay there.
A great place to stay. Close to Darling Street cafes and resturants.
This place is awesome. Within minutes of Darling street, filled with cafes and restaurants. There was a cot for our 1 year old and even fresh milk for him in the fridge.
Good stays and just walk a bit to darling street with many bars and restaurants as well as woolworth if you want buy stuffs for preparing your meal

Brilliant 2 bedroom place perfect for a short stay in Balmain. The house is close to Darling street shops and there is a bus stop about 5 mins walk that goes directly into CBD. Theres also a ferry stop which is about 10mins walk and we used that once for an alternative route into town. Theres a pleasant park down the road with fantastic views onto harbour bridge from Birchgrove.

The house itself is high spec with everything we needed and we loved using the courtyard for breakfast. 
Host was excellent and they installed an air con in the living room which worked out really well given the hot summer in Sydney at the time. 

Couldn't fault the place- highly recommended.

We really enjoyed our stay at the property in Birchgrove, and we were able, very easily, to make it our home for the 3 weeks we were there in late Summer....

The property was very comfortable, well equipped, and had a great contemporary feel behind the unassuming facade... its location, is well positioned to explore Sydney, with great bus and ferry transport links all of which made our stay on the Balmain peninsular very enjoyable. The local area has many great shops, cafes, restaurants and bars to discover too... it has a lovely village feel.

We were met at the property when we arrived by an agent, who made our arrival very easy, and then replied to our texts very promptly during our stay... He was also able to arrange a later check out time, which really helped with our onward journey.

A great stay.... and highly recommended listing...
Great place to stay, especially if you have kids.

Good location if you're looking for proximity to Balmain & transport to city. 

Good kids room downstairs.  A selection of toys too.  No problems with communication etc.

Currently no curtains on the windows in the main bedroom which meant we didn't sleep well, hopefully the owner will remedy this.
Fantastic house, close to the main drag of Darling St for food and drink. Super quick into the city too. Lovely area and decor.
Great spot and cute house with all the essentials.
In Sydney on business and so lovely to stay in such a beautiful, comfortable home away from home.
Second week in Sydney for business, and enjoyed staying in this lovely home. The neighbourhood is just gorgeous and a calming respite after a busy day!
We loved our stay in this lovely part of Sydney. So close to shops, restaurants and public transport. Lovely walks near the harbour. Accurately described and photographed.
Amazing house, secure, clean, comfortable, sensational location, wonderful communication. What more could you ask for from an Airbnb? Highly Recommended!!
Travelled to Sydney for business and stayed here for 4 nights. The property was very modern and close to darling street. The whole process was seamless and would highly recommend!

The home is just lovely. Very comfortable and gorgeous design. Everything you would need is provided. Great location. Beautiful bedroom with sound blocking Windows and a very comfortable bed. Can't recommend the property highly enough. Try it out!! Eliza

My stay at Alex and Kristina's home was great.  Extremely clean with everything you need. Spot on description and photos to what I experienced.  Geoff who will look after you is helpful and sweet.  Highly recommended oh and btw a fabulous location with great eateries and not far from east balmain ferry terminal.

Had a great stay at Alex and Kristina's lovely place . Parking was great and everything wonderful Balmain had to offer was within walking distance . 
Thank you Alex and Kristina for allowing us to stay . 

Regards Nicole
This is a wonderful home and I've enjoyed my multiple stays here. Hosts have been attentive and great at communicating, making for an easy and wonderful stay.
Wonderful place and very good location, with everything we needed and more. We'll definitely come back! Can't recommend enough.

Cute family house with a bit of style and artsiness. 5-10mn walk to Darling St restaurants and grocer, 15-20mn walk to ferry. Plenty of buses to take you into town. Quiet hood close to CBD with a clear hip factor but not trendy. Great communication with very nice property manager. Super clean. Only complaints would be the hard pillows (we both got stiff necks), slippery bathtub (but it’s a great size!), no bedroom door so not private if anyone’s downstairs (the stairs lead up to an open bedroom), great heat but rises up to the bedroom so if you want to warm up the downstairs it gets really hot in the bedroom (hard to balance the two), they’ve covered the bedroom window with a nice shade but it doesn’t cover the awkwardly shaped diagonal window so light comes in at one corner (we covered that spot with a pillow). Overall a good stay but does have its small quirks.

name: Tree top room with ocean views
summary: Come home to our peaceful island retreat, enjoy the tropical rainforest! 2.5 miles to the ocean! Fall asleep to the tree frog lullaby, wake to the bird song! Enjoy the local black sand beaches, farmers markets and full service town of Pahoa. Experience living close to nature, enjoy the peace of luxury off grid living. Close to yoga, dances
space: The tree top room is a spacious open air room up amongst the tree tops. Watch the sunrise out of the ocean! There are mosquito nets for all beds. You have full access to our shared kitchen and 1 and 1/2 baths.
description: Come home to our peaceful island retreat, enjoy the tropical rainforest! 2.5 miles to the ocean! Fall asleep to the tree frog lullaby, wake to the bird song! Enjoy the local black sand beaches, farmers markets and full service town of Pahoa. Experience living close to nature, enjoy the peace of luxury off grid living. Close to yoga, dances The tree top room is a spacious open air room up amongst the tree tops. Watch the sunrise out of the ocean! There are mosquito nets for all beds. You have full access to our shared kitchen and 1 and 1/2 baths. The tree top room is your private room. You also have access to full shared kitchen, bath house and 1/2 bath as well as all outdoor spaces We will be available on property or by phone. We love to meet our guests and share what we love about where we live. We also love our quiet space and are respectful of however much or little guests want to interact. Our home is 2 miles to the ocean. Black sand beaches and Pahoa town within 10 miles. The beau
neighborhood_overview: Our home is 2 miles to the ocean. Black sand beaches and Pahoa town within 10 miles. The beauty of nature surrounds you
notes: The tree top room is a second story room. Great for adults, not a child friendly space because of large open windows.
transit: It is necessary here to have your own vehicle to get around
access: The tree top room is your private room. You also have access to full shared kitchen, bath house and 1/2 bath as well as all outdoor spaces
interaction: We will be available on property or by phone. We love to meet our guests and share what we love about where we live. We also love our quiet space and are respectful of however much or little guests want to interact.
house_rules: - Quiet hours are; 10pm-8am. - Please No shoes in the home and no food in sleeping cabins - Off grid living does sometimes require conservation (shorter showers if no rain and internet off by midnight if low power) - Have fun! Relax! Make yourself at home

reviews.comments: Cool little Off the Grid Bungalow. loved our stay
Want to sleep in a treehouse in super comfortable beds surrounded by a variety of sounds from birds to frogs then this is the place to stay. A bit tricky to get there but then it's unique!
Beautiful stay - the view is incredible and very nicely decorated. Very friendly nice hosts!

This was a unique experience sleeping in a treehouse that was open to the elements. There were no mosquitos which was surprising considering that we were deep in a rainforest .  Julie was extremely kind and welcoming host. It is off road so be sure to arrive before dark. Most important is to bring earplugs to offset the noise of the coqui frogs.  Our grandchildren enjoy the memorable experience of living local and  in a rain forest.

Julia's place is in a beautiful, rural jungle location close to Pahoa. It's a rustic "tree top" building (on stilts) with wonderful views, sounds, and aromas in the air. There are a few more rustic buildings on the property that might be occasionally rented out. A few of the buildings are a shared kitchen and bathrooms. There are a few cats and dogs on the property. Julia and her husband were very kind to us. It was a great home-base from which we explored the Pahoa area.

name: Pali Ke Kua 144
summary: 2 Bedroom Oceanfront Getaway - Perfect for the Family!
space: This recently redecorated unit is what a dream vacation on Kauai is all about!  A new "nautical/beach" theme moves this unit to a class above many other vacation rental units with all new furniture and decor in the living room, dining room and office/additional guest area. Each of these rooms also features ocean views, as does each of the two lanais.  The kitchen has new granite counter tops and the bedrooms feature Hawaiiana furniture and bedding. The Master Bedroom has a king size bed and the guest bedroom has a queen size bed. There is a queen size sleeper/sofa in the office/additional guest area as well.
description: 2 Bedroom Oceanfront Getaway - Perfect for the Family! This recently redecorated unit is what a dream vacation on Kauai is all about!  A new "nautical/beach" theme moves this unit to a class above many other vacation rental units with all new furniture and decor in the living room, dining room and office/additional guest area. Each of these rooms also features ocean views, as does each of the two lanais.  The kitchen has new granite counter tops and the bedrooms feature Hawaiiana furniture and bedding. The Master Bedroom has a king size bed and the guest bedroom has a queen size bed. There is a queen size sleeper/sofa in the office/additional guest area as well. Amenities Full Kitchen Washer/Dryer King Bed Queen Bed WiFi TV DVD Player Cable Outdoor Patio Aloha and Greetings from the Kauai Pacific Real Estate Team! Our team of real estate, vacation rental and property management professionals have been serving the needs of our owners, guests and clients since 1997.  We know Kauai inside
neighborhood_overview: This unit is just steps away from the ocean bluff which overlooks spectacular Turtle Cove, home to dozens of Hawaiian Honu (Sea Turtles) as well as the Hawaiian Monk Seal. From either the bluff, the lanais or the inside of the unit you have expansive ocean views and during the winter months this is one of the locations where the famous Humpback Whales love to come and play. Pali Ke Kua is one of the North Shore`s premier ocean front locations. Features include a swimming pool and hot tub, and a path to isolated Hideaways Beach. From the project you can watch wonderful sunsets over Bali Hai, walk to multiple restaurants and enjoy the world famous golf courses of Princeville. This is a great spot for your family and friends to enjoy a perfect vacation on Kauai!
notes: Taxes are included in nightly rate and cleaning fee.
transit: There is limited public transportation on Kauai. Most visitors choose to rent a vehicle upon arrival at the Lihue Airport. Advanced car rental reservations are recommended.
access: Amenities Full Kitchen Washer/Dryer King Bed Queen Bed WiFi TV DVD Player Cable Outdoor Patio
interaction: Aloha and Greetings from the Kauai Pacific Real Estate Team! Our team of real estate, vacation rental and property management professionals have been serving the needs of our owners, guests and clients since 1997.  We know Kauai inside and out.  We all share the wonderful gift of Aloha!  Some of our employees and team members were born and raised on the Garden Island.  Others have made their home here for ten years or more.  This is an island and a life style we love and cherish and look forward to sharing our expertise with you. Kauai Pacific Real Estate is a full-service property management & real estate company.  We have experts in the field of real estate sales and purchases, the island`s best team of vacation rental experts, and we are one of the largest managers of privately-owned long-term rental properties on the island. Unlike most other property management companies, we handle every aspect of property care for our owners and guests.  We not only have our own cleaning services
house_rules: Kaua’i Pacific Real Estate Terms and Conditions    This contract constitutes an agreement between the Guest and the property Owner, represented by Kauai Pacific Real Estate, LLC (KPRE) - Vacation Rental Division in accordance with the laws of the State of Hawai’i.   CONDITION OF PREMISES:  The unit and contents are privately owned with Kauai Pacific Real Estate acting solely as the Owner`s Agent. It is rented with Owner`s furnishings and neither Owner nor Agent will be responsible for providing any additional furnishings or equipment. No items belonging to Owner shall be removed from the premises. Should any major equipment be out of order, we guarantee to have the deficiency corrected as soon as possible during normal business hours. Guest authorizes Agent to repair damages or losses caused by Guest or Invitees of Guest, at the expense of Guest. Guest accepts responsibility for the acts of their children, visitors, or invitees. Guest will not remove or rearrange inside furniture. BBQs

host.host_about:
Full service vacation rental agency for almost 20 years, we manage many beautiful properties on Kauai in all price ranges, from studios to 3 BR condos.
We have a full time reservation, cleaning and maintenance staff here to provide you with a worry free vacation.

reviews.comments: Beautiful quiet location close to the ocean! Washer/dryer is the unit is a great convenience. No basic food items like sugar, oil, etc. so plan your grocery shopping accordingly. It's a great overall vacation experience that we'd be happy to experience again!
Such a great and beautiful location! Right around the corner from Queens Bath! Such an incredible place!
The house was great! The views out the back were even better! Such a nice community and everyone was so friendly!!
Great location and great view of the ocean!

name: Convenient//Comfortable - Experience Kennedy Town!
summary: Waterfront apartment in one of Hong Kong's most up and coming neighbourhoods - Kennedy Town. 4 minute walk to MTR, walking distance from many great restaurants, and only a 10-15 minutes away by public transport from areas like Central, SOHO, Sai Ying Pun and more! Studio apartment with all necessary amenities - full use of kitchen with standard cooking ingredients (oils, spices), fast WIFI.
description: Waterfront apartment in one of Hong Kong's most up and coming neighbourhoods - Kennedy Town. 4 minute walk to MTR, walking distance from many great restaurants, and only a 10-15 minutes away by public transport from areas like Central, SOHO, Sai Ying Pun and more! Studio apartment with all necessary amenities - full use of kitchen with standard cooking ingredients (oils, spices), fast WIFI. Guest access includes full apartment. We are hands-off hosts - will leave you with a long list of recommendations but we do not interact.  In case of emergencies, we have a helper who can assist. Safe and quiet neighbourhood in up and coming area. Plenty of restaurants and bars geared towards both local and expat tastes. Come watch the sunset over Victoria Harbour. Public transport in Kennedy Town is plentiful. With MTR only 4 minute walk away - and busses at the apartment doorstep.

the unit was a great location and was much larger than I was expecting.  Julia was available of needed and was great to communicate  with
