un logement parfaitement propre et agréable convenant très bien pour 4 personnes . Un accueil chaleureux avec plusieurs plans et cartes de Québec et de sa région. Merci beaucoup

Philippe was very welcoming and always responsive via airbnb, though because of our personal scheduling we did not meet.  The Apartment was well furnished and had everything we needed during our stay.  The  location is great.  Finding street parking was no trouble.  A wonderful, nicely cultured neighborhood with many great shops, cafes, and restaurants close by, as well as a 10-15 minute walk to the metro.

The apartment was very clean and Philippe was pleasant to work with. 

I should mention however that the entire apartment smells very strongly of cigarette smoke and we were not given any notice of this (it even permeates the bedding and remained on our clothes for days after leaving). We were informed upon our arrival that this was from recent guests. I certainly understand that this was beyond Philippe's control, but we would have definitely appreciated a heads up beforehand as this would have affected our decision to stay at the apartment. In all other respects, we had a great stay.

The neighborhood is pretty cute nestled the Plateau so close to a lot of nearby places. The apartment is up a steep spiral staircase so be careful going up in winter time. We had everything that we needed and Philippe included a folder with a lot of information for you to get around. 

Although bathroom is a little small, but clean. Towels were included and we had no problems staying there. 

Thanks Philippe for everything!

Nous remercions Sandra et Philippe pour leur accueil et leur gentillesse. Le logement, confortable, correspondait parfaitement au descriptif et était bien situé ; à proximité des transports et commerces.
Nous recommandons cette location dans laquelle nous reviendrions avec plaisir lors d'un prochain séjour.

Pas de mauvaise surprise, le logement correspondait à notre attente.
Quartier agréable, proximité metro et magasin.
Philippe et son épouse ont été prévenants et efficaces.
Adresse à recommander sans aucun doute.

Philippe's place is so beautiful! My parents and I stayed for 3 nights and everything was super smooth. The location is great, right in the Plateau area and close to transit and very popular streets. Philippe is super friendly and ready to help or give advice. The apartment is warm, cosy, two nice bedrooms, great kitchen and living area. Very pleased with this experience!

This place was just as described - fantastic value for a 2 bedroom. I was in town visiting friends and it was perfect for my needs. The neighbourhood is lovely - very close to places I wanted to go in the Plateau/Mile End, etc. Philippe was very friendly to communicate with and responsive to any questions we had. He also provided great directions and the coffee maker was a nice touch. Overall, just what I was looking for.

We enjoyed staying in Philippes house, it was the perfect starting point to explore Montreal for the first time: The bus stops right in front of the door, you walk 10 minutes to the metro, and the little shops and cafés on Av. Laurier are only some steps away. We had a friendly and helpful host, and the apartment was perfect for our little family (2 adults, 1 child). Everything was clean and well prepared for our stay.

The house was great and in walking distance of everything including the 2 train which takes you to downtown. The apartment fits 4 comfortably and is provided with cooking equipment if you need them which I thought was really good. Phillippe and his wife were very good hosts and greeted us the first day my next stay in Montreal I will definitely be staying here again. Supermarket is right around the corner and so is the liquor store.

Un grand merci à Philippe et Sandra pour leur accueil.
Appartement impeccable, lumineux. 
Quartier calme à deux pas d'une rue animée (café, superette,...). 
A 10-15 minutes à pied du métro.
De quoi passer un super séjour à Montréal. 
A conseiller fortement.
Hervé et Marie-Pierre

Le logement est conforme a la description. Nous séjournions à 3 dans l'appartement sans problème. L'appartement est bien agréable et son emplacement situé proche de beaucoup de commerce et de la station Laurier est assez pratique (station à 10min a pied ou a moins de 5min en bus, le bus passant au pied de l'appartement). Note: l'appartement est accessible par un grand escalier (caractéristique) assez pentu. 
Merci à Philippe et Sandra pour leur accueil chaleureux.

Très joli appartement et très bien situé! Bien équipé et confortable. Bon rapport qualité prix! Très bon accueil! Des propriétaires très sympathiques et souriants! Nous avons passé un très bon séjour...

Merci pour ce séjour très réussi.
Nous avons apprécié votre accueil et votre logement est totalement adapté pour un séjour à Montréal dans un quartier calme et proche du centre
Merci encore
hôte très sympathique et maison très agréable. Adresse à recommander pour visiter Montréal
The place was great.  Very clean, and just as described.  Located in a residential neighborhood, very quiet and not far (bus ride or 30-ish min. walk) from bars and restaurants.  Recommended!
We had a great stay in this nice apartment in Montréal. It's in a quiet, pretty neighbourhood, about 15 minutes walk from the subway. Philippe was very welcoming. Recommended!

We arrived late on a Friday night and communicated previously with Philippe through text messaging. He was there to greet us when we arrived and showed us around the apartment. He informed us of all the local shops for any basics and groceries that we might need.  The apartment was simple and everything we needed - a comfortable bed, a good shower, space to relax after walking around all day. There is also a kitchen for those who want to cook. Would happily stay here again.
l'appartement était très sympa, et ça correspond bien aux photos indiqués, les hôtes sont sympa :)
Philippe ' apartment is very spacious and comfortable. The location is great and very close to downtown area. It met all of our expectations and I would recommend the place to anyone.

L'accueil personnalisé de Philippe m'a agréablement surpris dans ce sens tout était efficacement arrangé pour mon arrivée. Philippe n'était pas présent à mon arrivée lais l'appartement était accessible par ses bines indications. La visite tôt le lendemain matin pour prendre de mes nouvelles et me proposer le petit déjeuner est la cerise sur le gâteau ! Cela prouve qu'il a à cœur le bien être  de ses clients. Tout est pensé à l'avance pour que vous soyez a l'aise et ce dans les détails. Cela vous permet d'être autonome tout de suite meme si cela devrait être votre première visite à Montréal ! Et j'y retournerai bien volontiers.

My daughter and I loved Philippe's apartment in Montreal.  The neighborhood was quiet, conveniently located near a strip of restaurants, a grocery store, and drug store.  It was nice having a bus stop right at the bottom of the stairs.  It was super clean and everything we needed was in the apartment.  We'd gladly stay with them again.

Appt spacieux conforme à la description, excepte la salle d'eau qui n'est pas très grande mais cela suffit.On trouve tout ce qu'il faut dans la cuisine. Commerce a 5 mn a pieds. Tres bien situé Bus au pied de l'Appart ou métro à 15 min à pieds . Philippe était absent à notre arrivée mais avait tout organisé . Il est venu nous voir quand il est revenu. Très sympa . Nous y avons passé  un agréable séjour.

Super appart pour visiter Montréal ! 
Philippe et Sandra nous ont très bien accueillis et se sont montrés très disponibles pendant notre séjour.
L'appartement est situé dans un quartier calme et typique de Montréal, à 2 pas de toutes les commodités.
Nous y avons passé un excellent séjour. 
En bref, nous recommandons cette adresse !

We really enjoyed our stay in Montreal and loved this apartment. It was in a great location close to transit, grocery, restaurants etc. Philippe was very helpful and provided tons of info to make our stay as enjoyable as possible. Would definitely recommend this place!

Bel appartement, parfaitement propre, suffisamment spacieux et bien équipé pour quatre. Quartier très agréable (parc Laurier tantôt calme ou animé, piscine, ambiance générale...) et bien situé pour le bus, le métro, les vélos Bixi, comme les différents commerces (à 5mn).
Nous remercions Sandra pour son accueil et ses explications, nos hôtes ont été très arrangeants. Pour une première visite de Montréal en famille, nous avons passé un excellent séjour. A recommander vivement.

Nous sommes ravis de notre séjour dans le logement de Philippe et Sandra. Pratique, bien situé, bien équipé, l'appartement était parfait. L'accueil de Philippe et Sandra a été chaleureux et nous avons beaucoup apprécié les échanges avec eux. Un tout petit bémol sur le parking dans la rue qui nous a semblé compliqué...mais il semble que ce soit le cas dans pas mal de rues à Montréal. Encore merci à eux pour leur grande disponibilité.

My friend and I had just a great experience at Philippe's. The place is cozy and located in a nice neighborhood. Perhaps, my only concern was the absence of a/c, which would be nice to have during the summer
My stay was excellent. The unit was as shown on AirB&B. Philippe was very responsive and the unit was well located. Great Stay!!! I would stay there again.

We had a great stay at Philippe and Sandra's! The apartment was exactly as described and was ready and waiting for us to drop our bags and settle in when we arrived. The neighbourhood is Montreal at its finest - brick buildings, small shops and cafés, green boulevards and parks, and very walkable. Philippe and Sandra answered all our inquiries promptly and were lovely hosts. We look forward to a chance to stay here again in future!

One thing to note: due to some construction at the Laurier metro station entrance on Laurier Ave. the walk was a couple minutes longer to reach the other Laurier station entrance at Saint-Joseph Blvd. Nothing too much for avid pedestrians like us but it might be for some.

We also definitely recommend getting ice cream at Bo Bec on Laurier Ave! It's about a 5 minute walk from the apartment.

Un appartement idéalement situé dans un quartier calme et fort sympathique ! 
Nous avons rencontré Sandra qui a été adorable, accessible et de bons conseils. 
Nous recommandons ce logement.

This being our first Airbnb experience, my wife and I were very pleased with this clean, comfortable apartment.  The hosts were helpful, and while we never met them in person, everything was well prepared for our arrival and they were very easy to keep in touch with before and during the stay.  All amenities were as promised, bed and bath clean and comfortable, and there was just enough room for us to feel like we could spread out a bit while spending indoor downtime during our vacation.  The neighborhood is pleasant, though prospective guests should know that it is located rather on the far northwest end of the Mont Royal Plateau area (about a mile north of Boulevard St. Laurent).  But there are attractions nearer by as well, so all in all an excellent stay.  Strongly recommended.

Philippe et Sandra nous ont accueilli avec beaucoup d'entrain, merci à eux pour leur accueil. Un appartement sympathique très bien placé dans un quartier vivant mais restant calme.
Rien à dire, tout a été parfait !!

Philippe était présent pour nous accueillir même tôt le matin. Il c'est montré très disponible pour toute aide ou conseils. Nous connaissions déjà le quartier donc nous n'avons pas eu de demande particulière mais si la situation le devait nous aurions pu le joindre facilement surtout qu'il réside au rez de chaussée. 
L'appartement est fonctionnel, propre et confortable.

Although we didn't interact much with our host, we met him briefly during our stay and he was very welcoming and friendly. The listing was exactly as described. It was a gorgeous little apartment with everything you'd need for a short stay - extra blankets, iron, cutlery, etc. The neighbourhood was also wonderful. I loved Montreal and I loved the apartment we had the wonderful opportunity to stay in. Thank you Phillipe!
Phillipe's apartment was very clean and comfortable. We had everything we needed for our stay. He was very hospitable. I would definitely stay here again!
Such an cozy and beautiful home. Every time I come to Montreal now, I plan on staying there!

Accueil très chaleureux, Philippe et Sandra sont deux hôtes exemplaires, toujours disponibles si on a besoin.
L'appartement est exactement comme sur les photos, très bien agencé, tout est très propre. Il est bien situé, à 10/15 minutes du métro Laurier à pied et en bas de la rue on trouve pleins de commerces, de quoi faire ses courses et des restaurants. 
Nous y sommes restées 2 mois avec une amie et nous nous sentions vraiment chez nous !!
Très bonne adresse n'hésitez surtout pas !!!! :)
Cécilia et Marie
Très bon séjour chez Philippe, l'appartement est propre et calme, très bien situé.

My brother and I enjoyed our stay at Philippe and Sandra's place. Although I did not meet Philippe (but I did speak with him over the phone (very nice guy)) I did meet Sandra who was very lovely. She gave my brother and I a tour of the place and also made sure that where we were parked for our stay would be a good place to park to avoid parking tickets. Within the house they provided a nice little manual that they drew up. It had a nice map with near by restaurants, grocery stores and public transportation and also instructions on how to use the tv and a listing of some of the more used channels so you didn't have to go searching for them as well as information for connecting to the wifi. There were some basic cooking supplies (pots, cutlery and such) which was nice as that meant that we didn't have to eat out every night. The area was very nice, and just a few minutes walk away from a very nice park, bike rental station and swimming pool and about a 10-15 minute walk to the Metro. From their place to Rue Sherbrooke and St. Laurent (where they had many festivities for the Grand Prix Weekend) cost my brother and I about $11 for the taxi ride. All in all, the place is nice though it is a bit small, especially the bathroom. However, the 2 bedrooms that were there were a good size and didn't feel cramped at all. As mentioned before, our stay there was enjoyable. I would stay there again.

Malheureusement, nous n'avons pas rencontré Philippe, mais tout était prêt pour notre arrivée malgré notre retard (attente de 3h à la douane). L'appartement correspond bien aux photos. Il se trouve à +-14 minutes du métro Laurier et il y a tout ce qu'il faut à proximité.
Notre arrivée a été sans surprise mise à part la belle ambiance du quartier et de sa rue centrale toute proche.

Philippe's place is a great home base while in Montreal. It's in a lovely residential neighborhood. The place was nice, clean and had everything we needed. It's small but enough space for 2-3 people. We had no problem on arrival, just a bit of confusion on the checkout time but it ended up working out. Definitely important to know that the way in is up a VERY steep staircase! I would recommend staying here :)
Everything was cool, especially because there was small problem Phillipe quickly fixed.  Montreal was a great surprise, now I know where I might run if Trump gets elected ;-)

It was a very easy communication via email.  We never saw our host, however, it was easy to get in and utilize the apartment. There was a manual on the table describing, however, the first page is only in French.  The place is clean and has all the minimum amenities.  The bathroom, and the shower is very small but the size of the kitchen and the apartment and the bedrooms are good.
Nous ont renseigner sur le quartier et ses commodités  , piscine ,location de voiture , transport en commun . Quartier très sympathique , parc à côté  , (Website hidden by Airbnb) familiale

Non abbiamo mai incontrato Philippe durante la nostra permanenza ma è stato molto gentile, ci ha anche fornito seggiolone e lettino per la bimba piccola ed è stato molto elastico per gli orari di arrivo e partenza. Tutto l'appartamento è molto pulito e, anche se dalle foto sembra più grande di quello che è, resta comunque molto carino, curato e accogliente. La Wi-Fi funziona bene e la posizione è comoda: a 10 minuti dalla metro e in un bel quartiere residenziale.

We had a pleasant stay in the apartment. The location is very nice, the apartment simple but convenient. 
The communication was good with Philippe.

This was our first Airbnb stay and it was fabulous! The apartment was exactly as described in the listing and very clean. For us the location was perfect--near our friends and around the corner from a beautiful park, restaurants, and cafes.
Pour la deuxième fois tout c'est très bien passé.

This place was as shown in the images, simple and cute with the basics.  The neighborhood was up and coming with lots of cool restaurant.  Nice vibe about it, felt very safe.  Would recommend for people who want something a little cooler and laid back

my friend and i had a great overall experience staying at philippe's airbnb. philipe's wife initially greeted us with her huge smile and warm personality.  the place itself was super clean and perfect for 2-3 people. amenities wise the place isn't as stocked as others i've been but that's probably because i've been spoiled at others so make sure you bring shampoo, soap, extra coffee and tea. philippe is very quick at responding whenever you message him, he also lives downstairs so if you need anything just ring. to those driving there is street parking but its a bit confusing, make sure you read the signs like normal and you'll be fine. what else? thats about it! cool, chill spot, neat shops around, perfect base camp.
All as described. Friendly and helpful host.
Très propre, coin tranquille, livret d'instruction informatif ( resto, pharmacie, metro etc).

We had a lovely stay at the cosy apartment and were really thankful for the recommendation and help from Philippe and his wife. The apartment is situated on the first floor, reachable by a typical Montreal stairway. We stayed with 2 Persons in the apartment which was perfect. The place was clean and well equipped. Everything you need is provided and looked like on the pictures. The bathroom is small but didn't bothered us.   
The public transportation is near by, the Metro is in walking distance about 12 min,the bus right in front of the house. Also a bakery, supermarket and pharmacy are close by. We felt like home living in a typical Montreal apartment situated in a nice environment.
Appartement dans un quartier calme et sympathique. Le propriétaire est efficace et accommodant.

Philippe's place is super-clean, quiet and exactly as described.  It's easy to get to and in a perfect location close to shops and great restaurants, and also for getting downtown.  Would definitely stay here again!
Rien à dire, excellent séjour et superbe appartement c'est la deuxième fois que j'y vais.
Had a great stay at Philippe. Would stay again!
Très beau rapport qualité/prix ! Un bel emplacement pour découvrir Montréal
Très beau rapport qualité/prix ! Un bel emplacement pour découvrir Montréal
Hôtes tres sympatiques, appartement confortable et tres propre. Dans un beau quartier proche d'une rue commerçante.
This apartment is very cute and comfortable. Its central and convenient to shops and the metro. I highly recommend this place! It feels cosy and home like right away.
Good Apartment in trendy neighbourhood. Noisy street when windows are open.

L'appartement de Philippe est situé dans le pittoresque quartier du Plateau Mont-Royal où se trouvent toutes les maisons avec leurs escaliers extérieurs, typiques de Montréal. Il est bien équipé et agréable, facile d'accès depuis la station de métro Laurier (15 minutes de marche) ou par bus (un arrêt devant la maison). On accède facilement et rapidement au centre-ville et au Mont-Royal. Il aussi est tout proche d'une rue commerçante et d'un supermarché Metro bien pratique. Philippe et son épouse sont charmants et très accueillants. Notre séjour a été très agréable.

Safe place next to a beautiful park, the house is very clean all works good and the host perfect.
The bus stop is just few meters from house, the subway 10 min by walk.
Very good experience and confortable house, simply perfect!!
In a great location with many small restaurants and coffee shops near by.   Close to metro and bus stop. Philippe was very quick at responding to texts or emails.   Good value.
A fabulous neighbourhood and tremendous value. Communicative, kind and accessible hosts. I would definitely stay at this property again with no hesitation. A+
Très sympa pour trois personnes.On reviendra!
Very accommodating host and great location - Rue Laurier has lots of lovely independent boutiques, cafes and restaurants.
The location is the best thing about this rental!

OMG!!! the place is lovely. My Partner and I were visiting Montreal, very so romantic city.  Philippe's place is everything you see in the pics. Amazing place. Everything is near to the apartment. If you use public transportation, the bus passes in front of the apt. Amazing! Clean and nice. 
We want to go back to Montreal soon, definitely want to stay in Philippe's place again. Thanks Philippe.
Très bel appartement très bien situé. Philippe est réactif pour répondre aux questions !

Great place, Lots of light and cool top floor apartment. Very close to anything you'll need, but need to drive or metro to downtown or where the club's are. Very cozy feel and I'm glad we stayed there!
Très bel appartement, très bien situé et très calme sur le Plateau. Très bien équipé. Excellent séjour.
Clean place for staying. Parking available on the street for free.

Perfect little spot, on the edge of the plateau. Great location, close to most things, quick metro ride or cheap uber to anywhere. Had a fantastic stay in this quaint, comfortable and cozy spot. Thanks Phillipe and Sandra :)
Great location! Many restaurants at walking distance! Parking was a little tricky, but we got lucky!

Our long weekend stay was great! There were good places to eat right down the street, and plenty of other good things to do a short Uber ride away. My only issue was that the wifi was really slow and inconsistent. I keep just using my phone data in order to access maps and stuff to plan our outings. If I had had work to do and was relying on the wifi to send emails with attachments, it would have been very frustrating. Also, the bathroom is very small - there is almost no leg room in from of the toilet. Aside from those two things though, everything was great. I was nervous about finding street parking, but we always managed to find a decent spot.
appartement  parfait et conforme à la description très  bien situé non loin des commerces du métro  et c un super parc !
A real bargain: good location, comfortable, great hosts.

Great location, 2 bedrooms, a great value. Phillippe offered suggestions for dining in the area and was quick to respond to my parking questions. Never had an issue with parking. Would definitely stay again.
Philippe had a lovely place. There was a very helpful map that showed all necessary local stores and eating spots. The place was tidy and offered everything we needed. Definitely recommend!

Prévoyez votre maillot de bain, la piscine du parc laurier est très agreable (gratuite) si vous êtes de passage l'été. Sinon le quartier est très sympathique avec beaucoup de commerces a proximité. L'appartement est propre et conforme a l'annonce.
Bon accueil, appartement bien situé, quartier agréable.
Emplacement idéal

Philippe was a good host, the apartment is well located and was clean. It has 2 good-sized rooms, a big kitchen and air conditioning. Just keep in mind there are no dish soap or body wash/shampoo. Overall, a good experience.
Conforme à  la  description , logement sympa et pratique
Clean, well located, bigger than expected :)
Appartement bien placé. Idéal pour visiter Montréal. Des petites choses pourraient être améliorées mais globalement très bon rapport qualité prix.

Un appartement qui a conservé son charme ancien, beaux parquet, moulures, petites pièces, huisseries...  Dans une maison typique du quartier du plateau.
Les propriétaires sont charmants et un bon livret d'adresses pour les courses aux environs est fournit. Les programmes de la box tv proposent même des chaines radio.

Good location.
Easy check in.
Great base to explore Montreal.

ACCUEIL, REACTIVITE, APPARTEMENT SPACIEUX ET AGREABLE TRES BIEN SITUE !
NOUS LE CONSEILLONS !

Merci Philippe et Sandra pour ce formidable séjour, nos parents ont passé un séjour très agréable. Appartement très fonctionnel et propre pour des adultes. Vous avez été toujours disponible et à l'écoute. Nous vous recommanderons sans hésitation. Merci encore !

Overall good stay at Philippe’s place.

Keypad was problematic to the point of getting locked out but apparently that was a battery issue.

Apt is nice but not very comfortable for lounging and hanging out for more than 1
Appartement conforme à la description, bien placée à proximité de la rue Mont Royal et des restaurants. Parfait pour un séjour à Montréal !

Appartement conforme à ce qui est présentė sur les photos. Appartement super  ensoleillė.
Les propriétaires  habitent juste en dessous. Ils sont sympathiques !
Great location, very spacious, bright kitchen - had everything we needed for a comfortable 5 nights in Montreal.
Nice and Clean place . With all basic amenities.

We had a good stay at Philippe’s apartment. It’s basic, but it has everything you need and is great value for the price. We really appreciated the self-check in and key code lock, which made our arrival and departure really easy and we didn’t have to worry about trying to coordinate around specific times. It was also great not to have to worry about carrying around keys! The apartment is within walking distance (right down the block) to a grocery store, liquor store, pharmacy as well as some restaurants and coffee shops and is also not a far walk to more options on Avenue du Mont-Royal. There is a bus stop right at the corner beside the apartment, but it is a bit longer of a walk to the metro (around 15 minutes). Just a note that the bed is a little on the firmer side, but that might just personal preference. Apartment comes with all the basics you’ll need. Philippe was easy to communicate with and very responsive. Great spot for a home base in Montreal!

L’appartement est silencieuse & est très bien situé pour l’autobus et métro. Beaucoup de restaurants a proximité.
Communication rapide avec Philippe!

J’y retournerai certainement à ma prochaine visite à Montréal !

The place was as expected in the pictures , you could  say a little better even in real . The host , was really nice and flexible with the arriving time since I got late . He lives in the floor downstair of the Airbnb so he was really helpful and caring during my stay . Thank You for your hospitality.
This is a clean, well-appointed property in a lovely area.  Communication was excellent, and everything was cozy and comfortable.

name: Sophisticated, waterfront living w/ resort pool, hot tub, & beach access
summary: This property is a 1364  square feet,  3 Bedroom, 2 bathroom accommodation located in Kaanapali.  Sophisticated, waterfront living w/ resort pool, hot tub, & beach access offers 1 Sofa bed, 2 Twin bed, 2 King bed. It can host 8 people.  This accommodation features washer/dryer. Please see the description below or inquire for more details!
space: Aloha! Get ready to host your next big family gathering or holiday celebration at this luxurious oceanside resort condo with updated amenities, private lanai, resort pool and hot tub, and convenient beach access. This three-bedroom rental is at one of Maui’s most popular beachfront resorts, Kaanapali Shores, located right on North Kaanapali Beach. Spend your days in paradise snorkeling and surfing in the crystal clear waters (parking is available at the resort for a daily fee*). Luxurious, spacious, and oh so sophisticated, this fourth-floor oceanfront condo is a magical Maui destination featuring plenty of essential conveniences. With panoramic ocean views that are thoroughly jaw-dropping, you'll have a front-row seat to stunning sunsets and seasonal whale watching. Step through the front door and into a sunlit and airy great room with 20-foot cathedral ceilings, plush rattan-framed furniture, and sliding door access out to the private lanai. The living area has a sofa and two matchin
description: This property is a (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) square feet,  3 Bedroom, 2 bathroom accommodation located in Kaanapali.  Sophisticated, waterfront living w/ resort pool, hot tub, & beach access offers 1 Sofa bed, 2 Twin bed, 2 King bed. It can host 8 people.  This accommodation features washer/dryer. Please see the description below or inquire for more details! Aloha! Get ready to host your next big family gathering or holiday celebration at this luxurious oceanside resort condo with updated amenities, private lanai, resort pool and hot tub, and convenient beach access. This three-bedroom rental is at one of Maui’s most popular beachfront resorts, Kaanapali Shores, located right on North Kaanapali Beach. Spend your days in paradise snorkeling and surfing in the crystal clear waters (parking is available at the resort for a daily fee*). Luxurious, spacious, and oh so sophisticated, this fourth-floor oceanfront condo is a magical Maui destination featuring plenty of essential convenie
house_rules: - The responsible renter must be at least 21 years of age to book. Guests under 21 must be accompanied by a parent or legal guardian for the duration of the reservation. - No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval. - The property shall not be used by more than the number of adults and children listed in your reservation. - All guests shall abide by Vacasa’s good neighbor policy and shall not engage in illegal activity. Quiet hours are from 10 p.m. to 8 a.m. - If early check-in is available for your reservation, you will be notified by 9am on the morning of your arrival by email. Late check-out is offered whenever possible for a small fee. - No smoking of any kind is permitted anywhere on the premises. - No commercial photography or filming is permitted on the property. Tents or other structures may not be erected. - Renter is liable for any damage to the property and agrees to accept charges to the card on file should damage occur

host.host_about:
Greetings from Team Vacasa Vacation Rentals of Hawaii, LLC! Yes, we're a professional property management company—but we're also real people, trusted by the owners of vacation homes to take care of all the heavy lifting like housekeeping, reservations, maintenance, and guest care. (Because, to be honest, renting out a vacation home really can be a full-time job!)


We have local teams on the ground to take care of our homes and our guests. We like to think of it as the best of both worlds: you can enjoy a one-of-a-kind vacation experience in a unique property, only without compromising on service and convenience. You can trust that your home will be cleaned by professional housekeepers, and your calls will be answered (right away, around the clock!) by our dedicated Guest Services team. 


Check out our listings, and if you have any questions, get in touch! We'd love to help you plan your perfect getaway.

reviews.comments: This place has the best ocean view you can imagine. Beach is in downstairs, and you can watch sunset from the balcony. The facility is clean and well managed. As a matter of fact, the place is offered and maintained by a company.
Very, very convenient, delivered exactly what we wanted,  comfortable.
Great place, great view, highly recommend!!!

We had a wonderful stay at Vacasa’s space. The location is perfect- looking out at the ocean and right above a beach perfect for kids. It was great to have access to the two pools as well and towel service. We stayed here with two families with kids and the space worked well. The only thing that I would have added would have been the option for a daily cleaning service, but we also didn’t ask so perhaps it is available. Would definitely stay here again!

This place has the amenities of a resort without the "all inclusive/resort" feel. It is a beautiful grounds, and you can do you own thing, or join in the resort. We had 3 couples staying in the place and it was plenty large enough for everyone. Absolutely stunning view that did not disappoint!
Beautiful apartment with ocean view in an amazing location right at the beach.

Amazing Location!!!  We would totally stay here again for the view and the location.  The unit was a little tired and older furnishings and it got a bit warm at night - they had lots of fans for us to use. Loved watching the Whales off the deck!
Everything is wonderful. 地理位置绝佳,走路五分钟就有超市,还有一些小饭店｡阳台正对大海,不用出海也能看到鲸鱼｡设施齐全,度假村内还有娱乐活动可以参加｡

Nice place with great ocean view. When the weather was nice we enjoyed very beautiful sunset views from the lanai. Home is very clean, location is great, easy to access to several beaches in west Maui. If you plan to visit Haleakala and Hana, keep in mind you will drive 30-40 minutes first to Kahului and then get to those areas. Traffic seemed to get worse than when I first visited 5 years ago, but it's still nothing compared to where I live in the Washington DC metro area.

name: Sunny and bright 2 bedrooms + Free Private Parking
summary: Bright and sun filled 2 bedroom apartment one block from the waters of Sydney Harbor and the Rose Bay ferry which is a stunning boat ride direct to the Opera House or Watsons Bay.  Private car space included.  Located on a very quiet beautiful tree lined street, there are many cafes and restaurants 1 block away.  Walk to Bondi Beach.  Buses and the ferry are all next to the apartment.  Loads of free street parking is also available.
space: The apartment faces the garden to the west and is very peaceful, The sun fills the apartment until after sunset.
description: Bright and sun filled 2 bedroom apartment one block from the waters of Sydney Harbor and the Rose Bay ferry which is a stunning boat ride direct to the Opera House or Watsons Bay.  Private car space included.  Located on a very quiet beautiful tree lined street, there are many cafes and restaurants 1 block away.  Walk to Bondi Beach.  Buses and the ferry are all next to the apartment.  Loads of free street parking is also available. The apartment faces the garden to the west and is very peaceful, The sun fills the apartment until after sunset. You will enjoy the entire apartment. Rose Bay is a great spot as its on Sydney Harbor with lots of great eating options and activities.  Stand up paddle boarding, the ferry is the best way to explore Sydney!, golf course, and beaches are all walking distance. Rose Bay ferry terminal is just a 5 minute walk away on the Harbour.  It will take you directly to Circular Quay, Watsons Bay and many other amazing places on the Harbour.  There are multipl
neighborhood_overview: Rose Bay is a great spot as its on Sydney Harbor with lots of great eating options and activities.  Stand up paddle boarding, the ferry is the best way to explore Sydney!, golf course, and beaches are all walking distance.
transit: Rose Bay ferry terminal is just a 5 minute walk away on the Harbour.  It will take you directly to Circular Quay, Watsons Bay and many other amazing places on the Harbour.  There are multiple bus routes from my street.  Free and plentiful street parking.
access: You will enjoy the entire apartment.

host.host_about: I am a big traveler, 44 countries so far.  I work in film and tv production.

reviews.comments:
Trent is a really nice guy who will help you in any way he can.
When we arrived the place was a bit dirty but that wasn't Trents fault because he had been awayand his apartment had been out for lease.
And he made a really good job with fixing everything so we could have a happy stay!
And we did:)

The location is great and the apartment is lovely:)
The room is pretty small but it didn't bother us at all.

Can recommend this place to anyone, close to Bondi and to small hidden beautiful beaches around the coastline.
It's a very nice location, Trend was a very kindly young man. We have all we need. Thank you Trend, we hope we come back again

Trent was a great host. The apartment is situated in a beautiful, quiet and peaceful part of Rose Bay. The apartment was extremely clean. We felt right at home and even shared a glass of red with our friendly host. Highly recommend.
Excellent host really friendly and accommodating. My girlfriend and I really enjoyed are stay here great location plus it was a nice change to the busy hostel life we are used to

Trents place is in a lovely quiet tree lined street in Rose Bay. It is tastefully decorated and very comfortable. We didn't get to meet Trent, but he was great with his communication and how to check in. I would recommend it for a short stay convenient to activities in the eastern suburbs.

Trent's place is located in a beautiful street meters away from bus stops, café's, golfcourse, etc. We had a great time staying here as it was clean, convenient and cosy. Trent is lovely and will give you all the help or space you need. Highly recommended!!

Trents place is an awesome experience while staying in Sydney. Its tidy, organised and just a short walk to the beach and the ferry. Trent is super cool and makes sure you will have an awesome time. His place is located in a quite neighbourhood. Definitely recommend this place! :)
Trent is a great host. Very friendly and communication was easy. His place is just as described, clean, bright, airy and located in a beautiful area. Thanks Trent. Highly recommend!
Overall the place was great. Located in a beautiful neighborhood very close to a few shops and restaurants. The apartment was very clean and nice to stay in

Trent's apartment is accurate to the listing and photos - a light and airy space in rose bay close to the city via the nearby ferry. Check-in was a breeze - definitely recommend this place for a stay in Sydney!
We had a fabulous stay at Trent's place. Conveniently located to cafe's, shops, beaches, transport and parks. Would definitely stay there again. Thanks for a lovely stay!

Great place to stay exactly how described. As a first time Airbnb was a little apprehensive but I needn't have worried as Trent was great and so was the area. Very close to a variety of shops which has everything you need. A very short walk to ferry terminal, Circular Quay 10mins away. The area was great and felt safe to walk around in the evening. Rose Bay itself is a short stroll away with places to eat ect. Although unfortunately didn't meet Trent he was only a text/phone call away. Key pick up was easy and straight forward. Would highly recommend.

We found the apartment to be very comfortable. The location is very convenient close to transport, shops, restaurants and the beach. Although we didn't meet Trent he responded to us via email promptly. If you are without a car there is a GoGet (car sharing service) vehicle that is parked opposite the apartment.

Pleasant, comfortable, spacious apartment. Clean and presentable. Bathroom towels are provided, bedrooms are nicely made up. Apartment owner fantastic for communication in the lead up to booking and confirming.  Apartment is welcoming and would recommend. Apartment is on first floor, so there is one flight of stairs to consider. While off-street parking is available, it may be a bit tricky to find as Rose Bay is a very popular area- keep in mind.
A great unit in an awesome spot. Close to cafes and Rose bay shops. Very nice street and quiet, well equipped living space. Would definitely recommend and would stay there again

Trents apartment is in a beautiful street, short walk to the ferry terminal where we were able to take a quick 10 minute trip to Circular Quay to spend our day. The apartment itself was comfortable and as described. Minimal to zero noise from neighbours or cars. TV is amazing ! Thanks for having us :)
This 2 bedroom apartment is in a great location, handy to shops, cafes, ferry, etc. Clean & tidy with large screen TV. Good value & we would stay here again!
The decor and styling of the apartment is extra special and unique. Loved the candles. Nice location - close to shops surrounded by huge, old trees <3
Good
Trent and his host were quick to respond and made the place homely. Was an absolute pleasure staying there and would stay again / recommend
Great apartment close to shops and restaurants. Really easy city access as short walk to ferry.
时尚的家居,很好的位置,附近披萨不错,也有餐厅及小超市,离轮渡大约步行10分钟,很方便｡

Fabulous Apartment with everything you need. Clean and comfortable - exactly as photographed. Quiet area with everything at your doorstep. Local cafes and restaurants are all excellent. Beaches and shops in wAlking distance. Marina & ferry close by and If your active, run to Bondi and surrounds and back.

Great location - easy walk out along harbour and to ships and restaurants. Easy bus to city. Street parking all day and ok to get. Two bedrooms are at either end of the apt so very private from each other so suit two couples well. Nice light and breeze.
Trent was hospitable and his sunny apartment in leafy Balfour is central, close to Plumer shopping centre and the ferry, straight into Circular Key.  Easy transport everywhere.
We spent one night in Terent's place and have to admit that communication between us was great. He responded very quickly to all my questions. Please was ok.
In an ideal location, this unit is well appointed, comfortable and convenient.  The off-street parking is much appreciated.

This unit was perfect for my husband and I and our two young girls. The unit was very spacious and nice and bright. The unit was close to public transport and some amazing restaurants. I would def stay here again!

Clean and charmingly decorated. Neighbourhood was quiet, pretty and close to bay. Easy to walk to wharf and catch a ferry over to Circular Quay.

Did not meet Trent but communication was quick and easy. 

Parking available on street for free but can be busy so be prepared that you might have to park further away. We were only there for a night so didn’t have much luggage, but might need to factor that in if you do have a lot of luggage. Posting does mention a private parking space, not sure if there is a separate space other than street or if this just refers to the street but we utilised street.


Towels provided. No toiletries so best to pack some.

Tip: we found it difficult to unlock the main door by mailbox but there is another door around the other side that was much easier to open with the key.

Wifi only worked for about an hour and then we had no wifi at all. Other than that, it’s a great unit in a nice neighbourhood and would recommend.

Trent was prompt and clear in his communications. We did a last minute booking and Trent organised the cleaners to ensure a clean apartment with our arrival. The apartment is located on a quiet residential area. One block away to the sea and a short walk to the ferry. It is a peaceful area and there is plenty of space in the apartment. We found it comfortable and homely with lots of plants and a beautiful kitchen. Would recommend!
Great location, leafy neighbourhood, spacious, walk to harbour, cafes, ferries. Very enjoyable stay, highly recommended.

Amazing location and great value. Quirky and comfortable in a character art-deco apartment block; peaceful street, lovely to wake up to the sounds of the many birds that reside in the tree lined street. This place showcases Sydney's affluent Eastern Suburb vibe and is only a  5 min walk to a ferry terminal.

 IMPORTANT: note there is no air conditioning or heating - this was fine for my stay but in mid-winter this could be an issue.
Great spacious 2 bedroom apartment. Communication with Trent was easy with quick responses. Would recommend.
Excellent location. Lovely decor. We will stay again.
Cute, convenient 2nd floor apartment with limited street parking.
Stay met Trent's high expectations with great communication, and an apartment that matched the brief perfectly. Great location for events east of Sydney. Highly recommend.
Enjoyed our stay second time that we have stayed here. Great location and the apartment is very nice.
It is nice place for a family with 4, near by the markets,  public transportation and easy to move.
Awesome location, great apartment with everything you need and a short walk to the ferry - Thanks Trent!
Place is in an amazing location. Clean and nice decor. Host was very responsive.

Great apartment with all the stuff you need in it. Great location 7 minutes walk to the ferry terminal. Trent is a great host who will come address any question you may have. We enjoyed staying at the property

Trent's apartment is lovely for a stay in Sydney, close to bus and ferry stops. The space is beautifully decorated and the beds are very comfortable. Would recommend this place to friends and come here again!
Great place to stay
Great location and lovely apartment. Very central. Only a 10min walk to the ferry station which goes direct to circular quay, walked from Bondi beach 35mins.  Would stay here again :)

Great Apartment in a silent neighborhood. But everything is easy to reach by ferry or car.
We really enjoyed our stay there! Would definitely stay there again
The place is so quiet and peaceful. You can use public transport easily.
Great location, clean and tidy, easy communication with host. We loved it!

A great little apartment in a beautiful suburb, with shops nearby and an almost Melbourne feel. 1920s deco building with an apartment that feels funky with some nice touches. Two good sized beds and a killer tv but no dining table. Spotlessly clean and owner quick and responsive to our questions. We loved it and will stay there again without a doubt.
Amazing location ,great place , great response rate ,would go there again

The location is great. Close to restaurants and cafes as well as public transport. The apartment is spacious and sunny and the private car park is a real bonus. Communication from Trent was great and he was quick to respond both before and during my stay
Great communication, space and location!

Great location in Rose bay with the convenience of an easy ferry ride to the city. It’s a good size 2 bedroom apartment on the 2nd floor. Beds were very comfortable, kitchen has all you need and there’s a big tv with good wifi. Great shops for supplies, coffee, pizza and take out foods.
The only small negatives were difficulty getting out of the parking area and lack of seating in the living area.

Thank you Trent for your prompt replies to all our enquiries before and during our 3 week stay at your home.  We were very comfortable there.  It was ideal for visiting our family and would definitely stay there again on future visits, if we had the opportunity.  Location was excellent with shops close by for every day needs and with public transport – buses and ferry - at the end of the street.

A very spacious home, plenty of kitchen utensils great heating perfect all round.
A great location and a very accommodating host.
Great location, in the heart of Rosebay. Clean and spacious two bedroom apartment within a lovely Artdeco building. Good value for money. Easy communication with Trent. Would stay again.

Great apartment in a fantastic location.  Close by are small shops, restaurants, pharmacy, bakery, convenience store and wine shop. Close to public transportation, this is a must if you don’t want to drive all the time, or pay for parking in downtown Sydney (expensive). We didn’t see the host, but we had no problems communicating with him. Any questions we had were quickly answered. We had the apartment to ourselves, and the place was nicely decorated. Having a parking spot was nice. Street parking is available, although you usually didn’t get a spot close to the house, so having a reserved parking spot (in the back of the building) was a great benefit.

Rose Bay is suburb east of Sydney, but by using the Sydney Ferry (get an Opal card) you get to cruise on the water to downtown Sydney with amazing views of Sydney Harbor all the way. Ten minute walk to the Ferry, and a fifteen minute cruise. Within a half hour, you’re in downtown Sydney by the Opera House, Harbor Bridge, Royal Botanic Gardens, etc.  You can also use the bus/train, to travel downtown (~45 minutes), but why bother when you can see Sydney from the harbor. We were very happy that we were able to stay here.
a nice clean apartment, if you need to be in that area it's a great location. Great communication from the host.

Trent's apartment is a lovely, stylish place in a great location. It was ideal for our needs as we were visiting family nearby. if you want access to the many attractions that Sydney has to offer, but don't want to stay in the city, this would be an ideal base as it is an attractive area with great transport links.
Great location and excellent communication from Trent, Thanks
Great location - very accessible to the ferry, beaches, great restaurants.
Great location, short walk to the ferry and local eats. Prompt communication and a wonderful apartment. The car park was very convenient also, would highly recommend this stay.

name: Great location with pool, gym and sauna!
summary: Great location in shared apartment close to city! The Flat itself is very big and spacious with a huge living room, private courtyard and open kitchen area. Oh, and I forgot to mention that the building has a Sauna, pool and Gym too! It is located just next to the park in case you prefer outdoor exercise.  5 min walk from the bus stops that take you straight to the city or to the beach :)
description: Great location in shared apartment close to city! The Flat itself is very big and spacious with a huge living room, private courtyard and open kitchen area. Oh, and I forgot to mention that the building has a Sauna, pool and Gym too! It is located just next to the park in case you prefer outdoor exercise.  5 min walk from the bus stops that take you straight to the city or to the beach :)

host.host_about:
Clean and quiet person. Love to travel and discover new places.
While traveling, I spent must of my time in museums and exploring the streets of new cities

reviews.comments:
Me and my girlfriend stayed eleven nights at Andreas place and we were really sad to leave. Very good room with a nice own bathroom. Also a nice kitchen with a big living room. We really liked the gym, pool and the sauna because they are very clean and almost always empty. So you can relax really well because you are almost always alone. We used it almost every day!
The location is perfect as it is only 5 minutes by feet to many different bus stops, coles, restaurants and bars. The bus takes you within 10 minutes to the city but you can walk there aswell. 
Andrea is a very friendly person and answered always very fast when we had any questions and her roommates are also very friendly and helpful. 
I have nothing bad to say to the place of Andrea and we wish we stayed longer.

We had a nice stay, the place is close to public transport which brings you downtown in 10-15min. Andrea's room and ensuite bathroom were very clean. Andrea was very nice and acomodating, I would definitely stay there again.

name: Unique 3-storey apartment in Soho Heritage Bldg
summary: This stand-alone apartment with 3 floors is in a unique refurbished heritage building, fully furnished, and located in the trendy SoHo district in Central with easy access to bars, restaurants, and transportation (including MTR).
space: This apartment is located above a small bar that we also own. It is the only apartment space in this building and requires a 2-storey walk-up. The apartment is fully furnished, recently renovated, and with few personal belongings.  On the first floor of the apartment is the living room (with sofa bed), tv, work desk, dining table, and kitchen with fridge, microwave, stove-top, and all the standard utensils, plates etc for your stay. On the second floor is the bedroom and bathroom with a queen bed, a single bed, and the option of a double air mattress.
description: This stand-alone apartment with 3 floors is in a unique refurbished heritage building, fully furnished, and located in the trendy SoHo district in Central with easy access to bars, restaurants, and transportation (including MTR). This apartment is located above a small bar that we also own. It is the only apartment space in this building and requires a 2-storey walk-up. The apartment is fully furnished, recently renovated, and with few personal belongings.  On the first floor of the apartment is the living room (with sofa bed), tv, work desk, dining table, and kitchen with fridge, microwave, stove-top, and all the standard utensils, plates etc for your stay. On the second floor is the bedroom and bathroom with a queen bed, a single bed, and the option of a double air mattress. Exclusive use of all 3 floors of the apartment. I will be available by phone or text message throughout your stay. I work in the food and beverage industry and own a cocktail bar and restaurant. Happy to provide
neighborhood_overview: The most convenient area in Central, Hong Kong – in the SoHo area with a range of food and beverage options, 2 minutes to Wyndham Street bars and lounges, and 5 minutes into Lan Kwai Fong clubbing and partying. There is a supermarket just one street uphill. For tourist attractions –  PMQ - across the street Man Mo Temple & antique street - 6 minutes walk PoHo - 5 minutes walk
notes: There is a 2 storey walk-up to the entrance of the apartment (through an office space), and the apartment is spread over 2 storeys.
transit: Taxis are easy to hail at all times of day and the apartment is only steps away from the Mid-Level escalators. Nearest MTR & CBD: 10 minute walk away TST & Mong Kok: Walk to MTR, then 8 - 10 minutes away Causeway Bay: Walk to MTR, then 5 minutes away International Airport: 15 minutes walk/8 minute taxi to Airport Express then 24 minute ride, OR 35 minutes by taxi
access: Exclusive use of all 3 floors of the apartment.
interaction: I will be available by phone or text message throughout your stay. I work in the food and beverage industry and own a cocktail bar and restaurant. Happy to provide recommendations according to your travel style.
house_rules: - No smoking inside the apartment. Please treat the home like you would your own – put your trash in the collection area and switch off lights and air-conditioning when you leave the apartment.

host.host_about: I am in the booze industry and own a bar, The Woods, and look to educate the world on spirits appreciation! You can follow me on @torichow and (Website hidden by Airbnb)

address.street: Hong Kong Island, New Territories, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Great apartment, perfect location!

Juliette's place was very clean and in a great location. The only thing was there was no trashcan out and they used the stairs as storage for her bar below, which was inconvenient. Overall a nice place.

We had such a memorable time in HK, thanks to Juliette.
Juliette's house sits in the perfect location.
Very close proximity to soho and lkf, and it also is only a block or so away from famous restaurants (chom chom and ho lee fook are my favorites and are located less than 3-5 mins walk from Juliette's apt) yet very serene in the apt. You can't hear any noise. 
Contacting with Juliette was very convenient. She was very prompt with replies, informative with what's around the area, and had clear guidelines. 
The only thing that brought up some concerns was that  one of our friends in hk came over to visit and passed out on the couch after a long night of going out in lkf which wasn't our plan. We apologize for this and inviting someone over if that was not allowed. I am not sure how she found this out but we just assumed the first floor cafe workers are her relatives. haha 
Overall, Juliette's apt is the "it-place" if you're looking for both HK actions right in the center of the city and peaceful serene sleep. Bed was big and comfortable and bathroom was clean. Though we didn't have any toilet paper (which took us 30 minutes looking for a store that sells tp rolls - turns out it's very close from the apt) or hot water for 3 days, we still recommend Juliette's apt. REALLY. It didn't bother us so much so we didn't inform Juliette, and I'm sure if you inform her she'll get right down to have it fixed for you. 
One thing to be careful though! Be aware of the very dark and narrow staircase (especially if you had some fun night out). 

This was my first airbnb experience and was quite fun. Thank you very much Juliette.
It's perfect location. Recommended.

pros-
1. Great Location! (From clubs to convenient stores, all around this area!)
2. Good space 'inside' the Appartment (even though the pictures look much better than actual, but by HongKong standards, it was good space) 
3. Helpful host!
4. Clean bedding and towels, etc.

Cons-
1. Extremely narrow staircase (if you're traveling with luggage, the 3 story climb would be cumbersome)
2. A few essentials in the kitchen were missing (also a very cluttered kitchen, not properly organised)
Great value and location
Great place in perfect location! Juliette is very responsive , would recommend to stay there
The flat is well located and very big. It has also a roof top perfect if you are a smoker. Thanks to Juliette!

Had a great time in HK with Juliett's place. 
Especially the location was amazing that I could go to Soho, Central and Lan kwaifong by walk easily. 
Also there are lots of bars and cozy restaurants. 

The space is really cozy and big to stay.

Julliette’s place is in the best location, right in the middle of all the best little bars and restaurants in SOHO. Communication with Juliette was always easy and her tips were extremely helpful. Thanks for a great stay!
정말 위치가 최고였어요~ 다만 홍콩 특성상 습기때문에 침구가 눅눅하고 바퀴벌레두 있구요 ㅠ 겨울에 난방 안되있어서 추웠는데 히터가져다 주셧어요..엘레베이터가 없어서 짐들고 계단 올라갈때 힘들었지만 위치가 좋아서 다음번에 또 갈만한 가치는 있습니다. 집 굉장히 넓어요!!

We were chocked when we realised how amazing the location was. Located on top of our favourite restaurant and only five minute walks to great places like chom chom, feather boa, iron fairies, oddies foodies etc. The location itself makes it worth your money. The apt is clean but a bit cluttered. The sheets had some suspicious stains and the towels were a bit worn out but It’s really ok for the price we paid. If you’re picky with linen and such just bring your own it’s no big deal. The apartment is spacious and has all amenities you could need like well functioning WiFi, ok aircon and hot water. WILL DEFINITELY stay here next time in Hong Kong!! Super good value for money! Thank you Victoria :)
We enjoyed our stay very much and the apartment was quite roomy for us. Would stay again if we had the choice!
For the location it's perfect, a large amount of space, 3 of us stayed here very comfortably. The roof terrace is a really nice touch especially in Hong Kong, highly recommended

The location of this place is amazing! Can walk to many shops, restaurants, bars etc... can't get any better when it comes to location.

I felt kind of cheated when I viewed pics of the tv in the ads for the apt, but the tv did not work. Tried to contact host and she never responded. Also, the air conditioning isn't the best.... left the apt very humid. The apartment would be sooo much better if cleaned up and in cluttered... hard to walk on stairs with all the stuff in the way. 

This place has a lot of potential. Can't beat the location for the price!

Awesome location in vibrant, upmarket neighbourhood and close to mid-level escalators. Unbeatable value for money in this part of the city! The apartment was very comfortable  and spacious by Hong Kong standards, but can be a little noisy on some nights, which is the flipside of being close to popular bars and restaurants. Only slight disappointment was that the wifi was quite slow and dropped occasionally (probably not too much of an issue unless you need to keep on top of your work while away). Overall, we loved our stay and will definitely choose this apartment when back in Hong Kong!
Victoria's place is awesome. It's huge by HK standards, and great for getting some work done too. The position really can't be beat  - you are right in the middle of the soho action!

Amazing location, doesn’t get much better! Plenty of space for the three of us. Victoria was super easy to communicate with and very helpful with her information on arrival details and local tips and tricks.

Excellent location and great host , Victoria was easy going and precise with information about the area and directions , apartment was very comfortable and cosy , well kept , looking forward to renting again 
FM

I stayed the weekend here with a few friends. We loved the location near Central/Hong Kong MTR, the pier, and the escalators. The apartment is within easy walking distance to the Peak Tram, botanical park, and tons of bars and restaurants. The bathroom is spacious and lots of large bath towels are provided. The full size bed is comfy as is the single bed. With the air-conditioning on at night, you can't even hear the noise outside. I would definitely stay here again!
The host canceled this reservation 59 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Highly recommend staying here. Great apartment in a great location. And Victoria really helped it feel like home.
The host canceled this reservation 26 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Victoria is a great host, gives amazing tips and the place is kn the perfect area for getting around and grabbing a drink or eating amazing food! The apartment is very nice and perfect for our girls trip!
Great place, awesome location!

name: Near The Galata Tower
summary: Mekanım şuraya yakın: Galata Tower ve Sensus Galata Şarap Butiği. Benim mekanımı şu yüzden seveceksiniz: semt, rahat yatak, ortam, dış mekan ve ışık. Yerim çiftler, yalnız maceralar ve kurumsal seyahate çıkanlar için uygundur.
